130b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan pas myur ba yang yin no/ /de bas na theg pa 'di ni dbang po rnon po'i dbang du byas pa yin no/ /de'i phyir gsungs pa/ rgyal ba'i gzhi rnams ma thob kyang/ /yid brtan par ni 'gyur ma yin/ /ji srid sa brgyad la gnas par/ /theg sman
130b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa de la yod/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir/ /rgyal ba'i sras po rab nges na/ /yid ches par ni gyur pa yis/ /theg pa che la gzhol ba yin zhes so/ /spyod pa bla na med pa ni mi mthun pa'i spyod pa gsum spangs pa ste/
130b4(rgyud 'grel): de la nus pa chung bar byed pa'i spyod pa ni/ /dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pa/ /bsten bas grub par mi 'gyur gyi/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la/ /brten nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa ste/ lus 'di ni shin tu gsos
130b5(rgyud 'grel): shing stobs yod par byas la yid shin tu dga' bar byas te/ de nas de gnyis shin tu drag par dge ba spyad pas tshar bcad kyis/ lus nyam chung ba dang yid mi dga' bas ni rnal 'byor ga la 'grub/ blo'i stobs chung ba dag ni lus shin tu gsos
130b6(rgyud 'grel): shing stobs can du byas kyang dge bas tshar gcod mi nus kyi/ 'dod chags kyi mdza' la sogs par gyur du dogs nas sbyangs pa'i yon tan la sogs pa brten par gsungs so/ /'dir ni blo'i stobs yod pa dag la dgongs pas longs
130b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod nyid gnang ngo/ /dge bas tshar gcod par mi nus pa ni sngags pa nyid kyang ma yin la/ longs spyod kyang ma gnang ba nyid yin no/ /g.yeng bar byed pa'i spyod pa ni/ gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/ /glegs bam klag par
131a1(rgyud 'grel): mi bya zhing/ /mchod rten bskor ba mi bya'o/ /byas na byang chub rnyed par dka' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu byang chub sgrub pa la rgyu'i gtso bo ni/ sems yin pas dang por ni sems tshar bcad cing bya ba
131a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gtsor mi bya'o/ /sems la dbang ma thob pa dag ni glegs bam klag pa la sogs pa lus dang ngag gi bya ba spyod pa na sems g.yeng bar 'gyur bas bya ba thams cad btang ste/ ci bder gnas pas sems legs par blta ste/ sems kyi dmigs
131a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thob nas nyon mongs pa rags pa gcod pa'i dbang thob pa na bya ba phyi rol ba spyad pa 'am/ yang na sems stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig bsgom pas chog gi lus dang ngag gi bya ba mi dgos te/ rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las/ mtshan
131a4(rgyud 'grel): mar ces pas mtshan bcas kyi/ /dngos grub rgyal ba dam pa bzhed/ /mtshan ma med la gnas pa ni/ /mtshan mar bcas pa'ang grub tu rung/ /de bas rnam pa thams cad du/ /mtshan med la gnas par bya zhes gsungs so/ /slob dpon ye shes
131a5(rgyud 'grel): snying pos kyang bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel pa las/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad bos pa bzhin du 'du ste/ zad pa shes pa zag bcas kyang zhes pa'i lung dang ldan par
131a6(rgyud 'grel): bshad de/ /de bas na bdag gi nyon mongs pa spang ba dang/ gzhan gyi don rtsol ba dang bcas pa 'byung bar bya ba la ni stong pa nyid 'ba' zhig bsgom pa 'am/ dang por sems 'ba' zhig dbang du byas la de'i rjes la bya ba gzhan spyad pa 'di ni
131a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi mchog go/ 'di ni kri ya dang/ yo ga dang/ u pa ya dag la med pas/ rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul spyod pa rnam pa gsum las spros pa med pa'i spyod pa 'am/ shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa dang mthun pa'o/ /dngos por
131b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i spyod pa ni/ sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga/ /rnam rtog spang phyir ci rigs bsten zhes brjod pa ste/ 'di ni gtsang pa'o/ /'di ni mi gtsang ba'o zhes rtog pa nyid 'ching ba yin pa'i phyir/ sdig pa'i she shin tu smad pa mi dang rta dang ba lang dang khyi dang/
131b2(rgyud 'grel): glang po che dag dang/ thabs kyis zin par spyod pa dag gis 'chi bzlog pa'i bdud rtsi khu ba/ /phrag dang bshang ba dang/ gci ba dang/ mi'i sha dag ci rigs pa'i tshul gyis stong par bsam zhing/ yang de dag nyid lha'i bdud rtsi ltar bsams nas /
131b3(rgyud 'grel): chags pa med par spyad na rim gyis mi gtsang ba dang/ gtsang ba'i rnam par rtog pa mi 'byung la/ de'i tshe chos thams cad la tha dad pa'i rtog pa 'byung ba brdzun yin par nges pa'i shes pa 'byung ba dang/ mi ma yin pa kha cig de nyid kyis de la yongs su
131b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba 'byung zhing chos bzhin du skyob pa dang de'i gdams ngag 'dzin par 'gyur ba yod do/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga ni mtshon pa ste/ yul gang na sha la sogs pa mi gtsang bar 'dzin pa de dang de nyid la ma chags par spyad do/ /mnyam pa'i shes
131b5(rgyud 'grel): par thob pa na bdag gi don du de dag spyad par bya mi dgos so/ /'di ni spyod pas myur pa'o/ /de ltar thabs mkhas pa bcu gcig po 'di dag gis 'phags pa na 'di thabs kyi theg pa zhes bya'o/ /theg pa chen po'i yang chen po zhes bya'o/ /thabs myur
131b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ sla ba dang/ mang ba dang/ mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ /gang yang/ don gcig nyid na'ang ma rmongs dang/ thabs mang dka' ba med phyir dang/ /dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas/ /sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags zhes bshad pa dang/
131b7(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa rnam par dag pa dang/ grogs kyi mthu dang spyod pa yis/ /blo ldan rnams kyi theg pa ni/ /chen po'i chen po nyid du bsgrags zhes pa la sogs pas theg pa 'di'i che ba 'di'i che ba nyid brjod pa yang tshul snga ma dag nyid du 'dus par blta'o//
132a1(rgyud 'grel): mdor bsdus pa 'di brjod do/ gsang sngags ni gnyis te/ ngo bo nyid kyi gsang sngags thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa dang/ btags pa'i gsang sngags lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang phrin las dang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang mchod pa dang
132a2(rgyud 'grel): bstod ba la sogs ba'o/ de'i dbang gis gdul bya yang gnyis te/ mchog dang/ mchog ma yin pa'o/ /mchog gis ni sngar bshad pa'i thabs bcu gcig po ma lus par sgrub po/ /mchog ma yin pas ni re zhig rnam par byang ba'i sgo khyad par can
132a3(rgyud 'grel): la zhugs pa tsam las thabs de dag bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no/ /'on kyang de la'ang brnyas par mi bya ste/ ji ltar gsungs pa/ dper na mar gyis gsang ba'i snod/ /me yi dbus su gzhag gyur na/ /mar sar steng du zhu 'gyur zhing/ /snod kyi dri
132a4(rgyud 'grel): ma 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sh+rI he ru ka yi/ /mtshan gyis sdig pa 'jig par 'gyur zhes dpal bde mchog phyi ma'i phyi ma las so/ /'di ni skur pa spang pa'o/ /'bras bu yang dag par 'grub pa dang/ /las la ni khyad par med de/ ji srid
132a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' khyab par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyis khyab la/ ji srid ye shes kyis khyab pa de srid skus khyab pa'i phyir dang/ dang po sems can ma lus pa dang/ zhing ma lus pa sbyar ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang/ spangs pa dang/ ye shes la khyad
132a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang/ slob pa'i gnas skabs na yang sa dang po man chad bgrod pa tha dad pa srid kyang/ sa dang po chos kyi dbyings mthong nas/ lam ma lus pa rang bzhin gyis des par shes pa'i phyir ro/ /'di ni sgro 'dogs pa spong ba'o/ /de ltar gzhung 'di bkod
132a7(rgyud 'grel): pas bdag/ spros dang bral ba'i gnas thob shog/ 'gro ba'ang mdza' gnyis bral ba yi/ /lam du gyur du 'jug par shog /rdo rje theg pa'i mdza' gnyis sel ba zhes bya ba slob dpon dz+nyA na sh+rIs bkod pa rdzogs so// //
132b1(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid mthong ba'i lam zhes bya ba bzhugs so// / #/ /rgya gar skad du/ tat+tA mArgA barsha na nA mo/ bod skad du/ de nyid mthong ba'i lam zhes bya ba/ spyan ras gzigs mgo na de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi zhing 'byor pa 'gro mgon thugs
132b2(rgyud 'grel): rje can/ /ri khrod zhabs la gus pas phyag 'tshal te/ sngon las rje yis byin brlabs rgyud kyi don/ /zhabs kyi rdul la ma reg chos 'di ni/ /dad brtson ldan dang bdag nyid brjed 'jigs pas/ /de nyid mthong ba'i lam 'di 'dir bshad bya/ /
132b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pas 'di gsungs pa/ /gdul bya'i rim pas gzhag pa ste/ dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya/ /de rjes bslab pa'i gnas bcu nyid/ /de nas bye brag smra la bslab/ mdo sde pa yang de nas bstan/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa de bzhin te/
132b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas dbu ma pa yang bstan/ /sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyin/ /dgyes rdor rgyud nas de bstan pas/ /gso sbyong gnas bcu bye brag dang/ /chung ba'i mdo sde nyan thos lam/ /theg pa chen
132b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i mdo sde dang/ rnal 'byor spyod dang dbu ma'i chos/ /sngags gzhan dgyes rdor brjod pa nyid/ /bde ba'i lam dang 'bras bur bsngags/ /de la dang po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas pa dbang po rnon pos mdo dang 'dul ba ltar yang shes
132b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /'dir rgyud ltar skal pa dang ldan pas bla ma mnyes pas bsgrub ste/ de yang dang po/ thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs/ /zhes pas theg pa gsum la bslab par bya ste/ nyan thos dang/
132b7(rgyud 'grel): rang sangs rgyas gnyis la 'jug par 'dod pas dang po gso sbyong bya ba dang/ gnyis pa bslab pa bsrung ba dang/ gsum pa chos la bslab pa'o/ /de yang byams pas zhus pa'i mdo las/ dang po skyabs dang gso sbyong bya/ gnyis pa bslab pa'i rim pa 
133a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /gsum pa chos dag de la bstan/ /zhes pas so/ /skyabs la bdun te/ dang po dang/ lus ngag yid kyi sbyor pa dang/ rten dang/ de la mchod pa dang/ dus dang/ yon tan dang/ mi nyams par bya ba'o/ /dang po la gnyis te/ shes
133a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dag pa'i mkhan po dang slob dpon no/ /sbyor ba ni lus gus pa dang/ dag 'jam pas brjod pas yid chos la/ /dag pa dang gsum mo/ /rten mchog tu gyur pa ni dkon mchog go/ /rten la mchod pa ni ci 'byor pa yis mchod pa bri? lus dbul ba'o/ /dus
133a3(rgyud 'grel): ni 'di nas zhes pa dang/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar gnyis so/ /yon tan ni sngon gyi sdig pa thams cad 'byang zhing phyi ma'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad bde ba'o/ /mi nyams par bya ba la gsum ste/ sangs rgyas la skyabs nas 'jig rten pa'i lha spangs pa dang/
133a4(rgyud 'grel): chos la skyabs nas srog mi gcod pa dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs nas mu stegs dang mi 'grogs pa'o/ /bslab pa bsrung ba la gnyis te/ rten dang bslab pa dngos so/ /rten la gsum ste/ gzhan las skye ba dang/ rang las skye ba dang/ gnyi ga las skye ba'i
133a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan las skye ba gsum ste/ mkhan po dang slob dpon te/ dang po bar chad med pas tshul khrims thob pa dang/ nus pa dang ldan pas sdom pa la gnas pa dang/ bdag dang gzhan gyi nyes pa 'chos dgongs pas mkhas pas te/ de gsum dang
133a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa las bslab pa skye'o/ /rang las skye ba la gnyis te/ spyi dang bye brag go /spyi la drug ste/ 'gro ba khyad par du 'phags pa ni/ mi tsam ma yin te/ gling khyad par du 'phags pa'i gling 'di tsam yin te/ rigs khyad par du 'phags
133a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze'i rigs dang/ rje rigs so/ /rigs tsam ma yin te/ gzugs khyad par du 'phags pa skyes pa drang bud med tsam yin te/ lus khyad par 'phags pa dbang po tshang ba/ dbang po tshang ba tsam gyis mi mchog ste/ shes pa dang
133b1(rgyud 'grel): sems khyad par du 'phags pa rgan gzhon spangs nas lus dar ba'o/ /bye brag spyi dang ldan pa des nam blangs pa'i dus der skye'o/ /gnyi ga las skye ba la gsum ste/ mkhan slob la the tshom med pa dang/ chos dang chos kyi yon tan la the tshom med
133b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bslab pa bsrungs pa dang thob par the tshom med pas skye'o/ /bslab pa dngos la brgyad de/ rten gyi khyad par gyis bslab pa'i rim pa dang/ bslab par bya ba'i ngo bo dang/ nyes pa'i tshang dang/ bcos pa'i thabs dang/ nges pa skyed pa dang/ dus
133b3(rgyud 'grel): ma nges par bslab pa dang/ yon tan dang/ thob pa'o dus bstan pa'o/ /bslab pa'i rim pa la so so thar pa rigs bdun gyi rim pas bslab pa ste/ sngo ba'i 'dod pa mi mthun te/ yang 'dir bsnyen gnas dang/ dge bsnyen la bzhi ste lnga dang/ dge
133b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang/ dge slong dang bdun gyis bslab pa'o/ /ngo bo la gnyis te spyi dang bye brag go /spyi la yang gnyis te rtsa ba 'am rang bzhin gyi sdig bsdoms pa dang yan lag gam bcas pa'i sdig pa sdom pa'o/ /bye brag ni bsnyen gnas la rtsa ba bzhi ste brgyad do/
133b5(rgyud 'grel): sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen la srog mi gcod pa dang/ rtsa ba gzhan gang rung gcig phal cher srung ba la rtsa ba gsum/ yongs su rdzogs pa la rtsa ba gsum dang 'dod log bsrung/ tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen ni rtsa ba bzhi dang chad bsrung ba'o/ /dge tshul
133b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis rtsa ba bzhi yan lag bdun/ chang dang glu gar rtse 'jo dang/ /rgyan dang kha dog 'chad ba dang/ mal stan chen po gser dngul gyi khri dang khri stan mthong po khru gang ba yan chad spong ba dang/ phyi dro kha zas dang/ gser dngul 'chang ba
133b7(rgyud 'grel): spong ba'o/ /mkhan po las thob pa'i rtags gsum ste/ khyim pa'i rtags gtsug phud dang/ gos dkar po spangs te/ rab tu byung ba'i rtags skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig gon pa'o/ /phyi rol mu stegs rtags stong gos g.yas la 'gel ba
134a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ spang gos dkris pa spangs nas nang pa sangs rgyas pa'i rtags stong gos g.yon du 'gel pa dang smad gos che bas zur du spung pa'o/ /mi dge ba 'jig rten pa'i rtags de dag spangs nas dge ba dge 'dun gyi rtags gseg shad
134a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lhung bzed gri khab la sogs pa mkhor bo'i rdzas bzung ba'o/ /dge slong gis shes rab can dang/ dngos kyi rtsa ba bzhi dang/ khu ba phyung ba la sogs pa lhag ma bcu gsum/ dben pa dang skyabs ma nges pa gnyis dang 'chang ba 'bral pa la sogs
134a3(rgyud 'grel): spang ba'i ltung byed sum cu dang/ ltung byed dgu bcu dang/ grong du nyal ba la sogs pa so sor bshags pa bzhi dang sham thabs la sogs pa bslab par bya ba brgya bcu rtsa gnyis dang/ /mngon sum du nga rgyal mi bya ba la sogs te nyis
134a4(rgyud 'grel): brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum bka' lung las shes par bya'o/ /'dir 'og nas ston pa'i lus ngag yid kyis mi bya ba dang bya ba rnams so/ /de nas bslab pa'i gnas bcu sbyin zhes pas mi dge ba bcu spangs la dge ba bcu bsten pa'o/ /nyes pa'i
134a5(rgyud 'grel): tshad la gnyis te/ rtsa ba dang yan lag gi'o/ /rtsa ba la lnga/ rtsa ba dang 'dra bar sbyor ba dang dngos dang/ mjug cing na ltung ba chen pos nyams/ dngos mjug gnyis byung na ltung ba spom po ste nyams/ /sbyor ba dang dngos byung na ??
134a6(rgyud 'grel): te nyams/ /sbyor ba dang 'jug byung na ltung ba phra mo ste nyams/ /re re byung na ltung byed de nyams/ lhag ma dang ma nges pa la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams la yang lnga ste/ sbyor ba dang/ dngos dang mjug rdzogs na nyes pa chen po ste nyams
134a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos mjug gnyis byung na nyes pa spom po ste nyams/ sbyor ba dang dngos byung na nyes ba chung ngu na te nyams/ sbyor ba dang mjug gnyis byung na nyes pa phra mo ste nyams/ re re byung na nyes pa med do/ bcos pa'i thabs la gnyis te/ thabs dngos dang dus so//
134b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs la bcu gcig ste rtsa ba dang yan lag gnyis yan chad dam/ bzhi man chad byung na 'gyod pas lan gsum du bskyar zhing blang/ rtsa ba'i spom po byung na sngon bzhin du blang/ chung ngu na byung na slob dpon pas de nyid blang/ phra mo byung na slob dpon
134b2(rgyud 'grel): la bshags pas thub/ ltung byed byung na 'gyod pa dang bsdams sems kyis thub/ nyes pa chen po byung ba sngon bzhin blang/ nyes pa spom po slob dpon las blang/ nyes pa chung ngu na slob dpon la bshags/ nyes pa phra mo 'gyod pa dang bsdams
134b3(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis thug nyes med phyis ma byas pas thug/ chang rtsa ba dang 'dra'o/ /rtsa ba dang yan lag ltar kun btang sems kyis btang na blang du med/ /rgas pa dang na pa dang gzhan gyi dbang la nyes pa med/ dus la bzhi ste/ bsnyen gnas kyi skabs dang ldan
134b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ nyin skabs med na zla gcig gam phyed dam brgyad kyi dus de'o/ /dge bsnyen skabs dang ldan na thun gnyis pa la blang/ skabs med na zhag lnga la blang/ dge tshul skabs dang ldan na zhag lnga tshun chad la blang/ mi ldan na zla ba gcig tshun
134b5(rgyud 'grel): chad na blang/ dge slong skabs dang ldan na de nyid nas zhag bcu mi ldan na zla ba bdun tshun chad/ des pa skyed pa dus de la rtsa ba dang yan lag nyams pa/ thabs des bcos pas thar pa thob ste/ sgrung gi dpes re re bstan pa'o/ /de yang
134b6(rgyud 'grel): srog bcad pa las thar pa/ dge slong zla ba'i 'od bya ba rigs bram ze yin pas/ lo nyi shu rtsa gcig nas bzhi bcu'i bar du nyi shur sdom pa bsrungs te/ bzhi bcu lon nas ba kun tu 'khor zhes bya bas snyan ngag yod pas rgyal po'i pho brang du
134b7(rgyud 'grel): snyan ngag blon pas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po shin tu dga' nas/ go la bdun dang bcas pa byin nas bram ze gzhan gcig gis gcig lam du khyer bas khros nas 'thabs pas kun tu 'khor ba bsad do/ /bu dge slong sems
135a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs te sbyor ba gsang bas las kyi spu gri khyer te/ bram ze khrus byed sar bsgugs te spu gri mdang nas brdar ba dang/ bram ze khrus la byung ba dang spu gris ske bcad de bsad do/ /'jug 'gyod pa med par dga' bar
135a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur te/ ro yang gar dgar gzhag go/ der kun gyis ro mthong nas 'di sus gsang snyi nas ngas pha'i mi shar gsad ces bsgrags so/ /der kun gyis kyang dpyas par gyur/ /rtags kyang gzhag pa las/ yul der nang 'go ba byung ste/ kun ka ra ba dang/
135a3(rgyud 'grel): dka' thub med pa de yang na ba dang/ nad drag pos gzir bas shin tu 'gyod pa'i sems skyes te/ lung nas sangs rgyas 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa la gong gi nyes pa rnams zhus blangs pas sangs rgyas kyis gnang nas bslob pa bskyar te/
135a4(rgyud 'grel): dge slong dri ma dang bral bar gyur te ma lhung ngo/ /yul yangs pa can gyi grong na rje'u'i rigs dge slong rin chen srung zhes bya ba cig yod pa la bsod snyoms la phyin nas khyim bdag gi mdzod mthong ste/ lha khang gi logs su sbyor bas la
135a5(rgyud 'grel): dong brkos te gnas de nas ma ga d+har sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'gro zhes dge 'dun la bsgrags nas song ste/ de nub nam phyed na bang mdzod phug ste/ be'urya dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ gser dngul rkus nas da ci'i dong du sbas te/ mjug 'gyod pa
135a6(rgyud 'grel): med par dga' bar gyur te/ de longs spyod spyod pa las nub mo rkun po rkun 'phyan gzhan dang phrad nas nor khyer ro/ /lus btags pa las shin tu 'gyod nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ gong gi nyes pa bshags nas sdom pa blangs te sangs rgyas
135a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis gnad nas dge slong rin chen 'byung gnas su gyur te stung ba med do/ /grong khyer ser skyar dge slong shes grags kyis bsod snyoms byed pa las/ re zhig na smad 'tshong ma 'byor pa rnyed bya ba'i sgor phyin te blangs nas yon byin
135b1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ smad 'tshong ma de shin tu legs par mthong ste/ chags pa'i sems kyis sbyor ba slar log nas ka bya ri'i ras g.yar nas gyon te/ 'gron bu gton cig khyer nas srong la phyin te/ da nyo na byas pa las yar shog zer te phyin chags pa skye ba'i
135b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs sna tshogs byas dngos su nyon mongs pa la zhen nas bsrubs te/ khu ba phyung ngo/ /mjug bde bar tshor nas phyis kyang phrad do/ /ring zhig na ro mdzo byung ste sdug bsngal bar gyur nas 'gyod de sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin nas sa la 'gyel
135b3(rgyud 'grel): te nyes pa rnams bshags nas bslab pa bskyar te/ dge slong zhi ba'i ye shes su gyur te ltung ba med do/ /rgyal byed kyi tshal du dge slong byang chub 'byung gnas su grags pa rgyal rigs su gyur pa zhig byung bas dad pa shin tu che nas kha sar pa Nar phyin
135b4(rgyud 'grel): pas spyan ras gzigs mthong nas yul de la kha sar pa Na zhes btags so/ /slar log nas ma ga d+har phyin nas/ bstan bcos mang po byas nas de nas nga la sangs rgyas mang pos bstan zhes bsgrags pas/ slob pa mang po yod pa las/ sangs rgyas
135b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis mkhyen nas mi btang ba las nor sa 'og tu sbas nas phyin pa dang/ sgyu ma byas pa'i sbyor ba mang po byas nas chos 'chad pa'i sbyor ba dang/ dngos su kun bsrubs pa mang ba dang/ 'jug 'gyod pa med par dga' bar longs spyod spyod pa la rgyal po'i
135b6(rgyud 'grel): chad pa byung la khang pa dang tshor nas shin tu 'gyod pa skyes te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar phyin te nyes pa kun bshags te/ slar bslab pa gsos nas dge slong rdo rje snying por gyur te ltung ba med do/ /gzhan yang 'dul ba dang mdo nas
135b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyod de/ slar gsos pas thar pa mang po dang/ gtan gyi the tshom med par phyir bcos so/ /yan lag gi nyes pa tsho yang bcos pas yang bar shes par bya'o/ /chang rtsa ba ltar shes par bya'o/ /'dir theg pa chen po dang yang sbyar bar bya'o//
136a1(rgyud 'grel): dus ma nges pa la nyin gcig gam zhag gcig gam zhag bdun nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung bar bya'o/ /yon tan la shes rab can gyis re re'i bye brag mdor blta'o/ /'dir spyi ces? bstan pa ni dge bsnyen
136a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs kyi gzhi mi las thob pa dang/ lam rten dang ldan nas bsrung ba 'bras bu dgra bcom pa thob pa'o/ /dge slong gi las la dge slong gi mdo dang 'dul bar blta'o/ /'dir gsum ste/ yon tan che ba dang/ dus nges pa dang/ yon tan nges pa'o/ /yon tan che
136a3(rgyud 'grel): ba la gnyis te/ bdud kyis bar mi chod cing lam nye ba dang/ 'bras bu nye ba'o/ lam nye ba la yang gsum ste/ sangs rgyas la skyabs pas 'jig rten pa'i lha spangs pas/ phyi mar dga' ldan dang bstan pa la byams pa dang mjal lo/ /chos la
136a4(rgyud 'grel): skyabs pas srog gcod pa spangs pas byams pa la chos nyan pa dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs te mu stegs dang ma 'grogs pas byams pa'i 'khor gyi dge 'dun dang 'grogs pa'o/ /'bras bu la yang gsum ste/ so sor thar pa'i bslab pa
136a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs bdun rdzogs pas bdag nyid sangs rgyas su gyur pa dang/ lus ngag yid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos spyad pas bdag nyid sangs rgyas pas chos ston pa'o/ /dben par gcig pu bstan pas bdag sangs rgyas nas dge 'dun gyi 'khor
136a6(rgyud 'grel): phyug pa'o/ /dus skye ba bdun na dgra bcom pa thob nges so/ /yon tan nges pa la gnyis te/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'o/ /rgyu skye ba bdun du rten khyad par du 'phags pa drug dang ldan nges la 'bras bu lhag bcas dang lhag med gnyis mthong bas
136a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /thob pa'i dus la gsum ste/ sbyor ba dang/ blang ba dang/ thob pa dngos so/ sbyor ba la gnyis te/ gong gi dpang po la sogs pa'i skyabs su 'gro ba'i sbyor ba bdun pa dang/ skyabs dngos so/ /dngos la slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag
136b1(rgyud 'grel): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog /phyogs bcu'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshogs
136b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi mchog /phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /zhes lan gsum bskyar ro/ /de la yang dbang po dang/ bskyab par bya ba dang/ dus dang skyob mkhan dang/ grangs dang/ dgos pa shugs kyis bstan pa ste drug go/ blang ba
136b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos la bskyabs pa'i yon tan shes pas blang ba las so sor thar pa'i bslab pa'i rigs bdun te/ bsnyen gnas blang ba la rang pa zo min pa dang/ blang ba gnyis rang bzo min pa la yang dbang po la sogs drug ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/
136b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob po/ /rjes su bsgrub bo/ /rjes su bgyid do zhes lan gsum bskyar ro/ /blang pa la yang dbang po la sogs
136b5(rgyud 'grel): pa drug ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid dam/ lo 'am zla ba sngon du bstan pa ltung ngo/ /zla ba byung ngo cog gi ngo la stong ngam/ nya 'am brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas srung bar rang
136b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal pas de'i nyin par dang mtshan mo rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de bzhin du gcig gam gnyis sam gsum bsrung ba la rtsa ba nas re rer gsum mam yan
136b7(rgyud 'grel): lag tu bcas par/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du zla ba byung ngo cog gi ngo la/ nya'i bsnyen gnas bsrung bar 'tshal bas/ de'i nyin par dang mtshan mo rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod
137a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rtsa ba gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang/ rtsa ba gsum pa mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ rtsa ba bzhi pa brdzun du smra ba dang/ yan lag gi dang po 'bru'i chang dang/ bcos pa'i chang dang/ /myos par 'gyur ba'i chad dang/
137a2(rgyud 'grel): yan lag gnyis pa glu gar rtsed 'jo rgyan kha dog 'chang ba dang/ yan lag gsum pa ma la stan dang/ khri stan dang/ yan lag bzhi pa phyi dro'i kha zas spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do/ /sngon gyi dgra bcom pa kun gyi bslab pa la rjes su
137a3(rgyud 'grel): slob bo/ /rjes su bsgrub po/ /rjes su bgyid do/ /thabs yin no/ /legs so zhes so/ /bsnyen gnas kyi bslab pa la 'thob bo/ /slob dpon gyis bsnyen gnas su bzung du gsol lo zhes lan gsum brjod nas phyag lan gsum bya'o/ /thob pa
137a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos la drug ste/ skyabs 'gro sbyor ba sngon du song ba dang/ blang ba dang/ slob dpon la the tshom ma zos pa dang/ chos la the tshom ma zos pa dang/ ma thob par the tshom ma zos pa dang/ dus de nyid du thob pa'o/ /dge bsnyen la sogs pa drug po yang/
137a5(rgyud 'grel): don drug po de dang ldan nas thob ste 'dra bar shes par gyis shig /dge bsnyen gyi skyabs 'gro yang gong ltar blang ba/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sngon gyi dgra bcom pa
137a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob po/ /rjes su sgrub po/ /rjes su bgyid do zhes lan gsum brjod do/ dang po la sogs pa drug gong bzhin ldan no/ /slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sna 'ga' 
137a7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen bgyid pas rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa spangs nas srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyid do zhes lo zla ba'i grangs kyis gsum du brjod do/ /slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus
137b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen bgyid pas rtsa ba gnyis ma byin par len pa spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do/ /sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo/ /rjes su bsgrub po/ /rjes su bgyid do/ /
137b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs yin no/ /legs so/ /sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gyur/ slob dpon gyis sna 'ga' bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /phyag gsum bya'o/ /phal cher bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gyur pa skyabs 'gro gi
137b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin song ba dang/ rang bzo med pa'i bslang ba yang 'dra bas song nas slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du phal cher bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen bgyid pas rtsa ba dang po srog gcod pa
137b4(rgyud 'grel): spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do zhes lan gsum bzla'o/ /de bzhin du rtsa ba gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang/ gsum pa 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do zhes lan gsum brjod nas sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi?
137b5(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa la rjes su slob bo/ /rjes su bsgrub bo/ /rjes su bgyid do/ /thabs yin no legs so/ /phal cher bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gyur to/ /slob dpon gyis phal cher bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes brjod la phyag lan gsum
137b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen la gzhan sngon du song bas/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen la gnas pas rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod
137b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang/ gsum pa 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/ bzhi pa brdzun du smra ba spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid do/ /ces re re la gsum gsum brjod la/ sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rjes su slob bo/ /
138a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su bsgrub po/ /rjes su bgyid do/ /thabs yin no legs so/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes bya'o/ /tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen
138a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis kyang gzhan sngon du song bas/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi pa dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen la gnas pas rtsa ba'i dang po srog bcod pa dang/ rtsa ba gnyis pa
138a3(rgyud 'grel): ma byin par len pa dang/ gsum pa mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ bzhi pa brdzun du smra ba dang/ yan lag gi dang po myos pa'i chang dang/ bcos pa'i chang dang/ 'bru'i chang dag spangs nas slar ldog par bgyid pa la gso zhes so re re la gsum
138a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum brjod nas/ sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo/ /rjes su bsgrub po/ /rjes su bgyid de do/ /thabs yin no/ /legs so/ /tshangs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon gyis tshangs par spyod pa'i dge
138a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ dge tshul gyis kyang gzhan gong ltar mkhan po slob dpon dad pa'i dge 'dun gyi sngar slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge tshul la gnas pas
138a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i dang po srog gcod pa dang/ gnyis pa ma byin par len pa dang/ /gsum pa mi tshangs par spyod pa dang bzhi pa brdzun du smra ba dang/ yan lag dang po 'bru'i chang dang/ bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba dang/ yan lag gnyis pa glu
138a7(rgyud 'grel): gar rtse 'jo dang/ yan lag gsum pa rgyan dang kha dog 'chang ba dang/ bzhi pa mal stan mthon po dang/ lnga pa khri stan chen po dang/ drug pa phyi de'i kha zas dang/ bdun pa gser dngul 'chang pa spangs nas slar ldog par
138b1(rgyud 'grel): bgyid lags so zhes re re la gsum gsum brjod de/ /sngon gyi zhes pa la sogs pa gong ltar brjod do/ /dge slong dngos kyi las kyi tshogs blang/ 'dir skyabs dang legs par brjod pa gong ltar gsum brjod pa dang/ gong gi rtsa ba bzhi dang/ lhag ma dang
138b2(rgyud 'grel): ma nges pa gnyos dang/ spang ba'i ltung byed la sogs pa las ldog par brjod do/ /gso sbyong zhes pa la 'am zla ba 'am nya stong gso zhing sbyong ba'o/ /nyams pa yang bcos su yod pas kyang gso sbyong ngo/ /dus ma nges ba zla ba'am lo tsam srung ba la yang gso
138b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyong ba legs so/ /'dir 'og gi theg pa gsum 'dod pas dus snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du brjod cing khas slang ngo/ /sems bskyed pa'i tshe 'og gi gdams ngag gis byang chub snying por shes par bstan par bya'o/ /mdo nas kyang nyes pa skye bas
138b4(rgyud 'grel): blta'o/ /gsum pa chos la bslab pa la bzhi ste/ spyod lam dang/ lta ba dang/ bsgom pa dang/ skyon spang ba'o/ /spyod lam la bzhi ste/ bsnyen gnas pas spyad pa dang/ dge bsnyen gyis spyad pa dang/ dge tshul bas spyad pa dang/ dge slong gis
138b5(rgyud 'grel): spyad pa'o/ /de la bsnyen gnas pas spyad pa ni kun tu bzang po'i mdo nas bsnyen gnas pa'i gang zag gis/ de dus lus ngag yid kyis bgrim zhes pas lus kyis khrus dang phyag bya ba dang/ ngag gis 'don pa dang/ snying po bzlas pa dang/ yid ches
138b6(rgyud 'grel): nyas pa shes pas bslab pa bsrung ba'i sems dang/ yon tan shes pas yi dam gyi lha dran pa dang/ lus ngag gi dbye ba byas pa dang/ bsrung ba'i nyi ma yid la bya ba'o/ /dge bsnyen gyis spyad pa la byams pas zhus pa'i mdo nas/ dge bsnyen dad dang
138b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yis/ /las man spang zhing dge bcu bsnyen zhes pas ba lang dang/ bya phag gso ba la sogs pa bcu mya ngan las 'das pa'i nang nas bstan pa ltar spang ba'o/ /dge ba bcu ni kun dga' bos zhus pa'i mdo nas bstan pa ltar spyad do/ /srog
139a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyab pa dang/ 'byor pa sbyin par btang ba dang/ dkon mchog mchod pa dang/ mchod rten dang/ sku gzugs dang lha khang la sogs pa lan bza' dbul ba dang/ bskor ba dang/ phyag dang/ kha ton klag pa dang/ snying po
139a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bstod pa bya ba dang/ zhig pa gso ba dang/ sku dkar byug pa dang/ nyal mo btsun pa'i dge ba bya ba dang/ 'os pa'i pham dang drin can la rim gro bya ba'o/ /dge tshul gyis spyad pa la dge tshul dngos kyis 'bul bar blta'o 'dir kA ri kA
139a3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ nam gyi cha smad mal langs nas/ /naM langs par du kha ton bya/ /gdong dang so'i dri bkrus la/ de bzhin gshegs la gus phyag 'tshal/ /zhes pas lus ngag yid kyis bya ba ste lus kyi nyes pa 'phel bar mi bya ba la bzhi ste nyin par 'jig rten
139a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ma dad pa spang ba dang/ mtshan mo phyi sgo phyin chad du mi nyal ba dang/ 'gro ba'i tshe bslab pa ngan pas bag ma ltar 'gro ba dang/ za ba dang 'dug pa dag bag med par mi bya'o/ /dge ba 'phel bas tho rangs srod tsog tsog po dang/ khrus dang lha
139a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag dus dang skabs su bya'o/ /dag gis mi smra ba drug ste/ mi shes pa dang/ mi khro ba dang/ mtshang mi 'brub dang/ phyar ka mi gtang ba dang/ rta gang mi bya ba dang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ dge 'dun mang po'i gseb tu bcom bsgyud

139b4(rgyud 'grel): par dge slong rnams lus kyi bya ba byed pa dang/ ma byin par len pa'i nyes byed gzhan gyi gzugs kyi yul la reg pa dang/ mi tshangs par spyod pa'i nyes byed bud med kyi yul lnga la spyod pa dang/ brdzun gyi nyes byed ma bsams par smra ba dang/

139b7(rgyud 'grel): brag pa la bslab ces pa yang de nyid nas/ dge bcu rgyas phyir chos gnyis dang/ /spyod lam bzhir ru dge slong spyod ces pas de yang chos gnyis po nyes pa dang/ mi dge ba spyod lam rnam bzhis mi byed pa dang/ yon tan dge ba 'phel ba spyod lam
140a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs bya ba ste/ der yang de nyid nas/ dge slong byang chub sems ldan pas/ /rtag tu dben par bsdad par bya/ /sems kyis bdag gzhan don byed la/ /dge slong zhes ni ngas brjod do/ /zhes pas de yang sems gnyis bskyed
140a2(rgyud 'grel): nas theg pa gsum dang ldan zhing dben par gnas nas mi dge ba mi 'byung zhing dge ba 'phel te/ gal te gzhan don sems kyis byed kyang dngos su mi nus pa dang/ dben par mi gnas pas 'di ltar bya ste/ spyod lam bzhis mi bya ba la gnyis te/ yid kyis
140a3(rgyud 'grel): dran pa lus kyis mi bya ba dang/ ngag gis mi bya ba dang/ lus kyis gzhi la sdod pa dang 'gro ba dang/ zas za ba'i tshe dang/ nyal ba'i dus so/ /sdod pa la nyes pa 'byung ba dang/ nyes pa chen po 'byung nas mi bsdad pa gnyis kyi nyes pa 'byung bas mi bsdad pa
140a4(rgyud 'grel): la bcu gnyis te/ 'greng ba dang/ lto rgyal dang/ snyes pa dang/ khyi tshugs dang/ sa rko ba dang/ rtsa gcod pa dang/ chu dang/ me dang/ khyi dang/ bu chung la rtse ba dang/ 'jig rten dang bud med kyi nang du sdod ba spang ba'o/ /nyes pa chen po 'byung bas mi

140b7(rgyud 'grel): pa za ba dang/ mkhan po slob dpon la dad pas/ bsngos pa za ba dang/ pha dang ma la bsngos pa za ba dang/ gtor ma dang byin gyis rlob par za ba dang/ rgyal po dang grong dpon la bsngos pa za ba spong ba'o/ /nyal ba'i tshe'i lus la yang/
141a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te/ /nyes pa la dgu ste/ gal rgyal du mi nyal/ kha bub dang/ gos med pa dang/ dbang po lag pas bzung ba dang/ nub tu mgo bstan pa dang/ 'jig rten pa'i grong dang/ 'jig rten pa'i mi mang po'i

141a3(rgyud 'grel): na'am sa ye ma rnyed dam/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ram dbang med na/ mdo bzang pa 'phel ba nas/ dang po sa'i chos rnams ni/ /bar chad med par shes byas la/ /gso skyong bya zhing bslab pa bsrung/ /rim gyis rim gyis
141a4(rgyud 'grel): goms te bla/ zhes pa dang/ gso skyong bya zhing skabs dang sbyar ro/ /bye brag kho na dbang du byas nas 'dod pa dang/ dus gnyis su bsdus te 'dod pa sangs rgyas dang/ sdom pas rgan pa la phyag byed pa dang/ lus ngag gi dge ba rang

141a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med kyang/ /gtso bos theg pa gsum bstan pa/ /nga'i thabs la mkhas pa'o zhes pas theg pa gsum la gnas par bya zhing/ /sdom pa gsum dang ldan par byas pas yon tan dang dge ba 'phel ba'i phyir spyod lam bzhis spyad
141a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba yang spong ba la sogs pa thun bzhir bsgrub ste/ snga dro'i thun la gsum ste/ ldang pa dang/ khrus dang/ chos sbyang ba'o/ /ldang ba la sbyor ba dang/ dngos dang/ 'jug gsum ste/ sbyor ba yid dag lus gsum ste/ yid sngon yang
141b1(rgyud 'grel): le lo dang gnyid kho na la brten nas 'di 'dra'o zhes bsams te nam smad ldang ngo/ /gang gis na na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo many+dzu sh+rI/ na mo badzra pA Ni/ na mo lo ke shwa rA ya/ na ma tA ra/ zhes rang gi yi dam gyi lha bskul lo/ /lus dal nas
141b2(rgyud 'grel): tsog tsog tu ldang ngo/ /dngos lus legs par langs la stong gos dang smad gos bgo ba dang/ ngag snying po sgra dang bcas pas sprul dang sems can bskrad pa dang/ yid dge ba bya ba'i phyir chos dran pa'o/ /mjug le lo dang the tshom med pa'o//
141b3(rgyud 'grel): khrus la yang sbyor ba dngos mjug gsum ste/ sbyor ba bshad pa che chung dang/ snabs lung sems can la gnod pa dang/ sa min sar min 'dor zhing legs par byas pa dang/ chu srog cha dang dri ma med pas snod bkang ba dang/ bkrus yang mi gnod
141b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ sa ma yin par bkru ba dang/ chu byin gyis brlab pa chu snod de'i chu la a dkar po bsams la/ a'i 'od kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs spyan drangs te/ mdun na gsal ba'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan
141b5(rgyud 'grel): drangs te/ spyan ras gzigs lta bur gyur pas nam mkha' khengs pa phyag mtshan kun de'i mthus sngar gyi chus bkag nas 'o ma ltar bdud rtsi'i chur gyur par bsams te bkru'o/ /bkru ba dngos ni oM ma Ni padme swA b+hA ba hUM/ zhes brjod cing kha dang lag
141b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ gdong bkru'o/ /yid kyis sgrib pa gnyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i chu dang/ sngags kyi nus pas dag par bsam mo/ /mjug mdun gyi sangs rgyas rnams gzhan don la slar gshegs par bsam mo/ /
141b7(rgyud 'grel): rang nyes pa dang sgrib pa dag pas/ dag ba byas par gnas par bas zhing don che bar bsam mo/ /chos spyad pa la bsam gtan dang/ kha ton dang/ chu byin dang 'byung po la gtor ma gtang ba dang/ maN+Dal bya ba dang lnga'o/ /bsam gtan la
142a1(rgyud 'grel): yang gsum ste/ sbyor ba lus tsog tsog gam skyil krung du bsdad/ ngag oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes brjod/ yid oM gyi 'od kha dog lngas/ dngos po sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ngo bor byas/ A(rgyud 'grel): 'i 'od dkar pos sku'i ngo bo de sangs rgyas
142a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gsung dang ldan par byas/ hUm gi 'od nag po des sku gsung gi ngo bo de thugs dang ldan par byas te/ thams cad mnyam por bsgrubs pas gnas dang bdag dang ting nge 'dzin dag ste bsrung bar yang de 'gyur ro/ /de nas bsam gtan dngos rtogs
142a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang man ngag dang yid mos pa la thun dang nus tshang du gnas par bya'o/ /kha don la lnga ste/ bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gtsug tor dang/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa gdon/ /sgrib pa gsal zhing dge ba sdu'i phyir ltung bshags gdon/ dge
142a4(rgyud 'grel): ba rgyas par bya ba'i phyir byams pa dang spyan ras gzigs dang bzang spyod kyi smon lam gdon/ dge ba mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir shes rab snying po gdon/ bstan pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brjod dang/ mgon po nag po'i mdo
142a5(rgyud 'grel): gdon no/ /de yang gtsug tor rgyal pa'i mdo las/ bgegs rnams gtsug gtor rdo rjes 'joms/ /kun tu dge ba zhus pa yis/ /sgrib sel bsod nams sdud pa dang/ /byams pa smon dang bzang por spyod/ /dge ba rgyas phyir nga yis bskal/
142a6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab pha rol phyin de dag /de rnams kun gyi snying por brjod/ /bstan pa rgyas byed 'jam dpal dang/ da la khas blangs mgon nag po/ /zhes so/ /de la yang sbyor ba lha rnams mdun du gsal ba dang/ dag pa dang gsal ba dang bar ma chod
142a7(rgyud 'grel): par gdon pa dngos dang/ yon tan la the tshom mi za ba dngos po/ /rgyas par bshad pa'i sbyor ba dngos mjug kyang shes par bya'o/ /chu sbyin ni rten snod du gzhag pa 'am/ med na yang rang yi dam gyi lha gang yin pa der bsgoms la/ oM A:
142b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM brjod pas hUM gi 'od des snod kun stong par bsam/ /stong pa las paM las pad+ma ser po 'dab ma brgyad pa/ de'i lte ba la a las zla ba rgyas pa 'od dang bcas pa/ de'i steng du dzaM ser 'od dang bcas pa/ dzam de gyur pa las nor sbyin ser po pad+ma dang zla ba'i
142b2(rgyud 'grel): steng du g.yas brkyang ba'i 'og na yid bzhin gyi nor bu mnan pa/ g.yon bskum pa'i pus mo'i 'og na rin po che sna tshogs kyi bum pa mnan pa/ mdog ser po gser bsregs pa dang 'dra ba/ ral pa gyen du brdzes nas rin po che'i zer phrog
142b3(rgyud 'grel): can zhal rnam par snang mdzad ltar mdangs dang ldan pa/ snyan cha mgul rgyan/ dbu rgyan phyag gdub/ zhabs gdub rin po che sna tshogs kyis byas pa gcig bsgoms la/ de'i thugs ka na padmo'i steng zla ba/ de'i steng na dzam ser po
142b4(rgyud 'grel): yod pa des rang bzhin gyi nor lha de nyid 'dra ba spyan drangs te dngos sam yid kyis mchod sbyin phul la bdag gzhan gyi 'dod pa skongs shig ces brjod de/ de la bcug la gnyis med du gyur pa'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i dzam gyis phyogs bcu'i
142b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spyan drangs te mchod par nams kyis mchod nas dbang mnos rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan dang ldan pa'o/ /sbyor ba des nor sbyin bskyed nas chu snod chu dang bcas pa la sngon du bstan pa'i khrus kyi ltar byin gyis

147b2(rgyud 'grel): breg tu smra ba ste/ chos kyi bdag tha ma dang mthun no/ /gang zag gi bdag med par 'dod pa'o/ /des bsgom pa yang bden bzhi bsgom/ de yang las kyi 'byung ba'i mdo las/ sdug bsngal 'di brgyad phung po la/ phung por chags pas dug lnga yin/ zhes
147b3(rgyud 'grel): pas rgyu kun 'byung dug lnga spong ba dang/ 'bras bu sdug bsngal lus la gnod pas shes pas lnga la mi chags shing bdag med pa dang/ ye shes dang byams pa dang mi gtsang ba dang/ bdag med du lhag gis mthong la/ bdag med pa'i stong pa de bsgom
147b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de yang gong gi lus ngag yid kyi dge ba dang bsdoms pas sngon gyi sgrib pa 'dag la bdag med pa stong pa la gzhag pas dgra bcom pa thob pa'o/ /skyon gang zag gi bdag 'dod pa spong ba'o/ /theg pa chen po'i sdom pa la gnyis te/ byang chub
147b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i sdom pa dang/ sngags kyi dam tshig gnyis so/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa la bzhi ste/ spyod lam dang/ lta ba dang/ bsgom pa dang/ skyon no/ /spyod lam la gnyis te rten dang/ spyod lam dngos so/ /rten la lnga ste/ mdo sde pa dang/ rnam bcas
147b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang rnam med pa dang/ sgyu ma lta bu dang/ rab tu mi gnas pa'o/ /spyod lam dngos la gsum ste/ sbyor ba dang/ dngos dang/ 'jug go/ de yang spyod lam khyad par med par dus gsum du lnga car 'dod la lta ba la khyad yod de/ sbyor dngos mjug gsum mdo sde
147b7(rgyud 'grel): pas rten 'brel du 'dod la/ rnam bcas sems kyi rnam par 'dod/ /rnam med dpas bzang rtog tu 'dod la/ sgyu ma lta bus sgyu ma lta bur 'dod /rab tu mi gnas pas kun rdzob yin gyi don dam ma yin te/ rmi lam lta bu mi bden par snang par
148a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod de/ don dam la khas len med pa'o/ /gzhan don dam du 'dod pa'o/ /spyod lam dngos kyi sbyor ba la dgu ste/ mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ sdig pa bshags
148a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ yi rang ba dang/ bskul ba dang/ gsol ba gdab pa dang/ bsngo ba'o/ /de yang mchod dang bstod dang phyag 'tshal dang/ /skyabs dang sdig bshags yi rang dang/ /bskul dang gsol ba gdab pa dang/ /bsngo dang dgu po sbyor bar
148a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ /zhes dri ma med pa'i mdo nas bstan to/ /mchod ba la gsum ste gnas dang/ rten dang/ mchod pa dngos so/ /gnas rang byung dang/ byin gyis brlabs ba lha khang la sogs pa nyams dga' bar/ rten byang chub chen po dang/
148a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' dang mkhan po la mchod par bya ba'o/ /mchod pa dngos la gnyis te/ mchod par bya ba dang/ mchod par byed pa'o/ /mchod par bya ba la rten phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'o//
148a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod byed bdag /dgos pa de rnams mnyes pa/ de la dgos pa mchod pa yin/ de'i dgos pa bdag gzhan don grub pa'o/ /mchod pa dang yon 'byor na dngos/ ma 'byor na bskal bzang ltar me tog spar gang la brten te slob dpon dang/
148a6(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis gzhan na yod pa'i dngos po lus sems su bcas pa dbul te/ mchod pa rnam pa bdun gyis mchod de/ chu gtsang gis sku bsil zhing ras bzangs kyis sku byi dor bya ba dang/ me tog manda ra ba la sogs pa'i phreng ba dang/ sil snyan
148a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis mchod ba dang/ tsan dan dang/ /a ka ru dang/ ga bur dang/ gla rtsi dang/ rgya spos la sogs pa'i dud pas mchod pa dang/ rin po che 'bar ba dang/ mar me'i phreng ba gcig gam/ bcu 'am brgya stong dbul pa dang/ tsan dan la sogs
148b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dri'i byug pa bya ba dang/ 'bras chan dang/ sran chan dang/ gro chan dang/ nas chan dang/ zho dang mar dang sha skaM dang nya skaM dang/ nya btsos pa dang/ na ri ko la dang/ ya 'bra dang/ bil ba dang/ nyo ti la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ gro ma dang/ nyung ma
148b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ la phug dang/ bel sha la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang/ /khur ba dang la du la sogs pas mchod pa dang/ dung la sogs pa sil snyan dang dbyangs kyi rim pas mchod pa'o/ yon la rin po che sna bdun dang/ bkra shis kyi rdza sa brgyad dang/
148b3(rgyud 'grel): chu mig dang/ nags tshal dang/ skyeng mos tshal dang/ spang ljong sa dang/ mtsho dang/ steng ka la sogs pa/ gzugs sgra'i bye brag ji snyed pa blo dang dngos su 'byor pa dbul lo/ 'brel pa nam mkha' i snying po'i mdo nas/ sems gnyis bskyed
148b4(rgyud 'grel): nas sangs rgyas mchod/ /mchod pa yon dang bcas pa yis/ /rgyal dang de yi sras mnyes nas/ /'gro ba'i don la reg bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ /bstod pa yang rten gong ltar bstong byed dang/ dgos pa mnyes pa dang/ de la dgos
148b5(rgyud 'grel): pa phyogs dus kun gyi sangs rgyas sras/ /gang dag 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /'gro ba 'dren par gang bzhugs pa/ /sku'i mtshan ldan rnams la bstong/ /tshangs pa'i gsung can rnams la bstod/ /byams pa'i thugs ldan rnams la bstod
148b6(rgyud 'grel): ces theg ba chen po'i mdo nas sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bstod pa nyid kyis stod do/ /'brel pas kun nas brjod pas so/ /phyag 'tshal ba la yang gong ltar drug gis theg pa chen po nas phyag 'tshal ba gsum maM/ /bdun
148b7(rgyud 'grel): nas stong dang khri'i bar du 'tshal ba'o/ /skyabs dngos dang dbye ba gnyis las/ dngos la gsum/ skyabs la sngon gyi sbyor ba rnams shes nas/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba !dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub
149a1(rgyud 'grel): la mchis kyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su 'chi'o/ /zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba theg pa chen po'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /
149a2(rgyud 'grel): kun la skyob par mdzad pa'i 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /dbye ba la brgyad/ dpang po dang/ /rten skyabs su mchi ba nyan thos ltar/ bdun la gzhan
149a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ste/ yid theg ba chen po'i chos dang/ gzhan dag la dad pa'o/ /sbyor ba lus ngag yid gong ltar dang/ gzhan/ skyabs/ sems rten dang/ sangs rgyas sprul skur shes pa/ chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ dge 'dun 'jam
149a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal la sogs par shes par bya'o/ /mchod pa'i gong gi'o/ /dus mdza' thug pa med pa 'am/ byang chub par du'o/ yon tan 'khor ba las thar pa dang/ gzhan don nus pa'o/ spyod pa la 'jug pa nas/ khyod kyi thugs rjes rjes su bzung
149a5(rgyud 'grel): bas na/ srid la mi 'jigs sems can phan pa bgyi/ zhes pas so/ /mi nyams pa bya ba la gong ma'i 'jig rten gyi spangs pa'i steng du gzhan don bya ba dang/ srog gcod pa spangs nas gzhan la mi 'tshe ba dang/ mu stegs dang/ nyan thos
149a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang mi 'grogs pa'o/ /sdig pa bshags brten dang/ mkhan po'i spyan sngar/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /thog med dus nas 'khor bar 'khor/ /shin tu ma rig sdig pa'i las/ /sna tshogs bgyis dang
149a7(rgyud 'grel): bgyid du stsal/ /rjes su yi rang bgyis pa bshags zhes pa dang/ mdo gzhan nas bstan pa ltar bshags so/ /yi rang pa'i rim pa mdo gzhan ltar yang bya/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag na/ /skye bo rnams kyis dge spyad dang/ de yi
149b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis bder 'gyur la'ang/ bdag ni shin tu yi rang ngo/ /nyan thos rang rgyal bde ba dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la'ang/ /nges par de ring yi rang ngo/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa gang byung dang/ sems can bde la yi rang ngo/ /bskul ba/
149b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems/ /de dag tshogs la bdag bskul na/ /sems can rang dgar mi gtang bar/ /chos kyis rgyud 'byongs 'khor lo bskor/ gsol ba gdab pa/ phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ byang chub
149b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' 'don mdzad la/ /sems can bde la ma bkod par/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs bar gsol/ /de rnams kyi dge ba bsngo ba/ bdag gis de ltar dge spyad pas/ nam mkha' khyab pa'i sems can rnams/ /dge ba 'di yi byin
149b4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs kyis/ /pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin nas/ /thams cad byang chub chen por shog /gal te byang chub ma thob par/ /theg chen chos la spyod pa dang/ /'gro don mi 'dor 'khor ba las/ /'gro rnams myur du sgrol bar shog /mdo
149b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ltar yang gdab po/ /dngos la gnyis te/ smon pa dang/ 'jug pa'o/ /smon pa ni slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub la mi chos kyi bar du/ sngon gyi sangs
149b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa la rjes su slob po/ /rjes su sgrub po/ rjes su bgyid do/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba rnams la ji ltar phan pa de ltar bdag kyang phan par bgyi'o?
149b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /dngos 'jug pa ni/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba dang /
150a1(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims las byung ba'i dge ba dang/ bzod pa las byung ba'i dge ba dang? brtson 'grus las byung ba'i dge ba dang/ bsam gtan las byung ba'i dge ba dang/ shes rab las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyis
150a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can ma grol ba thams cad grol bar mdzad pa dang/ ma bsgral ba thams cad bsgral bar mdzad pa dang/ dbugs ma phyin pa thams cad dbugs phyin par mdzad pa dang/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa thams cad mya ngan las 'das par
150a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas bzung nas/ nam snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du bdag gis sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ tshul khrims las byung ba'i dge ba dang/ bzod pa las
150a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i dge ba dang/ brtson 'grus las byung ba'i dge ba dang/ bsam gtan las byung ba'i dge ba dang/ shes rab las byung ba'i dge ba ji snyed bgyid ba de snyed kyis sems can ma grol ba thams cad dgrol bar bgyi'o/ /ma
150a5(rgyud 'grel): rgal ba thams cad bsgral bar bgyi'o/ /dbugs ma phyin pa thams cad dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o/ /mya ngan las ma 'das pa thams cad mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi'o zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/
150a6(rgyud 'grel): gal te sdom pa las nyams na slar gso bas gnang du gsol zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /mjug gi don shes par bya ba la gsum ste/ dgos pa shes par bya ba dang/ thob par shes pa dang/ mjug mi nyams pa'o/ /dgos pa shes
150a7(rgyud 'grel): pa la gnyis te/ sbyor ba dang rten no/ /sbyor ba la mchod pa la sogs pa dgu las skye bas dgu dgos par shes pa dang/ rten gzhan dang bdag nyid las/ gzhan la rten dang dbang po gnyis/ dbang po sdom pa la gnas pa mkhas pa'i slob
150b1(rgyud 'grel): dpon las skye bar shes pa dang/ yi dam dang dpang po las skye ba'o/ /rten byang chub chen po la sogs pa'i mchog gsum las skye'o/ /bdag las skye ba gong gi nyan thos kyi ltar khyad par du 'phags pa drug dang/ phan sems yod pa nus pa
150b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa las skye bar shes par bya'o/ /thob par shes pa la bcu ste/ rten dang/ dpang po dang/ sems can dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ sbyor ba dang/ blangs pa dngos dang/ sems can byang chub la dgod pa'i bsam pa dang/ mi ldog pa'i
150b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa dang/ blangs pa'i dus de nyid nas yid ches pas thob pa'o/ /mi nyams par bya ba la gsum ste/ shes par bya ba dang/ shes pas spang ba dang/ shes pas bsgrub pa'o/ /shes par bya ba la lnga ste/ sdom pa'i ngo bo dang/ rten gyi
150b4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gyis bslab pa'i rim pa dang/ dus dang rigs dang/ sdom pa gsum ldan du shes par bya pa'o/ /ngo bo smon mjug gnyis las smon pa'i ngo bo dang/ grogs gnyis te/ de yang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pas ngo bo yang dag par
150b5(rgyud 'grel): blangs pa'i sems pa dge ba rgyun chags 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba' o/ /de yang dad pa dang/ snying rje dang/ 'dod dang/ khas blang pa bzhi las dang ba'i dad pa gzhan don gyis bdag grol bar shes pa dang/ bden snyam pa dang/ /bdag
150b6(rgyud 'grel): la snying rje skyes pas gzhan don la mos pa'o/ /mos pa skyes nas rgyun sa bcu man chad du yin dgos pas smon pa'i dge ba'i rgyun sems can la sangs rgyas kyi bya bas smon pa sems can sangs rgyas su 'dod la/ khas len dam 'cha' ba' o
150b7(rgyud 'grel): grogs la bdun ste/ 'dun pas lta bu 'jug pa'i gzhi byed pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa zla ba chos pa lta bu dge ba 'phel ba dang/ sbyor ba me lta bu dngos po thams cad bsreg pa dang/ bsam pa bzang po gser lta bu sems mi nyams
151a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ skyob pa lta bu nyes pas mi gos pa dang/ 'brel pa rgyu 'bras lta bu thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba dang/ myur ba thog lta bu ma sbyor ba'o/ /'jug pa'i ngo bo de yang ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yod
151a2(rgyud 'grel): pas yang dag par blangs pa'i sems pa dge ba rgyun chags rgyu la dam 'cha' ba' i ngo bo ste/ de yang ngo gong ltar bzhi/ yid ches pa'i dad pa sangs rgyas gzhan don las 'byung bas gzhan la snying rje skyes te sangs ma rgyas bar du 'phro mi gcod pa dang/
151a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don byed pas gzhan don khas blangs pa dang/ bdag gzhan sangs rgyas pa'i rgyu sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i sdig spong ba so so thar pa'i bslab pa/ dge ba chos sdud pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa /
151a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can don byed de gnyis sems can don du spyod la stobs gar cher de la yang 'byed pa dang phyo zhing spyod pa'o/ /de yang sangs ma rgyas bar du sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i rgyu spyod par khas len pa'o/ /grogs la bzhi ste/ sems can
151a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sngon 'drel gyi bur shes nas byams par bya ba dang/ ma chags pa ma 'dod pa la chos nor sbyin pa dang/ chos thams cad bdag med pas rang la 'dod pa med pa dang/ /sangs rgyas gzhan don las 'byung bas rgyu 'bras mi dgag
151a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rten gyi khyad par gyis bslab pa'i rim pa shes par bya ba la gnyis te/ rten dang/ bslab pa'i chos so/ /rten la yang gnyis te/ 'dod pa chung pa dang che ba'o/ /che ba la yang gnyis te/ las dang bo pa dang/ mthar phyin pa dag pa'o//
151a7(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa'i rim pa la gnyis te/ spyod pa dang 'jug pa'o/ /smon pa la yang gnyis te/ btags pa ba ni gong gi mi dang zhes pa'i rten tsam la yang skye la/ dngos thob nas ngo bo dang ldan par bsrung ba'i las dang po'o/ /'jug pa la gnyis/
151b1(rgyud 'grel): btags pa ba las dang po ba de la yang yod de/ dngos sa dang po pa dag pa la yod pa'o/ /las dang po pa'i bslab bya la gsum ste/ gzhi lam 'bras bu ste/ gzhi la yang gsum ste/ sbyor ba sngon du song bas mos pa smon bas gsum la skyabs pa dang
151b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang po shes nas gnas tshol ba dang/ bsam pa'o/ /bsam pa bdag la sems pa dang/ /gzhan la sems pa'o/ /bdag la sems pa la bzhi ste/ bdag gi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang/ dgos pa lus ngag gi dge ba bya ba dang/ grogs
151b3(rgyud 'grel): lus ngal/ ngag dben/ yid zhi pa dang/ longs spyod kyis tshogs bsags pa'o/ /gzhan sems pa la gnyis te/ snying rje dang bzod pa'o/ /snying rje chos la dmigs pa dang/ gang zag la dmigs pa'o/ /bzod pa sdug bsngal dang du
151b4(rgyud 'grel): len pa dang/ sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'o/ /lam pha rol tu phyin pa drug smon pas spyod pa'o/ /'bras bu skye ba la dbang ba dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ las dang/ thabs dang/ sems can gyi don byed pa la dbang ba lnga'o/ /shin tu rnam par dag
151b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las dang po'i bslab bya la yang gsum ste/ gzhi sbyor ba sngon du song bas skyabs pa dang/ dbang po dang/ bsam pa 'jug pa'i sems kyis gong bzhin 'dod pa'o/ /bsam pa gzhan la sems pa kho na ste/ snying rje dang/ bzod pa
151b6(rgyud 'grel): la gnyis te/ snying rje la yang gang zag la dmigs pa dang/ chos la dmigs pa dang/ dmigs pa med pa gsum ste/ gang zag la dmigs pa ni mu stegs dang/ nyan thos dang thun mong ste/ sems can rkyen gyis sdug bsngal ba la
151b7(rgyud 'grel): skye pa'o/ /chos la dmigs pa ni sems tsam ste/ chos nyid ma rtogs pas len te rtogs par byed pa'o/ /dmigs pa med pa dbu ma ste/ sdug bsngal ba chos nyid ma rtogs pa la snying rje bskyed pa'i dus na rab tu mi gnas par shes
152a1(rgyud 'grel): bas gsum bsdus pa'o/ /bzod pa gzhan du sdug bsngal phra mo la sron? zhing dang du len pa'o/ /goms nas che bas mi gnod la ji mi snyam pa dang/ bzod pa de dang mi bzod pa rab tu mi gnas par
152a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa gsum ga bsgom pa'o/ /lam pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzhan don du rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'bras bu re ba med pa dang/ sku bzhi dang gis 'byung ba'o/ /dus la 'dod pa chung ba'i mdza' med pa dang/ chen po'i rgyu bskyed
152a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus blangs ma thog dang/ lam sgrub pa snying po byang chub thob par dang/ sangs rgyas pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med gsum pa'o/ /rigs la gnyis te/ zla ba yar ngo la sems bskyed thob ba rnams byams pa la sogs pa
152a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar bram ze las sangs rgyas pa dang/ mar ngo las thob pa rnams shAkya thub pa la sogs pa ltar rgyal rigs las sangs rgyas pa'o/ /gsum dang ldan par shes par bya ba la gnyis te/ ldan lugs bstan pa dang/ nges pa
152a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'o/ ldan lugs la nam mkha' i snying po'i mdo nas/ chos dang gang zag gcig nyid sems/ /smon dang mjug dang so sor thar/ /rig pa sbyor bas gzhan gyi don/ /nus na gong nas gong du 'gyur zhes gsungs pa bzhin
152a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ gong gi so sor thar pa'i bslab pa ris bdun gyi bye brag de rang gi sems yin pas 'og ma'i nyan thos ma spangs par theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa yang yin la/ de yang sems kyi snang ba phung po dang khams dang/
152a7(rgyud 'grel): skye mched rgyud ltar ltar gnas pa'o/ /de yang/ sngags kyi dam tshig ni/ bdag dang dgos pa ltar gnas pa mthong bas lha dang/ lha mi gnod pas nyan thos ltar nyes pa spong ba dang/ lha ma yin pa gzhan gyis ma rtogs pas byang
152b1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' ltar phan 'dogs pa dang/ de ltar sems su 'dus pa'i don la sems can rnams shin tu 'khrul nas sems rab tu mi gnas par ma shes shing bdag tu bzung ba la dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje skyes nas so sor thar pa'i bslab
152b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ dam tshig spyod pa dag la dmigs pa med pas smon 'jug gzhan don du byed pa dang/ de yang sngags kyis lhar snang ba thams cad sems kyi 'phrul bar snang bas nyan thos bye brag tu spyod la/ bye brag ma 'gags na nus pa so sor 'byung
152b3(rgyud 'grel): bas byang chub sems dpa' ltar 'dogs pa dang/ de ltar sems kyi rgyun la rten nas sku bzhi 'byung bas/ 'gro ba 'dren pa'i snang ba ltar so so thar pa'i bslab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa dang/ sngags kyi dam
152b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig dang gsum ldan pa'o/ /sku bzhi nus pa so so nas snang zhing chos skur 'dus 'byung ba bzhin sdom pa yar ldan du 'gyur te/ so so thar pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur/ de sngags su 'gyur/ de so sor snang bar yang btub pa
152b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /nges pa bskyed pa yang bzhi ste/ gzhi ma nyams pa dang/ rgyu ma nyams pa dang/ lam ma nyams pa dang/ 'bras bu ma nyams pa'o/ /gzhi ma nyams pa slob dpon la la dag rten dang rten par sdom pa gsum min par 'dod
152b6(rgyud 'grel): de mi bden te/ ka bas gdung dang 'og khang gis steng khang bteg pa ltar ma yin zer ba mi rigs te/ sdom pa yar ldan du gnas gyur pas sa bon gyi dus na sa bon ma nyams/ myu gu ma spangs/ 'bras bu'i dus na 'bras bu ma
152b7(rgyud 'grel): nyams la/ sa bon ma spangs te/ dam tshig gi dus na so sor thar par ma song ste/ mi gnas med kyang nyes pa med do/ nyams pa spang/ slob dpon la la mi gcig gis mi mang po gsod na mi gcig po de ma bsad na byang chub 
153a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i sdom pa nyams la/ bsad na so so thar pa'i sdom pa nyams par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ ma shin brdzun nam thabs kyi yan lag nyams zer te/ de yang mi bden te so sor thar pa'i ltung ba ni sbyor ba
153a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dngos dang/ mjug rdzogs pas 'od ste/ sbyor ba dang/ mjug med pa dang/ dngos so sor thar pa bdag 'khor ba la 'jigs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don du dmyal ba la mi 'jigs par nyes pa len
153a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de ltar srog mang bar bton pa dang/ gcig la sdig pa dgos pa dang/ bdag dmyal ba la mi 'jigs par rang yang thar ba'o/ /de bzhin du brdzun sogs yan lag dang bcas pa ma nyams pas so/ /lam ma nyams pa
153a4(rgyud 'grel): yang slob dpon la la dag /so sor thar pa'i bslab pa rten du dgos na/ so sor thar pa'i bslab pa gong gi rten khyad par du 'phags pa drug la skye'i/ byang chub kyi sems 'gro ba gzhan dang gling gzhan la skye zer te/ de yang mi bden te/
153a5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar mu stegs ltar rkyen med pas rgyu gtso bas las brdzun te/ 'gro drug so sos bskyed la dge bas thar pa thob pa'i rgyu yin pa la/ dag gi pas ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang long dgos pa la med pa des de lta ma yin te/ sangs rgyas
153a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi thugs rjes sems can mir skyes la/ mi bsnyen gnas bsrungs bas nyan thos kyi rten bzang ba de goms pa las byang chub kyi sems/ de las sngags su 'gyur bas thams cad mkhyen pa'o/ /rgyu rkyen ma song bar thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung na mu stegs dang
153a7(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos la thams cad mkhyen pa rigs na/ chos nyid stong pa shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs pas 'thob zer na/ chos nyid yod pas 'thob na sems can la cis med/ rtogs pas chog na rtogs che dgang kho na/ rtogs tshad gang kho na tsam gyis chog /
153b1(rgyud 'grel): na da lta ga re/ tshad bstan du yod na thams cad mkhyen te brtag dpyad rigs pa bzhis ci bya/ med na rtsod pa brjod pa la don med/ thob pas mkhyen na thob rgyu brtag ste/ des na lam sngon du ma song bar 'gro ba gzhan dang/ mi gzhan dag la
153b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems mi skye ba'o/ /'bras bu ma nyams par bya ba la slob dpon las nyin thos kyi rigs dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ theg pa chen po dang/ rigs nges pa dang/ ma nges pa dang/ chad pa drug yod la/ sangs rgyas kyang rim gyis dang
153b3(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos las ldog pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas las ldog pa dang/ so sor yod pa mtshan nyid kyis sangs rgyas pa dang/ /sngags kyis dang/ sangs rgyas so sor yod pa la/ bstan pa yun ring thung dang/ chos theg pa che chung ston la/ bram ze dang
153b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal rigs so sor 'dod de/ de mi bden te/ gzhi don dam la yang sems can dang/ sangs rgyas gnyis la khyad med par/ sangs rgyas la khyad yod de/ rgyu rig pa bzang rtog tu sbyod pa la yang 'dra snyam lam sems gnyis dang phar phyin drug sbyor ba
153b5(rgyud 'grel): la yang 'dra mnyam/ 'bras bu 'dod pa che chung bstan pa dang/ chos rigs kyang gdul bya ste/ sku bzhi la bzang ngan med/ gal te yod na gong bzhin du dge bas ngan song dang/ sdig pa dang thar pa dang/ nyan thos kyis bcu bzhi pa'i sa dang/ sngags dang nyan
153b6(rgyud 'grel): thos la sogs par 'gro ba'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs bde ba chen por gnas shing chos skur snang yang ma grub cing snang la/ gsung brjod du med par gnas te/ theg pa gsum dang theg pa'i dgos par yang gsung ngo/ /sku
153b7(rgyud 'grel): ? bzhi'i sa la bzhugs la rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo gzugs skur ston no/ /yon tan spros pa dang bral la bzang ngan gyi rtog pa 'dod yon du snang grub po/ phrin las bya btsa la dang bral ba dgyes rdor ltar sems can thams cad /rigs lnga dang/ gsum dang
154a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu grub pa'o/ /da ltar shes pas sdom pa gsum rdzogs nas gsum ldan du bya'o/ /sngags kyi rgyas par 'og gi skabs su bstan pa nas dbang thob par shes par gyis shig /shes pas spang ba la gnyis
154a2(rgyud 'grel): te nyes pa shes pa dang/ spang ba'o/ /nyes pa shes pa la smon 'jug gnyis te/ smon pa'i rtsa ba'i nyes pa gzhan don la smon pa gzhag nas nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o/ /yan lag la bzhi ste/ dkon mchog /mkhan po/ slob dpon/

154a7(rgyud 'grel): yang gnyis te/ smon pa nyams par shes sman pas nyes pa spang/ 'jug pa'i nyes pa 'jug pas spang ba'o/ shes? pas bsgrub pa la gnyis ste/ yon tan du shes pa dang/ yon tan du shes pa sgrub pa'o/ /yon tan la gsum ste/ sangs rgyas la skyabs
154b1(rgyud 'grel): pas sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba dang/ chos la skyabs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos nyan cing zhal mthong ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun la skyabs pas grogs byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa'o/ /lam gyi yon tan mkhan po dang
154b2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma mchod pas da lta nyid sangs rgyas dang 'grogs pa dang/ sems can slu ba dang 'gyod pa spangs nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pas da lta nyid theg pa chen po'i chos nyan pa dang/ gzhan la gnod sems spangs nas phan sems dang ldan pas
154b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' dang da ltar 'grogs pa'o/ /'bras bu'i yon tan 'jug pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pas gdul bya la sprul sku dang/ tshogs rdzogs pa'i snang ba la longs sku ste/ da lta nyid sangs rgyas yin pa dang/ gang 'dod gang phan spyod pas
154b4(rgyud 'grel): da lta nyid chos ston pa dang/ bstan pa dang spyod pas phan pas da lta nyid du byang chub sems dpas bskor ba'o/ /bsgrub par bya la bzhi sde/ sdom pa gsum bsgrub pa dang/ mi nyams par bya ba dang/ rgyas par bya ba dang/ nyes pa bcos thabs so/ /sdom pa
154b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum sgrub pa ni sdom pa dngos dang/ rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i sdig spang ba dang/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba bsgrub pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug sde/ sbyin pa chos skyabs dang/ zang zing gi sbyin pa bdag gtong ba po dang/ gzhan len pa po dang/
154b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bya ba'i sku gsum sgyu mar shes pa'i gzhan don sgrub pa dang/ dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang/ sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims dang/ sdug bsngal dang du len pa dang/ sdug bsngal la ji mi
154b7(rgyud 'grel): snyam pa dang/ zab mos bzod pa dang/ go cha'i brtson 'grus dang/ sbyor ba dang/ nges par spyad pa dang/ mi 'god pa'i dang/ dpa' bo'i brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan lus dal/ dag dben/ sems zhi ba dang/ thos bsam bsgom pa'i
155a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab rnams sgyu mar shes pas gzhan don bsgrub pa'o/ /sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims gzhan don du sbyin sogs stobs gar che'i ma pa dang/ dam bcas pa med pas sgyu ma'i rnam pas sgyu ma shes pas
155a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'o/ /mi nyams par bya ba la brgyad de/ sems can sngon las kyi 'bras bu yin pas dben par bsgrub pa dang/ ma chags pas lus dang longs spyod dge ba sbyin pa dang/ bdag med pas 'bras bu mi re ba dang/ sangs rgyas gzhan las
155a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bas skyo ba mi bya ba dang/ slob dpon sangs rgyas dang 'dra bas bsnyen pa dang/ grogs po byang chub sems dpa' bsnyen pa dang/ dge bar byed pa thams cad la yi rangs pa dang bskul ba dang/ lus ngag yid kyis gzhan don las gzhan mi bya
155a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /rgyas par bya ba la gnyis te/ ma rgyas pa dang/ de rgyas par bya ba'o/ /ma rgyas pa la rgyu 'bras gnyis te/ rgyu la bsngo ba ma shes pa/ bsngo ba lus pa/ bsngo ba log pa bsngo ba ma dag pa/ bsngo ba ma rgyas pa'o/ /bsngo ba ma shes pa ni sngon du
155a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can la khas blangs nas/ chos nor skyabs mi ster ba'o/ /mi 'dod mi dgos mi phan na nyes pa med do/ /bsngo ba lus pa ni sbyin par bsams nas ma byin pa'o/ /de yang mi 'dod mi dgos mi phan phan chung gnod na nyes pa med do/ /bsngo ba log pa ni
155a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig la bsngos nas gzhan gcig la byin na'o/ /gcig stobs che la gcig mi 'dod sogs gong ltar na nyes pa med do/ /bsngo ba ma dag pa ni lan la re ba dang/ drin brtsis pa dang/ 'di'i phan la mi re ba'o/ /des chos 'phel zhing rang gi yid la
155a7(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'di yi 'dod pa med na nyes pa med do/ /bsngo ba ma rgyas pa ni grags pa dang/ gzhan 'og tu gzhug pa ste/ des bstan pa la phan zhing yid la med na nyes pa med do/ /'bras bu la yang lnga ste/ bsngo ba lus pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug
155b1(rgyud 'grel): spyad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsngos pa'o/ /bsngo ba ma shes pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu longs spyod che ba la sogs par re ba'o/ /bsngo ba log pa ni bdag don du bsngos pa'o/ /bsngo ba ma dag pa ni sems can sangs rgyas su mi smon pa'o/
155b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngo ba ma rgyas pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyas ma thebs pa'o/ /rgyas par bya ba de rnams las bzlog pa ste/ shes pa/ ma lus pa/ ma log pa/ dag pa/ rgyas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa che bas sems can la bsngo ba ma lus pa la
155b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas sbyin no/ /rgyas pa la sogs pas bsngos pa sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag sku bzhi thob ste/ sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad sku bzhi la dgod par smon la gzhan yang mdo dang/ slob dpon gzhan ltar smon no/ /'dod pa

155b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /nyams pa bcos pa'i thabs la gsum ste/ nyams pa'i tshad dang/ thabs dang/ nyams pa bcos pa nyes par bstan pa'o/ /tshad ni rtsa ba'i phe pa bzhi las bdag nyid rnyed pa dang/ bskur sti la rab tu zhen nas bdag la bstod la gzhan la smod na pham
155b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang po byung ba'o/ /bdag la nor zas yod pa la sdug bsngal la mgon med pa bkres sogs slong ba la snying sran gyis mi ster ba dang/ dad pa dang/ gus pa dang legs pa sa chos 'dod pa la snying mi brtse bas chos mi ster ba ste gnyis pa byung ba'o//
155b7(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang mdo nas gzhan la khros te/ 'thab mo sogs kyis bshags pa la mi nyan par brdeg pa la sogs pa byed par zhe sdang drag pos 'chad na gsum pa byung ba'o/ /theg pa chen po'i sde snod 'gro ba skyob pa la skur pa 'debs shing gzhan gyis
156a1(rgyud 'grel): zhar la bcos pa'i chos ma yin pas mos dga' ston nyan na byang chub sems dpa' pham pa bzhi pa byung ba'o/ /yan lag sdom pa nyi shu pa ltar nyon mongs na'i sems dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems kyis
156a2(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum gyi mchod pa la sogs pa'i sdom pa rnams so/ /bcos pa'i thabs dngos ni rtsa ba bzhi gang byung yang/ nyon mongs pa drag po byung nas nyams pa sngon bzhin 'gyod bas blang/ nyon mongs pa 'bring na khrel yod
156a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ngo tsha shes nas mkhas par gnas pa gsum la bshags/ des kyang 'gyod dam zhes dri/ 'gyod do zhes lan gsum brjod cing phyin chad bsdam/ nyon mongs pa chung na gcig po de'i drung du bshags so/ /'gyod dam zhes pa dang 'gyod do

156a6(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yas pa 'dod zer nas/ lag pa bcad nas g.yon pa'i khar gzhag nas byin pas ma 'dod nas/ /ngas ni sems can gyi don mi 'ong ngo/ /slar zer nas byin pa yang mi 'dod pa snyam ste yi mug par gyur nas smon pa dang 'jug pa

156b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas bram ze lag pa g.yon pa mi 'dod pa la g.yon pas ster ba rang gis nyes na ci la yid chad/ mgo thog tu gzhag la sbyin mod/ da yang thabs la mkhas pas sangs rgyas bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pas slar 'gyod nas blangs

157a2(rgyud 'grel): sde pa rten 'brel du 'dod de/ dper na ras sngon po'i khar shel gzhag pa dang 'dra ste/ shes pa dang rnam pa rten 'grel yin/ /ras kyi shel sngo ba sngo byed ras yin/ /de bzhin du ma yin nas tha dad na bye brag pa'i dge bas sems la mi
157a3(rgyud 'grel): phan pa dang/ sdig pas sems la mi gnod de/ bye brag ma yin pas rten 'brel yin te/ dge ba'i rnam pas sems la phan la/ sems rten 'brel du ye yod pas gnod pa'i rnam pas skyed par byed pa'i rdul phra rab cha dang bcas pa skad cig
157a4(rgyud 'grel): gis ma rtogs pa'i sil bur 'dod la/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang de tsam du rtogs pas 'bras bu skur bzhir 'dod do/ /bsgom pa ni de ltar rtogs sam shes na/ dngos po thams cad dang sems rten 'brel du ye yod pas pha
