157a7(rgyud 'grel): gtso bor 'dod pa na re/ thams cad rgyu la rag las te/ pad+ma la sogs me tog bzhin/ /'gro ba so so'i rgyu nyid las/ /thar pa dang ni thams cad mkhyen ces brjod de/ sangs rgya ba'i rgyu sems gdod mnas yod la/ gdod ma nas med na bsgrubs
157b1(rgyud 'grel): pas mi 'grub ste/ pad+ma rang la sngo dkar dmar po so so na yod la/ de bzhin du sems can la sangs rgyas pa'i rgyu yod pas sangs rgya rgyu med na btsal bas mi phan/ yod pa la bsgrub mi dgos/ /yod pa shes pas chog zer ba de'i skyon ni 'dir ni rgyu la
157b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsol sgrub kyis 'ong bar 'dod pa'o/ /sgom pa'i skyon ni zhi ba dang/ bye brag pa ste/ 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid ni/ /phyi'i spyod yul las 'gags nas/ /gnyis kyis bsgrub pa'i zhi bar gnas/ /'bad de bdag gis bsgom par bya/ zhes pas rnam pa la blo
157b3(rgyud 'grel): log ste/ rang gi sems zhi bar byid nas bde ba snyam byed pa dang/ nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba'i ming te/ mdo las rgyal byed tshal ni nyams dga' bar/ /bdag nyid gang gi gyur kyang bla'i/ /bye brag pa yi thar pa ni/ /nam yang gau tam mi 'tshal lo zhes pa ni
157b4(rgyud 'grel): gong du bstan pa'o/ /nyan thos mi gtsang ba dang/ dbus dang/ bden pa bzhis gnas pa'i sems de skyon no/ /'dir rten 'brel du pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod cing gong ltar gsal la mi rtog pa'o/ /theg pa chen po'i skyon ni mdo las bye brag bdag
157b5(rgyud 'grel): chos phung po gsum/ /gzhan spangs rang gi sdug bsngal zhi/ /bde bar 'dod pa dman pas te/ slar yang chung bas 'khor bar 'gyur zhes pas yul bye brag tu 'dod cing/ gang zag gi bdag yod pa yang min/ med pa yang min zhes phung po gsum par 'dod
157b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ rang 'khor ba las thar pa'i bde ba 'dod pas bskal pa gcig nas slar 'khor ba'o/ /'dir grub pa'i mdza' ma lus pa ston par byed pa'i theg pa chen po'i mdo nas/ pha rol tu phyin drug gzhan la bsngo/ /theg chen chos la rnam par spyod
157b7(rgyud 'grel): dge ba sems dang 'brel par brjod/ /mdo sde de ni theg chen bshad/ /ces pas de ltar gsum dang gong gi bsgom pa skad cig zer bas nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba skad cig nas mi rtag pa shes pa dang/ khyim par shes pa dang/ sems tsam snang bar mi 'dod
158a1(rgyud 'grel): pas de bzhin theg pa chen po'o/ /sems tsam zhe na/ rnam pa sems kho nar mi 'dod rten 'dre la du 'dod de/ des spyod pa sgom pa rnams so so'i rnam bcas kyi lta ba ni mdo sde pa ltar rten 'brel yin te/ thams cad sems
158a2(rgyud 'grel): yin la rnam pa yang sems kyi rnam par 'dod de/ lung las kyang/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam mo zhes pa dang/ rigs pa yang nyi shu pa nas/ drug gis cig car sbyar bas na/ /phra rab rdul cha drug tu 'gyur/ /drug po dag
158a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang go gcig na/ /gong bu rdul phran tsam du 'gyur/ /zhes pas mdo sde pa'i phra rab bdun la rdul phran gcig yin pas phra rab drug char shar dang lho dang nub dang byang dang steng dang 'og gi cha des so sor dus gcig la phye zhing blang du btub na phra
158a4(rgyud 'grel): rab de la drug po'i go sa nas yang drug blangs te phye bas phra rab med na/ shar phyogs gcig gi sa nas gcig len na ri'i gong bu 'di yo rdul phran du rigs te/ des na sems kho na ste/ pha rol phyin drug sems kyi rnam par gzhan don du spyad pas
158a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku bzhi don dam du 'dod pa'o/ /mdo sde pa dang nyan thos kyang kun rdzob tu mi 'gegs so/ /slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas spas pa mnyam gzhag na mi rtog /rjes la thams cad mkhyen par 'dod/ /sku gsung bdag
158a6(rgyud 'grel): po dkar dmar 'di 'khrul pa/ sangs rgyas pas snod gzhal yas khang/ bcud lha dang lha mor mi rtog pa snang bar 'dod do/ /ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa ni/ dgag sgrub gang yang med la mnyam gzhag dang rjes thob yang med par sna tshogs gnyis med du 'dod/
158a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa yang thams cad sems yin pas de la rang gis 'jog pa'o/ /skyon la lta ba'i skyon rig byed ltar song ba bsgom pa'i skyon mdo sde pa'o/ /rig byed pa na re/ dngos po gang dang gang snang ba/ bya bral sems nyid chos skur snang/ /sems las gzhan
158b1(rgyud 'grel): yod ma yin la/ /gsal la mi rtog gnas bde ba/ tshangs pa la yang tshangs de nyid/ /bdag gi ye shes tshangs pa'i mchog /ces pa'i snang pas dngos po ci snang sems yin la/ de yang me nas yin pas/ bya ba brtsal dang rtog pa dang/ the tshom
158b2(rgyud 'grel): med la de yang chos sku snang yang soms nyid yin la mi rtog par gnas pas bde ste/ gsal mi rtog pa 'di ni lha tshangs pa zhes bya/ chos sku zhes bya/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ de las don lhag pa gzhan med la/ de rtogs pas bdag lhun gyis
158b3(rgyud 'grel): grub cing sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'dod pa'o/ /mdo sde pa'i bsgom pa brtan par bya ba dang/ sna rtser sems 'dzin pa'o/ /'di ltar lta ba skad cig gis mi rtag pas khyad par ro/ /bsgom pa la sems yin pas mnyam gzhag rjes thob med la
158b4(rgyud 'grel): ye nas rang rig yin pas goms su med pa'o/ /rnam pa med pa'i lta ba ni rnam pa dang bcas pa ma yin te/ rnam pa 'khrul pa'i shes pa yin la don dam du rnam pa med pa'o/ /lung las/ bag chags kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems don du snang
158b5(rgyud 'grel): ba rab tu 'jug ces pas rlung gis dkrugs pas chu las chab rom 'byung ste/ de chu yin rlung gis lan/ de bzhin du bag chags kyis dkrugs nas dngos por zhen pas snang ba sems kyi rnam par mthong ste/ sems rnam pa med pa yin
158b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ rigs pa rnam pa sems yin na/ /tha dad pa yin nam cig car yin/ tha dad na bye brag pa dang 'dra la 'dre ba yang med/ sems rrnam pa yin nam/ gnyis kar yin/ rnam pa sems su yin na ma bcad pa'i yul mi shes pa ci/ sems rnam par yin
158b7(rgyud 'grel): na bems por 'gyur/ gnyi gar yin na 'dus par yin nam/ ma 'dus par yin/ 'dus par yin na mi 'du ba'i rgyu mtshan yod dam med/ med na sngon du 'am da ltar yang snang ba sems su stong par ram/ sems snang bar cis ma song/ yul dbang po
159a1(rgyud 'grel): yul du cis ma song/ yod na gar 'dus ma 'dus pa yin par/ gnyis so so na sems la rnam pa gang yong ces so/ /gzhan yang slob dpon gzhan gyi 'dod pa dbu ma'i rigs pa bzhis kyang khegs so/ /slob dpon dag gi
159a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug grags pa'i sna tshogs gnyis med du 'dod pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs sems su gnyis med ces 'dod pa gong ma dang/ 'dis kyang 'gegs pa'o/ /rnam pa de dkar dmar dang rtog gam mi rtog mi rtog na rnam pa dang sems gnyis med du
159a3(rgyud 'grel): cis shes/ de mig rgyang ring po bltas pas sna tshogs yod de/ sems su gnyis med ma rtogs pas man ngag tu 'dod do/ /sna tshogs su shes pas mngon sum gyis da lta shes zhes te/ de la skyon mang ste/ de gdod nas sam da ltar gdod nas na
159a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon du ma shes pa ci/ shes kyang ma phan na dgos pa med/ shes kyang dgos na thug pa med nas ma shes na rang rig nyams da? lta na sngon du med phyis med pas chad par thal/ yang na gnyis med de
159a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med du gang gis shes/ gzhan gyis shes sam de nyid kyis shes/ gzhan gyi shes na rang rig nyams/ de nyid de nyid shes sam/ de las 'byung bas shes de nyid kyis de nyid shes na/ rtag nas sam mi rtag nas/ rtag na mi rtag par
159a6(rgyud 'grel): thal/ mi rtag na shes rgyu med/ sngon du ma shes pa ci/ rkyen dgos na gzhan gong ltar de nyid du na dus sam mi rtag pas dang/ rigs sngon gyis so/ /dus sam rigs yin na de la rnam pa ci phan/ yang na de las byung bas phan shes bya 'am
159a7(rgyud 'grel): shes byed/ shes bya shes byed gang/ shes bya gnyis med byung na shes byed med par shes bya gang gis shes/ shes byed byung na shes bya med par shes byed kyis ci byed/ dus gcig tu skad cig la gnyis 'ong ba mi rigs so/ /des na shes
159b1(rgyud 'grel): bya med par shes byed du mi shes/ shes byed med par shes bya mi shes/ des na gnyi ga mi 'byung na gcig gis ni mi shes so/ /des na rnam pa med pa'i rang rig pa spros pa med pa bsam du med pa skad cig mas mi rtag rgyun tu gnas pa don dam
159b2(rgyud 'grel): mo/ /shAn ti pa rjes thob la sprul skur 'dod/ gzhan mi rtog pa las so/ /bsgom pa yang de'i ngang la blo 'jog pa'o/ /skyon la lta ba'i dang/ sgom pa gnyis las lta ba'i sems tsam rnam pa dang bcas pa de'o/ /bsgom pa'i nyi ma dang mthun te/
159b3(rgyud 'grel): mu stegs nyi ma pa'i rgyud nas/ rtog pa'i rgya mtsho dang ba la/ /chu bur rba rlabs sogs 'byung yang/ shar ba dang ni nub pa dag /chu bo de ru ro mnyam gcig /ces pas dper na 'og gi rgya mtsho nas chu bur dang/ rba rlabs dang/ gzhan yang rnyog mdang/
159b4(rgyud 'grel): chu gzhan der 'bab kyang rgya mtsho'i dang du gcig ba ltar/ rang gi sems nyid rnam pa med pa/ spros pa med pa/ mdza' dang mu med pa/ bsam du med pa/ thams cad rtag pa de rtogs na dngos po cir snang/ rtog pa ci byung yang sems nyid kyang tshangs
159b5(rgyud 'grel): pa chos nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes 'dod do/ /'dir skad cig mas mi rtag la/ rgyun gyis rtag par 'dod pa'o/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i lta ba ni de nyid mi bden te/ rnam pa sgyu ma skad cig gis mi rtag la rgyun tu gnas par 'dod do/ /lung gis kyang/ gzugs
159b6(rgyud 'grel): las kyang stong pa nyid de gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gzugs gzhan ma yin/ zhes gsungs la/ rigs pas kyang rnam pa sems su bden /sems rnam pa yin na dbyed pas ma grub ste/ skyon med na bde sdug nyams su myong ba yang brdzun la/ pha rol tu
159b7(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa drug bsags pa la dgos pa med/ sku bzhi med pas des na sgyu ma bden te don dam du 'dod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas gsang ba gzugs sku yang rigs pas sgyu ma bag chags ltar 'dod do/ /ka ma la rak+Shi ta mnyam gzhag dang rjes thob tu 'dod do//
160a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan mi rtog par gzugs sku sems can gyi snang bar 'dod do/ /rnam pa med pa dang/ rig par 'dod pa dang/ rig pa dang rnam pa med pa gnyis 'gal bas skyon gong bzhin no/ /bsgom pa yang
160a2(rgyud 'grel): sgyu mar shes pa'i dang la blo 'jog go /skyon lta ba dang sgom pa gnyis te/ lta ba dang sgom pa 'dra ste/ mu stegs grangs can pa ni lung las/ de tsam nyi shu lnga shes na/ ral pa spyi bo bcings pa'ang 'grol/ /ci dga' i spyod pa byed pa
160a3(rgyud 'grel): dag /bdag ni de las nyams pa yin/ zhes pas phung po lnga/ 'byung ba lnga/ phyogs lngar 'dod de/ rtsa ba'i nyi shu rtsa lnga yang lnga ste/ thams cad so so'o/ /sems 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum cha mnyam pa las snang ba bden rtag par 'dod
160a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de yang sems su bden pas dpyod pa dang/ rtog pa dang bya ba thabs nyes pa med par 'dod pa'o/ /'di skad cig mas mi rtag pa rgyun du gnas pa'o/ /rab tu mi gnas pa'i lta ba ni de thams cad bden pa ma yin te/ kun
160a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzob yin la don dam pa la rnams gcod dang yongs gcod med/ rnam gcod yongs gcod med zer ba rang kun rdzob bo/ /lung las kyang bden pa gnyis kyi mdo nas/ don dam pa'i bden pa sangs rgyas 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa
160a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa thams cad kyis mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang shes pa'ang med na/ rigs kyi bu thob pa 'am nyams su myong du lta ga la yod ces dang/ slob dpon klu grub kyi zhal snga nas kyang/ khyed kyi don
160a7(rgyud 'grel): dam gang yin pa/ /de ni ba'i? kun rdzob yin/ /zhes gsungs la/ slob dpon blo gros mi zad pa'i zhal nas kyang/ don dam blo sgra'i spyod yul min/ /blo dang sgra ni kun rdzob yin zhes gsungs so/ /rigs pa yang gtan tshigs
160b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po bzhi ste/ 'dir gtan tshig bzhi yang gzhan ltar gsum dang/ shes bya shes byed ma grub pa bzhi'o/ /de yang rgyu man chad du 'dod pa la rten cing 'brel 'byung gis don dam pa de gang dngos po rnams rnam pa med pa'i rigs sgyu ma de rnams
160b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang sems nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa chos sku yang rten 'brel kun rdzob bo/ /de yang rtog pa snang ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga/ gzugs sku la ltos nas chos skur btags te/ de yang de rnams stong pa la sogs par mthong ba/
160b3(rgyud 'grel): chos sku la chos skur 'dod pa de rnams med na med pa'o/ /des na rdo dkar po zhes pa don dam du med kyang mi bden pa kun rdzob tu/ rdo dang dkar po dang sra ba lci ba kun la grags pas yod pa'o/ /des na rnam bcas rnam med sgyu ma rten 'brel tsam
160b4(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du yod pa'o/ /don dam par med pas chos skur yang med de/ /mu bzhi skye 'gog ni don dam par 'dod pa ni yod nas 'dod dam med nas 'dod/ yod nas 'dod na yod pa ni med pa la ltos nas shes te/ med pa ma grub par
160b5(rgyud 'grel): yod na ga na grub/ med pa grub na yod pa 'gag pa'o/ /med nas 'dod na yang med pa yod pa la ltos nas shes te/ yod pa ma grub par med pa ga na grub/ yod pa ma grub na med pa 'gag pa'o/ /gnyi ga 'dod nas/ yod pa med pa 'gag la
160b6(rgyud 'grel): med na yod pa 'gag pas so/ /phung po gsum yang mi rigs la/ gnyi ga med pa yang mi rigs te/ gnyis sngon du ma grub par ro/ /grub nas gnyis med na bden te/ des na kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam mo/ /rdo rje gzegs ma thog pas med pa yang don dam de
160b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag las sam gzhan las skye/ yod na bdag grub pa las sam/ ma grub pa las/ grub pa las sgrub na sangs rgyas kyang sgrub dgos pas thug pa med/ yang na phan gnod med de/ grub kyang sgrub dgos pa'i phyir ro/ /ma grub pa sgrub na nam mkha' i me
161a1(rgyud 'grel): tog dang ri bong gi rwa yang sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /ma sgrub na bsgrubs pa la dgos pa ci/ gzhan las skye na rtag pa las sam/ mi rtag pa las rtag pa las skye na rim gyis sam/ cig car/ rims kyis skye na rtag pa nyams
161a2(rgyud 'grel): te sa bon las myu gu ltar 'gyur ro/ /cig car skye na de nyid 'gyur nas sam ma 'gyur nas 'gyur na mi rtag /ma 'gyur na gcig skye ba'am/ du ma skye/ gcig skye na du lam grub par gcig mi 'grub/ gnyis ka yang go rims bzhin du mi rigs so//

161a4(rgyud 'grel): tsam mo/ /shes bya shes byed ma grub kyang nga rgyal gyis 'dod na yang don dam pa de shes bya ba 'am/ shes byed dam/ gnyi ga shes bya nang gis shes/ shes byed yin na gang shes/ shes bya yod na shes byed nyams/ gnyis

161b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la /khas len med par shes ci dgos kun rdzob la skad cig gi bye brag gi rgyun la gnyis ka yang ma ste/ shes bya shes byed med pas chad pa'o zer na khas mi len par skyon ci la gnod de/ nam mkha' la skyon ci gdags/ yang khyod
161b3(rgyud 'grel): la rnam gcod yongs gcod med na/ rgyu man chad la skyon de tsam rnam par bcad pas rnams bcad des yongs su gcod pa'i sgrub pa yang yod pas khyod la yang don dam dpyad pas yod zer na/ nga la don dam rnam gcod yongs gcod med pa khas
161b4(rgyud 'grel): len med de/ khyod don dam du yongs su bcad nas 'dod pa la nga'i kun rdzob kyi dpyad pa'i skyon yod pa mthong nas rnam par gcod la/ kun rdzob kyis dpyad pas don dam pa grub pa med par yongs su grub kyi/ khyod de ltar don dam pa don du 'dod
161b5(rgyud 'grel): ba med do/ /yang kho na re 'o na khyod kun rdzob kyi yongs gcod de kun rdzob tu grub pa ma zhe na grub ste/ 'o na grub pa med pa de rnam gcod yongs gcod kyis grub na nga dang 'dra la/ rnam gcod yongs gcod sal na ni sgrub byed gang gis byed la/
161b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub byed med na ci 'grub ces 'dri na/ khyad don dam du 'dod pa rnam par gcod cing/ kun rdzob tu bcas pas ma grub pa de nyid kun rdzob tu grub la/ rnam gcod yongs gcod kun rdzob la re bzhi nas/ don dam la sel byed mi 'dod la/ mi
161b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod zer ba dang/ don dam zer ba yang de tsam du brjod par zad kyi mi brjod du ma btub pa las kun rdzob bo/ ci 'grub zer ba don dam la 'dod thog /dam bca' 'thun pa'o/ /kun rdzob tu ci yang ma yin pa de la skad cig gis snga ma
162a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun ma chad pa chu bo ltar yin 'jig pa'o/ /yang kho na re/ rnam gcod bdag la mthong ba de rang zhi la/ yongs gcod khyod rang la/ yon tan du mthong ba'i khas len med pa de/ rnam gcod nas sam ma
162a2(rgyud 'grel): chod nas/ mchod na gnyis sam phung po gsum pa'i skyon yod/ chod na gcod byed gzhan nas 'byung ngam de las yin/ gcod byed shes pa gzhan nas 'byung ba mi rigs te/ sangs rgyas lung rigs kun gyis rang la 'byung gis
162a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis mi byed/ byed na sangs rgyas gcig gis sems can yo sangs rgyas la 'god par rigs so/ /de las byung nas rnam par gcod na de bcad pa'i shes pa de la yang gcod byed cig dgos pas thug pa med pa 'am/ phan ma brtags
162a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skyon yod zhe na de ni dper na gzugs sam sgra'i yul yod pas/ mthong ba dang thos pa yod la/ yul med na dbang pos mthong thos med pa la rkyen med du rang zhi la shing ma zad kyi bar la me 'bar la/ shing zad nas me

162a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'bras kyi snang ba'o/ /spyod 'jug nas/ de la kun rdzob rnam gnyis mthong/ rnal 'byor pa dang de bzhin phal zhes pa'o/ /'jig rten pa'i sdig pa'i rgyu 'bras snang ba la dbye na yang mang la/ rnal 'byor pa'i dge ba'i rgyu 'bras snang
162a7(rgyud 'grel): ba la yang mu stegs dang/ nad pa la yang mdor dbye ba theg pa gsum dang/ bye brag tu smra ba la sogs pa'i lta ba drug gi rim phas rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa drug /'bras bu sku bzhi/ de yang mtshan nyid kyi lugs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa
162b1(rgyud 'grel): drug bskal pa grangs med gsum du sbyangs pas sku bzhi thob la/ de yang gong bzhin sems bskyed nas spyad pas sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims la brtson 'grus kyis grogs byas nas gzhan don du bsngo ba bsngos pas sprul sku 'byung la/ bzod
162b2(rgyud 'grel): pa brtson 'grus kyis grogs byas pas longs sku/ bsam gtan la grogs byas pas ngo bo nyid kyi skur rgyun du rang sems gnas/ de rnams thams cad gdod nas rab tu mi gnas pa'i shes rab la brtson pas chos sku'o/ /de yang byams
162b3(rgyud 'grel): bas zhus pa'i mdo nas/ sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dag /brtson pas gzugs sku 'byung ba'o/ /bsam gtan shes rab ngo bo chos/ /sku de brtson 'grus kyi 'byung ngo/ /zhes bstan to/ /sngags kyi lugs la slob dpon la la dag
162b4(rgyud 'grel): laM bde ba yin gyi nye ba yin te/ dper na rdo rje gdan du 'gro ba la rta rkang mgyogs pa nyin gcig gis mi sleb pas rta pa de mi chad rkang thang chad de phyin pa 'dra ba bzhin du/ sngags dang mtshan nyid sangs rgya ba'i dus dang brtson sgrub 'dra

162b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po nye la/ /de bas sngags nye ba'o/ /sku bzhi'i rgyu yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya las sprul sku dang/ longs sku las kyi phyag rgya las 'byung/ chos kyi phyag rgyas bde ba chen po'i sku 'byung/ phyag rgya chen po rtsol sgrub med pa de ye nas
162b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pas chos sku'o/ /lam du bsgom thabs la sogs pa rgyas par 'og nas sngags kyi ? bsu stan to/ /slob dpon la la'i kun rdzob yang dag pa zla ba gcig gam chu dngos bya ba nus pa yin la/ log pa'i kun rdzob smig rgyu'i chu dang/ zla ba
163a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis par mthong ba ni 'khrul te mi bden par snang zer ba 'dir mi 'dod de/ 'dir kun rdzob smig rgyu dang chos sku 'dra bar mi bden par snang ba 'khrul pa'i snang pa'o/ /de yang 'khrul ba'i mig rgyu'i chu dang zla ba gnyis
163a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa la snang ba tsam las med de/ ma 'khrul pa chu dngos dang/ zla ba gcig byang chub sems dpa' la snang ba tsam las dngos su med pas byang chub sems dpa' i snang ba tsam po de sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang/ bde ba chen po la med bya ba de
163a3(rgyud 'grel): don dam la med pas de kun log par song zhing ma shes pa'o/ /snga ma ltar snang ba tsam pa phye na dge sdig gnyis grangs med par bden pa'o/ /rigs pas gnod kyang kun rdzob tu bden pa tsam po de nyid bden par brjod pa'o/ /skyon ni mu
163a4(rgyud 'grel): stegs bram ze de nyid de/ kho'i rgyus nas/ tshangs pa gdong bzhi kun tu bzang/ sems nyid don par dam shes shing/ snang ba thams cad kun rdzob ste/ /de ltar rtogs nas phan nod med/ /ces pas rang gi sems 'di tsam las mgo nas rkang
163a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar du mig dang rna ba dang ba spu la sogs pa yang med la/ phyin yang gzugs sgra la sogs pa gang yang med cing ma rnyed pa de kho na rnyed pa ste/ de nyid nam mkha' ltar brjod pa dang/ bsam pa dang bral zhing mdza' dang bar mtshams dang
163a6(rgyud 'grel): mu med pa de nyid la rtogs pa zhes bya/ chos sku zhes bya/ tshangs pa zhes bya/ kun tu bzang ngo zhes bya ste sangs rgyas yin la/ de la dge bas phan 'dogs ma myong/ mi 'dogs la/ sdig pas gnod ma myong mi gnod kyi/ gzhan sangs
163a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa dang/ mu stegs rtsol sgrub la re ba rnams snying re rje/ don dam pa de la rtsol ba med pas 'grub pas so/ /zhes zer ro/ /de yang 'dir skyon yin te/ de nyid dar rtogs pas chog pa de rtogs par gang gis shes/ de las byung ba zhig shes sam/
163b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis shes/ gzhan gyis shes na khyod kyis bdag kyang rtogs su chug /nga sangs rgyas su chug/ yang na rang la sangs rgyas yod pa dang yin zer ba yang nyams/ de nyid las byung na de kho na 'dra ba cig byung nas shes sam/ mi 'dra ba cig byung
163b2(rgyud 'grel): nas shes/ ming 'dra pas 'dra bar mi shes te/ mi 'dra ba de 'dra ba min te/ min pas yin par shes pa ga la yod/ rten long ba la sogs pas mthong ba la sogs pa yod na ston/ des na mi 'dra ba cig byung bas kyang mi shes pas sangs ji ltar
163b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya/ de kho na 'dra ba cig byung nas shes na/ de sngon nas yod nas shes sam zhar la byung/ sngon nas yod nas shes sam/ da lta shes/ sngon nas yod nas sngon rang du shes na shes pa la phan med cing/ sngon nas shes pas da lta sems can
163b4(rgyud 'grel): du 'dug pa la mi phan te/ sangs rgyas kyang sems can du yod pas so/ /yang na thug pa med de/ sngon nas yod kyang da lta yang shes dgos pas so/ /sangs rgyas la yang thug pa med do/ /yang na rig pa yod dgos na/ la las sangs rgyas
163b5(rgyud 'grel): dge ba ma byas kyang 'gro ba 'am sdig pa ma byas kyang ngan song du 'gro ba la sogs pa'i/ /yang na dus rgyur lta ba bzhin du dus yod dgos te/ mi rigs so/ /zhar la byung ba shes na de nyid gnyis su song ba'am/ mang po'i skyon dang rgyu rkyen mi dgos
163b6(rgyud 'grel): na sngon du yang 'byung bar rigs/ /dgos na de kho na 'dra ba 'byung na thug pa med pa dang/ phan med na dang/ phan pa'i skyon dang/ mi 'dra na 'gyur mi rtag pa dang/ gong ltar rang rig dang kun sangs rgyas su bya ba rigs so/ /des na phyi rol mu
163b7(rgyud 'grel): stegs pa dang/ nang pa sangs rgyas pa thams cad don dam du khas len pa dang/ sangs rgyas 'dod pa skyon no/ /de yang skad cig ma dang/ rgyu med par rtag pa dang/ ther zug pa'o/ /skad cig dang rgyun ma shes na sems tsam rnam bcas rnam med
164a1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma dang rab tu mi gnas par 'dod kyang mu stegs su 'gro ba'o/ /mtshan nyid kyi de nyid mthong ba'i lam gyi rim pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //gnyis pa sngags kyi rim pa
164a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa la gnyis te/ snod du bya ba dang/ bcud du bya ba'o/ /snod du bya ba la dbang bzhi ste/ bum pa'i dbang dang/ gsang ba'i dbang dang/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang bzhis pa'o/ /bcud la phyag rgya bzhi'o/ /bum
164a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang la gnyis te/ slob ma'i bya ba dang/ slob dpon gyi las so/ /slob ma'i bya ba la gsum ste/ bsnyen pa'i bya ba dang/ sta gon gyi bya ba dang/ zhag gi bya ba'o/ /bsnyen pa'i bya ba la ste/ slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid brtag
164a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ zhu dbul ba dang/ rdzas bsags pa dang/ bsnyen pa zhu ba dang/ sdom pa bzung ba'o/ /mtshan nyid brtag pa la bzhi ste/ brgyud pa dang ldan zhing don dam mi gnas par rtogs pa dang/ dam tshig dang ldan zhing byin
164a5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs 'byung ba dang/ rgyud sde shes shing dkyil 'khor la mkhas pa dang/ gzhan don la brtson zhing chags pa med pa'o/ /zhu dbul ba ni bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par bya ba'i don du zhi ba la sogs
164a6(rgyud 'grel): thun mong gis gzhan don dang/ mchog gis 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas la bkod pa'i don gyi phyir slob dpon bdag la bum pa'i dbang zhu 'tshal zhes brjod cing/ maN+Dal dang/ me tog gi phreng ba gdags dbul lo/ /rdzas bsag
164a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni rgyud kun nas/ rin chen gser dngul mu thig dang/ /me tog la sogs rgyal srid bcas/ /gtor ma shing rtas bskyal ba dang/ /dpa' bo'i ston mos dga' ston bya/ /zhes pas 'khor lo mchod pa la chu gtsang brgyad stong khri 'bum
164b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi bar du 'gram/ de bzhin du me tog /spos mar me dri'i bye brag dpag tu med pa dang/ zhal zas dpag tu med pa dang/ sil snyan dpag tu med pa bsag go/ rgyal srid rin po che sna bdun/ bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad/ gzugs sgra'i
164b2(rgyud 'grel): bye brag dbul ba dang/ sha lnga dang/ bdud rtsi lnga dang/ rdo rje'i glu gar dang/ nang gi mchod pa dang/ bcu gnyis bcu drug nyi shu mdzes pa de kho na'i mchod pa bsag /bla ma mchod pa la yang de ltar mchod pa gsum dang/ rgyun gyi bye
164b3(rgyud 'grel): brag bsag ba dang/ chos skyong mchod pa'i yo byad 'bras chan la sogs pa tshan gyi rigs ji snyed yod pa dang/ sha dang nya'i rigs dang/ rtig tas bran pa'i tshod ma la sogs pa'i rigs dang/ zho la sogs pa'i dkar gyi rigs dang/ la du la
164b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa khur ba'i rigs dang/ gur kum la sogs pa sman gyi rigs dang/ na ri ke la sogs pa 'bras bu'i rigs dang/ phog phran la sogs pa la du'i rigs dang/ ka ra la sogs pa mngar gyi rigs dang/ la phug la sogs pa rtsa ba'i
164b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs dang/ gzhan yang bca' ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ kha ba dang/ skyur ba'i rigs kyi mchod pa'o/ /rdzas bsag pa dang/ dga' ston bya ba yang rgyud nas mchod 'os ma gyur gtor ma dbang/ sde dang rigs rnams dga' bar bya zhes pas dbang
164b6(rgyud 'grel): thon nas yo byad lhag pa la rnal 'byor pa dang/ ku su lu'i tshogs dang/ paN+Di ta dang/ slob ma'i 'khor dang/ dge 'dun dang/ dge snyen gyi g.yog dang/ rgyal po dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ rig byed kyi sde dang/ rje'u rigs
164b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gtsang ma rnams dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ rigs ban rnams la ci rigs pas mchod pa dang sbyin pa bya ba'i phyir bsag go /bsnyen pa zhu ba ni de ltar rdzas tshogs nas slob dpon bdag gi bsam pa sgrub par zhu zhes lan gsum brjod
165a1(rgyud 'grel): cing/ maN+Dal dang/ me tog gi phreng ba dbul lo/ /sdom pa gzung ba ni bsnyen pa'i dus te/ 'og nas ston to/ /slob dpon gyis las la shes pa dang/ dbang bskur ba ste/ shes pa la bzhi ste/ brgyad pa dang
165a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas sangs rgyas nas bar ma chad pa don dam rtog pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i lta ba 'dod pa/ rtogs pas sku bzhi man ngag gis sgrubs pa'i don shes pa dang/ byin brlabs dam tshig las 'byung bas dam tshig shes nas bsrung ba
165a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rgyud dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la mkhas pas ma tshang ba brgyad kyis kha skong ba dang/ slob ma yongs su skyob pa dang/ gzhan don la brtson zhing ma chags pas bsnyen pa dang ldan zhing 'byor pa la phan pa'o/ /cho ga la gsum ste/
165a4(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang/ dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /bsnyen pa la slob ma'i bsnyen pa dang/ lha'i bsnyen pa gnyis las/ slob ma'i bsnyen pa la yang sdom pa sbyin pa dang/ bsrung ba gnyis so/ /sdom pa sbyin pa la slob
165a5(rgyud 'grel): dpon rim gyis bstan pa dang/ slob ma srung du gzhug pa gnyis las/ slob ma srung du gzhug pa'i sdom pa yang chung ba dang/ che ba gnyis las chung ba ni sngon du bstan pa'i skyabs su gsol ba'i bye brag bdun dang/ rten dang bslab pa'i bye
165a6(rgyud 'grel): brag rnams rim pas bstan la srung du gzhug pa'o/ /theg pa chen po'i yang de bzhin du gong du bstan pa bzhin du srung du gzhug pa'o/ /bsrung ba la yang gnyis te/ mkha' gsang du rnam par snang mdzad du bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs
165a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas gdon pa dang/ rgyu gang bsnyen gyi bsrung sngags zlos su gzhug pa'o/ /lha'i bsnyen pa la bsnyen thabs dang/ rtags gnyis las/ lha'i bsnyen pa'i thabs la rdzas kyis bsnyan pa dang/
165b1(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin dang/ sngags kyis bsnyen pa dang gsum mo/ /rdzas la maN+Dal phul bas 'khor lo bsnyen pa dang/ gtor mas chos skyong bsnyen pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor bzhis 'khor lo bsnyen pa dang dgug gzhug skyes pas chos
165b2(rgyud 'grel): skyong bsnyen pa'o/ /sngags la gtso 'khor gnyis bsnyen pa dang/ yi ge brgya pas mtshams sbyar ba'o/ /rtags la mngon sum dang/ mtshan ma dang/ grangs su bskyal ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la yang bzhi ste/ dkyil 'khor
165b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu'i bya ba dang/ lhag gnas dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo dang/ cho ga dngos so/ /rgyu'i bya ba la bdun te/ sa btsal ba dang/ brtag pa dang/ blang ba dang/ gzung ba dang/ bcad pa dang/ sbyang ba dang/ brtsig pa'o/ /lhag gnas
165b4(rgyud 'grel): la bzhi ste/ sa'i lha mo dang/ 'khor lo dang/ bum pa dang/ slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o/ /ngo bo la thig gdab pa dang/ tshon dgye ba dang/ rgyan dgos pa'o/ /sa btsal ba la ting nge 'dzin sogs kyi lus lha/ yid gang 'dod
165b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'gro don la dmigs pa dang/ ngag snying po'i sbyor ba dang/ btsal ba dngos la las dang sbyar la phyogs btsal ba dang/ rgyud ltar dben pa 'am mi 'jigs pa'i sa btsal ba'o/ /brtag pa la yang sbyor ba dngos su song bas las dang
165b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bas kha dog dbyibs brtag pa dang/ rgyud ltar bum pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid brtag pa'o/ /blang ba la yang bdag po dngos por snang ba la blang ba dang/ dngos po med pa la blang ba'o/ /gzung ba la yang rnal 'byor bzhis gzung ba dang
165b7(rgyud 'grel): sa'i lha mo dpangs pas gzung ba'o/ /bcad pa la yang ji tsam 'dod pa de sa'i lha mo mkha' la bteg la yid kyis bcad pa dang/ khro bo'i phur bus phyogs ma nor bar bcad pa'o/ /sbyang ba la rdzas dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis
166a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyang pa lnga las /rdzas la sa ro mang na legs par bsal la gzhan gyis dgang ba dang/ rin po che'i bum pa bcud can sba ba dang gtor ma btang ba'o/ /lus rkang pa rdo rje brkyang bskum gyis bgegs gsal ba'o/ /
166a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag slob mas de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ zhes pa la sogs pa dang/ yak+Sha zhes brjod pas bgegs gsal ba'o/ /yid dra ba dang/ gur dang/ gdod nas dag pa dang/ rdo rje'i gdan ltar mi 'gyur bar bsam mo/ /brtsigs
166a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la dri dang ba'i rnam pa lnga bsres la tshad dang ldan par brtsig pa dang/ dri dang spos byug pa'o/ /sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas pa las bskyed pa dang/ mkha' i spyan drang ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ gnyis med byas la bstim pa'o/ /
166a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo lhag gnas la sa la me tog dgod pa dang/ lha bskyed pa dang/ gsol ba gdab pa gsum las/ me tog dgos pa la rdo rje slob dpon gyis bris lha'i gnas su mtshan ma gdab pa dang/ las kyi slob dpon gyis me tog
166a5(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa'o/ /lha bskyed pa ni sbyor ba gsum gyis rnal 'byor bzhi sgrub thabs kyi 'dod pas bskyed pa'o/ /gsol ba gdab pa la lnga ste/ slob dpon phyir byung la shar nas yid kyis blta ba dang/ 'khor lo'i lha la gsol ba gdab
166a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spyi la gsol ba gdab pa dang/ chos skyong la gsol ba gdab pa dang/ gsol ba btab la mkha' la gshegs pa'o/ /bum pa'i lha gnas la mtshan nyid dang/ phyi'i bya ba dang/ nang gi
166a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba gsum mo/ /mtshan nyid la grangs lha dang sbyor ba dang/ rgyu rin po che 'am sa las byas pa dang/ mu stegs kyi ma yin pa bre gang las mi chung/ bre gsum las mi che ba/ rtsa ba med cing mi gnag pa'o/ /phyi'i bya ba la yang mtshan
166b1(rgyud 'grel): ma gdab pa dang/ /ba rgyan mgul rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ gdan la gzhag pa'o/ /nang gi bya ba bcud la drug ste/ bcud blugs pa/ gzhal yas khang dang lhar bskyed pa dang/ ye shes kyi lha dgug pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ sngags
166b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa dang/ bzhu bas bkang la gnas su bzhag pa'o/ /slob ma'i lhag gnas la slob dpon dang/ slob ma 'brel pa'i bya ba bdun te/ spro ba bskyed pa dang/ gnang ba sbyin pa dang/ sdom pa sbyin pa dang/ bsrung ba dang/ so shing dor ba
166b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ku sha'i sngas dang stan sbyin pa dang/ gzengs bstod la nyal du gzhug pa'o/ /spro ba bskyed pa la gsum/ slob mas khrus byas la maN+Dal dbul ba dang/ slob dpon gyis sngags kyi dngos grub ces pa'i chos bstan pa dang/ slob mas pha rol
166b4(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs te rgya che bar shes par bya'o/ /gnang ba sbyin pa la nod pa dang/ sbyin pa gnyis las/ dga' chen zhes spro bas nod pa dang/ /bu tshur zhes brtse bas sbyin pa'o/ /sdom pa la gsum ste/ sangs rgyas zhes skyabs su gzhug
166b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ skyabs pa'i yon tan sangs rgyas longs sku/ chos bde bas bsgrub pa dang/ dge 'dun gtso bo'i ngo bo bstan pa dang/ sdom pa dang ldan pas slob dpon de gsum dang ldan pa dang/ khyod kyi dbang thob nas yin par 'gyur ro/ /sdom
166b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dngos la gnyis te/ mtshan nyid kyi dang/ sngags kyi'o/ /mtshan nyid la bdun sngon du song ba'o/ /sngags la gnyis te/ slob dpon gyi dang rigs lnga'i sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa/ 'di ni sangs rgyas zhes pas gzhug pa'o/ bsrung
166b7(rgyud 'grel): ba la 'byor bas bsrung ba dang/ gdams pas bsrung ba 'byor ba bsrung ba la zhi sogs kyi sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /gdams pas bsrung ba la slob ma dang/ slob dpon gyi bya ba gnyis las/ slob mas bsrung ba la/ lus gus pas rkang pa g.yas
167a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pus mo sa la btsugs la bsdad pa dang/ yid bya ba dran par bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis bsrung ba la ting nge 'dzin dang/ mchod pa dang/ rdzas gsum gyis bsung ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin de mkha' gsang du slob
167a2(rgyud 'grel): ma rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la gdon pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad lus la gzhug pa'o/ /mchod pa la gnas gsum du dris mtshan ma bya ba dang/ lha bskyed pa dang/ phyi nang gi mchod pas dngos su mchod
167a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rdzas la skud pa dang/ gtor ma gnyis las skud pa'i rgyu dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ sngags dang/ gdags sa gzhi las rgyu ras sam bal lam ring thung sum sgril mdud pa bdun nam lnga gsum du bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin la
167a4(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la sogs par skyed/ ye shes dgug/ mchod gnyis med du byas te/ sngags de brgya stong du bzlas te go char bsam pa'o/ /gdags sa skyes pa'i g.yon/ bud med kyi g.yas su'o/ /gtor ma la rgyu byin gyis brlab pa
167a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gron bsngo ba'o/ /rgyu snod ka pA la dang rin po che 'am/ de med na shing dang rdo skyong yang bzang/ byin gyis brlabs pa snod dang bcud las/ snod rlung mi bskyed pa ka pA lar ro/ /bcud bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga'o/ /'gron la gnas
167a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lha gnyis las/ gnas chos 'byung pad+ma dang/ lha la bskyed pa dang/ dgug pa las/ bskyed pa bar du chos skyong/ steng du lha chen po/ 'og tu klu ste gzhan ltar ro/ /so shing dor ba la bdun te/ so shing gi mtshan nyid dang/ dor
167a7(rgyud 'grel): sa dang/ slob ma'i kha lta phyogs dang/ dor ba'i thabs dang dgos pa dang/ de la dgos pa dang/ ltas brtag pa'o/ /ku sha'i sngas dang stan sbyin pa la ku sha bsangs la gtso bo'i sngags kyis sngas su sbyin pa dang/ las bum gyis bsangs la las kyi sngags kyis
167b1(rgyud 'grel): stan du sbyin pa'o/ /gzengs bstod nas nyal du gzhug pa la/ gzengs bstod pa dang/ nyal ba la gnyis te/ slob dpon gyis 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag ces brtse bas nges par bstan pa dang/ slob mas spro bas yid ches pas mnyan
167b2(rgyud 'grel): nas dga' bar bya ba'o/ /nyal ba la sbyor ba dang/ rmi lam brtag pa dang/ bzla ba'o sbyor ba la lus seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis dkyil 'khor dang slob dpon la sngas bstan la nyal ba dang/ ngag bsnyen pa'i dus kyi snying po bzlas pa dang/
167b3(rgyud 'grel): yid 'gro ba dang bdag gi don 'dod pas tha mal la mi yengs pas nyal ba'o/ /rmi lam brtag pa ni bdag gi so shing gi ltas dang mthun pa'i thun mong dang mchog gi ltas shog cig /ston cig ces brjod do/ /rmi lam bzla ba la
167b4(rgyud 'grel): bzla ba dang brtag pa'o/ /bzla ba bla ma la maN+Dal phul nas dang po 'am tha ma gang gsal bzla'o/ /brtag pa ni rmi lam bzang ba la sogs pa dang/ ngan pa mar nag gis lus byugs sam/ spre'u dang 'bu sbrang dang/ sdig sbrul gyis so btab pa rmis
167b5(rgyud 'grel): na zhe sogs man ngag gis sbyin sreg bya/ gzhan yang chus khyer ba la sogs pa rmis na sngags mang du bzla/ gzhan gyis bdag gi nor sogs khyer na bzang ba'o/ /gzhan yang bzang ba mang/ ngan yang sgyu mar shes na zlogs so/ /thig
167b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyu dang/ byin gyis brlab pa dang/ gdab pa'o/ /rgyu dkar po la sogs pa lnga'o/ /byin gyis brlab pa thig skud 'khal ba bdag lha gtso bo'i ngo bor gsal/ 'khal mkhan shar gyi lhar gsal nag po dkar po ser dmar ljang gu
167b7(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i 'od kyis ltar gsal/ 'od kyis rigs kyi thugs dam bskul bas sbyar ba dang snod du lha bskyed pa dang/ ye shes kyi lha dgug/ mchod/ bsgril /gnyis med thig tu gyur pa'o/ /gdab pa ye shes kyi mkha' la gdab pa dang/ dam tshig gi skud pas
168a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dngos la gdab pa dang/ ye shes kyi skud pas bsre ba'o/ /tshon la rgyu dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang dgye ba'o/ /rgyu rin po che 'am/ 'bru 'am dur khrod kyi rdzas sam/ sa dngos dang lnga'o/ /
168a2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs pa lha'i kha dog gis phyogs ma nor bar snod du yi ge'i bris la gzhag pa dang/ lha bskyed pa dang/ ye shes pa dgug pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ gnyis med tshon du gyur pa'o/ /dgye ba la bsrung ba dang/ dgye ba
168a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos so/ /bsrung pa byang shar du gtso bo'i rim bas sor bzhi dgye ba dang/ lha lnga bskyed pa dang/ ye shes dgug pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ gnyis med du gyur nas bgegs mthar byed kyis bsrungs te ka pA las bkab la gzhag go
168a4(rgyud 'grel): bgye ba tshen phyogs dang sa la ma nor bar dgye ba dang/ tshon spra brtag pa'o/ /rtsig pa lnga nas re khAs par mchod par phyogs nas bris te sngon gyi bsrung ba nas bar chad dam de bas spoms sam/ 'phras sam phyi nang du yon slob
168a5(rgyud 'grel): dpon 'chi ba dang/ nang dang/ nor nyams pa dang/ cho ga 'khrugs pa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin 'ong bar shes par bya'o/ /de las log pa bzang ba'o/ /rtog pa med pa 'am mi shes pas bris na nyes pa med/ /rgyan dgram
168a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni bla bre la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi nam mkha' brgyan pa dang/ phyi nang gi mchod pas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi brgyan pa'o/ /cho ga dngos dbang bskur ba la bzhi las/ bum pa'i dbang la bum pa la/ sgrub pa dang/ bskur
168a7(rgyud 'grel): ba dngos nyid las/ sgrub pa la rnal 'byor gsum bzhi'o/ /bskur pa dngos la slob dpon gyis blang ba dang/ slob ma la bskud pa gnyis las/ slob dpon gyis blang ba la dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang/ dbang dngos gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor
168b1(rgyud 'grel): du 'jug pa la zhugs pa dang/ zhugs nas phyir shar sgor byung ba dang/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang bla ma de'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis spyan drangs te/ de nyid la gzhag pa dang bdag gi sa bon las spros la phyi nang de nyid kyi mchod pa dbul ba
168b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dga' chen zhes gsol ba gdab pa dang/ bdud rtsi btung ba dang/ mkhyen par gsol ba dang/ khyod su zhes dris nas/ slob dpon dang mi bskyod pa spyi bo na yod pa'i ngo bos bskul nas shar gyi sgo bas nang bcug pa dang/ sdom pa
168b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa dang/ bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas chos dang zhes khas blang ba dang/ phyogs bcu nas yang ngo bos bskul/ shar sgor bkug mchad nas bdag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor lor gyur nas bcug pa dang/ mchog
168b4(rgyud 'grel): gi ye shes byin nas thun mong du rnams kyang 'grub par lung bstan pa dang/ sku rdo rje bkug nas bcug pa dang/ thugs rdo rje bcug pa dang/ gsung rdo rje bkug nas bcug pa dang/ de thams cad slob dpon las byung bas mnyan par
168b5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa dang/ sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes man ngag ltar dbab pa dang/ de nas bskor ba bya ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ de nas yi dam gyi lha ngo shes pa dang/ lha de rnams ngo bo gcig pas tha dad pa ma yin par kun shes pa dang/
168b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag la de rnams la gso ba brjod pa'o/ /dbang la byang chub ces zhu ba dang/ bskur ba gnyis las/ bskur ba la bgegs khro bos bskrad ba dang/ bdag la pad sogs gdan dang/ gdugs sogs rgyan dang/ bskur ba dngos te gsum
168b7(rgyud 'grel): mo/ /bskur ba dngos la bum sogs slob mas blang ba dang/ rdo rje'i de nyid dang/ dril bu'i de nyid dang/ phyag rgya'i de nyid bskur ba ltar man ngag gis byin gyis brlabs la dbang blang ngo/ /gsad dbang man ngag bzhin byin gyis brlab /
169a1(rgyud 'grel): gtang/ blang ngo/ /shes rab ye shes kyang de bzhin no/ /bzhi pa yang de bzhin no/ /slob ma la dbang bskur ba yang de'i rim pas te/ de yang dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang/ dbang bskur ba'o/ /gzhug pa la
169a2(rgyud 'grel): nang du gzhug pa dang/ gsang ba bsgo ba dang/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'o/ /nang du gzhug pa ni las bum gyis gsang ba'i mig ras A kham gyis byin gyis brlabs la bcing ba dang/ A khaM zlos su gzhug pa dang/ dga' chen zhes
169a3(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab pa dang/ las kyi slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang me tog su ra ta stwaM/ zhes snying gar sbyin/ A khaM gis nang du gzhug /gang yin zhes dri/ nang du gzhug pa'o/ /gsang ba bsgo ba la gsum ste/ rgyud sbyang ba/ bsgo ba
169a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos dang/ ye shes dbab pa'o/ /rgyud sbyang ba la lnga ste/ thog ma zhes pas sdig pa sbyang ba dang/ utpA da yas sems bskyed pa dang/ sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa dang/ mkha' gsang nas dbyung ba dang/ bgegs bsal ba'o/ /bsgo ba dngos
169a5(rgyud 'grel): la bdun te/ 'dod chags chen po las byung ba'i/ /'khor lo'i de nyid gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /zhes byin gyis brlab cing gnang ba nod pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis brlabs pas smrar mi gzhug pa dang/
169a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi dngos grub thob pa dang/ 'di ni khyod dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhes thugs rdo rje dang/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i/ zhes gsung rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la smrar mi rung bar bsgo ba
169a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ de rnams slob dpon las byung bas brnyas pa ma byed par bsgo ba'o/ /ye shes dbab pa la slob mas ye shes zhu ba dang/ slob ma'i ye shes dbab pa dang/ babs na zhes lus ngag yid brtag pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa
169b1(rgyud 'grel): la dgu ste/ snying po'i zhes dam bca' ba dang/ 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ pra ti zhes me tog dor ba dang/ snang ba dri ba dang/ gtsug tor la sogs pa dngos grub rab 'bring brtag pa dang/ stobs po che zhes me tog mgor bcing ba dang/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' 
169b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes mig dbye ba dang/ ltos shig ces dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang/ shar sgo nas dbus kyi bar du lha bstan pa'o/ /la la de kho na nyid 'dir ston te/ de ni ma yin te/ saM gra ha nas dbang bskur nas ni de nyid bstan/ gzhan du na ni dngos grub dang/
169b3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu ring bar 'gyur ro zhes/ rdo rje 'dzin pas yang dag gsungs zhes pas dbang rdzogs nas 'khor lo de nyid bstan par bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba la slob dpon mnyes par bya ba dang/ bskur pa gnyis so/ /mnyes pa la phyi nang de nyid gsum
169b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa las phyi'i mchod pa yon du lus ngag yid gsum dang bcas pa dbul ba man ngag gis so/ /nang sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga 'aM byin gyis brlabs la nang gi sbyin sreg tu bya'o/ /de kho na nyid ni dbang gi ye shes shes pas ga bur ma nyams pa'o/
169b5(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba la bum pa la sogs pa bzhi las/ bum pa la sbyor ba dang/ dngos gnyis las sbyor ba rdo rje zhes nod pa dang/ gdan bsham pa dang/ rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ gdugs la sogs pa bkra shis kyi rdzas
169b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mchod pa bsham pa dang/ til la sogs pas bgegs bskrad pa dang/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te/ bcug la mchod pa dang/ phun sum zhes bkra shis brjod pa'o/ /dngos la phyi nang gsang ba gsum
169b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'khor lo mchod lha mo lnga dang rigs lngar gyur te/ sangs rgyas spyan gyis las bum gyis ji ltar zhes dkrus pas dri ma rkang par bud par bsam pa dang/ he ru ka dang rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad
170a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsang ba gsum zhes pas gtso bo dang/ shar bum bskur bas sku'i rigs thams cad dang bcas pas lus la bcug nas bdud rtsis lus rgyas te dpral bar rnam snang byon pa'o/ /de nas chus
170a2(rgyud 'grel): bsangs te cod pan dang thor tshugs la rin chen 'byung ldan bskyed de/ ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug mchod bstims nas thor tshugs su gyur/ mA ma kIs ji ltar zhes dkrus pas dri ma dang sgrib pa rkang par bud bar bsam pa dang
170a3(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dang rin chen 'byung ldan gyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ gsang ba gsum las byung ba yi/ zhes gtso bo dang lho'i bum pa thogs nas bskur bas yon tan gyi rigs thams cad dang bcas pa lus la
170a4(rgyud 'grel): btsud pas bdud rtsis lus brgyan te rna brtag g.yas su rin chen 'byung ldan du gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin du rdo rje dang/ bdag po dang/ ming rnams la yang go bar bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang ni slob dpon kha cig 'dir
170a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod mod kyi/ rje ri khrod zhabs kyis 'dir bzhi pa yan chad bskur nas so/ /de la 'dir rdo rje'i de nyid sbyin pa ni/ /rdo rje la gong ltar byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rjer gyur pa de tshigs bcad dang sngags kyis sbyin te/ /slob ma'i lag
170a6(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas su ma las nyi ma hUM las gser gyi rdo rjer gyur par sgom du bcug la de gnyis med du zung zhes pas sbyin pa'o/ /dril bu'i de nyid kyang de bzhin du byas la lag pa g.yon par a dang kham las zla ba dang dril bur gyur pa dang gnyis
170a7(rgyud 'grel): med du sbyin no/ /thog mdza' med ces pa dang/ 'di ni sangs rgyas zhes pas gsor pa dang dkrol ba gsum gsum byed du gzhug go /phyag rgya'i de nyid dngos sam bskyed pa yang dam tshig dang ye shes pa mchod pa dang gnyis med du
170b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas sbyin no/ /rigs gang yin pa bsgom du yang gzhug go /de nas phyi nang de nyid kyis mchod do/ /de nas gsang dbang dang shes rab ye shes dang/ bzhi pa brgyud pa'i man ngag las blang ba'o/ /de nas rjes gnang rigs lnga sbyin/ de nas
170b2(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan te/ slob dpon sku cha lugs phyag rgya sngags des sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab cing lung ston pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba sgrag /de nas dbugs dbyung ba dang/ de nas de nyid bstan pa'o/ /bcud du bya ba la phyag rgya
170b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i don shes par bya ba dang/ bsgom par bya ba dang/ bsrung bar bya ba dang/ spyad par bya ba dang bzhi'o/ /phyag rgya bzhi'i don shes par bya ba dang/ dbang gis dgos pa shes par bya ba dang/ rgyud kyi don dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shas
170b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'o/ /dbang gi dgos pa la bzhi/ bum pa'i dbang tog la rig pa'i lha mos bkrus pa dang/ ma rig pa byad nas ye shes lnga skyes pa dang phung po lnga lha sngar rig pa'o/ /bum pa zlum pas dbye ba med pa chos sku 'byung ba dang/ chu
170b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pas bde ba chen po'i sku 'byung ba dang/ /'khyer? che pas longs sku 'byung pa dang/ dri ma med pas sprul sku 'byung ba dang/ bcud mgul brgyan mtshan ma gsum rigs gsum gyi bdag nyid 'byung ba dang/ kha rgyan gzungs thag
170b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med kyi 'gro ba 'dren pa dang/ thor tshugs rigs lnga byung nas las lnga byed pa dang/ cod pan gyi ngo bo gcig cing rtog pa med pa'o/ /rdo rje dang dril bu dang/ bdag po dang/ ming ni dbang nas shes par bya'o/ /de nyid gsum yang tshig don
170b7(rgyud 'grel): ltar nyid do/ /ngas lus kyi nyes pa dag /sprul sku thob pa'i rten byed pa'o/ /gsang dbang gis dag gi nyes pa dag /sangs rgyas nas brgyud pas longs sku'i rten byed pa'o/ /shes rab ye shes kyis yid kyi nyes pa dang/ shes rab la rten pas
171a1(rgyud 'grel): bde chen sku'i rten byed pa'o/ /bzhi pas lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa dag /chos sku'i ngo bo rtogs brdas bstan te bla ma las byung bas so/ /rgyud don shes par bya ba pa ni lta ba ste/ 'di rab tu mi gnas
171a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin te/ sems tsam du 'dod pa dang/ sgyu mar 'dod pa yang nyes pa med par brjod do/ /de la rgal pa bye brag tu smra ba dang/ /gzhan don med nas ma btub na mdo sde pa theg pa chen por 'dod la sngags su cis ma btub can
171a3(rgyud 'grel): yul sems so sor 'dod pas zhe'o/ /'o na zla ba grags pas sgron gsal du gnyis bshad pa zhe na/ de kun rdzob tu bstan zhe'o/ /'o na dngos por 'dzin pa skyon nam don dam skyon na rnam bcas kyang zhe na/ de rnam pa sems su 'dod
171a4(rgyud 'grel): pas zhes so/ /'o na mdo sde pa rnam pa dang/ sems tsam pa rten 'brel zer ba zhe na/ rten 'brel du 'dod pa tha dad ces so/ /rgyud kyi rgyu mtshan gzhan ltar yang shes par bya la/ 'dir rgyu'i rgyud sems can/ thabs kyi rgyur rgyud
171a5(rgyud 'grel): sde bzhi/ 'bras bu'i rgyud sku bzhi'o/ /de yang brgyud pas rgyud de/ sems can las brgyud pas sku bzhi/ 'brel pas rgyud thabs rgyu des 'brel nas ma nor bas rgyud sku bzhi 'dod pa 'byung la/ de ltar rgyu thabs dang 'bras bur
171a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyud nas 'brel zhing ma nor bar 'dus pas rgyud du gdags/ 'dus pa las 'bras bu 'dus pa ni 'di lta ste/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro nas/ rgyud kyi don ni gnyis yin te/ /don dam pa dang kun rdzob bden/ /don dam brjod
171a7(rgyud 'grel): du mi nus te/ /kun rdzob chu'i zla ltar bstan/ /zhes pas don dam la brjod du med do/ /kun rdzob la kun rdzob dngos dang/ don dam la dpyad du med pa'o/ /kun rdzob dngos la gnyis te/ kun rdzob la gong bzhin gnyis/
171b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa'i yang sngags dang mtshan nyid gnyis sngags la yang gzugs sku dang/ chos sku gnyis/ chos sku la yang bde ba chen po dang/ stong pa gnyis so/ /de yang kun spyod nas/ 'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid//
171b2(rgyud 'grel): gar mkhan ngag dang ri mo bzang ltar snang/ /gang du bde chen zhes pa gcig po nyid/ gcig po nyams ni du mas gar mthing ngo/ /zhes pas so/ /des na don dam brjod du med kyang/ kun rdzob tu bde ba chen po'i ngo bo kho na yin la/ chos thams
171b3(rgyud 'grel): cad gsang sngags yin la/ gsang sngags kyis 'chang rgya ba'o/ /de ltar na shAkya thub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas pa sngags kyis yin par bstan la/ bskal pa grangs med gsum du pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston pas sangs
171b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas so zhe na/ kun spyod nas/ rgyud rnams kun tu gsang ba yang/ /rgyud 'di yis ni rnal 'byor pa/ /bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten/ sprul pa dngos la de nyid bstan// zhes pas bde ba chen po brjod du med pa mu bzhi dang bral te/ phyi rabs
171b5(rgyud 'grel): la bden gnyis zhes pha rol tu phyin par sprul skur bstan yang/ sprul sku 'di sems can la sngags dang/ pha rol tu phyin par snang ste/ sprul sku nyid bde ba chen po nyid do/ /snang ba de sngon du rgyu dang/ rkyen song pas 'byung ste/ tsa ri ka pa bzhin mkha' ltar
171b6(rgyud 'grel): yas phub ces rgyu med min no/ /des na bde ba chen po yin yang sems can gyi don du pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas bde ba chen po thob nas tshogs chung zhing sangs rgyas pa'o/ /thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud nas/ dper na sgra'i mkhan po
171b7(rgyud 'grel): ngag sgra'i skyon med don tshol te/ /ma shes pa la ka kA dang/ ki kI dbyangs yig ston par byed do/ /ces pas 'dir yang sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba chen por gnas la 'gro ba'i khyad par gyis theg pa'i rim par bstan pa'o/ /lam
172a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa yang/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang/ bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kun/ /yi ge gnyis su de bzhin 'dus/ /zhes pas gsang sngags kyang thabs gzugs sku bskyed rim dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang/ las kyi phyag
172a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyar 'dus la/ shes rab chos sku dang bde ba chen por byung pas chos kyi phyag rgya chen por 'dus pas so/ /de yang eM bi ma yang sh+ru ta me kasmin/ zhes pa dang/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ zhes pas rgyud sde bzhi/ phyag rgya bzhi
172a3(rgyud 'grel): sku bzhi'o/ /de yang e las kyi phyag rgya 'di skad ces dngos min te/ las kyi phyag rgyas dpe mtshon pa'o/ /baM chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ste/ don chos kyi phyag rgya rnyed pa'o/ /ma phyag rgya chen po skad ces pas brdas mtshon pa dang/ rigs pas
172a4(rgyud 'grel): mi rnyad pa'o/ /ya dam tshig gi phyag rgyas 'di skad ces pas sprul pa sgyu mar snang ba'o/ /de bzhin dang sgra'i stobs kyis/ /sh+ru ta me kasmin bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig la sbyar nas d+harmA kA ya/ saM b+ho ga kA ya/ nir ma Na kA ya/ mahA su
172a5(rgyud 'grel): kha kA ya ni rim pa ltar chos dang/ longs spyod rdzogs pa dang/ sprul pa dang/ bde ba chen po'i skur 'byung ba'o/ /rgyu 'dus pas sems can gyi bsam pas 'dul ba dang/ theg pa chung ba kri yog tu 'dus la/ mngon pa dang theg pa
172a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po nang par 'dus so/ /rdo rje phreng ba nas/ thabs chung bya mang don ring bas/ /phyi pa kri yog spyod lam ste/ thabs che bya nyung don nye bas/ /de phyir nang ste bla na med ces so/ /de yang drang don nges don du 'dus te/ 'jam dpal gyis zhu pa'i mdo
172a7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ 'og ma gong du 'gro bas drang ba ste/ ma nor de nyid 'byung bas nges pa yin/ /zhes pas de yang mtshan nyid thams cad drang don/ sangs rgyas bde ba chen por 'gro bas gsang sngags thams cad nges don/ sangs rgyas thams
172b1(rgyud 'grel): cad bde ba chen por gnas pas 'dul ba dang/ theg? pa chung ngu'i mdo drang don chen po dang mngon par 'gro bas mngon pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i mdo thams cad nges don/ /'gro don du nges pas 'dul ba drang don/ chung ba'i mdo sde
172b2(rgyud 'grel): nges don/ rgyu las dang 'bras bu ston pas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga gong du 'gro bas theg pa chen po'i mdo drang don/ rgyu de rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par nges pas nges don no/ /rgyu las dang 'bras bur 'dod pas kri yog drang
172b3(rgyud 'grel): don/ ma nor ba'i 'bras bu nyid la spyad pas nang pa nges don/ thabs la brten nas 'gro bas pha rgyud drang don/ shes rab rgyud la rtogs pas ma rgyud nges don/ de rnams rim par brgyud pas rgyud rnams drang don/ rgyud don sku bzhi
172b4(rgyud 'grel): nges pas nges don te/ sku bzhi sgyu ma kun rdzob yin pas drang ba'i don/ don dam mtshon du med pas nges par shes par gyis/ zhes mtshon pas grub med nyams dga' tsam sku bzhi 'grub par rig par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho
172b5(rgyud 'grel): ga shes par bya ba la sgra don gnyis las/ sgra la bsnyen pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang/ dbang bskur ba gong ltar ram/ gzhan ltar shes par bya'o/ /don gyi khyad par la nges don dang drang don du shes par bya ba dang/ drang don nges
172b6(rgyud 'grel): don du sgrub pa la gnyis las nges don dang drang don du shes par bya ba la gnyis te/ nges don ni dkyil zhes bya/ dbus zhes bya ba dang/ mad+hya ma ste/ dbu ma mu bzhi dang bral ba la/ gang mu bzhi dang bral na 'khor zhes bya/ g.yog ces bya'o//
172b7(rgyud 'grel): ka bya d+har ste/ dngos por 'dzin pa mu bzhi dang bral la/ che ge ces bya/ sgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /sA d+ha sa ha dza ste/ lhan cig gdod nas gnyis med du yod par shes pa'o/ /drang don la snod du bya ba shes pa dang/ bcud bya ba la yang bsnyen
173a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang dkyil 'khor cho ga dang/ dbang bskur ba shes par bya'o/ /nges don dang drang don du shes par bya ba de yang/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje nas/ ston pa po de chos kyang nga/ /nyan pa'i tshogs ldan zhu ba dang/ zhes pas
173a2(rgyud 'grel): de dag thams cad nges par bcom ldan 'das nyid sems can drang ba'i don du mdzad pa ste/ nyan thos dang/ so so'i skye bo dang mu stegs pa rnams la ni mdo dang 'dul ba ltar yang snang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gong ltar sdom
173a3(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum ldan de snang ba'o/ /bsnyen pa'i dus na slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bzhir brtag /ces pa sku bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /brgyud pa dang ldan zhes pa chos skur gnas pa'o/ /dam tshig ces pa bde ba chen po'i skur gnas pa'o/ /
173a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud sde zhes pa longs skur gnas pa'o/ /gzhan don zhes pa sprul? skur ston pa'o/ /zhu 'bul zhes pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o/ /'og min du longs sku la zhu ba phul ba bum pa'i dbang zhes pa 'og min du dbang bskur ba'i
173a5(rgyud 'grel): snang ba de rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras btsas nas khrus gsol ba na bla ma la me tog ces pa ni chos sku bde ba chen po las ma g.yos par sprul sku ston pa'o/ /rdzas byams pa'i stobs phan chad kyis bsag ste spos kyi glang po la sogs pa dkor mang
173a6(rgyud 'grel): ba la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ chos skyong thams cad kyis mchod nas dzam+bu'i gling du lung bstan pa de phyi'i mchod pa'o/ /yab yum gyi gnas su bcas nas yi ge lnga las mngon byang lngar nyams su myong ba de
173a7(rgyud 'grel): nang mchod/ /de'i dus na yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de de kho na'o mchod pa'o/ /yab yum gyi dkor spos kyi glang po la sogs par snang ba de chos skyong la gtor ma ster ba'o/ /rigs bzhi la nor zas kyi sbyin pa gtong bar snang ba de slob
173b1(rgyud 'grel): ma yongs su skyob pa yin la/ dmangs la nye ring med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu spyod par snang ba de dang/ gzhan rjes su smon pa de gnyis ka slob dpon las sdom pa len pa'o/ /sku skyo nas grong khyer du 'chag pa la skye rga la sogs pa'i snang ba mthong
173b2(rgyud 'grel): ba des 'khor ba la yi mug par ston pa de so so thar pa'i bslab pa srung pa'o/ /de'i dus su rgyal bu ming sring phan chad sbyin pa byas pa'i snang ba de theg pa chen pa'i sdom ba srung ba'o/ /yum las bstams par snang ba de mkha' gsang
173b3(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rigs che bas bstod pa'i snang ba de rgyu gang bsnyen gyi sngags zlo ba'o/ /rdzas kyi bye brag la ma chags pa'i snang ba de/ dpa' o po dga' ston byed pa'o/ /de nas khyim spong zhes yab yum la
173b4(rgyud 'grel): zhu ba'i snang ba de sangs rgyas 'das pa la zhu ba'o/ /maN+Dal gong ltar ro/ /longs sku la zhu ba'i snang ba de slob dpon shes   pa la zhu ba de 'das pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /brgyud pa zhes pa 'das pa'i sangs rgyas de yang sku bzhi dang ldan pa'o//
173b5(rgyud 'grel): der rgyal srid bzung ba'i snang ba de rdzas kyi lha bsnyen pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis bteg pa'i snang ba de rnal 'byor bzhis lta bsnyen pa'o/ /dpal lha las babs pa'i rtsar phyin pa'i snang ba de chos skyong ba bsnyen pa'o/ /mchod rten la
173b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhan po byas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das nyid las med la/ sdom pa len pa'i rjod byed gtso bo dang 'khor la bsnyen pa'o/ /dbu skra nyid kyis bzhar ba'i snang ba de yi ge brgya pas mtshams sbyar ba'o/ /der chos thos dang khyim
173b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtags spangs shing sdom pa dang ldan pa'i snang ba de bsnyen pa'i rtags/ /mtshan ma grangs kyi bsnyen pa sngon du skyel ba'o/ /de nas shar du ma ga d+har byon pa'i snang ba de dkyil 'khor gyis tshol ba'o de yang mis ma mthong
174a1(rgyud 'grel): bar nyid snang ba la 'khor gyis bskor zhes grags pa de ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'o/ /shar du gzigs nas byon pa'i snang ba de sangs rgyas zhi bas sgrub pa'o/ /thams cad spangs par snang ba de dben pa
174a2(rgyud 'grel): btsal ba'o/ /phi li par pa tar bzhugs pa'i snang ba de phyi rabs la brtag pa dgos par bstan pa'o/ /bram ze mo bzang ldan la dris nas bram ze 'ga' yar g.yar ba de/ bdag po la bslang ba'o/ /lha ma yin gyis bar  
174a3(rgyud 'grel): chod byed par bsgrags pa de bdag po dngos snang ba med pa la bslang ba'o/ /bar ma chod par snang ba de rnal 'byor bzhis bzung ba'o/ /sa'i lha mo sku bstod ston pa de dpang du gsol ba'o/ /der 'gyur ba mang du snang ba de
174a4(rgyud 'grel): ji tsam 'dod pa thugs kyis bcad pa'o/ /de'i zur bzhir rdo rje phur pa bzhi btab bde khro bos mtshams bsrung ba'o/ /lhung bzed bskyur bas sa la thim pa'i snang ba de sa gter bcug pa'o/ /klu u bi ka gnyid sad pa la
174a5(rgyud 'grel): lhung bzed du shos nas nyal ba'i snang ba de/ sa bdag ma dga' nas sa gta' la chags pa'o/ /bdud rnams kyi mda' mtshon me tog tu song ba'i snang ba de gtor mas lan chags 'jal zhing bar chad zlog pa'o/ /rgyal
174a6(rgyud 'grel): po chen po bzhis bzhengs par bskul ba'i snang ba de slob ma rigs bzhis bskul ba'o/ /bzhengs nas spyan ltas bas bdud mo rnams 'dod pas steg par mthong ste spyan g.yas pa bstan nas se gol gtogs pas rgan mor song
174a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snang ba de spyan g.yas pa'i te las nyi ma bskal me ltar sreg pa'o/ /'gyod nas bdud mos gus pa phul bas sngar bzhin song ba'i snang ba de spyan g.yon pas a las zla ba'i 'od kyis snying rjes nyams pa gsos pa'o/ /de nas
174b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan nas phur pa'i mtshams nas phyogs bzhir g.yas bskor du byang chub shing la dbyangs dang ldan pas lan gsum bskor bas rdo rje la sogs pa bzhi zhabs rjes la byung ba'i snang ba de/ rdo rje brkyang bskum gyis dra gur du byas pa'o/ /
174b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs rak+Sha ste/ rdo rje'i mda'i dra bar gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje'i gdan mi 'gyur zhes grags pa de/ de ltar bsrung ba'i byin brlabs dang bsam pa'o/ /sa yul de phyogs gzhan pas mtho bar grags pa de tshad ldan du brtsig pa la sogs pa'o//
174b3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dri zhim zhing nyams dga' ba de dri dang ba'i lngas byug pa'o/ /sa'i lha mo de nyid du thim pa'i snang ba de sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas pa'o/ /byang chub kyi shing de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten yin pa'i snang ba de me tog bkod pa'o//
174b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa dang ma 'das pa kun gyi yang rten pa'i yang rten zhes grags pa'i snang ba de lha grangs kyi me tog dkod pa'o/ /byang chub kyi shing las 'od zer byung nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par grags pa de maN+Dal
174b5(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa la rnal 'byor bzhis bskyed pa'o/ /de la sangs rgyas tshigs bcad bzhi 'don pa'i snang ba de 'khor lo dang/ gzhan la gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /nges 'khor gyi mu stegs kun dga' nas yi rang ba de chos skyong la gsol ba
174b6(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa'o/ /'od zer de sangs rgyas pa'i snang ba de 'khor lo mkhan la bteg pa'o/ /phyogs skyong bzhis bum pa phul ba'i snang ba de bum pa sta gon no/ /bum pa gcig tu byin gyis brlabs pa'i snang ba de dkar pos byugs
174b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /khong rang gis so sor mthong la gzhan gyis gcig tu mthong ba'i snang ba de rin po che dang sa las byas pa'o/ /byin gyis brlabs pas mdzes shing che ba'i snang ba de mu stegs kyis spangs pa'o/ /tshangs pa la sogs pas rang rang
175a1(rgyud 'grel): gi nor gyi dgos pas mtshan ba btub pa de mtshan ma btab pa'o/ /phyi dro gsol du ma rung nas ras bkang nas ku sha'i khar bzhag pa'i snang ba de mgul chings dang gdan la gzhag pa'o/ /khyim
175a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi bu mos 'o ma drangs pa yang der blugs pa'i snang ba de bcud blugs pa'o/ /de blugs pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs der shar ba'i snang ba de lha bskyed pa'o/ /de las rlangs pa byung nas byang chub kyi shing la phogs
175a3(rgyud 'grel): bas 'dab ma gcig der lhung ba'i snang ba de ye shes kyi lhar spyan drang ba'o/ /de la kun ngo mtshar skyes nas mchod pa'i snang ba de spyan drangs pa de la mchod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis na mo bud+d+hA yang/ zhes brjod
175a4(rgyud 'grel): nas shing lo der bcug nas thams cad 'o mar gyur te gzhag pa'i snang ba de lha mchod bsnyen sgrub tu zhu ba'o/ /de la kun dga' nas spro la sangs rgyas nyid kyang dgyes pa'i snang ba de sta gon la 'jug pas dga' ba'o/ /bcom ldan
175a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyis bkyed nas shing la gzigs pa'i snang ba de dga' chen zhus pa'o/ /shing la yang 'od zer byung bas bcom ldan 'das dang bum pa la phog pa'i snang ba de bu tshur zhes pa dang/ bum pa la sngags kyi gzungs thag gdags
175a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): saM g+hA ya/ zhes brjod pas phyogs skyong la sogs pas phyag byas pa dang/ ne rany+dze na'i nya che chung dang phrad cing mu stegs rnams 'khor du gyur pa'i snang ba des
175a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku ste/ de ltar snang ba dang/ rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsung pa dang/ sh+rI da na pha rgyud gsungs pa la sogs pa gcig yin pas sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' i rnam 'phrul
175b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud re re nyid la chos rgyud ltar la de ltar yo gsungs pa yo rgyud do/ /dge 'dun 'khor de yo 'khor lo'i lhar ston pa nyid do gong na ston pa po zhes pas so/ /de ltar yang ldan sngags su shes pas thams cad sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang/
175b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad chos ltar gyur pas srog mi gcod pa dang/ thams cad grogs dang dge 'dun yin pas phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan ston pa'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas 'khor rnams zhi la rang rang gi spyod lam gyi chos ston pa rigs kyi sdom pa 'dzin pa'o//
175b3(rgyud 'grel): klu kha la me 'bar gyi sangs rgyas bsdigs pas sangs rgyas kyi sku las me dpung dpag tu med pas klu bred pa de zhi sogs kyi sbyin sreg byed pa'o/ /rtsa ku sha la mnyel bso ba de mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /tshangs pas me tog gtor ba dang mchod
175b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snang ba de mchod pa gnas su mdzad pa'o/ /pad+ma'i skud pa g.yas kyi dpung pa la bcings pas rlung zhi ba dang/ khyim bdag gi bu mo'i g.yon la btags pas rlung zhi ba'i snang ba de bsrung skud g.yon du btags pa'o/ /khyim bdag
175b5(rgyud 'grel): gi bu mos 'o thug lhung bzed blangs nas drangs pas gsol ba'i lhag ma 'khor la byin pa'i snang ba de gtor ma btang ba'o/ /zhal du tshoms shing gis dri ma phyis nas dor bas n+ya gro d+har gyur pa de so shing dor ba'o/ /ku sha sngon du bor bas
175b6(rgyud 'grel): snga phyir byin gyis brlabs stan byas pa'i snang ba de ku sha'i sngas la gtso bo'i sngags btab pa dang/ stan la sngags kyis btab pa gding ba'o/ /yo bskrad nas byang chub kyi shing la dbu gtad nam g.yas sa la phab nas gzims par snang ba de
175b7(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag yid tha mal la min par 'khor lo mgo gtad seng ge'i nyal stabs su gzims pa'o/ /srod la bdud kyis sprul pa byas pa las/ 'od zer sku la byung ba'i snang ba de rmi lam ngan pa zlog pa'o/ /lha mo rnams kyis mchod pa bzhes nas
176a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyes pa'i snang ba de rmi lam bzang nas mnyes pa'o/ /de nas shing drung du gshegs pas sku la 'od lnga byung ba'i snang ba de thig skud lnga bkal ba'o/ /'od tshur 'dus byang chub shing la 'od lnga byung ba ni thig skud
176a2(rgyud 'grel): snod du bcug nas lha lnga bskyed pa'o/ /'od des phyogs bcur khyab nas sangs rgyas thams cad bkug pa'i snang ba de ye shes kyi lha bkug pa'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byon nas nam mkha' i mdun na bzhugs pa la mchod nas
176a3(rgyud 'grel): shing la bzhugs pa'i snang ba de thig skud lha mchod nas thig skud du byas pa'o/ /shin tu bsal nas sangs rgyas gnas su gshegs pa'i snang ba de thig btab nas skud pa bsal ba'o/ /tshon yang de bzhin du 'od lnga de phyogs kyi
176a4(rgyud 'grel): snang ba tshig lnga'i rgyu 'od lnga phyogs nas spros/ phyogs phyogs su thim/ phyogs phyogs su gsal/ rigs lnga grags pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das nyid dbus na gnas pa'i snang ba de/ lha bkye bkug ma chod bsams bkye gsal bdag
176a5(rgyud 'grel): gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gtso bor bsal pa bsrung ba'o/ /'od zer gyi snang ba la 'khor gyi rtogs tshad ni pra brtag pa'o/ /byang chub kyi shing gi shar nas gzigs pa'i zhabs rjes yod pa de dkyil 'khor du bcug pa'i bye brag lho phyogs su ku
176a6(rgyud 'grel): sha'i stan la bzhugs pa dang/ shar gyi zhags rjes la bkra shis rdzas brgyad mnga' ba'i snang ba de la dbang stegs la gdugs stsogs gyis mchod pa'o/ /sku la me dpung phyung pas bdud dang mu stegs byar? bros pa'i snang ba de bgegs
176a7(rgyud 'grel): bskrad phyir sbyin bsreg dang til sngags pa'o/ /byang phyogs su gshegs pas pad+ma bcu gsum byung ba de dbang la bum pa dang/ cod pan dang/ rdo rje dang/ bdag po dang/ ming dang/ de nyid dang/ gsang dbang dang/ shes rab ye shes
176b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bzhi pa dang/ rjes su gnang ba dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ gsang ba bsgrags pa dang/ dbugs dbyung ba bskur ba'o/ /byang chub kyi shing la zla ba gcig tu gzigs pa'i snang ba de dkyil 'khor dang lha'i de kho na nyid lta ba'o/ /nub nas
176b2(rgyud 'grel): shar du gzigs nas 'od zer bkye ba'i snang bde dbang rdzogs pas 'gro don byed par shes pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po ze'u sprog lnga pa phul bas dbu la gsol ba'i snang ba de rig pa'i dbang lnga thob pa'o/ /tshangs pas bsreg shang dang par bu phul ba
176b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas g.yon du gzung ba'i snang ba de rdo rje dang dril bu'i de nyid thob pa'i rtags/ sgrol mas chos gos gsol ba'i snang ba de phyag rgya'i de nyid thob pa'i rtags/ legs skyes sam 'o thug drangs pa gsol nas sku gser du gyur pa de
176b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang dbang thob pa'i rtags/ legs skyes mas sbyin len nor la ston pas gsungs pa de shes rab ye shes thob pa'i rtags/ me long sgra sogs phul ba la bltas sogs byas nas slang gtang pa de bzhi pa thob pa'i rtags/ lha
176b5(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pas gser gyi 'khor lo phul ba de rjes gnang thob pa'i rtags/ de ltar phul yang chos ma gsungs pas nam mkha' la sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du mthong nas khyod mngon par rdzogs nas sangs rgyas pas chos ston zhes pa
176b6(rgyud 'grel): de lung bstan to/ mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa la/ tshangs pas zhus pa de gsang ba bsgrags pa'i rtags/ de nas shAkya'i rigs shing gi lho phyogs su rab tu byung ba'i snang ba de dbugs phyin pa'i brtags/ de nas bya ba gtong
176b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa de dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid go ba'i rtags so/ /bcud du bya ba la phyag rgya bzhi nges don drang dang drang don du shes par bya ba la yang bzhi ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas te chos gos la sogs pa sbyin
177a1(rgyud 'grel): par btang ba 'byor ba'i tshogs sogs pa'o/ /po ka rir sku khrus mdzad nas mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa la changs pas gsol ba yan chad gdams pas tshogs bsags pa'o/ /rgyal po
177a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhis chos ston drangs pa bzhes nas gcig tu byas nas tshogs pa la bkye bas tshad med bzhi bstan/ thams cad bzhag nas shing drung du gshegs nas bdud skyengs bas bsrung ba'i grwa gur yan chad bstan to/ /shing la sku brten
177a3(rgyud 'grel): nas zhal shar du gzigs pas mngon byang lnga las rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang ste sbyor ba dang po'i rnal 'byor ro/ /sku de las 'od phyogs bzhir spros slar 'dus te shing gi zil pa dbu gtsug la phog pas thugs mnyam par gnas
177a4(rgyud 'grel): pa de'i rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang zhu bgo la/ sgrol ma la sogs pa lha mo bzhis bskul bas de las bzhengs nas sgrol ma la sogs pa la bltas pa de lha mo bzhis bskul nas rdo rje 'chang bzhengs pa go ste rjes kyi rnal 'byor ro/ /sku las
177a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od byung phyogs bcur spros bas sangs rgyas thams cad mdun du snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la thim pa de 'khor lo rdzogs par bskyed pa ste/ rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ram/ dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog tu go ba'o//
177a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas thugs ka nas 'od 'phros nas snang bas khyab nas slar thim pa de ye shes sems dpa' bcug pa'o/ /de na dbang po rnams nas 'od byung snang bar byas slar 'dus pa skye mched byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /yang mdzod bu dang/
177a7(rgyud 'grel): ljags dang/ thugs ka nas de bzhin du rim gyis 'od 'phros slar bsdu sa pa de sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /gtsug nas 'od byung bar snang ba ni dbang bskur ba'o/ /khyim bdag bu mos yang 'o thug drangs pa ma gsol bar
177b1(rgyud 'grel): mdun du gzhag pas sku gsal bar gyur pa de bdud rtsi myang ba'o/ /'on kyang thugs ka nas 'phros 'dus lha ma'i tshogs kyis mchod pa de phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod par go la/ de nas changs pa la sogs pas bstod par go ba'o/ /de nas 'od zer
177b2(rgyud 'grel): de thams cad sku la thim nas gnas pa de bskyed pa rdzogs par go'o/ /de ltar mnyam par gnas pa de dam tshig gi phyag rgyar bsgom par go/ las kyi phyag rgya des don dang drang don du shes par bya ba ni de ltar gnas pa shing la sku rgyab
177b3(rgyud 'grel): gtang pa de a ba d+hU tI la dbugs yod la sa la ban yod pa'o/ /rtsa ba me rlung la zug pa yang/ rtsa de'i zhabs go ba'o/ /rtse mo lho nub tu 'ong zhing zil pa 'bab pa de bdud rtser sA na g.yas nas 'bab pa'o/ /yan lag byang
177b4(rgyud 'grel): chub na yar 'ong ba la lnga na'o/ /yal ga phra la mang ba de rtsa phran mang ba'o/ /dus der lo ma rje ba de nyid mongs ye shes su song ba'o/ /me tog nub mo gsal ba de kun la gsang ba'o/ /'bras bu phra zhing shing la thang
177b5(rgyud 'grel): chu med pa ni ro nyams su myong zhing nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /sku de grib ma la bzhugs pa de mi spong ba'o/ /chos kyi phyag rgya'i nges don dang drang don du shes par bya ba ni sku drang por zhal shar du gzigs nas bzhugs pa de brgyud pa'i
177b6(rgyud 'grel): man ngag yod cing nyams su len pa'o/ phyag gnyis sa gnon dang mnyam pa nyid ni rten 'brel thabs shes rab mnyam gzhag dang rjes thob tu bsgom pa'o/ /spyan sna rtser gtang ba de dpas de mtshon cing rnyed pa'o/ /zhabs rdo rje
177b7(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung du bzhugs pa de ye shes go zhing gdeng dang ldan pa'o/ /phyag rgya chen po sku mi snang bar mdzad nas 'od dang sprul pas kun tu khyab pa'o/ /de yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya ci dgos she na/ 'byor pa dang gdams pas bsod
178a1(rgyud 'grel): nams kyi tshogs bsags pa ni rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bas sangs rgyas ltar sprul sku 'byung ngo/ /de yang tshad med bzhi dang ye shes kyi tshogs sogs pas ma nyams shing 'byung ba'o/ /de gnyis
178a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyud bsod nams med na mi 'byung bas de'i rgyu'i dus so/ /'bras bu rten dang brten pa sangs rgyas re re'i snang ba de bsrungs pas bdud med pa'o/ /de yang stong pas 'chi bdag bcom /mes nyon mongs bcom/ dri gur gyis phung
178a3(rgyud 'grel): po bcom/ khro bos lha'i bu'i bdud bcom ste/ de ltar bdud med pas gzhal yas khang ji tsam 'dod pa rang rang gis bstan pa'o/ /mngon byang lnga las sku bzhengs pa sbul sku/ pha dang ma'i sil dang ga bur zla nyi hUM zlum
178a4(rgyud 'grel): po/ /'phro 'du'i tshogs kyi rgyu mthun de las sku bzhengs pa sngon stong pa yi ge lngar byas pa 'og min las chad pa mi 'dod pa thams cad rang gi sems su 'dod pas 'jig rten pa'i snang ba phra ma las rang gi mngon byang lnga
178a5(rgyud 'grel): las sku byung ba'o/ /zhu nas bskul bas bskyed pas 'dod chags 'dul pa mthong nas yab yum bzhengs pa/ /zhu bar gyur pa mi rtogs pa/ bzhengs pa 'gro ba gdul byar bya ba gzhan mdzad pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa
178a6(rgyud 'grel): sras bltam pa'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' bkug bcug gnyis med dgyes pa bdag dang sangs rgyas ngo bo gcig pa/ dus mi mnyam pas bkug pa/ tha dad med pas bcug la/ mi rtog pas gnyis med
178a7(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'o/ /'gro don nus pas mnyes pa'o/ /skye mched la mngon shes 'byung ba'o/ /rigs gsum 'dus nas 'dul bas sku gsum byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /sangs rgyas la dbye ba med cing mi rtog pas dbang ngo/ /
178b1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen por gnas pas bdud rtsi myang ba'o/ /'jig rten pa thams cad kyis shAkya thub pa la sogs pa mchod pas mchod pa'o/ /sems can 'dren pas bstod pa'o/ /mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis ngo bos rdzogs rims so/ /yang na de ltar
178b2(rgyud 'grel): byas pas ye shes sems dpa' la sogs pa la sems can gyi snang bas rdo rje gdan du 'ong la sogs pa gong bzhin shes par bya'o/ /gsang sngags bzhin byas pas sgyu ma sogs kyis da ltar bsgom pa de ltar bskyed par shes par
178b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /'dir rab tu mi gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' i snang ba la brten nas brten pa'i rnal 'byor bar snang ba sems la rdo rje gdan ltar snang ba'o/ /de yang las kyi phyag rgya'i rtsa yod pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam rgyab na
178b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis brten pa /me rlung yod pas thabs dgos pa la lA dang ra sA na sangs rgyas/ /dgos pa spyi bo nas 'bab pa sangs rgyas brgyud pa'i gsang gis ye shes thob pa dang nyams su myong ba'o/ /rtsa bran dang
178b5(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku byung ba dngos/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i bde ba chen po gnas pa la sku gnyis 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i lugs gong gi ltar rdo rje gdan du byung ba'o/ /phyag rgya chen pos
178b6(rgyud 'grel): sku gdong nas mu bzhi dang bral ba de rnams 'byung zhing de nyid yin par pha rol tu phyin pa'i gong ltar mi snang ba 'od du gyur pa'o/ /de yang sprul sku shAkya thub pa dang/ he ru ka sems can gyi snang ba longs skur byang chub sems
178b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i snang ba/ bde ba chen po rang gi bde ba chos kun la khyab pa'o/ /drang don dang nges don du sgrub pa la snod bsgrub pa dang bcud bsgrub pa'o/ /snod bsgrubs pa ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro nas /lus nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgrub/ /'bras bu
179a1(rgyud 'grel): de las 'byung ba'o/ /bsnyen pa gong 'og ltar bsgrubs te/ zhes 'byung ba dkyil 'khor cho ga las btsal ba/ bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa/ brtag pa ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa/ bslang ba gzhal yas khang dang rgyu bskyed
179a2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bras bu rdzogs pa ye shes bcug pa'o/ /gzung ba skye mched nas bstod pa yan chad do/ /bcad pa phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs pa gang 'dod gdod nas yod pa'o/ /sbyang ba rnams dag shes pa'o/ /rtsig pa lus gru bzhir
179a3(rgyud 'grel): byung bas phung por chags pa'o/ /thig 'khor lo bzhi la sogs pa'i rtsa/ tshon ga bur snang bas khrag 'bab pa'o/ /rkyen gnas snying dbus na/ ming a ba d+hU tI'i gzugs yi hUM /lha gtso bo dbyibs thig le /ngo bo khu ba/ las can gyi rgyu
179a4(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi 'phrul pa/ bde ba'i rang bzhin mi rtog pa/ nyams stong pa'i ngang/ rtogs pa dang ldan pas phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang/ sku bzhi de las 'byung bas gnas brgyan la/ ma rtags pa'i 'khor ba de las so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
179a5(rgyud 'grel): chos sum cu rtsa bdun/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug /stong pa bco brgyad yin la/ mngon byang lnga las 'khor lo phyung ba'o/ /ma rtogs pa 'khor ba'i gzugs sogs dang/ khrag dang khu ba la sogs pa sems can gyi lus
179a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'o/ /dbang bsgrub pa rgyud ltar man ngag gi rtsa dang rlung dang bsgom pa dkyil 'khor gyi sta gon no/ /nyams su myong pa'i bsgrub pa'o/ /rang las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du bcug pa mthong ba'o/ /lus rgya nas 'byung bas mi gnod pa
179a7(rgyud 'grel): bum dbang thob lus kyi nyes pa dag la'o/ /spyi bo nas babs pas gsang dbang thob dag gi nyes pa dag pa'o/ /yid mnyam par gzhag pas dbang gsum pa thob yid kyi nyes pa dag pa'o/ /thams cad de ltar rtogs pas lus ngag gi nyes pa
179b1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa bzhi thob pa'o/ /bcud bsgrub pa la phyag rgya bzhi'i tshul dang/ drang don nges don du bsgrub pa la theg pa che chung gnyis/ chung ba'i skyabs dkon mchog gsum zhes pa gong du bstan pa'i he ru ka phyi nas yor snang ba de dang/ rgyud 'khor lor
179b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur bas so/ /mchod pa dngos po thams cad lhar shes pa'o/ /dus shes pa de nyid do/ /yon tan de ltar gnas pas so/ /thams cad lhar gsal bas dge 'dun dang 'grogs/ lha la lhas srog mi gcod pa/ bdag nyid lha yin
179b3(rgyud 'grel): na phyag gang la 'tshal te mi nyams pa'o/ /rten gzhan slob dpon yi dam lha spyi khyad par 'phags pa drug 'gro drug dang bye brag bdun las byung ba'o/ /slob dpon pas lhag pa med /sngags las lhag pa'i chos med /rigs lnga'i
179b4(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa las lhag pa med pas 'grub pa'o/ /so so thar pa'i ris bdun dag pa'o/ /rtsa ba tshad med pa bzhi /rang bzhin ye shes kyi tshogs/ yan lag rnam par snang mdzad gzhal yas khang rten dang bcas pa lha gtso bor brten pa'o/ /rtsa ba
179b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang yan lag bzhi ste brgyad gzhal yas khang dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa'o/ /srog mi gcod pa dang/ rtsa ba gsum sa bon phyag mtshan 'phros 'dus gcig tu gyur pas yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku bzhengs pa'o/ /chang dang lha bsrung ba
179b6(rgyud 'grel): mngon byang lnga las grub pa'o/ /khyim pa'i rtags spangs pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gsal bar bsgom pa/ rab tu byung ba'i rtags rdo rje pad+ma byin gyis brlab pa/ mu stegs kyi rtags spangs pa ye shes kyi 'khor lo gzhug pa /sangs rgyas
179b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtags bsgrubs pa bdud rtsi zhal du zhugs pa/ dge ba'i rtags spangs pa bsgrub pa dge ba'i rtags 'khor lo lngar gyur pa'o/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag bdun sngon du tshad med bzhi bdun dag pa bsags pas lha mo bzhi 'byung ba'o/ /
180a1(rgyud 'grel): chang dang klu zhes pa glus bskul ba'o/ /dge slong gi rtsa ba bzhi glu bzhi blangs pa'o/ /lhag ma bcu gsum gyis yab yum gyi sku rdzogs par bsgom pa'o/ /ma nges pa la sogs pa'i sdom pa drug yab kyi thugs kyi sa bon dang/ yum gyi
180a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka'i sa bon gsal ba dang/ sa bon de spro ba dang/ rigs kyi thugs dam bskul pa dang/ las sbyang ba dang/ gnyis med du spyan drang ba dang/ yi ge lnga dang 'dres nas zhu ba dang/ zhal du zhugs pa dang/ rtsa rnams nas babs?
180a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bsrungs pa dang/ gzhal yas khang bskyed pa dang/ gtso bo la sogs pa'i gdan bskyed pa dang/ gtso bo dang 'khor bskyed pa dang/ gtso bo dang rigs lnga'i las byas nas gzhag pa lnga'o/ /rtsa pa lnga zhes pa 'khor lo rdzogs par bsgom pa rgyu 'bras mngon byang lnga las
180a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i sbyor ba dbang ma bskur ba/ dngos ma mnyam pa/ mjug ma bsgoms pa'o/ /de gsum ka med pa las nyan thos kyi sdom pa med na nyams pa chen po'o/ /ma nyams pa sgoms na nyams pa spom pa'o/ /dbang med par nyams
180a5(rgyud 'grel): na nyams pa chung ngu'o/ /ma mnyan na nyams pa spom po'o/ /dbang dang bsgom pa med na phra mo'o/ /gcig las med na ltung byed do/ /yan lag bsod nams kyi tshogs dang rnal 'byor bzhi rdzogs rims sbyor ba dngos 'jug go /de'i nyes
180a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yang gong bzhin no/ /rtsa ba'i nyes pa dbang dang sdom pa dang/ bslab pa gsum char blangs na sgom pa'o/ /mnyan la bsgoms nas chung ngu byung ba dbang bskur ba mnyan/ phra mo dang dbang bskur la bsgom/ ltung byed re re med pa blang/ nyes
180a7(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs gang spyad de bslang ba'o/ /de yang dbang dang slob dpon la tshogs dbul ba dang/ maN+Dal gyis bshags phyis mi byed par bsdams pas thub pa'o/ /chang zhes pa bdud rtsi myang ba dang/ ga bur ma shor ba'o/ /gtang sems
180b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa sngags gzhag pa'o/ /rgas zhes pa ma nus pa'o/ /bsnyen gnas zhes pa ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang/ skye mched dang sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlabs pa dang/ dbang bdud rtsi bzhi dang/ dge bsnyen bzhi dang/ dge tshul dang/
180b2(rgyud 'grel): dge slong chos bstod pa ste/ skabs zhes pa long yod na legs par bcos/ med na bsgom bya'o/ /bcos thabs nges par bskyed ces pa/ de ltar shes pa'i sngags pa la 'dul ba'i rtsa ba yan lag re re mi gnod/ thabs de slar gos pas thug go /
180b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon yang sangs rgyas kyang he ru ka dang/ rgyud ston par 'khor la snang la/ 'khor yang sdom gsum dang ldan pa'o/ /des nyams pa bcos su btub sngags gtso bo'o/ /des na sngags sgrub pa la blo bskyed cing brtson par bya'o/ /dus nges zhes pa sngags
180b4(rgyud 'grel): las/ in+d+ra b+hu ti dang/ Dom pi la sogs pa ltar phrad ma thog dang/ rang zhig dang/ nges pa med par thob la /ma grub bar du ngan 'gror mi skye pas ji srid do/ /yon tan yang yi dags ston pa'i rgyud nas /dam tshig phyag rgya legs bsgoms na/
180b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa yis gzugs gnyis 'thob/ ces pas mi'i nang nas bram zer skye la/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pas sdom pa gsum yang des thub cing sku bzhi yang de las byung ba'o/ /yon tan che ba la sogs pa de ltar gnas pa'o/ /thob dus
180b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang thob mnyam bsgoms bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags rnal 'byor bzhi rdzogs rim shes bsgoms pas de nyid na'o/ /de ltar yon tan shes na gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ lus ngag yid kyis sdig pa bshags la/ chos 'gro ba'i
