248a2(rgyud 'grel): rngon dang smad 'tshong ston pa ltar/ /khye dang spyod pa de min phyir/ /thabs chen lam la gnas pa'i phyir/ /skye bo kun gyis bya ba 'byung/ /ga Na'i dam tshig chen po ni/ /log par chags yid g.yo spangs pa'i/ /don gnyis sngon du 'dod pa'i min?
248a3(rgyud 'grel): bang can dung can ri mo can/ /be lang can dang lcug phran ma/ /sdong cig mi reg phyal ba brgyad/ /gnyen dang rka ring stod smad phyed/ /yan lag 'phra 'jam tshigs mi zlum/ /dpral ba'i dbyes phye smin dkyus ring/ /dmig dbrag dkyil na utpal
248a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog/ chu zhing gnyis ka 'bring du bshad/ /lus la chu klung ga bur dri/ /gsang thub shes rab spyod pa dal/ /dad ldan 'grogs shing yid dad che/ /gsang ba'i gnas su spyad par bya'o/ /dbang skur dam dpog chos gsum bshad/ /lus la
248a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga'i rdul tshon dgye/ /thabs la mkhas pas skabs kyi sbyar/ /dam tshig rnam grangs bcu gnyis kyis/ /dngos grub yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /slob bu smin cing las rnams 'grub/ /skye gnas ngan 'gro rigs su nges/ /thabs kyi
248a6(rgyud 'grel): theg pa 'dir bshad do/ /mtshan nyid cha dang rnam grangs dang/ /ltos ba'i kun rtags rnam pa gsum/ /dngos po de nyid las brdzun zhes/ /thams cad rang rig snang phyir bden/ /shes nas kun smra skyes bu'i yul/ /dkon mchog gsum dang slob
248a7(rgyud 'grel): dpon mched/ sems can gnod par 'ongs ba la/ /brdzun du smra ba'i tshig dag bya/ /gang la gsang bar bya rnams dang/ /gsang bcud la 'dri brdzun bcu smra/ /bsrung ba bcu bdun nyams su blang/ /zhing bcur gyur pa'i nor bcu dang/ /mtshan ldan
248b1(rgyud 'grel): gzungs dang bkra shis rdzas/ /sbas chos phal 'char byin can rdzas/ /bsrung ba yod dang med pa'i gter/ /phyug pa ser snas bcings pa'i nor/ /ming gis blangs la tshogs su bsngo/ /dam tshig bcu bdun spyad par bya/ /zhing bcur gyur pa'i sems can la
248b2(rgyud 'grel): brlang tshig bcu yis zhes bcad de/ /drag shul spyod pa'i sngags dag dang/ /gzungs la brlang po'i sbyor tshig dang/ /slob bu snod ces zhe gcod dang/ /'byung po zhe spyod rngam pa'i sgra/ /snod ldan bu la blang chos bshad/ /ngag gi dam tshig bco lnga
248b3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung/ /mi spang dam tshig bshad par bya/ /yang dag dug lnga log dug lnga/ /bshad pa'i thabs mkhas 'dod chags dang/ /'dod spyod sems kyi rgyan shes nas/ /shin tu zhen pa'i lam du gsungs/ /zhing bcu rlag byed zhe sdang gcod/ /ltas
248b4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni 'joms pa de bzhin te/ /thabs la mkhas pas spyod pa yin/ /mngon par mtho ba'i lta ba dang/ /ting 'dzin nges par sran tshugs dang/ shin tu rgyal ba'i mchog tu gsungs/ /lta bas phyogs rigs mi 'byed pa/ /spyod pas blang dor mi byed pa/ /
248b5(rgyud 'grel): theg pa chen po'i gti mug go/ lta spyod dman la phrag dog cing/ /dam ma 'dres sogs spod byed pas/ /phrag dog dam tshig bsrung ba'o/ /log dug sems can kun ldan pas/ /dug lnga rang rig rang ldan phyir/ /dran pa thams cad shes pa la/ /shes pa
248b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rtsol ba yin/ /rtsol ba'i sems phyir thabs mkhas pas/ /thabs mkhas rang rig yes te/ nyi ma'i dkyil na mun med ltar/ /rig la rang snang ma gtogs pa/ /nyon mongs 'khor ba rang gis med/ /de shes ye shes rang rigs las/ /spang bar bya ba dmigs
248b7(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur/ /dam tshig bco lnga gnas pa yi/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i don gnyis rdzogs/ /kun gyis blang ba'i dam tshig lnga/ /dri chen dri chu mangs dang/ /zil ba lhag pa'i sems rnams dang/ /grub pa bzhi yis brgyan pa'i phyir/ /nad lnga bsal phyir
249a1(rgyud 'grel): blang ba dang/ /gtsang rme rtog sbyang phyir blang dang/ /thun mong dgos pa lnga phyir dang/ /rigs lnga grub pa'i yon tan no/ /sdug bsngal las grol dngos grub thob/ /bcud ldan ltung lnga lam gyi mchog /thabs kyi lus la brten

249a3(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs yon tan la/ /gcig la'ang lnga lngar phye bas na/ /bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bye brag rnams/ /mtshan nyid shes nas sgrub par bya/ /shes pa lnga las bye brag tu/ /phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga/ /dbang po yul dang yan lag song/ /nyon mongs
249a4(rgyud 'grel): dam rdzas sha dang ni/ /phyogs dang kha dog 'gro ba dang/ /snyigs ma bag chags lnga lnga'o/ /bdun bcu la sogs 'khor ba'i chos/ /ye shes sku rigs yab yum sogs/ /rang gzhan gyis skur dag la/ /blo la nyams su len pa ni/ /spyod yul yongs?
249a5(rgyud 'grel): dag rnal 'byor pa'o/ /thun mong dam tshig mdor bsdu na/ /bdag gzhan don du shes par bya'o/ /rgyan 'gyed lus mdzes 'du lta dang/ /chang dang dregs spyod khengs sems dang/ /tshe dag dge smod sdig spyod dang/ /le lo ser sna gnyis g.yengs
249a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /khro gtum ye shes sngon mi gtong/ /bka' bcog sdig pa'i grogs sten dang/ /bag med spyod dang dam chos 'dor/ /chog mi shes dang rdon la dga' / /spang bya nyi shu gcig bzlog pa/ /bdag don mchog tu gyur pa ste/ /kun gyis bdag
249a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid bkur bar gyur/ /pha rol phyin drug chos spyod bcu/ /rnam gzhi las kyi spyod pa dang/ /mthun 'jug las kyi spyod pa ni/ /theg pa dgu dang mu stegs dgu/ /'gro ba drug gi spyod pa rnams/ /'dzin dang nyam pa med par spyod/ /don 'gyur ci yang
249b1(rgyud 'grel): nyams su blang/ /bzhi bcu bzhi la sogs pa yis/ /gdul bya gang yang dor mi bya/ /bsrung bya de dag grangs btab pa/ /dran dang shes bzhin gyis spyod pa/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por gsungs/ /nyams par gyur pa'i rgyu dag ni/ /mi chos blon po las byed dang//
249b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag stod gzhan smod gzung 'dzin mkhas/ /khengs dregs gnyis phyir 'du ba ste/ /rdzas la chags sems rang phyogs che/ /'chad dang rang mthong lta spyod snyoms/ /chos la phyogs ris doms skyon dang/ /gsang chung le lo gtsang rme che/ /sgro skur grogs kyi
249b3(rgyud 'grel): nyams len dang/ /'khor ba'i rigs rgyud spel 'dod cing/ /gcig pur mi dga' 'du la dga' / /nyi shu nyams pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /snga rtags sngon du 'byung ba ni/ /nyam nga ba'i nad rnams dang/ /dgra bgegs gnyis la bde mi 'jug/ 'khor dang longs spyod
249b4(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong 'bral/ /yag ma nyes la sogs 'byung/ /brtsams pa'i las la 'bras med cing/ /yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung/ /gal te nyams la rtags med par/ /legs par snang na mi rung ste/ /bde ba zad med gtan du sdug /gal te
249b5(rgyud 'grel): nyams la rtags byung na/ /sngon gyi rnam smin zad 'gyur phyir/ /bskang pa'i las rnams brtson byas na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur/ /nyams par gyur pa'i skyon bshad pa/ /byang sems dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /bskal par dge ba ci
249b6(rgyud 'grel): bsags kyang/ /gzhi rten med par gyur pa yis/ /'khor ba'i khams gsum zag par 'gyur/ /sku'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /ya nga'i nad sogs sdug bsngal 'byung/ /dus min tshe zad par chad mang/ /bskal par rdo rje dmyal bar ltung/ /bde bas rab
249b7(rgyud 'grel): tu brel bar 'gyur/ /gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /bgegs rnams thogs med 'ong ba dang/ /rkyen dang ye 'drog mang ba dang/ /chos la byin brlabs med 'gyur zhing/ /bskal pa gnyis su dmyal bar lhung/ /sgrub pa'i dam las 'das par 'gyur/ /thugs
250a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dam tshig nyams 'gyur na/ /smyo 'bod dbang po nyams dang 'tshal/ /myos shing skur pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ /gang yang sgrub la rtags med cing/ /lce la zhing rmo la sogs pa'i/ /dmyal bar bskal pa gsum la gnas//
250a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba kun nyams pa la pa dag /gsol bar nye bar mi brtson na/ /rdo rje dmyal ba phal pa thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal gcig tu bsdom pas ni/ /de'i 'bum gyi char mi phod/ /sangs rgyas stong gi 'od zer dang/ /byang chub sems
250a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i 'phrin las kun/ /rgyun du mdzad kyang phan mi 'gyur/ /bskal ba ther 'bum la sogs su/ /de ni thon pa mi 'gyur te/ /'jig rten 'jig na'ang gzhan du 'pho/ /se gol gcig gis phyin par byed/ /de bas shin tu nan tan gyis/ /yan lag
250a4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /longs spyod mang du 'phel ba med/ /theg pa che la 'phyas 'dogs shing/ /thun mong mchog gis dngos grub rnams/ /shin tu ring bar gyur pa dang/ /gdul bya'i don rnams yal 'gyur zhing/ /lta spyod ya char
250a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa yis/ /theg pa phyi mar 'dres pa nyid/ /bka' byin nyams 'grub par dka' / /bsrung pa'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang/ /zab mo'i chos las ring 'gyur zhing/ /bsgal par ngan song ltung bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor sngo skams nyid du 'gyur/ /rnal
250a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor skyes bu chen po yis/ /dam tshig ma nyams gzhung mthun dang/ /lus la nad nyung mtshan ldan zhing/ /thun mong nyes byas dag par 'gyur/ /srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur zhing/ /theg chen zab mo'i don thob gyur/ /gsung gis lha mnyes rgyud
250a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phel zhing/ /mthu dang byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/ /las rnams dus su 'grub par 'gyur/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /thugs kyi skyo dub med pa dang/ man ngag snod 'gyur dngos grub nye/ /dgongs zab don la mkhas pa
250b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /lha rnams kyis ni dbang bskur 'gyur/ /yan lag dam tshig ma nyams na/ /skyon bzlog pa nyid yon tan 'gyur/ /bdud bzhi bcom zhing ngan song skyob/ /theg chen lta spyod gzhung bsrang bas/ /lha rnams 'go zhing bsams pa 'grub/ /don gnyis
250b2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /theg chen dam tshig la gnas na/ 'og ma'i 'dul sdom dam tshig kun/ /bsrung ba med par thub pas na/ /dge slong byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po yin/ /nyams na bskang ba'i thabs rnams ni//
250b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems kyi dam nyams na/ /mkhas la gnas te gnas par bya/ /sku yis dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /gang la nyams pa der song la/ /nor rdzas mnyes pa der phul nas/ /gang nyes tshig tu bshags byas la/ /phyin chad sdom pa legs par
250b4(rgyud 'grel): bca' / /gal te grongs chad gyur pa na/ /de yi slob dpon bzhugs pa la/ /dam tshig gong ma bzhin du bshags/ /med na mnyam pa brgya la bshags/ /de yang rnyed par ma gyur na/ /de dang mnyam pa gsum bkug la/ /sbyin sreg me thab rab brtsi
250b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /dkyil 'khor lha la mchod rjes su/ /spyan drangs gsang mtshan la sogs mchod/ /gong du smos pa'i yon rnams kyang/ /mnyam pa gsum la dbul bar bya/ /gal te gus bar mi len na/ /gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar skye/ /de bas myur tu
250b6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa bya/ /gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /sgo gsum sku gsung thugs nyid du/ /nges par shes te skongs par 'gyur/ /bzlas pa sngags kyis bsab pa dang/ /bsgrub pa chen po gsum gyis bskang/ /thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na/
250b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro drug sems su gsal rtogs na/ /bdag nyid bdag la gsang bar byed/ /mi rtog ting 'dzin ? zhugs te/ /ma yengs blo la 'gris par bya'o/ /yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /gang 'das de nyid sor bcug la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyi tshogs
251a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sa bskang/ /de ltar nyams su blangs na skongs/ /snga rtags sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po dpes bstan pa/ /sa gzhi lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /lam dang 'bras bu'i chos rnams kun/ /dam tshig med par
251a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung mi srid/ /sa mdza' i mkhar gyi rang bzhin pas/ /srung ba thub dang ma thub las/ /legs nyes stobs chen spyod pa'o/ /rin chen lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /dngos grub dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin pas//
251a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di yod thams cad shod bar 'gyur/ /rno dbal mtshon gyi rang bzhin pas/ /'khor ba'i dra ba gcod pa la/ /pha ma lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad skyed/ /rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /rlabs chen dus dus 'byung bar
251a4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /me dpung lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /gangs mtshe thams cad tshig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rtsi sman rang bzhin pas/ /'khor ba'i gcod rnying ma lus 'byin/ /rgyal po lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /phyogs 'ga' brten yang rims kyis 'tsho//
251a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho nor len ded dpon dang/ /thog ma nas mthar 'dis phyin pas/ /'di la shin tu nan tan bya'o/ /dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba/ /gung na yod pa ma yin te/ /rang gi sems nyid dam tshig yin/ /ji snyed snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /rang
251a6(rgyud 'grel): rig rkyen bral nyid snang bas/ /cir snang cir srid rang rig nyid/ /'gro ldog spyi gtsugs gang sor yang/ /snying po'i don las 'da' mi srid/ /rang bzhin dam tshig chen po yi/ /rang bzhin lhun grub dam tshig la/ /rigs pas phyin ci ma log na//
251a7(rgyud 'grel): mngon snang gdags pa'i chos med pas/ /lta ba'i dam tshig chen por bshad/ /de dag blo la 'dris pa yis/ /spyod lam kun yang ma nyams bar/ /ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig ste/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang spyod yul gcig/ 'di la bsrung
251b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ci yang med/ /nyams pa rdul tsam 'byung mi srid/ /ma 'gags spyod pa 'dzin med pas/ /lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam bzhi ldan/ /bsrung bya ma lus 'dir 'dus phyir/ /dam tshig kun gyi mdo zhes so/ /sgyu 'phrul rnam bkod gtor tshogs rgya mtsho'i rgyun chen
251b2(rgyud 'grel): las/ /lam 'bras snying bo me long bcu gcig gis mtshan pa/ /'khor ba'i ngang mchus tshul gyis sgeg pa'i blos bsdus pa'i/ /dge rtsas kun kyang dam gnas 'gro kun byang chub shog /spyi'i dam tshig mdor bsdus ba/ /dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes
251b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /dam tshig chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// (tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang dam tshig mi 'gal ba ye shes dpal gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so//) // */ /rgya gar skad du/ shI la sam+ba ra sa ma yA bi rud+d+ha nA ma/ bod
251b4(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang dam tshig mi 'gal ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal tshogs kun mkhyen dam pa'i dbang phyug snying rje'i mchog gi bdud rtsis brlan pa'i blo gos can//
251b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don yon tan dri med bden pa'i rin chen rin thang med pa mang po 'phob pa'i mchog/ 'gro ba nyon mongs ha la ha la'i dug zos rnams la chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char pa yis/ /mya ngan 'das pa dam pa'i don byed pa yi dpal ldan gang yin khyed kyis
251b6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bsrungs/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing/ /bde gshegs byin brlabs med pa dang/ /mang du thos pa dang bral zhing/ /thos pa nyung dus chog shes pa/ /mkhas pa nyid du rlom byed rnams/ /rgyud dang sngags dang phyag rgya sogs/ /sbyin
251b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs dang sangs rgyas yum/ /lung nod ji bzhin ma rtogs pas/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom/ /dang por bzung nas de 'og tu/ /rab tu byung nas dge slong ngam/ /dang por rab tu byung brten nas/ /sngags dang pha rol
252a1(rgyud 'grel): phyin lam gnas/ /phyi nas de rnams rmongs sogs kyi/ /'dul ba yi ni bstan bcos las/ /nyan thos la sogs sdom gnas pa/ /so sor thar dang lo drir gnas/ /der bstan pa yi bslab pa rnams/ /phal cher ?
252a2(rgyud 'grel): bar ma lus pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa dang/ /'gal ba nyid du gnas bzung nas/ /de ltar de spangs rnam par gnas/ /de dag mi shes bsal phyir dang/ /bstan pa 'khrul pa zlog pa'i phyir/ /rig 'dzin gyi ni dam tshig rnams/ /
252a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i bslab pa dang/ /so sor thar gsungs sdom pa ni/ /rgyu 'bras ltos 'brel grub rnams la/ /mi 'gal 'brel pa gsal bar bya/ /sgrub ba lung bzhin bya ba ni/ /dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal snga nas/ /yang dag shes rab pha rol
252a4(rgyud 'grel): phyin/ /mngon par rtogs pa brgyad rnams dang/ /dam tshig dbang bskur thob pa yis/ /shin tu man ngag dang ldan bas/ /dpal ldan 'dus sogs rgyud kyi don/ /rim pa gnyis ni rnam dbye ba/ /thob pa des bsam snying rje yis/ /bdag dang
252a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi byang chub phyir/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de/ /kun las phyir mi ldog brtan bya/ /thabs kyi rang bzhin bya ba 'am/ /sgom pa yi ni lam dag ste/ /sbyin la sogs pa'i bslab pa la/ /yang na sngags spyod rim pa las/ /rtag
252a6(rgyud 'grel): tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ /bsten pa yongs su btang mi bya/ /mdo sde chos mngon 'dul ba yi/ /gtsug lag gi ni bstan bcos dang/ /gtsug lag ma yin lo dri sogs/ /slob dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ /byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi/ /so
252a7(rgyud 'grel): sor bar sogs sdom pa ni/ /dge slong blo dang ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag bsten/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi byang chub dang/ /dpal ldan 'chi bdag las rgyal ba'i/ /bstan pa yang ni bsrung phyir dang/ /de bzhin 'jig rten gsum gnas
252b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /mi dang lha sogs 'jig rten rnams/ /sems sun 'byin pa gzhom phyir ro/ /sdom pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni/ /dpal ldan rgyal bas gang gsungs pa/ /phan tshun 'gal ba dag tu ni/ /gang yang nam duAng gnas ma yin/ /chos 'dul las ni bcom
252b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyis/ /so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni/ /rnam pa brgyad gsungs 'di lta ste/ /dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/ /dge slob dge tshul dge tshul ma/ /de bzhin dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma/ /bsnyen gnas la ni gnas pa'o/ /de rnams bslab pa'ang rnam dbye ba//
252b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan thub pa'i dbang chen po/ /snying rje ldan pas gsungs pa ni/ /dge bsnyen pho mo dag gi sdom/ /rnam pa lnga ru rab bstan te/ /'di ltar srog gcod spong ba nas/ /myos 'gyur chang mi 'thung ba'i bar/ /dge tshul pho mo'i sdom dag ni/ /mgon pos
252b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bcur gsungs te/ /srog gcod pa la sogs pa nas/ /ji srid gser dngul la sogs pa/ /len pa spong ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin gzhin ni rab slob? ma'i/ /'dul las bcu gnyis nyid yin te/ /chos dang rjes su mthun pa rnams/ /thar pa'i lam
252b5(rgyud 'grel): ni dag phyir gsungs/ /thub pa thugs rje chen po yis/ /spang bya thams cad spangs pa ni/ /dge slong dge slong ma rnams kyi/ /sdom pa yin par gsungs pa yin/ /thub pa thugs rje chen po yis/ /glu dang gar sogs phreng ba sogs/ /gcig byas phyed dang dus
252b6(rgyud 'grel): min zas/ /bar gyi spang bya brgyad spangs la/ /bsnyen gnas kyi ni sdom par gsungs/ /sbyin la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos/ /bya ba thabs kyi bdag nyid gnas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa ru/ /bstan pa rgyal ba'i dbang po yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
252b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /sdom pa nyid du gsungs pa yin/ /phyag rgya sngags sogs rnal 'byor gyi/ /rim pa gnyis la brten pa las/ /rdo rje ye shes lus ngag gi/ lha'i rnam par rab bsgoms pa/ /thabs dang ldan par sgrub pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' i bslab 'grub pas//
253a1(rgyud 'grel): so sor thar sdom gyis de 'grub/ /gsang sngags sbyin sogs dbye ba las/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba yis/ /dge slong la sogs dbye bya ste/ /dge slong sogs sdom dbye ba med/ /dge slong nyid sdom gcig yin te/ /de bzhin
253a2(rgyud 'grel): len dang sgrub pa'ang gcig /rab byung sdom pa btang nas ni/ /sngags kyi sdom dang sbyin sogs kyi/ /sdom pa yang ni gzung mi bya/ /gsang sngags kyi ni sdom pa dang/ /spyin sogs sdom pas bsdams pa dang/ rnyed dang bkur sti'i rgya yis saM//
253a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi 'tsho pa 'grub don du/ /rab byung sdom pa len 'dod na/ /dge slong min pas sdom mi bya/ /gsang sngags sbyin sogs ldan pa ni/ /rab byung sdom pa bsgrub pa'o/ /'phags pa mgon po byams pa yis/ /'di ltar mkhyen te gsungs
253a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /rab tu byung ba'i phyogs dag ni/ /yon tan tshad med rnams dang ldan/ /de ltar sdom brtson khyim pa yi/ /byang chub sems las khyad par 'phags/ /gsang so gis lam dang sbyin sogs kyi/ /lam nyid dag ni dge slong gis/ /dge slong
253a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas las blang bya yi/ /gzhan nyid las ni ma yin no/ /sngags dang sbyin sogs la gnas pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa ni /tshul khrims pha rol phyin rnam gsum/ /dang po sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang/ dge ba chos sdud tshul khrims
253a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims te/ /des bsgrub 'di bsgrub nges pa yin/ /rgyal bas 'dul ba'i sde snod las/ /dge slong sdom gang gsungs de ni/ /dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /tshul khrims sdom pa'i cha ru 'gyur/ /dpal ldan de bzhin
253a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa dang/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /dbugs dbyung dag la brten nas ni/ rdo rje'i lam ni gnyis su gnas/ /de la bde gshegs dbugs dbyung ba/ /dge slong rnams la zhi sems kyis/ /ma lus spros pa dang bral ba/ /gsungs
253b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dbang spyod sogs rim bya/ /phyi rol shes rab spangs nas ni/ rtag tu rang snang shes rab ldan/ /de la 'dul las gsungs pa yi/ /sdom pa yi ni byang chub sgrub/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid thob pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rol pa ni/ /dge slong bdag nyid gyur pa yi/ /dpal ldan
253b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad sogs/ /gos dkar sogs dang snyoms 'jug pa/ /do shal dpung rgyan gdu bu yis/ /rnam par brgyan cing gos dag ni/ /shin tu bzang po mnabs par ru/ /dpal ldan 'dus sogs las byung bas/ /sems can kun
253b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi don 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dbugs dbyung ba/ /rtag tu khyim pa spyang pa'i phyir/ /dbang bskur la sogs rim pa ni/ /spros dang bcas pa de la gsungs/ /sems sogs 'os su gyur pa la/ /phyi rol rig ma'i dbang bskur bya/ /spros pa med pas rab byung la//
253b4(rgyud 'grel): dge slong rnams kyis de sbyin te/ /'dul la sogs ba'i sdom pa ni/ /thams cad ldan pa'i slob ma la/ /rtag tu rang snang shes rab kyi/ /bsgom pa gsal bar bya phyir ro/ /sbyin sogs spyod dang sngags sogs spyod/ /rnal 'byor gnas pa'i bdag nyid dag /rdzogs pa'i
253b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sangs rgyas chos/ /rang dang gzhan la rab bsgrub par/ /rab tu 'jug pa'i dge slong gi /dngos gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /bse ru nyan thos nyid gnas pa'i/ /zhi ba 'dod pa'i dge slong gis/ 'dul las gsungs pa'i sdom pa yang//
253b6(rgyud 'grel): phra mo tsam yang gtar mi bya/ /khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang/ /gang tshe tshangs spyod nyid bsrung na/ /rab byung byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /rang gi tshul khrims ji ltar dor/ /dpal ldan mgon po byams pa yis/ /rtag tu tshangs par spyod
253b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang/ /'tsho ba rnam par dag nyid du/ /byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs so/ /dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /sbyin sogs bya ba'i lam gyis saM/ /yang na sngags kyi sdom pa yis/ /gnas te de nyid sgrub byed pas/ /'dul las gsungs pa'i sdom
254a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung/ /dpal ldan thub pa'i dbang po ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin des/ /theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung la/ /theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas/ /zhes bya bar ni gsungs pa yin/ /sdom pa rnams
254a2(rgyud 'grel): ni sdom pa yin/ /gong nas gong du rjes 'jug ste/ /'di ltar dge bsnyan sdom pa ni dge tshul gyi ni rjes su 'jug /gang de dge slong rjes su 'jug /gang dag nyan thos dge slong gi/ sdom gsungs byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /rjes su 'jug ste kun ldan pas//
254a3(rgyud 'grel): dge slong shin tu khyad par 'phags/ /bya ba thabs kyi sbyor pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa ste/ /sngags pas sbyin la sogs pa ste/ thams cad du ni 'jug par bya/ /gal te sdom pa 'gal gyur na/ /dge slong gi ni sdom pa rnams/ /phul
254a4(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur na dge tshul dang/ /dge bsnyen yang ni mi gnas 'gyur/ /sems can don la ltos pa yis/ /so sor thar gsungs sdom gtong zhes/ /gal te de ltar brjod byed na/ /de dag nges par rmongs pa yin/ /blo ldan khyad par 'phags pa yi//
254a5(rgyud 'grel): dge slong byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /thabs la mkhas pas thams cad du/ /rmi lam du yang 'gal mi bsam/ /sbyin la sogs pa bya ba 'am/ /yang na de nyid bsgom bya yin/ /dge slong sems can bsgrub pa 'am/ /byang chub sems dpa' 
254a6(rgyud 'grel): snying rje che/ /gzhan don byed par 'dod rnams kyis/ /'dul la sogs pa'i dge slong gi/ bya ba tshul khrims khyad 'phags phyir/ /tshul khrims lhag par brtan par bya/ /'dul ba las brjod tshul khrims ni/ /dge slong nyid du bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /
254a7(rgyud 'grel): ji srid 'tsho bar brten bya ba/ /sems can don yin btang mi bya/ /sngags sogs bsgom la gnas pa dang/ sbyin la sogs la gnas pa nyi/ /dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /so sor thar gsungs bslab pa ni/ /nam yang btang bar mi bya'o//
254b1(rgyud 'grel): btang na dmyal sogs 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de ltar ma gyur rnam nges na/ /yang dag byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /dge slong sdom pa yang dag pa/ /so sor thar la gnas par bya/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras la gus pas lung dang rig pa yis/ /shin tu dri ma
254b2(rgyud 'grel): med cing mi 'gal sdom rnams byas pa las/ /bdag gis zla 'od lta bu'i dge ba bsags pa gang yin des/ /'jig rten ma lus dpal ldan rgyal ba'i dbang po myur grub shog/ tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang dam tshig mi 'gal ba zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon mkhas
254b3(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i mkhan po dz+nyA na sh+rI b+ha dra de nyid dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong blo gros snying po dang/ dge slong rab zhi bshes gnyen gyis bsgyur cing
254b4(rgyud 'grel): zhus te gtan la phab pa// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba sa ma ya saM gra ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dam tshig thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//
254b5(rgyud 'grel): oM A hUM/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum bdag nyid/ /dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje la/ btud de gsang sngags theg pa'i gzhung/ /rgyud las gsungs pa bri bar bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs pas 'di ltar shes par bya'o/ /theg pa
254b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i yang chen po 'di 'og ma rnams las khyad par du 'phags te/ /ji ltar zhe na 'di skad du 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas thams cad chos kyi skur rtogs pas kun tu bzang po'i rgyas thebs pa dang 'jig rten gyi lha chen po dam tshig can
254b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pas bkur gnas byed pas byin gyis brlabs dang ldan pa dang/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pas thugs la dgongs shing byin gyis brlabs pas dngos grub myur ba dang/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang spyod yul gcig pas 'khor ba
255a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ngan song gi 'jigs pa dang bral zhing dbugs phyin pa dang/ rdo rje byang chub kyi sems dang ldan zhing sku dang gsung dang thugs mi phyed pas bar du gcod pa gang yang med pa dang/ phyi nang thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par
255a2(rgyud 'grel): dag par yid ches pas dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang/ gal te nyams na yang rang bzhin gyis skongs par 'gyur pa'i khyad por zhes gsungs so/ /yang slob dpon chen po in+d+ra bo d+hi'i zhal snga nas bla ma'i khyad par dang snod kyi khyad par
255a3(rgyud 'grel): dang cho ga'i khyad par dang las kyi khyad par dang dam tshig gi khyad par dang lta ba'i khyad par dang spyod pa'i khyad par te bdun gyis 'phags so zhes gsungs/ /slob dpon chen po ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas sngags kyi theg pa ni rnam pa gsum gyis
255a4(rgyud 'grel): thun mong ma yin te/ /'di ltar sgrub pa po dang lam dang 'bras bu gsum mo zhes gsungs so/ /slob dpon tri bid tra ma'i zhal snga nas ni/ /don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang/ /thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang/ dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas/ /sngags
255a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags/ /zhes gsungs so/ /slob dpon DoM bi he ru ka'i zhal snga nas kyang 'dir ni snod kyi khyad par dang snod du byed pa'i chos dang gzhung dang lam gyi khyad par dang 'bras bu dag gi khyad par gyis sngags kyi theg pa khyad par
255a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags zhes gsungs pa dang/ gzhan yang rdo rje dril bu pa'i zhal nas kyang gsang sngags kyi them pa ni theg pa chen po'i yang chen po yin te/ 'di ltar rten gyi gang zag gi khyad par dang/ 'jug pa lam gyi khyad par dang/ mthar
255a7(rgyud 'grel): thug pa 'bras bu'i khyad par dang/ mngon par 'byung ba'i khyad par ro zhes gsungs so/ /slob dpon ratna A ka ra shIn+ta pa'i zhal snga nas 'dir/ dmigs pa rnam par dag pa dang/ grogs kyi mthu dang spyod pa yis/ /blo ldan rnams kyi theg
255b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di/ /chen po'i chen po nyid du bsgrags zhes gsungs so/ /bdag gi bla ma rje btsun dam tshig rdo rje'i zhal nas ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa las theg pa 'di gong du gyur pa yin te bla ma dang dbang bskur ba dang dam tshig dang man ngag dang
255b2(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus kyis khyad par du 'phags so zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'dir dam tshig 'ba' zhig brjod par bya ste/ dam tshig ni sngags pa rnams kyi gnad kyi gnas su gyur pa dang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi lo rtog skye ba'i sa gzhir gyur pa yin
255b3(rgyud 'grel): pas de bri bar bya'o/ /dam tshig kyang gang zhe na/ rten dang rgyu dang rtsa ba dang ngo bo dang nges pa'i tshig dang dbye ba dang ming gi rnam grangs dang rkang grangs dang brda dang bdud dang dgra dang nyams pa'i tshad dang spongs pa dang ma nyams pa'i rtags dang bsngo
255b4(rgyud 'grel): bgrang bya ba dang bskad ba dang bsdus pa'i dam tshig dang nyams pa'i nyas dmigs dang ma nyams pa'i phan yon dang 'bras bu rnams so/ /des na rten ni theg pa chen po'i rigs can skyabs su 'gro ba gnyis sngon du song ba bla na med pa byang chub kyi sems
255b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang bskur ba thob pa'o/ /de la rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems so/ rtsa ba ni snying rje'o/ /ngo bo ni ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang/ snying rje dang shes rab mtshungs par ldan pa shes pa'i rgyun no/ /nges tshig ni rtogs
255b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ram/ /mnyam pa nyid du 'gro ba'i phyir ram/ /thob cing mi 'da' ba' i phyir ro/ /de la dbye ba ni rtsa ba dang sbom po yan lag gi sgo nas dbye ba dang bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa'i sgo nas dbye ba dang spyod pa dang lta ba'i sgo nas dbye ba dang spyi dang
255b7(rgyud 'grel): khyad par dang lhag pa'i sgo nas dbye ba dang thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas dbye ba dang/ rags pa dang phra ba'i sgo nas dbye ba dang/ bsrung bar bya ba dang nyams su blang ba dang spyad par bya ba dang spyod lam dang thun mong ma yin pa'i
256a1(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas dbye ba'o/ /de la ming gi rnam grangs ni dam tshig dang sdom pa dang brtul zhugs dang spyod yul dang dka' spyad dang spyod pa dang shI la la sogs pa'o/ /de la rkang grangs ni thun mong gi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi dang pha rol
256a2(rgyud 'grel): tu phyin pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu gnyis dang kri ya'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu gsum dang/ spyod pa'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi
256a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /yang lnga dang yang bzhi dang/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba bdun bcu tham pa'o/ /de la yan lag gi dam tshig rnams ni 'di rnams so zhes bgrang bar mi nus te/ mdo sde dang mngon pa dang 'dul pa dang rgyud sde rnams su blta bar bya'o/ /de la dam tshig
256a4(rgyud 'grel): gi brda ni ji skad du/ /mi bshig pa ni seng+ge ste/ /gcan zan rgyal po yin pas so/ /za ma tog ni rgyal mo mdzod/ /dug sbyong ba ni der mi rigs/ /rat na myu gu lcug phran dag /brabs te 'byung rgyun gcad mi bya/ /gangs kyi zhu chu phal pa yang//
256a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas btung bar mi bya'o/ /pad+ma'i ze 'bru kha ma dbye/ /zla zer ma yin dbye mi bya/ /ma rtags bug rdol can snod du/ /bdud rtsi sman blugs zags par 'gyur/ /don med bcos pa'i tshul brtags can/ /bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min//
256a6(rgyud 'grel): shel dkar ratna sgo nga dang/ /'dam rdzab khung du nub mi bya/ /seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag /gser snod ma yin blug mi bya/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ /bseg par bya ba yod ma yin/ /khyung chen gshog pa gar brkyang pa//
256a7(rgyud 'grel): de dag gcag par bya ba min/ /gnam lcags me'i dur mo dag/ brdab par bya ba ma yin no/ /rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i gzhi/ /gzhig par bya ba ga la yin/ /bur shing bsregs pa'i sgron med de/ /mthor rlung drag po bskyod mi
256b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rdo rje tshig gi chu rgyun dag/ 'ol kar bkag par bya ba min/ /rgyal pos bka' rtags phyag rgya dag /nam yang bshig par mi bya'o/ /gtsug gi yid bzhin nor bu de/ /rgyal mtshan rtse las dbog mi bya/ /zhes gsungs pas/ zla ba'i dam
256b2(rgyud 'grel): tshig kyang brdar gsungs te/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje las/ tsa'u sa ma ya/ ka stu ra/ sihla/ kapbu ra /bA la zhes pa dang/ snyoms 'jug gi dam tshig kyang bo la/ /ka ko la /kun du ru zhes gsungs so/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi yang brdar gsungs
256b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las/ ri bong can dang mig dang yon tan rig byed dang/ mda' dang dbang po ri dang bkra shis gza' dang phyogs/ /drag po nyi ma yan lag sa rnams yin zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de la dam tshig gi bdud ni rnam rtog
256b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrig pa'i bdud dang/ btang snyoms le lo'i bdud dang longs spyod g.yeng ba'i bdud dang/ tshig rtsub mtshon cha'i bdud dang khro gtum 'khrug pa'i bdud do/ /de la dam tshig gi dgra ni gsang ba 'phel pas bcos kar song ba'i dgra dang chos log
256b5(rgyud 'grel): par spyad bas bar chad 'ong ba'i dgra dang rtsa ba byung bas chad pa chen po 'byung ba'i dgra dang/ sgrub pa mi brtson pas dge ba 'phrog pa'i dgra'o/ /de la dam tshig gi nyams pa'i tshad ni nyams pa che chung gi tshad dang dus kyi tshad do/ /de la nyams che chung gi
256b6(rgyud 'grel): tshad ni kun du nyams pa chen po dang rtsa ba nyams pa dang/ yan lag nyams pa dang zlas pa nyams pa dang zhar la nyams pa'o/ /de la dang po bla ma'i dam tshig ni de bskrongs pa dang de la mtshon la sogs pas brgyab pa dang sku la smad pa dang/
256b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khus pa dang bsnyas pa dang 'khon pa dang bka' bcag pa dang ngan sems dang 'phya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rdo rje spun pho mo'i dam tshig ni de bsad pa dang 'khus pas dang brdegs pa dang nor rdzas dang chung ma la sogs pa phrogs pa dang/ lkog kha dang dor 
257a1(rgyud 'grel): kha dang nan dur dang brnyas pa dang 'tshang 'bru ba dang ngan sems dang khon pa dang brtse gdung med pa la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems gtan spangs pa ni kun tu nyes pa chen po'o/ /de la rtsa ba'i ltung ba bdun
257a2(rgyud 'grel): cu las bla ma dang rdo rje spun dang byang chub kyi sems ma gtogs pa drug cu rtsa gsum nyams pa dang/ gzhan yang rang gis dpang ma thob par gzhan la bskur pa dang mi shes par dal 'bri ba dang rab gnas dang sbyin sreg dang/ tshogs kyi 'khor lor
257a3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa dang/ gsang sngags rang shes su bla ma med par spyod pa dang thun mtshams kyi rnal 'byor chag pa dang lha dang bla ma la mchod pa dus su chag pa dang mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams med pa lnga dang nye ba'i mtshams med pa lnga dang/ dam pa'i
257a4(rgyud 'grel): chos spong ba dang 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang rang gi gsang ba bzhi bo bag med par gzhan la smra ba dang ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pas sdig pa ci la yang mi 'dzem pa rnams ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhig ral du 'gyur ro/ /de la rtsa ba'i yan lag tu gyur
257a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yan lag gi ltung ba bdun dang bco lnga la sogs pa spyir bzhi par skabs bzhi gsang ba nye bar btang pa bzhi gsang bar 'os pa'o/ /sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa nas gsungs pa ji snyed pa rnams dang/ gzhan yang gzugs sku dang po ti dang rdo rje dril
257a6(rgyud 'grel): bu dang phur bu 'joms pa dang 'chod pa dang 'gom pa dang mchog tu yi dam lha'i sku dang/ glegs bam dang phyag rgya rnams sbyin pa dang 'tshong ba la sogs pa rnams ni yan lag gi ltung ba zhig ral du 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub kyi sems gtan spangs te
257a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba mdang? byung ba ni kun tu nyon mongs pa chen po'o/ de ma shor yang rtsa ba'i nyes pa gcig gam 'ga' byung ba ni rtsa ba nyams pa'o/ /rtsa ba ma shor ba yang nyes pa gzhan byung ba ni yan lag nyams pa'o/ /bla ma ngan pa dang grogs ngan pas nyes pa byung
257b1(rgyud 'grel): na ni bzlas nyams pa'o/ /mi shes pa dang ma gus pa dang bag med pa dang nyon mongs pa che bas nyes pa byung ba na zhar la nyams pa'o/ /de la dus kyi nyams ba ni brtson pa rab kyi rab kyis ni nyes pa byung ba'i rjes nyid la ma bskangs na nyams so/ /rab kyi 'bring
257b2(rgyud 'grel): gis snga dro nyi ma phyed dang phyed kyi phyed dang dgongs ka dang de bzhin du dus su ma bskangs na nyams so/ /rab kyi tha mas ni nyin bar nyes pa mtshan mo la/ /mtshan mo'i nyes pa nyin par ma bskangs na nyams so/ /'bring gi rab dang 'bring gi 'bring dang 'bring gi tha ma ni
257b3(rgyud 'grel): zhag bdun dang dus khyad par can dang zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tshun chad du ma bskangs na nyams so/ /tha ma'i rab dang tha ma'i 'bring dang tha ma'i tha mas ni zla ba gcig dang zla ba bdun dang zla ba bcu gnyis tshun tshad du ma bskangs na nyams so/ /shin tu dmags pas kyang
257b4(rgyud 'grel): skye ba 'di la nyams pa lus pa las 'chi kar bskangs na de bskongs pa las de ma bskangs na nyams so/ /de la dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags ni gdung sha rI ra ma dang khrel ma khrel dang rmi lam dang bar chad mang nyung las brtag par bya'o/ /de la dam tshig
257b5(rgyud 'grel): bskang ba ni so so dang thun mong gi'o/ /de la so so bskang ba ni spyod pa rlabs po che tsha tsha dang sbyin sreg dang gtor ma dang yan lag bdun ba dang chos spyod bcu dang tshogs kyi tsakra dang nye'u 'don pa dang dge 'dun la chos ston yon dang bcas pa dang
257b6(rgyud 'grel): grwa chen po'i bzhi gzugs pa dang gzugs khyad par can dang rang gi lha'i snying po bzlas brjod bya ba ni 'bum phrag lnga dang khri phrag gsum dang khri phrag lnga stong phrag sum dang stong phrag lnga dang brgya phrag gsum dang brgya phrag lnga dang bcu phrag
257b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang bcu phrag lnga dang nyi shu rtsa gcig ste nyams pa chen po la sogs pa lnga dang rim pa bzhin du sbyar ro/ /gzhan yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi nyams na slar yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ba dang/ rdo rje spun gyi dam tshig nyams pa
258a1(rgyud 'grel): na tshogs kyi tsakra la sogs ba ste/ nyes pa so sor bskang ba'i thabs so sor ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bskang bar bya'o/ /de la thun mong gi bskang ba ni bshags pa dang/ sbyang ba dang slar blang ba'o/ /gzhan yang gong du
258a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i dge ba'i las kyis bskang ba dang rdzas kyis bskang ba dang don gyis bskang ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyis bskang ba dang gsang ba'i thabs kyis bskang ba'o/ /de la dang po gong du bshad do/ /gnyis pa ni bla ma spyan drangs nas rin po che dang khyad par can phul nas nyes pa
258a3(rgyud 'grel): bshags te dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas rdzas de dag slar slu ba'i tshul du bla ma las dam tshig slu bar bya'o/ /gsum pa ni chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pas bsgom pa dang chos zab mo nyan pa dang bsam ba dang klag pa dang/ kha ton bya ba
258a4(rgyud 'grel): de la brtag pa dang bri ba dang gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /de la bzhi pa ni sdig pa bkru ba dang sdig pa sreg pa dang sdig pa gtor ba dang dam tshig rdo rje bsgoms nas de'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bskang ba'o/ /de la lnga pa ni bla ma la rdzas dang rang gi chung ma phul
258a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ gsang ba'i dbang dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang bzhi pa'i dbang zhu bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang yi dam lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzlas pas shin tu yang bskongs so/ /khyad par du rdo rje byang chub kyi sems bsgoms nas bskang du mi btub pa yang
258a6(rgyud 'grel): skongs te/ mdzod kyi mdo la sogs pa lta bar bya'o/ /de la dam tshig rnams bsngo bgrang bya ba ni mdor bsdu na dran pa'i tshul gyis bsngo bgrang bya ba dang/ kha ton dus gsum du bsngo bgrang bya ba dang/ dus drug tu yi dam nar ma'i dus su bskang zhing bsngo
258a7(rgyud 'grel): bgrang bya ba dang/ glegs bam ltas pas bsngo bgrang bya'o/ /de la dam tshig skongs pa dang ma nyams ba'i rtags sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de la dam tshig nyams pa'i nyes dmigs ni ji skad du dpal sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud
258b1(rgyud 'grel): las/ /dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du/ /dbang bskur dngos grub 'thob mi 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pas dang po dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang bskur ba thob nas dam tshig sdom pa mnos nas phyis ma bsrungs na 'jig rten dang
258b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub mi 'byung la/ mi 'dod pa sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dam tshig med pa'i mi rnams la/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mi sbyin zhing/ /de dang 'grogs par mi bya ste/ snying rje bskyed la spang bar bya
258b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dang/ dang por bla ma rje btsun las/ /dam tshig thob nas mi bsrung ba/ /mkha' 'gro srin pos bsad nas su/ /ngu 'bod la sogs dmyal bar 'gro /shes rab snying rje mi ldan pa/ /gsang sngags la ni 'jug mi bya/ /yan lag dam tshig
258b4(rgyud 'grel): nyams gyur na/ /rdo rje'i dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur/ /de bas dam nyams sdig can de'i/ /nyams pas grib ma 'go bas na/ /lhan cig gnas par mi bya zhing/ /de la snying rje bskyed par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa dang/ dpal sangs rgyas thod
258b5(rgyud 'grel): pa las kyang/ re zhig dam tshig nyams pa las/ /dngos grub thob pa lta zhog gi /mi yi skye ba'ang rnyed par dka' / /gang yang bla ma brgyud pa yi/ /rims 'ongs de nyid man ngag ni/ /de yis ji ltar 'grub mnyam dgongs zhes gsungs pa dang/
258b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams na dper na shing chen po rtsa ba tshig pa 'am skams pa 'am 'bag pa dang 'dra ste/ 'jig rten dang de las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /sbom po'i nyes pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du
258b7(rgyud 'grel): shing chen sdong po dang 'dra ste/ 'jig rten gyi dngos grub chen po brgyad mi 'byung ngo/ /yan lag gi ltung ba ni shing gi yal ga dang 'dra bar phrin las bzhi'i dngos grub kyi bar du gcod do/ /gzhan yang 'di la g.yel ba dang mchod pa dang
259a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma chags na byin brlabs chung ba dang rnal 'byor sngo skams so/ /bla ma'i thugs ma zin zhing bka' bcag na bgegs ldang ngo/ /spyod pa rtsir ba dang bag med na 'byor ba brlag par 'gyur ro/ /gal te dam tshig ma
259a2(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs kyang bkra shis pa 'dra na yang 'phral du tshe la gnod pa med kyang de nyid chad pa chen po 'byung ba'i rtags yin te/ dper na rgyal po'i bka' chad byung na de la zan dang chang mang po blud nas gzi bar byas na phyis gsod do/ dam
259a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig kha cig legs par bsrungs pa las sdug bsngal dang bar chad mang ba ltar 'dug kyang de tshe rabs snga ma'i las kyi lhag ma lus pa ma yin pas des ni myur du phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dam tshig
259a4(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa ni tshe 'dir yang bkra mi shis pa mang po 'byung la/ /dus ma yin pa brgyad dang/ gshis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gnyis kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas shi nas kyang rdo rje'i dmyal bar skyes nas de nas thon pa'i dus med do/ /de la dam tshig
259a5(rgyud 'grel): ma nyams pa'i phan yon ni tshe ring ba dang longs spyod che ba dang ci bsam pa 'grub pa dang/ mthu dang byin brlabs che ba dang bkra shis par 'gyur ro/ /bsgom pa dang bzlas pa dang mchod pa la brtson pas rnal 'byor pa sngo ma skams par longs
259a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod che ba dang bla ma'i bka' ma bcag cing gus pas bar chad med pa dang rdo rje spun la brtse gdung byas pas mi ma yin rnams kyis bkur sti byed do/ /g.yo sgyu med pas mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags 'chol
259a7(rgyud 'grel): par ma spyad pas 'byor pa brtan pa dang bkra shis so/ /'chi ba'i dus su yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bsu nas rig 'dzin gyi gnas su khrid do/ /gzhan yang des skye ba 'di dang phyi ma dang skye ba bdun dang skye ba bcu drug tshun chad kyis
259b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub pa la the tshom med do/ /de la dam tshig thams cad bsdu na gnyis te/ snying rje rus pa'i gting nas skye ba dang shes rab tshig tsam ma yin pa gting nas go ba'o/ /'di gnyis rgyud la brtan na dang po nyid nas nyes pa mi 'byung ba
259b2(rgyud 'grel): gal te byung na yang myur du bskongs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dam tshig thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems su 'dus te de yang rnam pa bzhi'o/ /byang chub kyi sems dang bla na med pa byang chub kyi sems dang kun tu bzang po'i sems dang rdo rje byang
259b3(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi sems so/ /de la so so thar pa'i sdom pa ni las dge sdig gtsor ston no/ /mdo sde'i sdom pa ni snying rje gtsor ston no/ /gsang sngags kyi sdom pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi mi phyed pa gtsor ston no/ /de de la so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni mya ngan las
259b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'i bsam pa brtan po las skye 'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po las skye'o/ /gsang sngags kyi sdom pa ni rdo rje byang chub kyi sems las skye'o/ /de la so so thar pa'i sdom pa ni spong ba bdun no//
259b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa ni spong ba bcu'o/ /sngags kyi sdom? pa ni spong ba gcig go /so sor thar pa'i gzhung du ni kha na ma tho ba gnyi ga brjod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' i gzhung du ni rang bzhin 'ba' zhig brjod do/ /sngags kyi gzhung du ni
259b6(rgyud 'grel): de gnyi ga'i tha snyad ma brjod do/ /yang so so thar pa'i sdom pa ni/ /rdzas kyi bdag nyid du yod par 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa ni brtag pa tsam du yod par 'dod do/ /sngags su ni de gnyi ga'i tha snyad ma brjod do/ /yang nyan thos kyi
259b7(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa la bar chad kyi chos mang du yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa la bar chad kyi chos nyung zad gcig go /sngags kyi sdom pa la ni bar chad kyi chos bshad pa med do/ /yang sdom pa dang po la ni pham pa byung na phyis blang ba'i skal ba
260a1(rgyud 'grel): med do/ /bar ma la ni pham pa byung na phyis blang pa'i sa la ba yod do/ /tha ma ni rdo rje byang chub kyi sems dang ldan na nyams pa med do/ /de la sdom pa dang po la ni mkhan po dang slob dpon dgos so/ /bar ma'i sdom pa la ni bla ma
260a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig po 'am yang na mad pa'o/ /tha ma de la ni bzhi ste/ bla ma'i zhal nas byung ba'i dbang dang/ ye shes lha'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbang dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas lung bstan pa'i dbang dang/ rang nyid kyi sems kyi rtsal gyis thob pa'i dbang dang ngo/
260a3(rgyud 'grel): yang snga ma ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pa las ldog go/ bar me ni de'i steng du gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'o/ /phyi ma ni de'i steng du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad spyod nyams su len pa'o/ /yang dang po'i sdom pa ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o/ /bar
260a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sdom pa ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o/ /sngags kyi sdom pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o/ /yang dang po'i sdom pa ni bdag 'ba' zhig gi don no/ /bar ma'i sdom pa ni gzhan 'ba' zhig gi don ni/ /phyi ma'i
260a5(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa ni gnyi ga'i don no/ /yang dang po'i sdom pa ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas so/ /bar ma'i sdom pa ni snying po byang chub kyi bar du'o/ /phyi ma'i sdom pa ni nam mkha' ji srid gnas kyi bar du'o/ /sdom pa dang po'i 'bras bu ni mya ngan las 'das
260a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis so/ /bar ma'i 'bras bu ni sa bcu 'am sa bcu gcig pa'o/ /tha ma'i 'bras bu ni sa bcu gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang bsgom sgrub dang chos spyod yi dam gyi lhas ma khrel ba dang/ dad pa dang bsnyen bkur bla mas ma khrel ba dang/ dam tshig
260a7(rgyud 'grel): dang sdom pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ma khrel ba dang/ brtse gdung phan gnod rdo rje spun pho mos ma khrel ba dang/ bzlas brjod dang gtor ma dang cho ga'i nus pa dang byin brlabs mtshan mo rgyu ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs kyis ma khrel ba dang/ rdo
260b1(rgyud 'grel): rje bla ma'i man ngag zab mi zab rang gi slob mas ma khrel ba dang/ lta ba zab mi zab mkhas pa rnams kyis ma khrel ba dang ji ltar dam bcas pa'i don rang gi sems kyis ma khrel ba dang/ spyod pa bzang ngan grogs pos ma khrel ba dang/ gtong phod pa dang?
260b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol gshog dang/ ro tshod dang/ zhi nges dang/ mthun 'jug 'jig rten gyi mi rnams kyis ma khrel ba'o/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /spyod lam rnal 'byor dus ni/ phyi nang thams cad gzhan
260b3(rgyud 'grel): min te/ /sems nyid lta nyid sgyu ma nyid/ /'od gsal yin te mnyam nyid gzhi/ /dag pa bzhi yang de nyid yin/ /nyin dang mtshan mo rtog par ni/ /sems kyi skad cig re re la/ /de ltar mos pa yang yang bya/ /rdo rje shugs dang mi ldan
260b4(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /snang ba byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ /de lta bu yi sngags pa ni/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i dogs pa med/ /b+haM ga lar skyes dge slong ni/ /mar me mdzad dpal ye shes kyis/ /gzhung dang bla ma'i man ngag gis/ /dam tshig thams cad
260b5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas bris/ /dam tshig thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dI paM kA ra sh+rI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //rje btsun bla ma chen po de nyid kyi zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas
260b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // */ (/las dang po pa'i dam tshig mdor bsdus ba ye shes byang chub kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ karma pra ma tha sa ma ya sU tra so gra ha/ bod skad du/ las dang po pa'i dam tshig
260b7(rgyud 'grel): mdor bsdus pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang sngags kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgor zhugs pa'i las dang po rnams kyi dam tshig mdor bstan pa/ hUM rdor las byung mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin 
261a1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal nas/ sngags 'chang rnams kyi bsung ba'i dam tshig ni/ /mdor bsdus brtse ba'i yid kyis bshad par bya/ /sdug bsngal tshogs kyis bsregs pa'i sems can la/ /snying rjer ldan pa'i yongs la khyab pa dang//
261a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yo dang mi g.yo'i chos rnams ma skyes par/ rtogs pa'i shes rab snying rje'i gzhir bya'o/ /rtag tu dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang/ /shes bzhin ting 'dzin mchog la gnas par bya/ /dang por sngags pas srog gcod rku ba dang/ /
261a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khrig dang rdzun smra chang 'thung? la sogs pa'i/ /tshul khrims sngags kyi rtsa bar sangs rgyas gsungs/ /de bas srog bzhin bslab ba bsrung bar bya/ /zhes so/ /yul gangs ri'i rtsa na gnas pa'i slob dpon dz+nyA na sa twa sa mdzad pa'i gsang chen
261a4(rgyud 'grel): sgron pa'i dam tshig las/ /nyan thos tshul khrims theg chen sdom pa dang/ /sa bdag khrims las 'da' bar mi bya'o/ /zhe'o/ rdo rje rtso mo'i rgyud las/ byang chub sems 'dzin gyur nas ni/ lha gzhan dag la mi mos dang/ /dkon mchog gsum
261a5(rgyud 'grel): la dad pa dang/ de la gzhol zhing 'bab pa yis/ gsod dang rku dang 'khrig pa dang/ /brdzun dang chang ni rnam par spang/ /khyim pa'i tshul du gnas nas ni/ /rig sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya/ /gal te de ni rab byung na/ /sdom pa gsum la
261a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya/ /se so thar dang? byang chub sems/ /rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa'o zhes 'byung bas sdom pa dang dam tshig mdza' dag la gnas par bya'o/ /de lta bas na rnal 'byor bas thog mar rig sngags bzung ba'i dam tshig la
261a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya'o/ /ji ltar bus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla? med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni sdom pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /son don
261b1(rgyud 'grel): byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de bzhin brtan por bzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ /sdom pa deng nas gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yis//
261b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon nyid kyang bzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po las/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen
261b3(rgyud 'grel): po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa las/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po las/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /
261b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gis bsgral/ /ma grol ba ni bdag gi
261b5(rgyud 'grel): dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing/ /mya ngan 'das la sems can dgod/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /bdag ni rab tu gnas par bgyi/ /lus dang ngag dang yid dag gi /mi dge ba ni rnam
261b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu dang/ bag med pa yi gnas byung ba/ /'bru char bcos pa'i tshang dag dang/ /theg pa dman la 'dod pa dang/ /de bzhin lha dang lha min dang/ /gsang ba pa rnams brnyas pa dang/ /phyag rgya mtshan ma gzhom pa dang/ mtshon cha la sogs 'gom
261b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams/ /dus 'di nyid nas gzung nas ni/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi'o/ /zhe'o/ gal te rig sngags gzung ba nyid du nges pas ni/ /sdom pa dang dam tshig tshul bzhin du ma bsrungs na/ /'phags pa rnams
262a1(rgyud 'grel): bslus pa/ bdag nyid la 'khu bar byed pa/ dngos grub chen po la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ de ni g.yon can shing rul pa lta bu yin no/ /dam tshig la mi gnas par gsang sngags tshig tsam gyis/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don du las
262a2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs byed pa'o/ /dbor na mdze can nang na 'bus rnyings pa la phyi rol gyi gos dang rgyan gyis bkab pa lta bu yin no/ /des ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos/ de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis smod cing bshud
262a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yin no/ /gsang sngags kyi dngos grub sgrub pa dang gzhan gyis don du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las byed pa ni/ dus yun ring por bdag gi sems kyi rgyud sbyangs pa dang/ sdom pa dang dam tshig la sngags spyod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas/
262a4(rgyud 'grel): dben par tshul bzhin du las byas na dngos grub tu yang 'gyur la gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa yang 'grub po/ /dam tshig spangs te gzu lums su gsang sngags dgongs pas bshad pa'i don/ /sgra ji bzhin du bzung nas snod min pa'i
262a5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dang/ grong la sogs par log par spyad na ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rgyud khyad du bsad pas slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang/ in+d+ra bo d+hi la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas kyi tshig gi bdud rtsi spangs pa yin pas bdag legs su 'dod
262a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyi zas dug dang bcas pa bzhin du spang bar bya'o/ /de bas na dngos grub kyi snod du rung ba'i sgrub pa pos/ /dang por dam tshig mnos pa nyid nas bzung nas byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mi nyams par bya'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i
262a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang thob pas ni dam tshig gnyis bsrung ste/ bza' ba'i dam tshig dang/ bsrung ba'i dam tshig go /de la bza' ba'i dam tshig ni/ ga bur mtshal dang pi pi ling/ /tsan dan dmar dang gur gum sogs/ /man ngag bzhin du sgrub pa pos//
262b1(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu brten cing bza' par bgyi/ /bsrung bdag gi dam tshig ni/ /rang lus phyag rgya nyid bsgoms la/ /ma lus 'gro ba'i tshogs bsam bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon rdo rje rnams/ /rdo rje de ni spun rnams la/ /gtso dang/ sems dpa' bskyed par bya/ /'di ni
262b2(rgyud 'grel): sku yi dam tshig ste/ /tshul khrims bsrung la brtson par bya/ /srid 'byung ngag gi skyon spangs te/ /rig sngags lha yi snying po dang/ /rdo rje phra sogs rtse gcig pas/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas par bya/ /de ni gsung gi dam tshig de/ /rtag tu 'di las
262b3(rgyud 'grel): 'da' mi bya/ /rgyun du ting 'dzin gnyis po dang/ /spyod bzhin dran pas zin par bya/ /thun mong ma yin gsang chen dang/ /man ngag gzhan du mi spel lo/ /lta dang spyod dang lha dag dang/ /slob dpon mchog gnyis gsang ba ste/ /'di dag gsang chen
262b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du min/ /'di dag thugs kyi dam tshig go /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'di/ /srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo/ /rgyal bas dgongs te gsungs pa yi/ /dam tshig bzhi la gnas par bya/ /ji bzhin don ldan bcu bzhi ni/ /phas pham par ni rab
262b5(rgyud 'grel): tu bsgrags/ /spang zhing 'dor bar mi bya ste/ rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas pa dang/ /bder gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang/ sdang bas spun gyi bsngags min smra/ /byams pa chen po rnam spong dang/ /byang chub sems ni 'dor
262b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /theg pa gsum la snod pa dang/ /skal min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang/ rgyal ba'i bdag nyid phung po smod/ /dam pa'i chos la yid gnyis za/ /gdug la byams dang chags bral dang/ /chos la gnyis su 'byed pa dang/ dang ba'i sems la rab
262b7(rgyud 'grel): tu smod/ /dam tshig bsten pa ji snyed pa/ /brtags pa'i rig ma smod pa ste/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba des/ /sngags pa'i dam tshig zad par 'gyur/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re bzhin ni bzla bar bya/ /gal te nyams gyur rnal 'byor
263a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /kha na mtho sbom por 'gyur/ /dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i/ /rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang/ /gsang ba'i chos ni ston pa dang/ sems can dad dang ldan pa la/ /dam chos
263a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du ston pa dang/ /nyan thos dag tu rlom byed pa'i/ /nang du zhag bdun 'jug pa dang/ /sbyor ba nges par ma byas pa'i/ /snod min gsang ba ston pa rnams/ /kha na ma tho bcas 'gyur te/ /sngags pa de yi dam tshig zad/ /zad pas 'grub
263a3(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur zhing/ /bdud dang sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel zhe'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang thob pas kyang dam tshig rnams/ dang po thob pa nyid nas byang chub chen po'i bar du yang dag par gzung ngo/ /gal te nyams par byas na don dam par
263a4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung du med pa dang/ dgongs pa'i don gyi tshig gi gzugs brnyan la brten nas/ dam tshig mi bsrung bar gzu lums su dkyil 'khor la sogs pa byed pa ni 'phags pa dang 'gro ba kun bslus pa ste/ yon tan de gsang sngags seng+ge'i
263a5(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma lta bu skye bo snod dang mi ldan pa'i mi la bstan pa dang/ dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las byas pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba'i skye ba dang/ bdag dang gzhan rlag par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
263a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ de nam du yang dngos grub kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba yin no/ /de lta bas na dam tshig rnams lus dang srog la ltos pa med par bsrung bar bya'o/ /dam tshig nyams pa gso ba ni gnang ste/ thun mtshams
263a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba las gyur na/ /bde gshegs las rigs bsam gtan gyis/ /de yi nyes pa bsal bar bya/ /gser sbyangs dri med lta bur 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i yan lag sbom nyams na/ /mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya/ /'phags
263b1(rgyud 'grel): la bzod gsol dam bcas na/ /phyin chad bsdams te gus par blang/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid las/ /dang por rigs bdag dkyil 'khor du/ /tshul bzhin yang dag blang bar bya/ /de ltar ma bshags par blangs pas
263b2(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa khyad du gsod cing de'i nyes pa 'phel ba dang bcas par gyur na skyon che ste/ gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ /de bzhin chos kyi sems dpa' dang/ rmongs pa 'gal bar
263b3(rgyud 'grel): byas na ni/ /tshal bar 'gas par gdon mi za zhi'o/ /de lta bas na sangs rgyas dbu 'gas na mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ dam tshig nyams pa ni bdag nyid dang/ gzhan phyogs su yang nyes pa sna tshogs su 'byung la/ phyi mar yang bskal pa gsum la
263b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs par ngan 'gror 'gro ba'o/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig med cing ngan spyod po/ /bslus 'gyur ngan pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis zos nas kyang/ /de las nga ni skyob mi byed/ gsang
263b5(rgyud 'grel): ba pa'i nang nas ni/ /sgrub pa po de phyugs dang 'dra zhe'o/ /bla ma lnga bcu pa las kyang/ /slob dpon la ni smod pa de/ /yams dang 'tshe ba'i nad rnams dang/ /gdon dang rims dang dug rnams kyis/ /rmongs chen de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po me dang sprul
263b6(rgyud 'grel): gdug dang/ chu dang mkha' 'gro rkun bo dang/ /gdon dang log 'dren rnams kyis kyang/ /bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ nam yang slob dpon dag gi ni/ /kun tu sems dkrugs mi bya ste/ gal te rmongs pas byed 'gyur na/ /dmyal bar
263b7(rgyud 'grel): nges par 'tshed par nges/ /mnar med la sogs 'jigs rung pa'i/ /dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin pa/ /slob dpon la ni smod pa dag /der ni gnas par yang dag bshad/ /zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las kyang/ /dam tshig sdom pa nyams pa las/ /sangs
264a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /byin gyis brlabs par mi mdzad de/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa/ /phul yang bzhes par mi 'gyur te/ /nad dang dug dang dgra rnams kyis/ /bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro zhe'o//
264a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog las kyang/ /dam tshig 'di las 'das gyur na/ /ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin/ /lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang/ /sgrub pa po dang
264a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bcas/ /de dag las ni snying ring nas/ /snying nas khrag chen drang nas 'thung zhe'o/ /yang de nyid las/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang/ /dam tshig rnam par spangs pa dang/ /gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas/ /bsgrub kyang ci yang ma 'grub
264a4(rgyud 'grel): po zhe'o/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las/ dam tshig 'di las su 'da' dang/ /sdang sems ldan pa de dag ni/ /mgo ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang/ /rdo rje rnams kyis rtag tu 'gems zhe'o/ /yang mtshams med lnga byas pa'i sdig
264a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni bla'i/ /gsang sngags log par spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /gzhan las ni/ dam tshig 'di las su 'da' ba/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum du ni/ /mnar med shin tu mi bzad sogs/ /bcu drug dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur zhe'o/ /ye shes
264a6(rgyud 'grel): grub pa las babs ni/ /dam tshig nyams pa sdug bsngal zhing/ /lus dang de bzhin yid dang ni/ /de'i yon tan nyams 'gyur zhing/ /myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /shi nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ni/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tu/ /myong nas
264a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas la 'pho 'gyur bas/ /gdol pa 'am dman pa'i rigs su skye/ /lkugs par skye 'am yang na 'on par? skye zhe'o/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed ce'o/ /dpal
264b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang po'i rgyud las kyang/ /drag po'i dam tshig mdud rtse dang/ /ma mo rnams kyis rgyas 'debs pas/ /gal te 'das na khyod kyi snying/ /rtag tu 'jigs par byed par 'gyur zhe'o/ /gal te dam tshig 'di las 'das gyur na/ /pha gsod 'gro ba yin
264b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba gang/ /'gro ba der ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas/ /dam tshig nyams na skyon che bas na lus dang srog gi phyir yang mi btang bar bsrung bar bya'o/ /sdom pa dang dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsrung
264b3(rgyud 'grel): ba yang don che ste/ /dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud las kyang/ /'gro ba'i don dang de don du/ /dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas nas/ /bsod nams gtsang sbra las byung gang/ /bsgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po/ /stong phrag brgya yi kha min par
264b4(rgyud 'grel): kha cig gis kyang brjod par mi nus she'o/ /gzhan las ni/ dam tshig sdom pa 'di rnams kun/ /tshul bzhin bsrung dang sgrub pa yis/ /rgyal ba thams cad mnyes gyur nas/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhe'o/ /dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje ste//
264b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin zhe'o/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las kyang/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcas pa yis/ /brtul zhugs dang ni tshul khrims dang/ /spyod pa bzlas pa'i gzhi rnams la/ /gal te gnas na
264b6(rgyud 'grel): de yi tshe/ sngags pas 'di ltar sngags bsgrub po zhe'o/ slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa'i sgrub thabs las/ /sngags pas rnam pa 'di dag gis/ /dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas na/ /tshe 'di nyid rla dngos grub kyis/ /rdo rje gsung nyid thob par
264b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhe'o/ /gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang/ /gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal yang byang chub sems dpar mi 'gyur te/ gsang ba 'dus pa
265a1(rgyud 'grel): la dga' zhing de'i dam tshig la gnas shing bsgrubs na tshe 'di nyid la mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rnam bar snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor te/ /
265a2(rgyud 'grel): lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus nas/ /nga yi snyam pa'i gzi bskyed gzugs/ /rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan na/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa tshe de la/ /ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur zhe'o/ /gzhung gzhan las thabs kyi dam tshig thams cad la spyod cing
265a3(rgyud 'grel): mi nyams par bsrungs la/ /shes rab kyis bsrung du med par shes pa ni rnal 'byor pa mchog ces bya'o/ /gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ rnam par mi rtog las byung ba'i/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
265a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs/ /theg pa mchog 'di bla med pa/ /mchog tu blar gyur sgrub par byed/ /rigs ngan rme sha can la sogs/ /gsod pa don du gnyer ba rnams/ /theg pa bla na med pa yi/ /theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshams med
265a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa yis/ /sems can dag gis bsgrub na 'grub/ /srog gcod pa'i sems can rnams/ /brdzun du smra bar dad pa dang/ /gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang/ /rtag tu 'dod la spyod pa dag /de dag bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur zhe'o//
265a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes grub pa las/ de ltar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /yar ngo'i zla ba ji bzhin du/ /rims kyis yang dag 'phel 'gyur gyis/ /nam yang 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus dman pa la la zhig/ sangs rgyas thob par ma gyur
265a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal bde ba ni/ /skye ba kun tu thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bsod nams ni/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum yod pa rnams/ /de yi ba spu'i khung bu zhes/ /rgyal ba mchog gi rab tu gsungs/ /zhe'o//
265b1(rgyud 'grel): le'u brgyad pa las/ sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig pas/ /rnam pa slu ba med pa'i sems/ /de bas brtan pa bskyed par bya/ /'di byas pa yis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can kun mnyes/ /bdud dang bgegs la sogs
265b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yang/ /glags skabs tshol bar mi byed cing/ /phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ dgyes par rtag tu bsrung bar mdzad ce'o/ /gzhan las ni/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste 'phags pa rnams la phul
265b3(rgyud 'grel): ba bas/ /gang gis dam tshig la yang dag par gnas te 'du 'dzi spangs te dgon pa la gnas nas/ /skad cig tsam ting nge 'dzin gnyis kyi mnyam par gzhag na de gnyis las mnyam par gzhag pa de bsod nams kyi phung po
265b4(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtshan gyis brgyan pa ni gling bzhi la dbang ba'i mthu yod cing chos kyi 'khor lor sgyur to/ /de bzhin du rgyal ba'i sras dam tshig dang sdom pa la yang dag par 
265b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa ni ring por mi thogs par skye ba bdun la sogs pa 'tshang rgya zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed pa yin no/ /yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po ni su'i spyi gtsug na yod pa la
265b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba gang gis kyang bar mi chad do/ /de bzhin du sngags pa gang zhig sdom pa dang dam tshig gis nor bus sgo gsum brgyan pa la bdud la sogs pa gang gis kyang bar du mi chod do/ /yang skyes bu mig dang rkang par ldan pa ni gang 'gro
265b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas su phyin cing dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed do/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig mig dang 'dra ba dang spyod pa'i dam tshig rkang pa dang 'dra ba la brten te ye shes kyi lam srang du zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i nor bu blangs te/ bdag dang
266a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi don lhun gyis grub bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs la sman 'bral bar dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ /de gang gis rnyed pa de ni dug dang nad la sogs pa rtsa ba nas 'byin cing tshe ring ba yang
266a2(rgyud 'grel): 'grub bo/ /de bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyi thugs nor bu rin po che'i nor bu blangs te/ las dang skal ba dang ldan pa gang zhig dam tshig rnams kyi sman thob pas 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i bag chags dang nyon mongs pa'i nad
266a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zhi zhing byang la bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du mi 'chi ba'i tshe yang 'thob bo/ /dper na ded dpon bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang thabs dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te/ rin po che'i gling du phyin te nor bu rin po che
266a4(rgyud 'grel): blangs nas bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs so/ /de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'gro ba 'khor ba las 'don pa'i ded dpon la brten te/ tshul khrims dang dam tshig tu sbyar nas thabs la mkhas pa dang brtson 'grus kyi skya pa bskyod nas//
266a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral te/ dngos grub rnam pa gsum gyi nor bu blangs te/ bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs so/ /de lta bas rnal 'byor pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dag gis dam tshig dang sdom pa
266a6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' dag tshul bzhin bsrungs la/ /rgyud dang sgrub thabs dang mthun par dgongs pa'i gnas su/ /nam lhun gyis grub pa'i bar du/ rdo shing ngam ri dags shi ba'i ro bzhin du gnas te bsgrub par bya'o/ /bdag nyid dran gso rnal 'byor pa la
266a7(rgyud 'grel): phan gdags phyir/ /rgyud dang sgrub thabs dag las dam tshig mdor bsdus pas/ /'phags dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la gnod ste bzod par gsol/ /des ni 'jig rten gsum bcas rdo rje 'dzin thob shog/ dbang pos mtshan ma'i
266b1(rgyud 'grel): yul gyis rtsa na gnas pa'i slob dpon dz+nyA na bo d+his mdzad pa/ las dang po pa'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gupta dang/ lo tsa ba bsod nams rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// //
266b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tri sam+ba ra pra b+hA mA lA nA ma/ bod skad du/ sdom gsum 'od kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam dag zab yangs shes bya'i rgya mtsho las/ /bstan pa'i gru dang bdag blo'i ded dpon gyis/ /mkhyen
266b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dar 'phyar brtse ba'i rlung bskyed nas/ /snga gsum yid bzhin nor bu kho bos blang/ /deng sang bstan pa'i gsham 'di ru/ /sdom pa gsum gyi rnam gzhag la/ /mkhas pa'i rgyu skar 'ga' zhig gis/ /phyogs re'i cha tsam rtags 'gyur mod/ /so sor thar dang byang
266b4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems/ /rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa la/ /'thob tshul gnas tshul gtong ba'i tshul/ /gnyis ldan gsum ldan 'thad pa'i gzhung/ /nyes pa phan yon rim pa dag/ bdag blo nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs las rgyal bar byas te dgod/ gling gsum
266b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes ba bud med kyis/ /rang nyid 'khor ba bsgral don du/ /mkhan slob cho ga tshad ldan las/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar dag tu/ /gnod pa gzhi dang bcas pa las/ /gtso cher lus ngag sdom pa de/ /nyan thos bye brag smra ba'i sdom/ gang zag glang pu
266b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba la/ /sdom pa khal dang 'dra ba zhig /thob pa'i thag pas sprel bar gnas/ /so sor thar pa'i gnas tshul yin/ /bslab pa phul dang shi 'phos dang/ /mtshan nyid dag ni byung ba dang/ /rtsa ba chad dang mtshan 'das las/ /so sor thar
266b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'dul ba gtong/ /gsungs so pham pa spyad pas kyang/ /so sor thar pa'i tshul yin no/ /lha mi la sogs gang rung gis/ /'gro ba ma lus skyob pa'i phyir/ /slob dpon cho ga tshad ldan las/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /smon dang 'jug
267a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdag nyid can/ /lus ngag yid gsum rang don dang/ /gzhan don thabs ma yin las sdom/ /kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi'o/ de nyid snang la rang bzhin med/ /'jig sogs bzhin du sgoms pa las/ /yul dang
267a2(rgyud 'grel): yul can gnyis las grol/ /don dam byang chub sems yin no/ /sems dang sems byung sems bskyed gnyis/ /rang don bza' dang bral bas na/ /nyi ma dang ni 'od zer bzhin/ /de dag gnas pa'i tshul yin no/ /rang don blangs dang nag po yi/ /chos
267a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi la sogs zhugs pa dang/ /'bras bu dag ni thob pa na/ /tsha grang gru bzhin sems bskyed gtong/ /rigs bzhi la sogs gsod nams ldan/ /rang gzhan dgos 'dod phun tshogs don/ /bla ma cho ga tshad ldan las/ /nam mkha' ji srid gnas bar du//
267a4(rgyud 'grel): lhan skyes ye shes brda don sprod/ /rnam rtog dri ma kun las sdom/ /rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal mtshan la/ /rim gnyis yid bzhin nor gyis spras/ /'dod yon lnga yis kun nas mchod/ /dgos 'dod kun gyi
267a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gnas sa/ /rig 'dzin sdom pa'i gnas tshul yin/ /dgos 'dod med do skyon rnams 'byung/ /dpag bsam shing bu 'gyel ba ltar/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung ba na/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa gtong/ /rgyud ni sum brgya pa las ni/ /'khor
267a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po la rjes su gnang/ /rang gi bslab pa dang yang ldan/ /dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa bya/ /gsungs dus kyi 'khor lo las/ /rten ni gsum las dge slong mchog /'bring ni dge tshul yin par 'dod/ /gzhan yang rdo rje rtse mo las/ /gal te
267a7(rgyud 'grel): de ni rab? byung? na/ /sdom pa gsum dang yang dag ldan/ /so so thar dang byang chub sems/ /rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa'o/ /gzhung 'bum pa las 'di skad du/ /rdo yi rigs kyi bye brag bzhu/ /lcags dang zangs dang dngul du 'byung/ /gser
267b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur rtsi yi dngos po yis/ /kun kyang gser du 'gyur pa bzhin/ /rigs can gsum gyi sdom pa yang/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /gsungs pa'i don la 'ga' zhig ni/ /sdom gsum gnas gyur ngo bo gcig/ gong
267b2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rtsa ltung byung ba na/ /'og ma gtong zhes sgrogs pa yod/ /de la cung zhig brtag par bya/ /gsum ldan gsungs pa'i dgongs pa'i don/ /gcig ldan spong ba'am dgongs pa min/ /rigs pas kyang ni shin tu gnod/ /bud med la smod ltung ba yis//
267b3(rgyud 'grel): reg srung sdom ba gtong ngam ci/ /gal te gtod na ha cang thal/ /mkha' la sprin chen 'khrig pa yis/ /sa yi lo tog skam zhes bsgre/ /gzhan yang sdom pa gtong thob rgyu/ /sangs rgyas gsung las gzhan pa yi/ /chog mkhan du byed rigs sam//
267b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang 'gal ba ltag spros la/ /gnas gyur rtsi ba rigs ma yin/ /rigs na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /gang gA'i chu las gyur zhes bsgre/ /des na rang gis brtags la blang/ /sdom gsum ldan zhes gsungs ba de/ /shes rgyud gcig
267b5(rgyud 'grel): la rtsi na ni/ /gcig tu 'dod kyang gsum du 'gyur/ /ldan chos rdzas gzhan tha dad phyir/ /'on te snga phyi la rtsi na/ /gsum ldan zhes pa'i sgra don med/ /'on te sdom gsum rdzas gcig tu/ /shes rgyud gcig la ldan zhe na/ /gtong thob cho ga gcig
267b6(rgyud 'grel): tu 'gyur/ /des na so sor thar ldan pas/ /byang chub mchog gi sems blangs na/ /dang po de ni kun gzhi la/ /bag la nyal ba'i tshul du gnas/ /rig 'dzin sdom pa thob pa na/ /'og ma gnyis ka bag la nyal/ /dper na mkha' la skar ma shar//
267b7(rgyud 'grel): cung zad snang bar byas gyur mod/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba'i tshe/ /skar 'od nyams mod 'jig rten gsal/ /rta mdun tsha zer byung ba na/ /zla ba'i 'od nyams 'jig rten gsal/ /gal te rig pa 'dzin pa yis/ /gdul bya gang la gang don du//
268a1(rgyud 'grel): 'og ma'i sdom pa blangs pa na/ /gong ma zil gyis mi non mod/ /sdom pa tshogs 'thob pa yin/ /mkha' la nyi ma gnas gyur mod/ /rgyu skar 'char ba bkag pa med/ /des thob tshul dang gtong pa'i tshul/ /rang rang
268a2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin du gnas/ /kun gzhi bag chags mang po can/ /yin yang shes rgyud tha dad med/ /'og ma'i ltung ba byung gyur mod/ /gong ma ji srid gnas kyi bar/ /rnam par smin pas gos pa med/ /dper na zla skar nub gyur mod/ /nyi ma mkha' la
268a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi bar/ /cung zad 'grib par byas pa med/ /gong ma'i ltung ba byung ba na/ /'og ma ji ltar gnas gyur kyang/ /cung zad phan gyi skyob mi nus/ /rta bdun tsha zer byung ba na/ /zla skar gnas kyang mun pa'i bag/ gser 'gyur rtsi zhes gsungs
268a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don/ /zil gnon yon tan mchog la dgongs/ /zla skar gnyis kyi 'od zer yang/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas kyi bar/ /nyi ma'i 'od ces kun gyis sgrogs/ /gzhan yang kha cig sdom pa gsum/ /sa chu gru 'dra gzhi rten du/ /'dod
268a5(rgyud 'grel): ces sgrogs pa 'khrul pa yin/ /de yi 'khrul gzhi kho bos bstan/ mkhas pa chen po rta dbyangs dang/ /slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rje sogs/ /sdom gsum de nyid rig pa yis/ /don de ldog pa du mas phye/ /khyab bya khyab byed gsungs pa la/ /
268a6(rgyud 'grel): rten dang brten par byed na 'khrul/ /byang sems sdom pa'i don gcig la/ /phan sgrub sgrub pa'i ldog pa dang/ /gnod spong dgag pa gnyis 'dug mod/ /phan sgrub ngo bo gang yin la/ /gnod pa spong ba khyab pas na/ /khyab bya khyab
268a7(rgyud 'grel): byed rdzas gcig tu/ /ba lang rdzes kyang mi go 'am/ /des na rig 'dzin gcig pu la/ /gsum ldan sbyor ba 'thad ma yin/ /gal te 'thad na 'og ma gnyis/ /cho ga mi dgos skye bar 'gyur/ /sdom gsum cho ga thun mong du
268b1(rgyud 'grel): thug pa chen pos gsungs pa med/ /phrag dog nar 'dod gti mug can/ /rang gzo byed pa su yis khegs/ /mdo rgyud spungs kyang phyogs su 'phen/ /sgra chad byung na gtam gzhan sgyur/ /bstan pa'i byi dor ji ltar bya/ /rig 'dzin sdom pa kho na bas/ /gsum ldan
268b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngags pa'i dgongs pa ni/ /'bras bu'i sgo nas ma yin te/ yin na kun mkhyen mchog dman 'gyur/ /des na lam dus gdul bya'i don/ /gcig dang gsum gyi khyad par dang/ sdom pa rdzas chos gzhan nyams mod/ /gzhan yod pa yi/ khyad par
268b3(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /sdom gsum gang yang mi ldan na/ /lha mi'i lus kyang rnyed par bka' / /nyams na mthong tshes rnams smin gyi/ /rim pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya/ /de las so zar nyams gyur na/ /rang gis rang bslus gnod pa nyung/ /rgyal dang de sras thams cad kyis
268b4(rgyud 'grel): cung zad khrel gyi shin tu min/ /pham pa lci yang bye brag gis/ /lo grangs ngan song gsum du gnas/ /byang sems nyams na 'gro ba kun/ /bslus pas gnod pa shin tu mang/ /rgyal dang de sras thams cad dang/ /'gro ba kun gyis shin tu
268b5(rgyud 'grel): khrel/ /pham pa lci yang bye brag gis/ /bskal pa'i grangs kyis dmyal bar gnas/ /rig 'dzin sdom pa nyams pas ni/ /yid du mi 'od sna tshogs can/ /rgyal dang de sras kun brnyas pas/ /mi 'jig mnar med gnas dag tu/ /sdug bsngal chen po de yis
268b6(rgyud 'grel): myong/ /rtsa ba kun nyams phyal pa dag /gso la nye bar mi brtson na/ /rdo rje dmyal bar de ltung ste/ dmyal ba pham pa thams cad kyis/ /sdug bsngal gcig tu bsdoms pa bas/ /de yi 'bum gyi char mi phod/ /'jig rten 'jig na gzhan du 'pho/ /se
268b7(rgyud 'grel): gol gcig gis phyin par byed/ /sangs rgyas stong gis 'od zer dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i phrin las kun/ /rgyun du mdzad kyang phan mi 'gyur/ /bskal pa ther 'bum la sogs su/ /de ni thon par ma gsungs so/ /so sor thar pa'i phan yon ni//
269a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas skabs lha mi mthar thug ni/ /dgra bcom 'bras bu nges par 'thob/ /byang chub sems kyi phan yon ni/ /gnas skabs bde mang ring mon/ /sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'grub/ /rgyas par mdo sde blta bar byos/ /
269a2(rgyud 'grel): rig 'dzin sdom pa'i phan yon ni/ /gnas skabs kun mkhyen bde longs spyod/ /gal te bsgom pa dang bcas na/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /ma bsgoms gyur kyang ltung med na/ /skye ba bcu drug nyid na'o/ /mkhyen brtse dung phyur ldan
269a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /paN chen blo yi rgya mtsho las/ /sdom gsum nor bu'i phreng ba blangs/ /bdag gzhan 'gro ba ma lus kyi/ /blo gros gtsug lag legs gnas te/ /kun mkhyen dgos 'dod spyod par shog go/ /rgya gar shar phyogs dzA sa ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po
269a4(rgyud 'grel): bi b+hu ti tsan+d+ras mdzad de rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra yA na mU lA pat+ti karma shat+trAM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i las kyi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
269a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje theg pa'i sgor zhugs pa'i ka? rab 'byor pa yis dpyad bya ba/ /las kyi cho ga 'di ltar mdzod/ /spyi ba nyi zla bar stengs su/ /bla ma sangs rgyas bsam byas te/ /rtag tu dran dang gsol gdab bya/ /srog gcod
269a6(rgyud 'grel): brdzun dang ma byin len/ /'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni/ /ci la bab kyang bsrung bar bya/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba ni/ /lus grib bzhin du 'bral mi bya/ /bum pa'i dbang thob gyur nas ni/ /lha dang bzlas pa rnal 'byor dang/ /phyag
269a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal mchod dang sdig bshags dang/ /rjes su yi rang skor dang gsol/ /dge bsngo sdom pa byul ba dang/ /sbyin ba bla ma dran dang chos/ /dam tshig rnam pa bco lnga 'di/ /nyin re thebs re ma byas na/ /zhag gsum 'das na bum dbang gi/ /dam
269b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig nyams pas bshags par bya/ /de yang brgya pa brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas te phyis ni mi nyams bya/ /gsang ba'i dbang thob rnal 'byor pas/ /mi 'chi lnga dang sgron ma lnga/ /rlung dang lta stangs 'khrul 'khor dang/ /tshogs dang gtor ma brtul zhugs dang//
269b2(rgyud 'grel): glu dang gar dang ni ram shu/ /dam tshig rnam pa bcu gcig po/ /zla ba phyed du bral gyur na/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig nyams par gsungs/ /nyams na tshogs 'khor sbyin sreg bya/ /gsum pa'i dbang thob rnal 'byor pas/ /bde ba thig le rtsa gnas dang//
269b3(rgyud 'grel): me 'dzag bde ba skad cig dang/ phyag rgya ma dang sbyor ba dang/ /zla ba gcig bral nyams par gsungs/ /dbang dang sbyin sreg gshags pa bya/ bzhi pa'i dbang thob rnal 'byor pa/ /spang blang rtsol dang dngos dang zhen/ /skad cig skyes kyang nyams pas na/ /mi dmigs bde
269b4(rgyud 'grel): chen spos bral gzhag/ dbang bzhi spyi yi dam tshig ni/ /rgya mtsho'i dkyil du gzings mi bshig/ btsan dug gar ma bza' mi bya/ /'thab khang rtse nas dbab mi bya/ /za ma tog tu sbrul mi gzhug /blangs? dkyis? bsang mi bya/ /g.yos legs gzhan
269b5(rgyud 'grel): la drang mi bya/ /de drug rdo rje dmyal ba'i rgyu/ /rgyal khrims bshig par mi bya zhing/ /chung ma nyams par mi bya'o/ /pha ma btsongs nas rin mi bza' / /me mdag bgam par mi bya'o/ /'di bzhi ngan song gsum gyi rgyu/ /spu gri'i sbrang rtsi bldag
269b6(rgyud 'grel): ma bya/ /g.yos 'gyed bza' ru phyog mi bya/ /sman zos mi gseb sgrag mi bya/ /ri rab rtse nas bsnyil mi bya/ /gnyen la snying rings mi bya'o/ /de lnga sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu/ /ma bu 'bral ba'i las mi bya/ /gdung sas thag pa rgyun mi gcad/ /chu zla
269b7(rgyud 'grel): bden par gzung mi bya/ /sbrang rtsi'i ro la chags mi bya/ /'di bzhi khams gsum 'khor pa'i rgyu/ /dug chu khol mar lus ni/ bkru/ /rtsi dug sbyar ba'i dug mi bldag/ rdza snod seng ge'i zho ma bzho/ /chang rdza'i them bu gtang mi bya/ de bzhi
270a1(rgyud 'grel): byol song phag gi rgyu/ /'dir yang tshe thung dngos grub bgyang/ /mthon po'i kha nas ldang mi bya/ /chags mi gseb bcag mi bya/ /gzhi gzhan la brjod mi bya/ /lam du tsher ma 'gram mi bya/ /'di ni rang ngan sgrub pa'i
270a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu/ /lce ? zas zhim skyur mi bya/ /mdzod phugs? dbral bstan mi bya/ /rkun nor gzhan la bstan mi bya/ /ser ra'i ro tshogs mi bya zhing/ /mi lang ba mi shes min/ /khyi rgod phang du blang mi bya/ /'di drug dngos grub yal ba'i rgyu/ /lha khang
270a3(rgyud 'grel): dud pas mi bdug cing/ /mchod rten bshig par mi bya'o/ /'di gnyis dman pa'i byang chub rgyu/ /me long g.ya' yis mi bsko zhing/ /khab rtse gnyis pas btsam mi bya/ /'di gnyis bdud kyis khyer pa'i rgyu/ /dug gi phyag tshang mi bya zhing/ /stag
270a4(rgyud 'grel): la zhan bu mi bya'o/ /'di gnyis mkha' 'gros za ba'i rgyu/ /nam mkha' chos kyis bsgyur mi bya/ /ri bong rwas phug 'jig mi bya/ /'di gnyis 'khor bar sdod pa'i rgyu/ /myu gu than pas bskur mi bya/ /lcug phrag rtsa dgug breg mi bya/ /'gro ba'i lam sna
