270a5(rgyud 'grel): dgag mi bya/ /'di gsum ngan sor skyur ba'i rgyu/ /mchog la dman par gzung mi bya/ /byams tshig khyad du gsad mi bya/ /dgos pa yal bar deng mi bya/ /'di gsum gtan gyi bar chod yin/ /bde la skur pa gdab mi bya/ /ma la ngan tshig smra
270a6(rgyud 'grel): mi bya/ /bu me sring mo spyo mi bya/ /'di gsum mkha' 'gro 'khrug pa'i rgyu/ /las kyi cho ga 'di rnams las/ /'gal na rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/ /ltung ba chen po byung gyur na/ /dbang rdzogs bdun dang sbyin sreg khri/ /tshogs 'khor brgya rtsa
270a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang ni/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pas bshags/ /ltung ba bzhi bo byung gyur na/ /dbang bskur gcig dang sbyin sreg brgya/ tshogs 'khor bdun dang mchod sbyin gcig/ smre sngags drag pos bshags par bya/ /ltung ba chung du
270b1(rgyud 'grel): byung gyur na/ /lus la tshab ma smre bshags bya/ /maN+Dal gcig dngul bzod gsol bya/ brgya pa bdun nam nyi shu gcig/ bzlas pas de las ldang ba yin/ /ngag la rgyal dang smre bshags bya/ /maN+Dal dbul zhing bzod gsol bya/ /brgya pa brgya rtsa
270b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad dang ni/ /lnga bcu nyer gcig bdun dag dang/ /lan gcig brjod pas 'dag par gsungs/ /yid la 'gyod dang maN+Dal dang/ /brgya pa gong bzhin bzlas pas 'dag/ kun gyi kha skong gtor ma dang/ maN+Dal bdun po rnam dag shis/ /brgya pa
270b3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bzlas par bya/ /yan lag dam tshig ces bya ba/ /sngags med btsan dug bza' mi bya/ /rtsi med ri mo bkru mi bya/ /stobs med ral kha sprad mi bya/ /tshod med zhal ce bcad mi bya/ /dpung? med skyel ma mi bya ste/ /rgyus med sa mkhan mi
270b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /yang rtsal med par 'phyor mi bya/ /dga' ba'i sa ru shags 'gyeng min/ /bye ma'i ril mkhar mi btsig/ rgya mtsho'i gling du yul mi gzung/ /tsan dan nags la me mi 'jug /me tog ldum dar sad mi gsad/ /rgyal po 'bangs kyi g.yog mi
270b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rang gi las la g.yo mi bya/ /rgyal po btsun mo brdeg mi bya/ /'dod la mi ster spang bar bya/ /mi 'dod ster ba spang bar bya/ /lcags sgrog bcing bar mi bya'o/ /byis pa rnams dang 'dris mi bya/ /'gyogs po 'gran bar mi bya'o/ /g.yang lugs rtag tu bgo mi bya/ /stan la 'dug pa
270b6(rgyud 'grel): spang bar bya/ /mtshon cha'i snod kha dam par bya/ /rtag tu mda' ni bsrang bya zhing/ /rtag tu gzhu ni gdung bar bya/ /rtag tu phub gzugs bya ra bya/ /mkhar dpe stod kyin 'obs btsad bya/ /shi ba'i rol yang yang brtag /rang gi srog zon dus drug bya//
270b7(rgyud 'grel): mdor na de la sogs pa yi/ /dam tshig dpag tu med mod kyang/ /rang sems drang por bsrang byas te/ /rtag tu bla ma dran byed cing/ /sgo gsum tho mal ma lus na/ /dam tshig sdom pa thams cad ni/ /gdon mi za bar bsrung bar nges/ /bag yangs chen po ci
271a1(rgyud 'grel): bder sbyod?/ /dam tshig dang sdom pa'i rnam par bshad pa/ rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i las kyi cho ga/ rnal 'byor gyi srog ces bya ba/ bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi
271a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhan po a b+hyA ka ra gupta dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba tsa mi sangs rgyas grags pas klen skad du bsgyur ba'o/ /karma shad twan rdzogs so// (// !/ /'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad ba'i zhen 'og sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so//) // */ /mchod
271a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la 'jug thabs don 'di bstan par bya/ /gang zhig bdag gzhan sdug bsngal spong 'dod cing/ /bde ba 'dod pas dam chos spyad par bya/ /mi rtag chos la bye brag bsam las 'das/ /ci phyir
271a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'di dag mi rtag ste/ snod kyi 'jig rten ri rab lhun po dang/ /gser gyi ri bdun rol mtsho chen po bdun/ /gling bzhi gling phran lcags ri mu khyud yang/ /'jig pa'i dus na bskal pa'i me byung bas/ /thal ba'i lhag ma tsam yang mi lus
271a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ /tha mar chu dang rlung gis 'jig pas na/ /brtan zhing nges pa 'dra ste brtag mi bzod/ /lo zla chos grangs shol ni me thebs pas/ /lo zla 'das shing 'jig pa'i dus dang nye/ /dus bzhi 'khor bsdod pa med pas na/ /dbyar dro skye la dgun
271a6(rgyud 'grel): grang skam pa dang/ /lo legs lo nyes than zhod nges pa med/ /rtsi tog ljon shing lo 'dab rgyas pa 'dra/ /dus kyi drod bral rlung gis mi rtag go /rtag pa lags na ci phyir 'gyur zhing 'gro/ /de la sogs pa mi rtag dgongs nas gdal/ bcud
271a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'jig rten 'di yang mi rtag ste/ /nyin zhag 'das shing shi dang phar phar nye/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gsum gyis rtag tu 'khor/ /skye rga na 'chi rang thag ri mo 'dra/ /'chi bdag bdud ni se bya nya sdod 'dra/ /'jig rten 'di na che chung
271b1(rgyud 'grel): phyug dbul kun/ /'chi bdag bdud kyi lag tu mi 'gro med/ /snga ma shi ba'i mi rnams kun gyis kyang/ /rtag tu re zhing bu dang nor bsags kyang/ /rang ni dge sdig gnyis dang 'grogs te 'gro/ bu nor phyir lus bdag la phan med pas/ /de phyir
271b2(rgyud 'grel): bu nor zas la chags mi bya/ /yod pas dge ba'i las la mi 'bad na/ /de ni 'jig rten 'di yi gter bsrungs yin/ /shes pas dam pa'i chos la mi spyod na/ /brtags pas bcam bu don med glen pa yin/ /de bas nor med dbul lo
271b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen dga' dang/ /bram ze ldan pa phul ba dag la spyod/ /de ni 'jig rten 'di yi gter bsrungs yin/ /shes pas dam pa'i chos la mi spyod na/ /brtags pas bcam bu don med glen ba yin/ /de bas nor med dbul lo bsnyen dga' dang//
271b4(rgyud 'grel): bram ze ldan ba phul bdag la spyed/ /'jig rten 'di yi pha ma bu tsha dang/ /phu nu mdza' shes bran khol nor rnams kun/ /sdug bsngal skal len 'ga' yang mi 'ong ste/ /'chi ba'i phyir ni gcig kyang mi 'ong ngo/ /don de ma rigs na mang po kun/ /
271b5(rgyud 'grel): tsha 'di'i 'khor ba'i nye bshes tshad dag tu/ /sdig pa'i bye brag rnam pa mang po spyod/ /phan med rang ni ngan song gsum du ltung/ /de tsha 'gyod kyang phan med nyon mongs snon/ /tshe 'dir phrad pa'i las mthun nye ba'i rnams/ /'gron po gnas mthun tsam
271b6(rgyud 'grel): ste so sor 'gro/ /sdig dang sdos nas zas dang nor bsags kyang/ /sdig pa'i rnam smin rmongs pa bdag gis khur/ /bsags pa'i nor ni phyir lus bu tshas khyer/ /sbrang bus 'bad de sbrang rtsi bsags pa 'dra/ /de bas longs spyod med cing dbul ba yang//
271b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyu 'bras mi slu chos la yid ches pa/ ?mos pas dag bya dang pa'i yon phul nas/ /dge slong gsel 'byig lta bur gyur pa yod/ /de phyir 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang du blang/ /dad dang tshul khrims gtong dang thos pa dang/ /dri med ngo tsha shes shing khrel
272a1(rgyud 'grel): yod shes rab ni/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun lags par thub pas gsungs/ /dper na nor gyi nang na chog shes pa/ /rab mchog lags par lha mi'i ston pas gsungs/ /kun tu chog shes mdzod cing chog mkhyen na/ /nor mi
272a2(rgyud 'grel): bdog kyang yang dag 'byor par 'gyur/ /bdag la shin tu 'phangs pa'i lus 'di yang/ /gos rnying lam du bor ba bzhin du 'gro/ /da lta sa stengs 'di na gnas pa kun/ /lo brgya tshun ched gcig kyang mi lus so/ /brgya thub 'bum la gcig kyang mi 'byung
272a3(rgyud 'grel): na/ /brgya la srid kyang phal cher yongs 'gyur te/ /mtshan mo nyal bas brgya phyed gnyid dbang du/ /song ste de la dran med shi dang 'dra/ /lhag ma lnga bcu yod du zad kyang ni/ /ra ro nyal dang 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen/ /lnga bcu phyed ni der yang zad
272a4(rgyud 'grel): pas ni/ /legs par dran pa nyi shu rtsa lnga yod/ /de yang rang la dbang byar ma mchis te/ /de ring do nod 'chi 'am rtol med kyi/ /da lta nyid du brtun te 'bad la bya'o/ /tshe 'di zil pa 'dra ste med la khang/ /dbugs ni na bun 'dra ste yal
272a5(rgyud 'grel): la khang/ /lus ni sgyu ma 'dra ste snang la med/ /sems ni glog dang 'dra ste skad cig ma/ /phung po mi rtag 'chi zhing 'gyur ba ste/ /da ra ba'i mdog ni nyon mongs nang kyis 'phrog/ 'chi ba'i srog ni 'chi bdag bdud kyis 'phrog/ dper na chu 'gram g.yang
272a6(rgyud 'grel): sa'i sdong po 'dra/ /ring po mi thogs bya khyi dur ba dang/ /srin bya 'ug pa bya rgod khwa skeg dang/ /khyi ltogs wa dang 'bu sbrang gzan du 'gyur/ /de bzhin sgyu mar mi rtag mi rtogs par/ /phung po 'di yi ched du sdig spyod pa/ /ma rig glen pa nyon mongs
272a7(rgyud 'grel): snying re rje/ /zas nor 'brel pa'i longs spyod 'ja' tshon 'dra/ /rmi lam longs spyod rnyed dang mtshungs pa ste/ de ltar 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pas/ /dam pa'i chos la myur du 'bad par bya'o/ /de bas 'phags pa'i gzugs brnyan mchod
272b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas la/ /mos pa'i dad pas dge la brtson pa ni/ /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i dpe/ /rgyal po gsal thub lta bur gyur pa'o/ /de phyir mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya/ /cis te mi lus thob pa shin tu dka' / /khom ldan mi lus thob
272b2(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa na/ /phyi ma'i phan pa 'di la ma bsgrubs na/ /phyis ni mtho ris thob par ga la 'gyur/ /ngan song skyes nas sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i tshe/ /tshe 'di'i btsan phyug bde bskyid ci la phan/ /snga mar ci spyad dran pas shin tu sdug /de phyir 'khor ba'i chos
272b3(rgyud 'grel): la ma yengs par/ /zhe sdang chen po me ltar 'bar ba la/ /snying rje chen po'i chu yis myur du sod/ /'dod chags ser sna'i mdud pa dam po de/ /chags med sbyin pa chen po'i sems kyis khrol/ /gti mug mun pa chen po'i thibs pa de/ /shes
272b4(rgyud 'grel): rab gsal ba'i sgron me chen po theg/ nyon mongs kun la gnyen po bcug nas ni/ /'khor ba'i chu bo chen po bzhi rnams la/ /brtson 'grus gru btsugs nas ni rgal bar bya/ /do cig yod pas sang phod yod pa bzhin/ /tshe 'di yod pas phyi
272b5(rgyud 'grel): ma yod par nges/ /sang phod lo dang sku tshe slad ma ni/ /gang sngar 'ong ba su la'ang rtol med pas/ /sang phod don du so nam 'bad pa bzhin/ /phyi ma'i don du dam chos spyad par rigs/ /de ring do nub kho na mi 'chi zhes/ /bag med bde bar 'dug
272b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rigs ma yin/ /tshe 'di mi sdod ri gzar chu dang 'dra/ /ring por mi rtag rtswa kha'i zil pa 'dra/ /yang na skye shi chu yi chu bur 'dra/ /'khor bar skye ba shing rta'i 'khor lo 'dra/ /de bas rang gi lus la ma chags par/ /skyabs kyi sbyin pas 'gro
272b7(rgyud 'grel): la phan btags na/ /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i dpe/ /rgyal po shi byin lta bur gyur pa'ang yod/ /mi yi chos lugs legs par spyad pas na/ /mtho ris lha yul bgrod pa thag mi ring/ /mtho ris thar pa'i go 'phang gang yin pa/
273a1(rgyud 'grel): gzegs na thar pa ? man 'dug pas na/ /de bas mi dge bcu spong dge bcu spyod/ /grags pa nyams par 'gyur ba'i chos drug spongs/ /dge la mi skud sdig la mi bstod de/ /'bras bu gang spyod de dang mnyam par
273a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /ngan song sdug bsngal shes kyang mi 'jigs par/ /mi rtag lus la chags nas sdig spyod pa/ /e ma'o rang gis rang brlag snying re rje/ /yi dags byol song sdug bsngal skyi ru bung/ /dmyal khams bco brgyad sdug bsngal ya re cha
273a3(rgyud 'grel): skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal rgyun re zhing/ /phung bo sgyu ma zas nor brnyan ma yin/ /'khrul pa'i gnyen bshes 'khor ba'i bshal thag pas/ /de ring rang dbang yod pa'i mi rnams kyis/ /rang dang 'brel pa'i zas nor gnyen bshes la/ /
273a4(rgyud 'grel): ser snas mi bcing chags sems mi bskyed do/ /sems can rtsa la shugs med la bskul mi bya/ /char ni ha la'i dug bzhin rab tu bsrung/ /gzhan gyi bud med dag la chags mi bya/ /rnam smin med pa'i so nam mi bor zhing/ /gzhan
273a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi nor la brtsig dab chom rkun spang/ /don du lus ngag yid gsum spyod pa gzab/ /mdor na mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga/ /lci bzhi log brgyad kha na ma tho gsum/ /'di spyod ngan song gsum du gdon mi za/ /mi rig sdig
273a6(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon du spyod pa las/ /'gyod pa drag po sems ni bskyed nas su/ /sdig pa 'phro gcad dge ba spyod pa ni/ /'bras bu mtho ris thob par gdon mi za/ /de yang cis mngon ston pa'i bka' las ni/ /dang po rgyal po ma skyes dgra yis su/ /
273a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshams med pa yi sdig pa byas pa las/ /nags kyi drang song dag las sems bskyed nas/ /'gyod pa'i sems kyis 'bras bu thob pa 'dra'o/ /de phyir nges pa'i 'phral bshags dge la spyod/ /gzhan yang dang po kha na ma tho ba'i/ /tshig gis
273b1(rgyud 'grel): skur pa btab ste smad pa las/ /mod la 'gyod pa de bshags pa phul na ni/ /du mo rdo rje lta bur skyes pa'o/ /mdor na gzhan don spyod bar gsungs pa ste/ /bdag phyir gzhan la gnod byas bde bar 'gyur/ /ma rig skye bo rang gi don byed dang/ /ston pa
273b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gzhan gyi don byed gnyis/ /'bras bu che chung khyad par de 'dra bas/ /sems can bkres pas nyen par gyur pa las/ /zas nor lus kyi sgo nas pham 'dogs pa/ /rgyal po shud lo gang ne lta bu ste/ /gzhan don spyad na 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/
273b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag shes nas dge med sdig spyod pa/ /mi shes sdig spyod sdig pa brgya 'gyur che/ /de bas don med ? ma brtson par/ /dge ba'i las la rtag tu spyad par bya/ /rgyu 'bras shes byed rkyen ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen pas/ /de phyir dge
273b4(rgyud 'grel): bshes dam pa btsal bar bya/ /de ni legs pa kun ston nyes pa skyob/ /yang dag lam ston 'bras bu skyed byed pas/ /pha mas mkhan dus kyis dbyar dang 'dra'o/ /de phyir dge bshes dam pa rtag tu bsten/ /chos kyang shes pas mi chog
273b5(rgyud 'grel): spyad ba gces/ /ci yi phyir na chos son ma 'dra/ /chos kyi bdag bshad bdag gis chos ma bshad/ /don rtogs bya phyir dang po mnyan yang dgos/ /nges pa rnyed nas tshig mang bslab mi dgos/ /tshig mi zad phyir nyan pas mthar thug
273b6(rgyud 'grel): med/ /nyan cir 'chad pa spyad thabs bca' phyir yin/ /mi spyod nyan 'chad don chung tshe ri chad/ /gzhan la 'chad pa tshig gi than pa yin/ /gzhan gyi than 'byal rang la mi phan te/ /bro mkhan sgrung mkhan bro sgrung 'chad pa 'dra/ /de ni mi nag
273b7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi lo rgyus mkhan/ /thos pas rgyabs nas rang sems mthul na/ /mkhas kyang phan med slar la 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /thos mad tshig la mkhas pa ne tso 'dra/ /'gro ba gang zhig rang la med pa yi/ /nor bu rin po che yi yon tan dag/ ji snyed brjod
274a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang rang la phan med 'gyur/ /de bzhin chos shes chos dang mi ldan pas/ /spyad thabs che pa'i yon tan ji snyed cig/ brjod kyang rang gi don la phan med 'gyur/ /gzhan yang shes nas dam chos ma spyad na/ /
274a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho'i nang du skom nas shi ba 'dra/ /gzhan yang khe phyir gzhan la chos 'chad pa/ /rin chen rnyed kyang sbrang ba 'dra zhes gsungs/ /dper na sman mkhan nad la ma btang dang/ /dbul mos phyug pa'i nor bgrangs pa dang 'dra/ /lam rgyus
274a3(rgyud 'grel): shes kyang ma phyin 'dra zhes gsungs/ /de bas 'gro ba kun kyang chos la gzung/ /pha ma bu che gnyen 'dun thams cad dang/ /'khor g.yog las kyi 'brel pa thams cad kun/ /gros btab gal gyis bcud de dge la gzung/ /chos
274a4(rgyud 'grel): la chud na byang chub spyod pa yin/ /ge ba nyams chung sdig pa stobs chen dag/ bla med byang chub sems ni ma bskyed par/ /dge ba gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pas/ /'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams shing nyam thag pa'i/ /bdag
274a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan mi bde gsal bar 'dod pa des/ /byang chub sems gnyis rtag tu btang mi bya/ /sdig med dge ba'i sems dang ldan de la/ /bder gshegs rnams kyi sras su dgongs pa dang/ /lha mi nga dgongs pa kun gyis phyag bya'i 'os/ /mdor na
274a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rnam pa gsum dgongs te/ /dang por smon dgos par du 'jug kyang dgos/ /tha mar don de nyid la gnas par bya/ /smon kyang ma zhugs don la ma gnas na/ /yid smon byas pas 'bras bu mi thob pas/ /byang chub spyod pa rlabs
274a7(rgyud 'grel): chen spyad par bya/ /rgyu ni dka' ba dang du ma blangs par/ /'bras bu byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te/ /gang la sbyin par mchog tu btang dga' ba/ /yan lag kun gyi dang po mgo bo yin/ /sbyin par gtong ba rgyal po zla yod yon/ /de
274b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin spyad na byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir 'khor ba'i chos 'di gtan du spang/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la 'jug par bya/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol byin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /sa ni dang po rab tu dga' ba thob/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs
274b2(rgyud 'grel): na/ /gnyis pa dri ma med pa'o sa yang thob/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /gsum pa 'od byed pa yi sa yang thob/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba yi sa yang thob/ /bsam gtan pha rol
274b3(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /lnga pa shin tu spyang ka'i sa yang thob/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /drug pa mngon du gyur pa'i sa yang thob/ /thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa yang thob/ /smon
274b4(rgyud 'grel): lam pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /brgyad pa mi g.yo ba yi sa yang thob/ /stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros sa yang thob/ /yi shes pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi sa yang
274b5(rgyud 'grel): thob/ /'bras bu sku gsum lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs rnams kyis su/ /byang chub mchog tu thugs ni bskyed pa dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa rlabs po che/ /rim par gnas nas 'bras bu thob pa
274b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /de bzhin bdag dang gzhan la phan don du/ /sems bskyed nas ni dge ba gzhung du spyod/ /de ltar dam chos gzhung du spyad pa na/ /nyon mongs 'chi bdag bdud ni 'joms pa yi/ /bdud rtsi mchog nyid kyang ni de yin no/ /de phyir dam chos
274b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhung bzhin spyad par bya/ /chos gzhung mi spyod chos pa'i ming ci yod/ /tshul khrims mi bsrung dge slong ci la zer/ /dam tshig med na sngags pa gang la zer/ /sdig ni chung yang mi brnyas spang bar bya/ /dge ba chung yang dang du blang bar bya/ /mdor
275a1(rgyud 'grel): na tshad med bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhi/ /gzhan don spyad na bdag don chud mi za/ /de phyir sgrib gnyis spangs la tshogs gnyis bsgrub/ /ston pa'i dka' dang don du mthun byed cing/ /chags med dge bar gtong ba'i
275a2(rgyud 'grel): gang zag ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' i rigs can yin pas na/ /de la phrag dog dbang gis sgro skur zhing/ /thabs kyis smod byed 'khor ba'i g.yang sar ltung/ /dge ba'i don la zhugs pa'i gang zag gis/ /nyon mongs 'du 'dzin med
275a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dge gnas ni/ /mtshan mo stod smad dge la gnas nas ni/ /gung la nyal tshe dge dran 'phro la nyal/ /de yis bag chags dge la gnas par 'gyur/ /bag chags rtag par gnas na dang po'i drod/ /yin bas dge ba
275a4(rgyud 'grel): nyams 'og chud de bya/ /zas kyang chags phyir ma yin rgyags phyir min/ /dag rtags bya phyir tshod ni zin par bza' / /rgod dang 'gyod dang gnod sems rmugs pa dang/ /gnyid dang 'dod la 'dun dang the tshom ste/ /sgrib pa lnga
275a5(rgyud 'grel): po 'di dag dge ba'i nor/ /'phrog pa'i chom rkun lags par rig par mdzod/ /ston pa'i bka' la brdzun pa mi mnga' bas/ /the tshom nem nur yid gnyis mi bya'o/ /don la spyad cing tshig phyir mi 'brang ste/ /don ni gser
275a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra tshig ni sgron ma bzhin/ /gser rnyed nas ni sgron ma gdeg mi dgos/ /don la spyad cing bsgoms na rang rig skye/ /tshig phyir nyan cing 'chad pa mang byas kyang/ /rang rig mi skye nyon mongs 'phel ba'i rgyu/ /mdor na theg pa
275a7(rgyud 'grel): kun la blo sbyangs te/ /nges pa gcig la zhugs te mi sgrub par/ /ye rngaM zos nas byang chub 'phrul pa ste/ /des ni 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos kyang rang gi nyams dang spyad cing spyang/ /'bras bu gong ma che la
275b1(rgyud 'grel): gtad byas na/ /nyams kyis mi lcogs bzhin du khas len pa/ /thang stod sdig pa rang gis blangs pa yin/ /theg pa'i grangs ni gcig tu ma nges la/ /theg pa'i khyad par shes rab che chung ste/ /nyams 'og chud par spyad na chud mi za/ /dam chos gzhung du spyod
275b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mi de la/ /dam can kun kyang ma bskul rang bzhin 'go/ /mkhas pa chen po'i mthun nyi shar 'dra/ /'gro ba kun kyang dad cing 'dun pas na/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas kyi dge ba la/ /thun mong dag tu spong len med par bya/ /spong len byas
275b3(rgyud 'grel): na ston pa'i bka' dang 'gal/ /theg chen sgor zhugs gang zag rnams kyis kyang/ /shes rab snying rje gnyis kyis gzhi gzung ste/ /thams cad dbyer med rtog pa shes rab yin/ /kun la bu bzhin byams pa snying rje yin/ /de gnyis mi ldan theg chen
275b4(rgyud 'grel): khas che ba/ /long spyad rgyal po yin zhes zer te brdzun/ /da lta' gang zag sngags kyi sgor zhugs bas/ /gsang sngags zab mo nor rdzas brnyan mar bcongs/ /'khor ba'i bu tsha pho mo khyim thabs byed/ /gsang sngags shes pas bdag phung snying
275b5(rgyud 'grel): re rje/ /des ni tsan dan sol bar 'tshang ba dang/ /gser phye spang phyer 'tshong dang 'dra bar gsungs/ /gzhan yang dad pa can gyi nor blangs nas/ /dge bar ma spyad mi chos nor du spyad/ /'bras bu dag ni rnga mo'i lus su skye/ /de yi nor la nor bdag
275b6(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod bya/ /sbyong ros sdug bsngal nyams su myeng bar 'gyur/ /lcags rdo dngul rdo bzhu ru btub pas na/ /dad pa can gyi nor ni bzhur mi btub/ /tshig tsam ma yin sems kyis mnyam pa nyid/ /rtogs nas klong du gyur cing drod ldan dang//
275b7(rgyud 'grel): chags med dge bar spyod pa'i gang zag gis/ /ma byin blangs nas spyad kyang mi sgrib bo/ /mdor na sngags kyi rtsa ba dam tshig bsrung/ /bya ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig bstan pa ni/ /thun mong bslab pa bzhi po nyams mi bya/ /bla med rnam gsum mchod
276a1(rgyud 'grel): cing bla ma bkur/ /grogs la bdud zhing mi mthun kha zas spang/ /mtshan mar byas shing lha la phul ba yis/ /khrus la brtson pa bskyed cing lus spyod bzang/ /ma nyams bsrungs na rig gsum dngos grub thob/ /rnal 'byor byi pa'i
276a2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bstan ba na/ /spyi yi dam tshig gsum po nyams ma bya/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig drug ni gzhung du bsrung/ /yan lag dam tshig gsum dang ldan bar bya/ /mnyams bsrungs na 'bras bu thob bar 'gyur/ rnal 'byor nang pa'i dam tshig bstan
276a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /dam tshig bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab kyang/ /mdo ru bsdus na rtsa ba gsum du 'dus/ /lus srog skyed pa'i dus gsum pha ma dang/ /ma rig sgo 'byed 'dren ston slob dpon dang/ /dam pas 'brel pa'i grogs mched rnams la ni/ /lus
276a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag yid gsum don dang mthun par bsrung/ /yi dam lha yi ting 'dzin g.yel mi bya/ /de yi sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/ /dam tshig nyams dang ma 'dres snod med la/ /gsang ba'i man ngag spel bar mi bya'o/ /da lta gang zag sngags
276a5(rgyud 'grel): par khas 'chos nas/ /sku'i dam tshig gzhung du mi srung bar/ /pha ma spong rdung bla ma sman mi 'khur/ /phrag dog dbang gis grogs la brtse gdung gcad/ /ngan song gnas su the tshom med par 'gro/ /gsung gi dam tshig gzhung du mi srung bar/ /ting 'dzin
276a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod sgrub 'dzab du rna 'cha' zhing/ /phyag rgyar ma byin zas nor len byed pa'i/ /sngags par khas 'ches 'khor ba'i g.yang sar ltung/ gsang sngags zab mo dgon par mi spyod par/ /snod dang mi ldan nyan mi rnyed thang la/ /bag rtse bcas
276a7(rgyud 'grel): nas man ngag lhug? par bshad/ /thugs kyi dam tshig nyams ba dmyal bar skye/ /gsang sngags gab pa'i don rnams mi rtogs par/ /dam med mi? nag? khal thig kun bsdus nas/ /spas pa'i gsang ba mngon sum 'chol bar spyod//
276b1(rgyud 'grel): bka' dang 'gal bas 'khor ba'i g.yang par ltung/ /dang por dam tshig gzhung du mi srung dang/ /bar du dbang rnams rim par mi nod dang/ /tha mar dka' gzhung bzhin du mi sgrub par/ /sngags bar khas pa ches gang thag snying re rje/ /bza' shing
276b2(rgyud 'grel): ra bar dug gi sdong skyes nas/ /dug des bza' shing byin yang med byed pas/ /bdag pos dug de do ni shes ma thag/ rtsa nas phyung ste myur du med byed ltar/ /gang zhig rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dang/ /'dres nyams 'gyur ba nyes pa'i 'phel 'gyur bas/ /
276b3(rgyud 'grel): don rig nas ni myur du spang par bya/ /dper na 'o ma nyung ngu'i thig pa gcig /rul pas 'o ma kun kyang 'drul pa bzhin/ /dam nyams snod ni de dang ma 'dres na/ /nyams pa de dang de ni 'dra bar gsungs/ /de bas lung gcig chu la'ang mi btung ngo/ /dam
276b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig sa gzhi 'dra ste kun gyi rten/ /dam tshig nor bur 'dra ste 'dod pa 'byung/ /dam tshig mkhar dang 'dra ste 'jigs pa skyob/ /dam tshig gru dang 'dra ste chu bo sgrol/ /mdor na chos kyi rtsa ba dam tshig gsungs/ /phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyis sems
276b5(rgyud 'grel): la 'jog/ rnam smin gzhan ni khad dang rims kyis smin/ /gsang sngags thun mong ma yin rnam smin drag /rgyu mar sprul zhugs bzhin du 'gro'o zhes/ /gsang ba'i rgyad rnams kun las gsal bar 'byung/ /gang zag sngags par khas len
276b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis ni/ /rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gsum/ /dam tshig dbang dang mchod pa'i sgor zhugs nas/ /rang nyid zab mo'i don dang ldan par bya/ /theg pa 'og ma'i sgor zhugs bsrang sdom dang/ /chos spyod byed ba
276b7(rgyud 'grel): mi dgag mi smod do/ /ci phyir chos la spong len phyogs ris dang/ /bzang ngan gnyis su ston pa ma gsungs pas/ /'di ltar snod pa'i chos 'di thams cad la/ /gnyis med mnyam pa chen por rtogs pa ni/ /'bad rtsal ci byas dge par gyur pas na//
277a1(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba phyogs ris med par bya'o/ /da lta'i gang zag theg pa 'og ma pa'i/ /rgyu 'bras don la zhes pa kha cig ni/ /gsang sngags zab mo'i don rnams ma rtogs par/ /sngags kyi stan 'gan chos spyod 'phrigs
277a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong na/ /ban? de log chos spyod cing rtsing chos byed/ /gsang sngags chos min ston pas ma gsungs zer/ /man ngag zab mo'i don la smrar btab pas/ /'bras bu mnar med dmyal ba'i yang gting du/ /skye bar gyur pas rmongs pa snying
277a3(rgyud 'grel): re rje/ /ston pa'i zhal nas ngas par gsungs pa yi/ /man ngag don dam gsang sngags zab mo la/ /bka' slad gzhung bzhin dang du mi len par/ /mtshan nyid chos spyod dag la blo zhen pas/ /bskal pa gsum du sangs rgyas zhal
277a4(rgyud 'grel): mi mthong/ /skal pa chung zhing shes rab zhan pa dang/ /blo ngan don la rmongs pa'i gang zag gis/ /zab mo'i don la ma zhugs skur pa btab/ /rnam smin dpag gis mi lang brjod las 'das/ /gsang sngags zab mo'i don la yid ches
277a5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /lha spyod dam tshig gzhung du ldan pa dang/ /sgrub la shin tu brtson pa'i gang zag ni/ /sangs rgyas sa la the tshom med par 'gro/ skye bo ma rig chos la gzung pa dang/ /chos la chos dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi/ /don du bdag gis yi ge 'di
277a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsams pas/ /kun kyang dang cing don la 'jug par smon/ /zhen log sgron ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon mkhas pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ mahA rA dza bai sh+ra ba na sA d+ha naM/ bod skad
277a7(rgyud 'grel): du/ rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi sgrub thabs/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor gyi dbang phyug rin chen gter mnga' ba/ /gnod sbyin kun gyi nor 'chang kun gyi rje/ /byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal po rnam thos sras/ /dngos grub mchog
277b1(rgyud 'grel): stsol mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngal so dge ba stobs po che/ /sgom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis be con ne'u le bsnams/ /de sgrub cho ga bshad par bya/ /ga pur la sogs lci ba yis/ /sngags brjod sa gzhi legs par byug /tshom
277b2(rgyud 'grel): pu dgur ni me tog 'god/ /dam tshig bdun dang ldan pa yis/ rgyal po'i rten gsum gzugs par bya/ /bdag nyid cho ga rdzogs byas la/ /sngags brgya bcu gsum pa bzlas pa/ /phyogs mtshams sur du gsab? gtor bya/ /snying khar sa bon bsam
277b3(rgyud 'grel): pa las/ /byang phyogs 'od zer rab spros te/ /gnod sbyin bye ba 'bum gyi gtso/ /rgyal po rnam thos spyan drang te/ /mdun du legs par bzhugs par bsam/ /de la gsang gtor nas brtsams te/ /rgyal po 'khor bcas legs par mchod/ /oM
277b4(rgyud 'grel): a mri ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ /de la mchod pa'i yi ge la/ /yi ge gsum dang ldan pa yis/ /so sor legs par sbyar te dbul/ /spyi gtsug lkog ma snying ma yi/ /oM A hUM gis 'od zer gyis/ /rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
277b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zhu stong pa'i rang bzhin bya/ /de nas mdun du brum las ni/ /rin chen khang pa brtsegs par bsgom/ /zur bzhi rim gsum khang brtsegs pa/ /dbus ma'i pho brang gsum brtsegs te/ /rtse mo rin chen nor bus brgyan/ /dra ba
277b6(rgyud 'grel): dra ba phyed pas bskor/ /shar sogs shel dang bai DUrya/ /pad+ma ra ga gser gyi ni/ /ka ba stong phrag bcu yis brgyan/ /de'i phyi rol phyogs 'tshams su/ /bum pa bzang po dpag bsam shing/ /rin chen rdzing bu 'dod 'jo ba/ /brgyad brgyad lnga yis
277b7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu mdzes/ /rin chen 'bar bas yongs su bskor/ /dbus su sa bon yi ge las/ /'od zer sna tshogs rab 'phros nas/ /don byos slar 'dus bai la thim/ /de las rgyal chen 'khor bcas rdzogs/ /rin chen pho brang dam pa dang/ /mi 'jigs
278a1(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i gdan steng na/ /bai las byung ba'i mgon po ni/ /ngal so dge ba stobs po cha/ /g.yas na rin chen rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /g.yon na gter gyi ne le bsnams/ /sku ni gser gyi 'od pas mdzes/ /zhal
278a2(rgyud 'grel): nas rin chen char pa 'bebs/ /thugs rjes phongs pa las sgrol mdzad/ /sku la rin chen rgyan gyis sgras/ /phrag gong g.yas g.yon nyi zlas brgyan/ /nyi ma 'bum gyis gzi mdangs can/ /dbu la rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /gnod
278a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bye ba'i 'khor rnams dang/ /nam mkha' i sprin tshogs bzhin du bsam/ /nam mkha' i mdzod la mnga' mnyes pa/ /sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /de nas rgyal po spyan drangs te/ mgon po kun gshegs dam tshig can
278a4(rgyud 'grel): da lta snyigs ma lnga yi dus/ /mtshams med lnga ni kun spyod cing/ /thams cad nyon mongs 'dam 'byings ser/ /gzigs shing gshegs pa'i gnas ngan yang/ /shAkya seng+ge'i spyan sngar khyod/ /thugs dam gang bzhes de

278a7(rgyud 'grel): gtor nas brtsams te/ /rin chen bdun dang bkra shis brgyad/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis mchod/ /gu gul dud ba dbul zhing bstod/ /de nas thugs kha'i zla ba la/ /sa bon sngags kyis yongs bskor te/ lce rdo rje sbu gur
278b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa spro bsdu ni/ /so so'i thugs kar dmigs la zlas/ /tad ya thA oM hi li ma Ni b+ha dra hi li hi li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ki li ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/ /ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ ku ru ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ /tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tu ru
278b2(rgyud 'grel): tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ su ru su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu ru tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ oM e hya hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha a ba ta ra tiSh+Tha me tsa ya/ tad ya thA bud d+ha ni su te ne/ su ra me na/ su pa de re/ su su sh+ye/ hi li mi li swAhA/ hUM be sh+ra
278b3(rgyud 'grel): man ya swAhA/ 'di brjod bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bcu/ /zla ba yar ngo'i bco lnga la/ /tsandan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas/ de nas rgyal po la dmigs nas/ /a ka ru bsregs sngags bzlas bya/ /'dir ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /
278b4(rgyud 'grel): nyin dang mtshan mo lan drug tu/ /rgyal po la dmigs sngags bzlas na/ /rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyid/ /dpag tshad brgya ni tshun chad du/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsrung bar byed/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing/ /kha na ma
278b5(rgyud 'grel): tho med pa yi/ /zas dang skom dang bca' ba dang/ /nor bu dbyig dang gser gsal bgyid/ /rin po che'i gter la sogs/ /bsod nams tshang med 'grub par 'gyur/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub/ /de la sogs pa la lus
278b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /ngal bar gyur na gshegs su gsol/ /mchod bstod bzod par gsol ba dang/ /dkar gtor gtang la phrin las bcol/ /brum la sogs pa'i snod bskyed la/ /khaM las zhal zas bskyed par bya/ /oM a ka ro mu khaM sarbaM d+harma NaM/
278b7(rgyud 'grel): a dya nud pan nAd twad oM A hUM/ /sangs rgyas kyis spel byas la/ /sngags rgyal bcu gsum pa bzlas bya/ /hUM bai sh+ra ma Na ye i dam ba li ma grih+Na du sa ma ya rak+Shan tu mA ma si ti bra yad tshad/ /ma ma sarba karmA sA d+hu a mo g+ha swAhA
279a1(rgyud 'grel): so so'i sngags la btags la dbul/ /hUM byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam thos sras/ gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes nas kyang/ /bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la/ bu sdug bzhin du bskyang bar mdzod//
279a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag la gnod par sems dpa' yi/ /log par zhugs pa'i sems can kun/ /de'i phru ma gzhom pa dang/ gtan nas brlag pa'i phrin las mdzod/ /bai yig sum cu rtsa gnyis bsring/ /snying kha'i lcags kyu bkrol la
279a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs/ /oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su 'thun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /byang phyogs gnas su gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /dam tshig sems dpa' 'od du bya/ /rgyal po'i gzugs
279a4(rgyud 'grel): brnyan byas pa la/ /rang bzhin rgyal po bkug la bstim zhabs kyis mnan la dbang du bsdu/ /hUM bai sh+ra ma ne ye a nu ra tsa kyu ru hUM/ de ltar rdzogs par byas gyur na/ /rgyal po rnam thos sras bcas kyis/ /'dod pa thams cad

279a6(rgyud 'grel): dge slong 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ //rgya gar skad du/ mahA rA dza bi ru ta ka kar ma kal sA d+ha na/ bod skad du rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi las brtag pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /dpal

279b1(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po gtsor gyur pa'i/ /stong phrag brgya dang gnyis lhag pa'i/ /de bsgrub cho ga bshad par bya/ /dpal ldan khro rgyal rdo rje can/ /sngon 'gro rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ lha sogs gdug pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ /dang por cho

279b3(rgyud 'grel): par dgos/ /khrus byas bsrung ba bdun byas la/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung bde bstan la/ /byang du mngon phyogs 'jug par bya/ /de nyid rigs kyi me tog dang/ /sna tshogs dug phye mi rus phye/ /legs par sbyar ba'i de bzhin spos/ /mi rkang las byung
279b4(rgyud 'grel): mar me gtad/ sa lu dmar po sha lnga sogs/ /gcig tu byas pa'i lha bshos dang/ /mi dang bong bu'i dri chu dang/ /rma bya'i sgro dang ku shar bcas/ /bsang gtor dri'i chu dang ldan/ /sngags rgyal bcu gsum pa bzlas bya/ /phyogs 'tshams kun du bsang
279b5(rgyud 'grel): gtor bya/ /de nas bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa/ /gdong bkrus nas brtsams sgrub thabs gzhung/ bdag nyid cho ga rdzogs byas la/ /yi ge bcu gsum bzlas pa ni/ /'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas byas la/ /snying khar yi ge bsam pa las/ /'od zer

279b7(rgyud 'grel): gong gi mchod pa'i rim pa yis/ /yi ge gsum dang ldan pa rnams/ rgyal po 'khor bcas legs par mchod/ /oM a mri ta kun Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de la mchod pa'i yi ge ni/ /so sor legs par sbyar te dbul/ /spyi gtsug lkog ma snying kha
280a1(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /yi ge gsum gyi 'od zer gyis/ /rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /'od zhu sa bon rang bzhin bya/ de la rang sngags bskor ba dmigs/ /'od kyis gdug pa bcom byas te/ /slar bsdu hUM sogs la thim nas/ rgyal
280a2(rgyud 'grel): chen 'khor bcas yongs su rdzogs/ /de nyid rgyal po chen po ste/ sku mdog sngon po gzi brjid can/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /khro gnyer mche ba cung zhig gtsigs/ /cod pan sbrul mog mchu sder can/ /phrag god g.yas g.yon nyi zlas
280a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can/ /seng+ga'i la sogs 'jigs pas mtshan/ /sku las nam mkha' gang par 'phro/ /g.yas ni rdo rje rab mtshan pa'i/ /dbyug pa ba dan bcas pa 'dzin/ /g.yon pa phyag na sku gdung 'dzin/ /klu rnams gdug pa'i
280a4(rgyud 'grel): rang lus 'chad/ /gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs rnams ni/ /nam mkha' i sprin tshogs bzhin du bsam/ /thugs ka'i sa bon las 'phros pa'i/ /'od kyi rgyal po rnam thos sras/ /'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas ni/ /mdun nas dkyil 'khor dag la
280a5(rgyud 'grel): bstim/ /de nas bsang gtor nas btsams te/ /gong gi sngags kyis mchod pa dbul/ /gong gi gtor ma'i bzhin/ /legs par byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /oM badzra bi ru ra ga ku be ra/ ad ma ka /mahA yak+Sha rA dza/ aSh+Ta nA ga bi ga bir bai sha sarba
280a6(rgyud 'grel): yak+Sha ba ri/ /b+ha ra i daM ba ling grih+NaM du/ sa ma ya rak+Sha du/ ma ma sid+d+hi pra yats+tsha/ ma ma sarba karma sa da a mo ka ma ra ya hUM phaT swAhA/ /yig bcwa lnga sngags la ni/ /brtags te gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /de nas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya/ /gser la
280a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la/ /hUM di khri gyi phyi rol du/ /yi ge bcu gsum bskor bar bya/ /yungs kar dang bcas spyi bor bzhag /bla rtsi ba'i rnam lnga la/ /gos sngon can gyi sngags bzlas te/ mgo lus khyab par byugs la bsrung/ /de nas rten
280b1(rgyud 'grel): 'brel sngags kyis ni/ /lus la go cha dgod par bya/ /spyi bo lkog ma snying kha ru/ kha dog gsum ldan yi ge bsam/ /so sor sngags kyis bskor ba bya/ /thugs khar zla ba la gnas hUM/ /de la sngags kyis yongs bskor te/ /lce la rdo rje spu gu bsam/ /spros?
280b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdu'i sngags kyi bzlas pa ni/ /rgyal po'i thugs kar dmigs la bzlas/ /dal min myur ba ma yin dang/ /gsal min mi gsal ma yin par/ /rtse gcig sems kyi bzlas par bya/ /oM ni lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni mahA yak+Sha rAM dza ku be ra be ru ra Da?
280b3(rgyud 'grel): ga sid d+hi me pra yats+tsha hUM hUM hUM phaT/ 'di rjod bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig /rdzogs nas rmi ltas 'byung ba ste/ /chu bo skams dang sgrub mthong ngam/ dgra khyim nags la me mched mthong/ /sog po srin pos bskor ba yi/ /dbus na gnas pa mthong ba'aM//
280b4(rgyud 'grel): seng+ge'i la sogs gcan zan tshogs/ /mdun 'dus par mthong ba na/ /de nas las sbyar ba rtsam par bya/ /gnas gsum thig le byas nas su/ /gong gi bsrung ba'i cho ga rnams/ bsrungs te byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /dur khod b+ho leb thog tu ni/ /sna tshogs
280b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bris byas la/ /steng du dug dang lan tsha dang/ /khrag dang chu 'gram gnyis kyis/ /rkang rjes sa la sogs pa la/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs sam gdug pa'i gzugs/ /rang gzugs mtshan nyid ldan par bya/ /dgug dang bcing la sogs pa yi//
280b6(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa'i cho ga byas nas ni/ /de la sbyin bsreg brtsam par bya/ /me thab gru gsum thab khung la/ /zur khru re'i chad yod de/ /zabs su khru phyed la sogs la/ /sbyin bsreg cho gar gsungs pa bzhin/ /thab kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /de'i dbus su
280b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten ni/ /dur khrod mtshon ni nag pos bris/ /de'i dbus rdo rje dbyug pa ni/ /ba dan rtse lngas mtshan par bya/ /de'i phyi rol phyogs 'tshams su/ /kha dog nag po sbrul brgyad bri/ /gzhan dag dkyil 'khor phyag mtshan rnams/ /sbyin bsreg 
281a1(rgyud 'grel): cho gar shes par bya/ /tsher ma dug shing khru gang la/ /dbus su zur gsum brtsig byas te/ /mi skra'i skud pas bcings bya yi/ /tsher ma khru gang dbus su gzhag /de nas mngon spyod rdzas rnams bzhag /bseg rdzas
281a2(rgyud 'grel): ling ga gnyis su bya/ /dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang/ /yungs kar chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa/ /rkang rjes sa dang da du ra/ /bra bsron ma mi rus phye/ /byang du mgo bstan shi ba'i skras/ /kun la bsreg pa byas nas ni/ /dug shing tsher ma
281a3(rgyud 'grel): sor brgyad la/ /khrag dang dug chus spags pa yi/ /de yi yam shing dbul bar bya/ /rus phye la sogs mchod pa rnams/ /gong du gsungs pa bzhin du bya/ /de nas me ni spang bya ste/ dbus su rgyal po chen po ni/ /klu dang gnod sbyin
281a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bskor ba'i/ /thams cad rdzogs par bsam par bya/ /rang bzhin rgyal po bkug la bstim/ /sku bstod khra dang 'ug pa dang/ /gcan zan 'jig tshogs spro bar bya/ /rkyed par gnod sbyin 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ mtshon cha sna tshogs
281a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa spro/ /sku smad seng ge'i la sogs pa/ /gcan zan 'jigs pa'i tshogs su spro/ de dag gzugs kyi bsgrub bya dang/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams bkug byas te/ /gong gi ling gar bstim pa dang/ /nam mkha' i dum bur gtubs
281a6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po'i zhal du dbul/ /dug dang khrag la sogs pa ni/ /bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig par/ /gong gis rdzas rnams dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra bai ru ke ku be ra mahA yak+Sha? rA dza/ che ge mo a na la ha na sarba du Sh+TaM na sarba
281a7(rgyud 'grel): b+hasmiM ku ru che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ /des ni sbyin bsreg dbul bar bya/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po'i phyag rgya yis/ /stong phrag cig tu bsreg par bya'o/ /thal ba lan tsha ske tshe dang/ /dug dang khrag gis sprus nas ni/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs ni khru gang
281b1(rgyud 'grel): tshad/ /legs par byas pa'i snying kha ru/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa/ /'khor lo ra'i yi lte bar ni/ /hUM gnyis par la ming bgod de/ /de yi lte ba'i mu khyud la/ /yi ge bcu gsum dgod par bya/ /phyi rol rtsibs ni bcu gnyis la//
281b2(rgyud 'grel): badzra bi ru Da ka mahA yak+Sha ku be ra/ yi ge de la bsgrub bya dang/ /bsang pa'i yi ge gdags par bya/ /mchod pa snying khar gdags par bya/ /dug la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis/ /gzugs la legs par byug par bya/ /de yi steng du rdo leb la/
281b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rgya gram bris nas ni/ /ling ga'i snying khar gzhug par bya/ /de yi steng du mchod rten ni/ /sngon po khru gang tshad du brtsig /bum par rgyal po chen po yis/ /bsad pa'i sngags ni bris te gzhug /slob dpon chen po 'gro bzang snying pos
281b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i rnam thos sras kyi drag byed kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar dbus kyi paN+Di ta chen po te tsa de ba dang bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /rgya gar skad du/ yak+Sha rA dza sA d+ha ni/
281b5(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam dag ye shes dngos rang bzhin/ /skyob pa'i stobs chen la phyag 'tshal/ /bstan pa dam pa'i gnas 'chad pa'i/ /de yi dgos pa
281b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /gnod sbyin kun bdag sgrub thabs bri/ /de la dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i/ /gnas su sdig bshags lan chags sbyangs/ /de nas phan? gnod gang gi las kyang grub cing bdag gir sgrub ste/ stegs bu khru gang ba la
281b7(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gzhal yas khang bris te/ de ru rgyal po sku dmar nag /g.yas pa na mdung dmar ram/ /dbyug to g.yon pa dbyig gi rgyal pa/ dbu cod pan gyi dbus na rin po che yod pa/ /seng ge'i dang spren gyi gdan la bzhugs pa/
282a1(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i phreng bas phyag dang zhabs brgyan pa/ g.yas kyi dpung rgyan rin po che dang seng thos kyis rgyan pa'o/ /g.yas g.yon du dung sa rna buM rna rna gsum/ rna ba che ser ljang dmar ljang/ ljang nag /dkar ljang gsus pa
282a2(rgyud 'grel): ldir ba mdung dmar dang rgyal mtshan dang mdung dang dbyig tho bcas pa dang ne'u le'o/ /mdun du yum rgyal po dang 'thun pa la phyag g.yas pa bum pa/ g.yon bskyang bskum mo/ /de lta bu'i legs par bris pa bzhugs par bya'o/ /de la dar
282a3(rgyud 'grel): ser po'i 'og gi gdugs dar dmar po'i yol ga dkar po'i rgyal mtshan ljang khu dang mthing kha'i ru mtshon bri bar bya'o/ /spros dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa dgram par bya'o/ /de nas dri dang ldan pa'i steng du mchod yon dang
282a4(rgyud 'grel): me tog dang/ spos dang mar me dang dri chu dang lha bshos khru gang ba gcig la snyug ma gtsang ma la rtse mo la rtsi kra ka dang/ snying zhe sha /de'i 'og tu chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan/ /de'i 'og tu rin po che sna lnga/ /spos lnga za 'og dang dar sna dang stag
282a5(rgyud 'grel): ras dang bse'i me long de'i steng du bu mar dang sman sna tshogs dang mar dang thung dang lug dang g.yag snying dang/ dkor cha rnams kyis brgyan te thod du gzhag go /de'i rtsar chad la rin po che dang ldan par bya'o/ /de nas byang du kha bltas
282a6(rgyud 'grel): te stan la 'dug la bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs su bskyed de/ /mchod pa rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ spos la sogs pa rang rang gi sngags kyis rgya che bar byin gyis brlab bo/ /rten gyi dkor cha sogs yongs su gyur pa las rten
282a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams mang zhing mdzes par bya'o/ /cha a yongs su gyur pa las bdud rtsir bya'o/ /de nas rang gi mchod pa dang bstod pa yan chad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ de nas nyams dag la nyid kyis chos skyong ba mnyes par bya ba'i phyir bsnyen pa byas te//
282b1(rgyud 'grel): de la 'jug pa ni/ oM sarba de wa da la ye dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:- e ma ho sa na ka ga nan ta pa ka ra sle dza:- hUM baM ho:- sa ma ya swAhA/ mchod pa'i dus su gdags so zhes brjod pa'i don no/ /thugs ka'i hUM las brjod pa'i nyi zer ltar 'thon nas rgyal po'i thugs
282b2(rgyud 'grel): kar thim pa bas/ des chos skyong ba'i thugs sngon bzhin du g.yos nas gdan seng ge'i shugs kyis rin chen po'i khang pa dang nyid la so sor thim par bsams te stong brjod do/ /deng nas mchod pa dbul te rtsa ba'i sngags sbyar ba dang bcas
282b3(rgyud 'grel): pas dbul te/ oM ni ri ste hUM khaM zhal du'o/ /badzra puShpe hUM swAhA me tog spyi bor ro/ /oM badzra d+hU be hUM swA hAM/ /dri thugs kar ro/ /oM badzra dI be hUM swAhA mar me bdun du'o/ /oM badzra gand+he hUM swAhA/ dri chab bdun du'o/ /oM badzra ni be te hUM
282b4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ lha bshos phyag tu'o/ /dkor cha dang thogs te sngags kyi tshig brjod/ /rang gi lus zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul te nyes pa ma lus pa dang bas mthol zhing rdzas gcig kyang 'jig rten gad bar sprul te/ nyes pa byang zhing rjes su 'thun
282b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshig gis gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas bstod cing bskul ba ni/ /sngon tshe bsang bdag spyan snga ru/ /dam chos bsrung bar zhal bzhes bzhin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gdung 'tshob pa'i/ /sems bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/ /gnod pa'i
282b6(rgyud 'grel): bar chod mang po rnams/ /stobs ldan rgyal chen yab yum dang/ /gnod sbyin pho mo sde brgyad bcas/ /bstan pa bsrung bar gnyed gtad bzhin/ /rdzu 'phrul bye ba sna tshogs kyis/ /gnod pa thams cad rdul du lhog /
282b7(rgyud 'grel): dam bcas las la ma brtson na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sems gyur pa'i/ /rang gi byang sems gnyen por 'gyur/ /de dran byos la las rnams kyis zhes brjod la/ /dam tshig rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bdud rtsi zhal du dbul lo//
283a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas dgongs sngags zhal du thim pas nyid kyis dam tshig de thugs ka nas phyung la bdag la thim pas rgyal po dang dbyer med par bsgom pas brtan par bya'o/ mchod pa rnams stong pa ma lnga stong zhing dbul lo//
283a2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar byas pas nyes pa byang ba'i rtags rim par 'byung ste/ /'khru ba dang/ bskur ba dang dbang bskur ba dang/ sems la dogs pa med pa la sogs pa 'byung ngo/ /de ltar 'bum tsho gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /de de la yid brtan pa dang/
283a3(rgyud 'grel): chang gi nang du sha dang bdud rtsi dang mi rta dangs ma'i khrag blugs la sgrub par bya ste/ /nye bar dgug pa la na mo rad na tra ya yA/ na mo bEe sha ra ma na ye mahA yak+Sha da ku be pa ra mArta ni dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): dza hi dza hi zhes brjod pa'i don ni bdag la rgyal
283a4(rgyud 'grel): po bstims la/ 'khor gnod sbyin pho mo sde brgyad khugs par bkug la drang/ rgyal po yang mdun bzhugs te 'khor dang bcas pa'i dgug pa gnyis ni bsnyen pa'i nyams las rigs par bya'o/ /dgongs pa ni sngags
283a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid dgug bya'i srog yin pa'i nus ba dang ldan pa'i phyir 'khol lo phreng ba lta bu so sor bstim par rab tu dad pas mang po dbul zhing gus pas bdag gir gyur pa'i rtse gcig pa'i bsam gtan gyis bzlas te/ de la ma brten
283a6(rgyud 'grel): na nus pa 'ga' byung yang dbang du mi 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa sngags dang sdom la la dbul lo/ /bzlas pa drug 'bum du bya'o/ /rtags rab sku 'byung ba dang/ 'bring sa dang bar snang la sgra dang 'od 'byung/ /tha ma dmag tshogs dang 'gro
283a7(rgyud 'grel): ba la dbang byed pa'o/ /chod 'phrul ni tha dad do/ /phan pa ni bzlas pa 'di rdzogs pa dang rdzas ci 'byor pa phul la gshegs su gsol/ /rdzas ri rtse la bas?/ /dus kyi mchod pa bya'o/ /des ni chad pa dang phral bar chad pas gnod pa'i//
283b1(rgyud 'grel): byor pa ni sbyar ba'i rim pa nus pa rdzogs pa dang/ khru gang ba'i 'byung khung gyen thur du phyed phyed brtsig /gcig byung la ri khya phag gi bris? pa dur khrod kyi sol bas byugs la/ de'i nang du 'bru sna lnga'i ling ga byas la ming rus pa mchad pa'i rgyu gro ga la
283b2(rgyud 'grel): bris la snying khar bcug la/ ma ra gas gdab sha'i gtor ma dang/ ra ga ta dang bdud rtsi dang lha bshos drug gsum mthing nag go /a nu ru ki pi khi ha su ru pa na khA haM/ ku pe ra tsa na tra khA haM/ da ku pa ra ma ta khA hi zhes dbul zhing btag go /de nas gsum dang
283b3(rgyud 'grel): tshe ba gsum dang pad+ma'i sha khrag la thun sngags la/ dun dun mugs shang ha la ha la/ tsa la tsa la/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hiM hiM/ rbad na rbad na/ rbad pu li rbad/ me sha ya mA ra ya mA ra ya phaT/ zhes zhag bdun bar du ma chad par rdeg go /tha ma brtson dang
283b4(rgyud 'grel): gris btub cing brdung ngo/ /de'i don ni rlung la sngags zhan nas srog gi gnas su thim pas sems 'khrul nas/ /gnod sbyin pho mos sna tshogs bcud bseg cing bzhib par bya'o/ /de nas gzugs kyang mchod par dbul zhing bstabs pa gtor
283b5(rgyud 'grel): ma dug sor du 'phang bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa'i ring lus kyis bshags pa phul la gshegs su gsol/ /las rjes snang ba med par bya/ 'grub na ming dang rjes la btab pa 'byung ngo/ /rgyun du mchod cing bsnyen pa byas na ci
283b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub nges pas dal bar mi gnas so/ /rnal 'byor dge sprod brtan pa yi/ /dngos grub brtan pa'i rgyas bstan phyir/ /stobs ldan rgyal chen nyer sgrub byas/ /mi mthun kun gyi gnyen por shog /rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi gsang ba'i
283b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs slon po dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ mahA rA dza ku bai ra sA d+ha naM nA ma/ /bod skad du/ rgyal po chen po lus ngan po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ ngal sos rgyal po la
284a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por snod ldan gang zag gis/ /gnas rnams shin tu dben pa ru/ /rdo rje 'chang ba bsgrub par bya/ /de nas las rnams myur 'dod nas/ /bka' yi pho nya bsgrub par bya/ /de yang rang rgyud dag dang
284a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /gtso bo 'khor du gnas pa'o/ /thabs ni tshogs bsags tshad med bsgom/ /bsrung ba stong nyid dang nas bya/ pad+ma'i gdan steng hUM las ni/ mchod rten la ni sku bskyed do/ /ljang khu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas na mchod rten
284a3(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa sel/ /g.yon na nor ldan ne'u le 'dzin/ /rang bzhin gnas pa spyan drangs la/ /dbang skur byin brlabs tshul bzhin bya/ /mchod pa rnam lnga phul nas ni/ /bstod pa 'di dag brjod par bya/ /bstan bsrungs rgyal po chen po ni/ /mchod
284a4(rgyud 'grel): rten gyis ni don rnams bsgrub/ /rin chen ne'u le bsnams nas ni/ /dgos 'dod ster ba'i ljang khu bstod/ /bskyed rims rdzogs nas bzlas pa bya/ /sems dpa' sum brtseg ldan pa la/ /'od zer spro bsdu 'khor lo'i tshul/ /sgrub pa'i dus spro bsdu
284a5(rgyud 'grel): spang/ /dgug sogs man ngag bzhin du bya/ /rtags ma byung bar 'phro mi gcad/ sngags ni oM nI lam ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM bai sh+ra nA ma ye yak+ShA d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/ dam tshig brtan zhing gtor ma
284a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin/ /de nas rang rgyud sgrub 'dod na/ /gtso bo 'khor du bcas pa yang/ /tshogs bsags la sogs gong ma ltar/ /'khor lo chen po'i lte bar gtso/ /mdun du rgyal pa bskyed par bya/ /bka' sgo la sogs las dang sbyar/ /dgug
284a7(rgyud 'grel): dang gsad la sogs pa yi/ /bsgrub pa ci rigs shes bya ste/ 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba dag tu shes/ /rnal 'byor sgrub par byed 'dod na/ /gnod sbyin g.yas su bskyed byas la/ bka' bsgo rgyal pos bya bar rigs/ /klu rgyal g.yon
284b1(rgyud 'grel): du bkol ba'i phyir/ /bde gshegs sprul pa sgrub 'dod na/ /mdun nam g.yon du pad+ma la/ /cho ga gsum mam skad cig las/ /sku mdog dkar po sprul zhags can/ /de 'dra'i klu rgyal spyan drangs bstim/ /mchod bstod gang 'dod bzlas pa bya//
284b2(rgyud 'grel): dam la ma thogs klu rnams ni/ /sgrub pa po la bar chod byed/ /dang po zhi bas gdul bar bya/ /ma nyan drag po'i las rnams brtsam/ /gsod na dngos su gzugs brnyan gzhug /dgug la bsad sngags shes par bya/ /khro bo 'am yang na
284b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha yis/ /lus rnams gtub cing bsad par bya/ /yang na sbyin bsreg rnams kyang bya/ /yang na 'khrul 'khor sbyor bar bya/ /yang na ma mo rnams kyang bskul/ /gnod na gro ga rnams la ni/ gzugs bri 'od zer rnams kyis
284b4(rgyud 'grel): bgug? /de nas zhing chen nang du gzhug /kha dgab mtshon bcing thal bas dgang/ /yang na pha bong dug la sogs/ /gong ma bzhin du shes par bya/ /bskrad sogs gzhan yang man ngag sbyar/ /rgyal po chen po lus ngan po'i bsgrub thabs/
284b5(rgyud 'grel): grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //sgra pa chen po rgyal ba'i snyan la legs par zhus zhing/ /bstan bcos kyi skad cung zad shes pa'i lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi
284b6(rgyud 'grel): ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal? thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur ba'o/ /sa steng nyi zla ltar gyur cig/ //rgya gar skad du/ bai sh+ra bA Ni swa d+hA naM nA ma bod skad du/ rnam thos sras kyi sgrub pa'i thabs
284b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mang/ /'gro ba kun gyi don gzigs nas/ /drang srong rnams mang thos pa dang/ /lha mo dpal tshul bzang mo yi/ /sras su smon lam btab pa
285a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /lha rnams 'byor ba'i 'dod pa yis/ /lha rnams kyis ni phyag byas pa'i/ /bcom ldan lha'i lha zhes bstod/ /de'i sgrub thabs brtsam par bya/ /brum las
285a2(rgyud 'grel): skyed pa'i 'khor lo las/ /drod mdza' da ro lnga bas brgyan/ /steng du rjes 'jug dbyangs dang ldan/ /'od zer 'phro 'dus 'gro don mdzad pa yi/ rang gi phyag mtshan las skyes gtso bo ni/ /phyag na rdo rje ljang ser 'gying bcas bri/ /bsod
285a3(rgyud 'grel): nams tshogs bdun dam stong nyid las/ /skyes pa'i rang bzhin sku gsung thugs pa po/ /yes shes sems dpa' gzhug dang dbang bskur dang/ /gnas gsum byin brlabs dbang drug rdo rje bskyed/ /rdo rje dril bu rgyan rnams bcu dang
285a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /'od zer spro bsdus khams gsum lhar bskyed nas/ /gsal byed oM dang chu'i yi ge dang/ gsum pa me'i bu dang yang dag ldan/ /lnga pa'i thog ma bzhi pa'i tha ma na/ /nga ro bzhi pa yin mnan pa la/ gtum po chen po rungs
285a5(rgyud 'grel): tshigs mnan/ /hUM gnyis phaT dang ldan pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /dus rnams kun tu gtso bo'i thugs kar bkor/ /rgyun mi 'chad par rtse gcig yid kyi bzlas/ /de'i mdun du b+hUM las ni/ /rin chen khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom/ shar du shel
285a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis ka bas brgyan/ /lho ru rin chen baiDUrya/ nub tu pad+ma ra ga ste/ byang du gser gyi ka ba mdzes/ /zur bzhi rim gsum khang brtsegs dgu /dbus ma'i pho brang sum rtseg ni/ /rtse mo rin chen nor bu bzang/ /rnam pa bcu yis spras
285a7(rgyud 'grel): pa po/ /de dbus 'jig byed yi ge las/ /seng ge'i stan la legs bzhugs pa/ /ngal so dge ba'i lag pa na/ /g.yas na rin chen rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /g.yon na gter gyi ne'u le bsam/ /rin chen cod pan rna rgyan dang/
285b1(rgyud 'grel): mgul brgyan ni do shal dang/ /dpung brgyan dang ni lag gdub ces/ /ska rags phreng ba do shal can/ /nying lag brgyan gyis rnam par mdzes/ /gsus khyim che ba skyil krungs bzhugs/ /bum pa bzang po rnam brgyad dang/ /dpag bsam
285b2(rgyud 'grel): shing dang rin chen shing/ /rdzing bu bzang po brgyan mdzes pa/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i ra bas bskor/ /de'i dbus na mgon po ni/ /nam mkha' mdzod kyis ting 'dzin gyis/ /rin chen bdun gyi char ba 'bebs/ /de nas rgyal po spyan drangs te/ /mgon
285b3(rgyud 'grel): po kun gshegs thugs rje can/ /da lta snyigs ma lnga'i dus/ /thams cad nyon mongs 'dam bying bar/ /gzigs shing gshegs pa'i gnas ngan yang/ /shAkya seng ge'i spyan sngar khyed/ /thugs dam gang bzhes de dgongs la/ /'dren pa'i stan
285b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bsrung ba dang/ /sems can kun la phan slad du/ /byang phyogs gnas na bzhugs pa rnams/ /sems can don phyir gshegs su gsol/ spyan drangs nas ni mchod pa dbul/ /dbang bskur nas ni nam bza' gsol/ /rin chen bdun dang
285b5(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis brgyad/ /phyag tu phul la dngos grub blang/ /bza' btung 'dod yon la sogs pa/ /rtag rten lha la dbul bar bgyi/ /snying po chu'i yi ge la/ /dbyangs yig bcu gnyis pa yis brgyan/ /mig btsums sum cu rtsa gnyis bsrid//
285b6(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i snying po ni/ /oM be sh+ra ba na ye swAhA/ /'bum phrag gcig gis mkha' la g.yo/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyis sa rnams g.yo/ /'bum phrag gsum gyis phyogs rnams bsregs/ /'bum phrag bzhi yis bza' btung 'thob/ /'bum phrag lnga
285b7(rgyud 'grel): yis nor dang ldan/ /'bum phrag drug gis 'khor mang snyed/ /'bum phrag bdun gyis rigs rgyud 'phel/ /'bum phrag brgyad kyi tshe 'phel zhing/ /dgus ni bcud len sman rnams rnyed/ /bcu yis mngon par shes pa 'thog
286a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol tshe bzod par gsol/ /smon lam gdab cing 'phrin las bcol/ /yang phyis 'byon par gsol ba gdab/ /sna tshogs rab tu sgrub rgyud dang/ /gar mkhan mchog gis rgyud las ni/ /phan pa'i yan
286a2(rgyud 'grel): lag gces pa bsdus/ /'gro kun gnas srung thob par shog /slob dpon shu ram ga bar mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta he? dza da ba dang lots+tsha ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /dang por
286a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid yi dam gyi lhar bskyed la/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam thos sras seng ge la bcibs pa/ mdog ser po lag na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'bar ba thogs pa/ /gnod sbyin gyi bdag po brgyad kyis bskor ba/ mdun na rmugs 'dzin
286a4(rgyud 'grel): rin po che thogs pa ser po/ /g.yas su gang ba bzang po bum pa thogs pa ser po/ /rgyab tu nor bu bzang po rin po chen po 'bar ba thogs pa dkar po/ /g.yon du rta bdag ku be ra lag na ral gri thogs pa nag po gos sngon po can/ /mtshams
286a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhir yang dag shes ser po lag na ral gri thogs pa/ /'brog gnas lag na mdung thogs pa nag po/ /lnga rtsen ser skya lag na khang bu brtsegs pa bsnams pa/ tsi bi kun d+ha li lag na ral gri dang phub thogs pa dkar po/ /de rnams rta
286a6(rgyud 'grel): la bcibs pa/ /'khor bye ba bye bas bskor ba lag na mtshon cha phyar ba bsams te/ gu gul gyi dung pa'am/ 'bras kyi phye'i dud pa gtang la/ /dung dang rnga brdungs te spyan drang bar bya'o/ /oM bi sh+ra ba Na sa pa ri ba ra badzras sa ma ya dza:-
286a7(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:- oM bai swAhA/ de bdun du byon pa'i rtags snying 'dar ba dang mgo sbrid pa dang grags la babs pa dang/ /mthong ba na bdug pa dang/ me tog dang/ gtor ma byin la/ 'phrin las bcol nas/ gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /sgrol ma'i
286b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcas la/ oM swa b+ha ba pi shud d+ha:- sarba d+harma swa b+hA ba bi shud d+ho haM zhes brjod pas stong par bsam/ de la gtor ma'i snod rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam bsams la/ de'i nang du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya pa bsams
286b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ oM A hUM/ gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la/ oM A ka ro zhes bya ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas la/ kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyis bcus par bsams par bya'o/ /de la bsngo ba ni/ oM bai sh+ra ba nA ye swAhA/ oM dzaM b+ha lA ye swAhA/ oM puN+Na b+ha
286b3(rgyud 'grel): dra ye swAhA/ oM ma Ni b+ha dra ye swAhA/ oM ku be rA ye swAhA/ oM saM pra dza Na ye swAhA/ oM gu ha ta nA ye swAhA/ oM pan tsi kA ye swAhA/ oM tsi pi kun DA lI ye swAhA/ de rnams la zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi 'phrin las bcol la/ snying kha'i lcags
286b4(rgyud 'grel): kyu dkrol/ oM bai zhes yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chad du gdon/ ner b+har tsa na bsreg pa bslab/ bar bar du gtor ma rgya chen po btang/ bai sh+ra ba na pa'i rtog pa rdzogs so// //bstod pa ni byang phyogs skyong
286b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyal chen rnam thos sras/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /'jig rten skyong pa grags dang ldan/ snga po che la stobs po che/ /pha rol dgra rnams 'joms par byed/ /gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan
286b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag la/ /mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal/ /byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam thos sras/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' nyan dam tshig can/ /rig pas byin
286b7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs nam mkha' i mthas klas pa'i/ /'dod yon lnga bcas gtor ma phul ba bzhes/ /sras dang btsun mo gnyen dang dmag dpung bcas/ /'di dag dgongs shing 'go bar gyur nas kyang/ /sngon gyi thugs dam 'phrin las ma bsnyel bar/ /
287a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi 'phrin las 'bras bu mdzod// //dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/ /zla ba yar ngo'i bcwa lnga la/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thun mong ma
287a2(rgyud 'grel): yin mchod pa ste/ /gang gis bdug pa tsam gyis ni/ /dngos grub myur du thob byed pa'i/ /sgrub pos bdug spos bdug pa ni/ /brtul shugs 'dzin pas 'di ltar bya/ /'bras dkar btags pa'i phye ma ni/ /sa rdza ra rdza dag dang ni/ /ga bur
287a3(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan dkar dmar dang/ /cha mnyams nas ni de dag bsras/ /a ka ru nag gis bsgos nas/ /'be ta dkar mo'i char rgyun gyis/ /rnam par sbrus nas rab sngags te/ /rtsa ba'i rig pa gang de la/ dbab pa'i gsang sngags rab tu sbyar/ /
287a4(rgyud 'grel): stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni/ /dngos grub phyir ni rdzas de yis/ /de nas mkhas pas ri lu bya/ /gang zhig mchod pa'i dus su ni/ /sems kyi dbang phyug ting 'dzin gyis/ /rnam par sbyangs pa'i sa gzhi la/ /rten sogs dgram par byas
287a5(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /cho gas gter bdag mdun bkug nas/ /rdo rje can gyi bdug pa dbul/ /gser swo mdzes pa'i snod du ni/ /tsan dan la sogs 'dag me la/ /sngar bshad pa'i ri lu bsreg /des ni rten la 'dug par bya/ /sbyor des skyob pa
287a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes gyur nas/ /gnyer rnams de'i mod la ster/ /gal te da ltar ma gyur na/ gter bdag nyams par gdon mi za/ /'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ /gsang ba'i gnas su spyad par bya/ /bdug spos kyi sbyor ba'o/ /de nas dam tshig bshad bya ba
287a7(rgyud 'grel): rtag par khrus dang gtsang sbra bya/ /rgyal dril la sogs rol mo'i sgra/ /sna tshogs me tog dri ldan dang/ /sna tshogs 'bru'i cha na dang bshos/ /mdzes pa'i dar snas btags mchod bya/ /chad rnams dbul bar mi bya ste/ /sha ni brtags
287b1(rgyud 'grel): te dbul bar bya/ /rtag tu sngon po'i gos 'chad zhing/ lung thang 'bras bu'i bgrang phreng bgrang/ /myur 'gro sha yi bza' ba spang/ /nyams shing chag pa'i snod mi bza' / /rtsub cing nag po'i stan mi 'dug /gza' bral mas bstab bza' btung rnams//
287b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa kun du mi spyad do/ /srog bral ba la reg pa spang/ /bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go /de nas rten ni bshad par bya/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag gis/ /gter bdag rten pa'i rten yang ni/ /rnam pa gsum du mkhas pas brtag /phyi rten
287b3(rgyud 'grel): rta mchog rab sngo la/ /mdzes pa'i brgyan brtags mgon la dmigs/ /rtag tu yang ni bcad par bya/ /yang na gzugs legs rab tu gzung/ /gsang rten gro ga'i shu na sogs la/ /gur kum dri bzangs rab ser bas/ /bEe yig bris la sngags
287b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskor/ /rin chen dang bcas rin chen gzugs/ /'bru mchog btags nas ba smos byas la/ /mkhas pas byas te snying po gzhug /tshon byugs nas ni mdun bzhag go /gnyis pa bram ze'i rigs dag gam/ /gzhon nu ma yis legs
287b5(rgyud 'grel): bskal ba'i/ /ras la dri yis rab bskor nas/ gter bdag sku mdog phyag char ldan/ /lugs gnas 'byung ba'i rim pa yis/ /dam tshig ldan pas myur bris la/ /phyi rol shing la sogs rgyan gyis mdzes/ /sngags rigs pas ni mdun 'gram bya/ /
287b6(rgyud 'grel): rten gzugs pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste/ sgrub po gsang bdag phyogs ltas te/ /gtor ma'ang de nyid phyogs su byin/ /gsang rten ne'u le'i glud bur gzhug/ /sngon dmar kha spro rgyun 'chang zhing/ /'bras sogs 'bru rnams 'dor
287b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhug bya/ /gzhan gyis mthong na dngos grub nyams/ /gtor sgrub pa la gsang ba shis/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /nam mkha' mdzod la rnam par rol/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi rtog pa bde byed kyi cho ga sna tshogs pa'i mdzad ces bya
288a1(rgyud 'grel): ba rdzogs so// //panDi ta te dza de ba dang/ lots+tsha ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// (//chos skyong ba'i rgyal po rnam thos sras la bstod pa bzhugs so//) */ /rgya gar skad du
288a2(rgyud 'grel): mahA rA dza d+harmA pA la bai sh+ra ba Na stod tra/ bod skad du/ chos skyong pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras la bstod pa/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha/ /bskal ba mang por rgyal ba'i lam sgrubs nas/ /
288a3(rgyud 'grel): srid shing drungs phyung nyes brgya rtsad bcad de/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i phun tshogs kun brnyes kyang/ /smon lam stobs kyis gnod sbyin tshul 'dzin pas/ /drang srong rnam mang thos pa'i sras gyur nas/ /phongs pa'i ngal bso dbul ba dbugs 'byin pa//
288a4(rgyud 'grel): stobs tshon rgyal ba'i sras la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha dbang drang srong tshogs dang grub pa dang/ /'jig rten mes po seng ge 'phrog byed dang/ /snang byed la sogs lha tshogs thams cad kyang/ /'jig rten bla ma khyod zhabs rtag tu 'dud/ /lha yul
288a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni sa stengs thams cad tu/ /lha'i lha khyod bstod pa mang mod kyang bdag kyang mgon po khyod la gus pa yis/ /yon tan phyogs tsam bstod cing gsol 'debs na/ /gzhan don lhur len skyo ngal med pa yi/ /sgrib med ye shes snyan gyis
288a6(rgyud 'grel): gsan du gsol/ /gnas rabs lcang lo can gyi pho brang na/ /rgyal chen rnam thos sras de gser gyi mdog /dpal ldan rnam mang gter tshogs thugs mnga' ba/ /thub mchog bstan pa skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod sku gser sogs rin chen rgyan
288a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis phyug /bzhin 'dzum spyan rgyas zla ba nya ba 'dra/ /seng ge'i gdan bzhugs mtshan dang dpe byang rdzogs/ /gzi brjid mdza' yas sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal bud shing rnams/ /drang srong mchog gi sngags kyis sreg
288b1(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ theg chen gsung rab seng ge'i sgra dbyangs sgrogs/ /bdag med gnyis ston gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lta ba ngan pa'i khri shing dra ba rnams/ /dri med ye shes blo gros rdo rje yis/ /spros pa kun bcad shes bya kun rtogs pa'i/ /chags thogs mi mnga' i?
288b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin dbang po'i phrag gong g.yas g.yon na/ /thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i 'od shar bas/ /'jig rten gsum dang dus gsum sa lir gzigs/ /shes rab spyan ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal srid 'khor los sgyur
288b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbu rgyan mtho/ /thams cad zil gnon mdzes pa'i dar dbyangs 'dzin/ /yon tan rgyas mdzad na bza' ser khra gsol/ /chos kyi rgyal srid brnyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag g.yas rin chen dbyug pas dbul ba 'joms/ /dgongs
288b4(rgyud 'grel): ba kun bsgrub g.yon pa ne'u le 'dzin/ /spyi gtsug nor bus nor gyi char 'bebs pa/ /dpal ldan bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'das kyang 'jig rten tshul ston pa/ /gnod sbyin dbang po 'khor lo sgyur ba'i gzugs/ /ting 'dzin
288b5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i mdzod kyis 'gro ba kun/ /ci 'dod re ba skong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba gcig kyang yal bar mi 'dor med/ /nang kyis nyen pa'i bu sdug ma bzhin du/ /dman la rjes brtse 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster/ /'phongs pa bzlog mdzad khyod la phyag
288b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /srid na bdag cag nyon mongs tshom kun gyis/ /bcom nas 'phags nor phrogs te sdug bsngal ba/ mgon po khyod dran tsam gyis zhi byed pa/ /pha rol dpung 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam mang yon tan ldan pa'i sras rnams dang//
288b7(rgyud 'grel): pho nya las mkhan sbrul ba'i tshogs rnams ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs ldan sna tshogs mtshan ma 'dzin/ /sna tshogs 'phrin las mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po yon tan dran can gyis mnyes pa/ /khyod ltar gzhan la brtse ba 'di na med/ /de phyir bsod
289a1(rgyud 'grel): nams mi ldan rab bkren pa/ /bdag gis sgo gsum spyod pa gzhan spangs nas/ /bcom ldan 'bad pa'i sgo nas btsal btsal nas/ /sgo gsum dang bas rtag tu dran byed cing/ /mchod pa sbyar bas lus kyang dug po
289a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rtag par ngag tu khyod sngags brtson bar zlas/ /skad cig kyang ni khyod sku brjed mi gyur/ /sdom gnas dam tshig tshogs dang 'gal ma bgyis/ /de ltar byang chub grogs su khyod brten nas/ /tshe rabs kun du thugs rjes bzung du gsol//
289a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag bkren 'bad bas mchod pa bshams byas pas/ /bdag gi don slad 'di dag mi bzhes sam/ /mgon po'i thugs dang 'gal ba bshags bgyid na/ /thugs rje can khyod tshangs pa mi stsol lam/ /kho bo dbul phongs sdug bsngal
289a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis gdungs la/ /pad ltar yangs ba'i spyan gyis mi gzigs sam/ /phongs pas 'o dod 'bod cing gsol 'debs na/ /kun mkhyen sgrib med snyan gyis mi gsan nam/ /bdag gdong mchi mas g.yogs shing sdug bsngal ba/ /brtser ldan shes
289a5(rgyud 'grel): rab spyan gyis mi gzigs sam/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs me yis rgyu bsregs pa/ /skyon bral dag pa'i thugs kyis ma dgongs sam/ /bar chad bgegs dang dgra tshogs 'di dag kun/ /bde chen dpa' pa'i stobs kyis mi 'joms sam//
289a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sgrub pa'i grogs su gsol 'debs na/ /thar lam 'dren pa'i ded dpon mi mdzad dam/ /tshul bzhin bsgrubs kyang grub pa mi ster na/ /sngon gyi dam bcas blo de ma nyams sam/ /gal te mgon khyod tshe 'dir 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ bdag
289a7(rgyud 'grel): la sngon gyi smon lam 'brel med bas/ /de phyir nyid kyis bdag la mi dgongs na/ /thugs rjes dgongs ba'i lha gzhan gang yin mos/ /kye ma'o bcom ldan srid 'joms thugs rje yi/ /sprin chen mnga' ba khyod rten gyur kyang/ /sdug por?
289b1(rgyud 'grel): bzod dka' i tsha bas gdungs gyur kyang/ /zhi ma gyur na 'di rgyu ci zhig lags/ /sems can rnams pa sna tshogs gang dang gang/ /de kun sman slad nor bu rin po che/ /sna tshogs gter gyi char pa 'bebs zhes kyang/ /phongs pa bdag la thigs tsam bab ma
289b2(rgyud 'grel): myong/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang lhan cig mun 'khyams bzhin/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid mgon khyod brten bzhin du/ /sdug phongs me yis bdag gi rgyud gdungs na/ /khyod kyi thugs rje che ba gang du thal/ /'jig rten skyong ba khyod zhal blta 'dod
289b3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /'khor bcas rtag bar mngon du bsgoms byas kyang/ /khyod sku phyogs gcig kyang ni mngon ma gyur/ /'gro don mdzad pa'i sku mchog med dam ci/ /bum bzang yid bzhin nor dang dpag bsams shing/ /de dag gis kyang 'gro ba'i re skor na/
289b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod blo bskal pa mang por skyed bskyed pa'i/ /gzhan don thugs rje'i rgyun de gang du thal/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i dbang phyug rnam thos bu/ /ngal bso dge ba'i stobs zhes khyod kyi mtshan/ /thos pa tsam mam skad cig dran pas kyang/ /nyes pa kun
289b5(rgyud 'grel): zhi bde dpal rgyas 'gyur na/ /bdag gis yun ring khyod mtshan brjod byas kyang/ /mngon bar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob ma byug/ /gang te bdag cag 'dod lan nyon mongs bcas/ /de phyir khyod kyis grub pa mi ster na/ /nyon mongs zad tshe
289b6(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod ci zhig dgos/ /kun mkhyen thob nas gzhan la gsol ci 'tshal/ /gal te bdag mthus dbul ba ngos 'dor nus na/ /bcom ldan snyan la bzang bgyid mi rigs mod/ /bdag la yus med mgon khyod skyon bras bas/ /'khrug med
289b7(rgyud 'grel): snying rje ? stobs la gsol ba 'debs/ /nad kyis dal gyur phongs pas sems brgyal nas/ /rmi lam tsam du mgon pos ci zhig bstan/ /rab tu skyo bas bla bcol 'di dag rdol/ /bcom ldan thugs rje'i zhags pas gzung du gsol/ /bdag cag rtsol
290a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan sems can skyon mang bas/ /sgron bral khyod la smra bar mi rigs kyang/ /skyabs su chags sdang bral dang mgon khyed la/ /nyams thag dus na 'bod cing ? ma mchis/ /brel zhing phongs pas cho des btab byas kyang/ /'di
290a2(rgyud 'grel): na bdag la gdong sdebs gzhan ma mchis/ /sdug phongs dus na mgon po khyod 'bod na/ /sngon gyi dam bcas blo de rjes dran nas/ /ma byams bu sdug bzhin du 'dir gshegs la/ /mdzes pa'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol/ /dbul
290a3(rgyud 'grel): phongs sdug bsngal nyes pa'i bud shing rnams/ /khyod sngags bzlas pa'i mes ni bsreg par mdzod/ /rtse gcig thugs rjes brtse gdung shugs phyung ste/ /nor gyi dbang phyug gter gyi dngos grub stsol/ /bsod nams bar du gcod pa'i bgegs
290a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ /rnam par sdang bas log zhugs ngag? tshogs kun/ /sde chen 'khor mang g.yog dang pho nyar bcas/ /gnod sbyin dbang po'i stobs kyis bzlog tu gsol/ /de ltar mgon po nyes pa'i tshogs 'joms la/ /bstod cing gsol ba btab
290a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsod nams des/ /gnod pa'i rkyen bral 'dod pa'i 'bras smin nas/ /khyod bzhin phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas thob shog /chos skyong pa'i rgyal po rnam thos sras la bstod cing gnang nas bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa thugs rje'i ba 'jo zhes
290a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i snyan sngags kyi phreng ba slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sto// //panDi ta te dza de ba dang/ lots+tsha ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/
290a7(rgyud 'grel): u tsu shma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'chol pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa 'dzam b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi bskyod pa 'am tha mal snying khar ni/ /a la zla stod nag po gser 'od can/ /las byung rdo rje rtse dgu lte ba la/ zla steng hUM gis 'od
290b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis lha spyan drangs/ /mchod pas mnyes te rang gi snying khar zhugs/ /tshad med bzhi dang byang chub sems bskyed la/ /rdo rje 'od kyis dngos kun lhar bsgyur thim/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): sa spyan drangs der bstim lhar gsal bya/ /sad ma nyi mar nor bdag rgyan
290b2(rgyud 'grel): spras pa/ /nor skyug mgo rkang gnon pa khro bo'i gzugs/ /mi bskyod dbu mdzes thong khrag ne'u le 'dzin/ /klus brgyan thugs khar zla ba sngar bzhin bsam/ /dbu zhal? dpung pa g.yon dang thugs kha dang/ g.yas g.yon brla dang gsang
290b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas byin gnyis la/ /zla bar yig bcu pa gser 'od 'phro/ /'od kyi mchod dang lhar bsgyur nor bsdus skyug /lag mthil paM las gser bum rin chen skyug/ mdzub mo gud mo ming med mthe'u chung dang/ /mthe bong nor 'chad
290b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon yi ge bcu/ /oM in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+ha ma ri swAhA/ oM dzu luM swAhA/ rim bzhin byin gyis brlab dang dbul sngags so/ /phyag dang zhal dang gsang gnas nas phyag/ de nas zhal du dmar ser chu rgyun 'jug/ ma mo radna tra yA ya/ na mo
290b5(rgyud 'grel): ma Ni b+ha dra ya/ mahA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ /oM dzaM b+ha la dza len dra ye swAhA/ lo phyed thun drug chu phul 'byor chen 'grub/ /spogs na hUM mdzad khros pas dug khrag dang/ tsha ba ske tshi mar khu byugs te skam/ ram las khang par gru gsum
290b6(rgyud 'grel): me bsams dbul /sa 'am rdo las 'khyid gang sku gzugs bya/ /lha bstim thab khung gzhug ste mchod par bya/ rtsibs brgyad 'khor lor sku 'am sngags bris te/ /lha bstim dril te rin chen 'bar gzugs bcas/ /sna tshogs rgyun tu zhabs
290b7(rgyud 'grel): nas chu 'dzag pa'i/ /'og tu lha sku ye shes bstim pa bzhugs/ mal logs sngags sam sku bris ye shes gzhug /gzugs brnyan snod nang 'char byas chu dbul lo/ /u tsu shma sgrub pa'i thabs thun mong ma yin pa/ /slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rjes
291a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po da na shi las bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ utsa shma dzi b+hA la sA d+ha na na ma/ bod skad du/ rmugs 'dzin
291a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chol ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal ldan rmugs 'dzin 'chol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig spyan gsum grags pa'i gtsug phud kyi/ /rgyan gyi nor bu la reg zhabs ldan pa/ /thub pa'i gzhon nu des ni thub dbang sras/ /rnams
291a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi phun tshogs mchog mar rgyas mdzad gyur/ /bla med yon tan gnyis med pa'i/ /rin chen grong khyer 'dren pa ste/ /'gro ba rang gi phun tshogs la/ /myur du len 'dod 'di brten bya/ /de la dang po re shig bdag gis dzam b+ha la
291a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par byas nas/ /ma rtogs pa'i de'i bdag nyid du gyur te/ 'gro rnams mngon par mtho ba dang/ nges par legs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas snying gi nang gis bu
291a5(rgyud 'grel): gar thig le dang bral ba'i yi ge A dkar po 'od zer 'phro ba de las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /der hUM yig dbus sngo ba phyi rol kun nas cung zad ser ba/ /'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro ba mgon rgyan du bstan ba ste/ de las bya ba
291a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse dgu ?/ kha dog dang bya ba hUM yig dang 'dra pa ste/ lte ba'i nang du son pa'i zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM de lta bu dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas oM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas tAM yig dang rdo rje dag las
291a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'phros te/ phyogs bcu nas sems can gyi /don mdzad pa'i dzam b+ha la'i gzugs mdza' yas pa rnams mar me blang ba'i tshul gyis spyan drangs nas mdun du de'i sku gcig tu rnam por bsgoms la 'od zer rnams
291b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod pa lngas mchod pa dang/ sdig pa bshags pa nas btang snyoms kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su hUM dang rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams la lus mdza' dag bstims la spros pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyis rang bzhin
291b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba dang/ rdo rje dang/ sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams la oM A(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'di dang 'od zer spros pas bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs lo gzhug par bya'o/ /gzhug pa'i mjug thogs su skad cig gis zla ba la sogs pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das
291b3(rgyud 'grel): rmugs 'dzin 'chol pa gzhon nu lo lnga lon pa lta bu/ mi 'u thung gis rnam pa can/ sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i steng du nor sbyin ser po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ /zhal nas rin po che skyug cing
291b4(rgyud 'grel): gan rkyal du nyal ba'i dpral bar zhabs g.yas pa dang/ rkang pa gnyis kyi steng du g.yon pas mnan pa/ g.yon brkyang gi gom stabs can/ gcer bu rtags mje gyen du bgrang bas gsum pa 'chang ba thugs kar phyag g.yas na thod pa khrag gi
291b5(rgyud 'grel): bkang bo bsnams pa la g.yon du phyogs nas gzigs pa brla g.yon pa la brten pa'i phyag g.yon pas na'u le kha nas 'og tu rin po che'i tshogs skyugs pa bsnams pa snyan ma bug cing gug pa zhal mche pa zla ba lta bu gtsigs pa/ spyan
291b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar la zlum pa/ dprel ba'i dbes su khro gnyer byas pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'greng ba/ dbu la thub pa mi bskyod pa sngon po sa gnon gyi phyag rgya can gyis rgyas btab pa/ /mdza' mas sngon po ta ma la'i lo ma lta bus dbu skra
291b7(rgyud 'grel): bcings ba/ 'jog po dmar pos rna ba dkris pa/ pad+ma chen po pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar bas do shal byas pa/ stobs kyi rgyu ljang khu dur ba lta bus tshangs skur byas pa/ nor rgyas dkar pos skye rags byas pa/ /pad+ma me tog kund+ha ltar mdzes pas
292a1(rgyud 'grel): rkang gdub byas pa/ dung skyong ser pos lag gdub byas pa/ /rigs ldan du ba'i mdog can khra bos dpung rgyan byas pa/ sku mdog sngon po 'od zer ser pa'i tshogs 'phro pa bsgom nas dpral ba dang kha dang dpung pa
292a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon dang snying ga dang rdo rje'i steng dang brla g.yas g.yon dang/ zhabs g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i nang gis rtsa bu gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu rnams la/ oM dzaM b+ha la dza len dra ye swAhA zhes bya ba'i yi ge ser po rnams ni 'od zer
292a3(rgyud 'grel): po can du blta bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la sna'i rlung phyir 'byung ba'i dus su/ oM yig la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams dang/ thugs kha'i hUM dang/ rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phyogs thams cad du spros te reg pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad
292a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems dang sems las byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bor gyur pa rnams rlung 'jug pa'i dus su hUM yig la bcug la sems brtan par byed pa yis brtan par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa rin po
292a5(rgyud 'grel): che sna tshogs pa rnams kyang klu dang ne'u le dang nor sbyin gyi kha rnams su gzhug par bya'o/ /slar rlung 'byung ba na klu la sogs pa rnams kyis mid pa'i rin po che rnams mdun du skyug par bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar yang dang yang du spro ba
292a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bsdu ba la sogs pa byed do/ /de'i rjes su ngal bar gyur na/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra ya mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ /oM dzaM b+ha la dza len dra ye swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags sam/ yang na gong gis sngags yi ge bcu pa
292a7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par bya'o/ /chu sbyin pa'i dus su ni lag pa g.yas pa gan rkya/ gyi dbus su bam yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis lag pa bum pa bzang po lta bur byas la/ lag pa'i rtsa bar oM yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis gdu bu'i rnam pa dang
292b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa dang/ bam yig dbus su dzam dang mdzub mo dang gung mo dang ming med pa dang/ mthe'u chung dang/ mthe bong rnams kyi rtse mo la b+ha la dza len dra yi zhes bya ba'i yi ge rnams rim pa ji lta bar dang/ oM dang baM yig dag gi bar du ya yig dang/
292b2(rgyud 'grel): ya yig gi g.yon dang g.yas ngos dag tu swAhA zhes bya ba'i yi ge dag ste/ oM yig la sogs pa 'di rnams rang rang gi gnas kyi bu ga rnams su zla ba la gnas pa ser po can du bsgoms nas/ lag pa'i nang du me tog chu dang bcas ba kha dang nye bar byas
292b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /oM in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+ha ma ri swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan bdun du mngon par bsngags par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la lag pa brkyang bas sbyin par bya ba'i chu rang gi kha nas zhugs pa dzam yig 'od zer rnams dang/ thugs kar gnas pa'i
292b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang/ hUM yig 'od zer rnams kyis kha dog ser po byas pa rdo rje'i kha nas thon nas lag pa g.yon pa skad cig gis bcom ldan 'das zhal mngon du phyogs par bsgom pa 'am/ /sku gzugs kyi zhal gyi nang du oM dzU swAhA/ zhes
292b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang/ na mo rad na tra yA ya zhes bya ba la sogs kyis lan bdun du dbul bar bya'o/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa lan gcig rjod pas 'bras rngos pa bu ram dang bsres pa la
292b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rnams kyi gtor ma bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o/ /de ltar ji ltar nus pa thun gsum mam/ /thun gcig la rjes su bsgrubs te/ bstod pa dang/ smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la bsgoms pa'i bcom ldan 'das
292b7(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra mu:- zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang smin drug gi zla ba dang dpyid zla ra ba dang/ dpyid zla tha chungs dang/ dbyar zla 'bring po rnams gang yang rung ba'i nya 'am dge ba'i nyi ma gzhan la yang rngo? ma gas pa la skad cig
293a1(rgyud 'grel): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bor bsgrubs te yang dag par mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /bzo bo bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa bzung bas nyin zhag gcig nyis la dpa' bo'i yon gyis sku gzugs byed du gzhug go/
293a2(rgyud 'grel): byas pa la yang bdag nyid la bkod pa bzhin du rim pa ji lta bar bcom ldan 'das gzugs yi ge dgod pa dang bcas pa rnam par sgoms nas chu sbyin pa la sogs pas mnyes par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni man ngag go /de'i tshe ni gshegs
293a3(rgyud 'grel): su gsol bar mi bya ste/ /bcom ldan 'das sku gzugs kyi rnam par rtag tu bzhugs pa la bskur sti dang mchod par bya'o/ /paN+Di ta a b+hya ka ra gu pa tas mdzad pa'i u tsushma dzaM b+ha la sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po
293a4(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta a lang ka de ba dang/ /lots+tsha ba shakya'i dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas spas pas/ chos 'khor shongs ma'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o/ /slad kyis paN+Di ta mahA bi b+hu ti tsan dra dang/ chag lots+tsha ba
293a5(rgyud 'grel): dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing dag par bgyis so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya dzaM b+ha la stong tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa/ /bcom ldan 'das ji b+ha la la phyag
293a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /mchod sbyin brgya pa me lha gdong bzhi dang/ seng ge 'phrog byed nyin mor byed rnams kyis/ /zhabs gnyis ? bco ldan sdug bsngal ba/ /bdag la pad ltar yangs pa'i spyan ras gzigs/ /bcom ldan chab khyer gang
