293a7(rgyud 'grel): gis mnyes 'gyur na/ thugs rje mnga' ya? gzhan gang lags pa gsungs/ /de phyir mchod pa bshams la mi rtsi zhing/ /khyod dang 'dra ba phal cher snyed pa dka' / /brtse bas 'bad pa'i sgo nas btsal btsal nas/ /phongs par gyur pa
293b1(rgyud 'grel): dag la bde mdzad nas/ /kho bo mchi ma dag gis gdong sbags pa/ spyan sngar mchis kyang ci ste gzigs ma lags/ /e ma ho rab tu rgyas pa thugs rje yi/ /gzhu mo mnga' ba khyod lta bzhugs gyur kyang/ /skye tshogs bzlog dka' sdug bsngal
293b2(rgyud 'grel): tshom rkun gyi/ /sde yis rnam par 'joms pa ji ltar lags/ /sems can sman slad nor bu rin po che/ rnam pa sna tshogs dgung 'char 'bebs grag na/ /kho bo khyod nyid gcig pu'i mthar thug pa/ /ci ste thigs spangs yang ni 'babs ma ?/
293b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod bzhugs bzhin du mi yis 'bar ba ltar/ /kho bo phongs pas shin du cher sreg nad/ /khyod kyi lta zhig thugs rje 'jo ba'i ba/ /sa gsum khur du khur ba gang du thal/ bum pa dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi/ /nor bu sems pa dang
293b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan ma lags pa/ /de dag gis kyang sems can phan bgyid na/ /thugs rje'i bdag can bcom ldan smos ci 'tshal/ /gang zhig rmugs 'dzin chu yi bdag po zhes/ /skad cig kyang ni khyod kyi mtshan smos pa/ /de la pad+ma'i 'byung gnas
293b5(rgyud 'grel): legs bzhin du/ /pad rgyas dpal ni 'jug par bgyis pa lags/ /de ltar bcom ldan sred 'joms khyod spyan sngar/ /cho nges btab nas bsod nams 'byam klas pa/ /gang yang de yis skye bo khyod bzhin du/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i
293b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu 'byin par shog /bcom ldan 'das dzaM b+ha la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po btsun pa zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu ta ti sh+rI dz+nya na'i zhal snga nas/ /bod kyi lots+tsha ba la tshab nyi ma grags kyis
293b7(rgyud 'grel): legs par bsgyur ba'o// //na mo u tsushma dza b+ha la pa oM A zhes bya bas spyan drangs la/ /rang gi snying khar A yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ /hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse
294a1(rgyud 'grel): dgu pa de'i dbus su inDa go pa dang mnyam ma'i dza yig las/ /sngar brjod pa'i spyan 'dren pa'i sngags kyis/ dzaM b+ha la'i mgon po rang gis snying khar gzhug ste/ u tsushma byis pa'i gzugs rna ba ma phug pa/ sku
294a2(rgyud 'grel): mdog nag po skra gyen du brdzes pa/ mi lu thung gi rnam pa khro gnyer can/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dbu rgyan can/ phyag g.yon pas rin po che skyug pa'i ne'u le 'dzin pa/ g.yas pas khrag gis bkang pa'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ lho phyogs
294a3(rgyud 'grel): su mgo bstan pa'i gser gyi mdog can/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /nor gter gan skyal du bsgyel ba/ /zhabs gnyis kyis mnan pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba skyug pa'i bdag nyid las/ 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i tshogs 'phro bar bsam/
294a4(rgyud 'grel): u tsushma'i phrag g.yas oM yig las skyes pa'i gdug bu'i/ /baM yig las skyes pa'i bum pa bzang po dang 'dra ba 'bo bzhin po lag pa'i dbus su dzaM yig go /'dzub mo la baM yig go /gung mo la la yig go /srin lag la dza yig go/
294a5(rgyud 'grel): mthe chung la yin yig go /mthe bong la dra yig go /khrig ma la ya yig go /de nas swAhA yig go /'di ni sngags pa'i rim pa'o/ /kha sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la chu skyor sbyin no/ /oM dzluM swAhA chu skyor byin pa'i sngags so/ /oM a in+d+ra
294a6(rgyud 'grel): ya ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swAhA/ lag pa nas kha nas lag par de dben par sbyin no/ /'di ltar snying rjes sems can thams cad phongs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i don du dzaM b+ha la bsgom par bya'o/ /u tsu shmA dzaM b+ha la zhes
294a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i sgrub thabs rgyal po Arya ma tis mdzad pa'o/ /rdzogs so// //dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ arya u tsuSh+ma dzam+b+ha la kriSh+Na sA d+ha ni/ /bod skad du
294b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin 'chol pa nag po'i sgrub thabs/ /rje btsun dzam+b+ha la'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal gyi dbang phyug dbang chen bcu gnas rin chen rnam pa mang ldan pa/ /thabs mang stobs chen dri med thugs rje drang srong lha mo'i sras
294b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur de'i/ sras gcig mtshungs med ma lus srid dang zhi ba'i nor bdag gter chen ni/ /mi'u thung cha byad thod khrag ne le 'dzin mdzad khyod kyis bdag la bsrungs/ /re shig bsgrub pa po dam tshig can gzhan la phan par brtson pas 'phags
294b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ?? ? mi phyed pa'i dang ba thob pas skyabs su song la/ /pad+ma'i mdang ma mchog gi snod dang/ /gnod sbyin mo kun tu rgyug gi lus ling ga chen po'i rdzas dang ldan pas nor bu brtsegs pa lta bu'i gnas su 'dug ste/ thog ma kho nar mi bskyod pa'i rgyal po'i
294b4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga ji lta ba bzhin mnyes par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu de'i nga rgyal gyis bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba byas la/ /rang gi snying khar A las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la gnas pa'i hUM yig nag po gser gyi mdangs can las byung ba'i rdo rje
294b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse dgu pa gyen du langs shing rnam par 'gyur pa'i ngang tshul can/ /dbus kyi rwa rtse rnam par dkar po nor bu'i tog gis mtshan pa dang rwa gzhan gnag cing kun nas dgrad pa'i bar byed pa de nyid kyi lte bar dri ma med pa la hUM yig bEeDUrya'i
294b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'bar bas mtshan pa blta bar bya'o/ /yi ge de'i 'od kyis nam mkha' i dbyings khyab par bkang nas zhing gi dkyil 'khor yongs su spyod pas don gnyis byas te/ /tshur 'dus pa las rje btsun rmugs 'dzin nag po sras dang bcas pa rdul phra rab
294b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi grangs dang mnyam pa spyan drangs la/ /khrus gsol pa sngon du 'gro bas mched pa'i yan lag bcu gsum yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mnyes pa'i 'od kyis phreng ba bdag gi snying la zhugs te bskul ba'i yid kyis tshad med pa bzhi spel zhes
295a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems brtan pa yang dag bgos bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer chen pos brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po mdza' rnam par bcu nas rdo rje sems dpa' ngo bor thim pa dang yang ches 'bas
295a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lus kyang nye bar bsreg nas gzi brjid kyi phung po sgyu ma lta bu'i bdag nyid du bsam mo/ /de'i 'og tu oM A zhes skad gsang stod da bspran? pas ? par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi mgon po byang phyogs kyi mgon tshe la rdo
295a3(rgyud 'grel): rje'i ri pa'i zom nas spyan drangs te/ /kun nas dang zhing si ma la gdung ba'i yid kyi rgyu'i sems dpa' 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba 'bar ba la bstim par bya'o/ /de dag yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das nor gyi dbang phyug/ lha dang klu dang
295a4(rgyud 'grel): mi'i nor thams cad 'dzin pa mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mi'u thung gi cha byad rigs ngan gyi rnam pa rna ba ma phug lhag ma za zhing mi srun pa gsus pa cher 'phyang zhing/ /rab tu brjid pa'i bdag nyid/ /khye'u lo drug lon pa'i
295a5(rgyud 'grel): na tshod can/ /gcer bu mtshan ma 'gred pa/ /zhabs gnyis dor stabs su nye bar gnas pas nor 'dzin ser po kha nas nor bu skyug pa'i mgo /g.yas su rnam par mnan pa/ /mche ba cung zad gtsigs shing/ /ljags rkan phugs su
295a6(rgyud 'grel): nye bar 'dril ba zhal dang spyan sum me'i phung po ltar 'bar zhing/ /spyan kun nas zlum zhing zlog la rnam par gyur pa can/ /dpral ba la rin po che'i mig gsum pa'i gzugs can gyi khro gnyer gyi rim pa dang ldan pa dbu skra dang smin ma
295a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi spu kham pa re re nas gyen du langs shing 'od zer 'phro ba'i me stag thur du 'dzag pa/ phyag g.yas dang g.yon gyis pad ma'i snod ru ti ras bkad pa dang/ ne'u le'i rgyal pa lha dang klu dang mi'o nor bu rin po che'i rigs mi 'dra ba du
295b1(rgyud 'grel): mas khengs par byas pa kha na re chen po'i rgyun snod skyug pa 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi rgyan can/ /klu'i rgyal po mdza' yas dang/ /'jog po dang pad+ma chen po dang stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang dung skyong dang nor rgyas dang
295b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rnams nag po dang dkar po dang ser po dang sngon po dang khra bo dang ser po dang dmar po rnam pa brgyad kyi ko rims ltar thor tshugs dang rna ba dang do shal dang tshangs sku dang dpung ba dang lag pa dang rked pa rkang pa rnams la brgyan pa'o/ /thugs khar zla ba la ji
295b3(rgyud 'grel): skad bshad pa'i snying po can gyi mtshan ma bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i yig bcu'i go cha bgo bar bya ste dpral ba dang zhal dang dpung pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dang thugs kha dang zhabs dang g.yas dang/ g.yon dang chu so dang zhabs bol gong
295b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang g.yon dang grangs bzhin du/ /oM dang dzaM dang b+ha dang la dang dze dang len dang dra dang ye dang swA dang hA rnams kyi yig 'bru rnams zla ba'i gdan dang/ /rdo rje phyed pa la gnas pa nyi ma'i snying po 'bar pa 'am gser gyi mchod sdong
295b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa ltar bsam par bya'o/ /thugs ka'i mi byed yi ge las 'phros phyogs bcu'i 'dren pa kun mchod cing/ /go cha bcur bcas skyob dbang nyid 'phros ma lus 'gro rnams rang 'drar byas/ /na'u le klu dbang nor bdag 'od ldan
295b6(rgyud 'grel): lha klu mi yin nor rnams bsdus?/ /chos cing? pos nye 'grangs gyur btsir? pas de skyugs dngos grub yang yang blang/ /de nas chu sbyin par bya ste/ /lag pa'i mthil du bam ser po las gser gyi bum pa bzang po rin chen sna tshogs skyug pa kha phyir
295b7(rgyud 'grel): bskal? pas yi ge ngam? de nyid kyis mtshan pa blta ba'o/ /bam gi nang du dzaM yig go/ /khrig ma la ni oM mo/ 'dzub mo la ni b+ha'o/ gung mo la ni la'o/ /srin lag la ni dza'o/ mthe'u chung la le'o/ the bong la dra'o/ /nor bu 'ching ba'i gnas su ye'o/ /lag
296a1(rgyud 'grel): mthil gyi lto g.yon du swA de'i g.yas su hA'o/ /thams cad kyang zla ba gang ba gnas shing/ /gser 'od dri ma dang bral ba ltag par 'tsher ba ltar bsam mo/ /de nas yang chu khyor ba gang kha la nye bar tu gas te/ /oM a'i dra
296a2(rgyud 'grel): ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swAhA zhes bya bas sor mo lnga la lan re re dang/ kha dang lag pa byin gyis brlabs pa la gnyis te/ bdun gyis byin gyis brlab bo/ /de'i 'og tu nag po chen po mdzes pa'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa zhig mdun gyi pad+ma rin chen rgyan
296a3(rgyud 'grel): snod du bzhugs te rang gi thugs kha nas ci 'dri ba'i gzugs phyung ste bstims la/ /rin po che'i bum pa rgyan thams cad gyis spras pa yongs su gang ba rgyun mi 'chad pas chu sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ltar bya ste oM dzluM swAhA zhes bya ba rin po ches
296a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa'i lag pa nas zhal du'o/ /zhal nas rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo ru'o/ /des nas slar lag mthil du 'bab pa'i rim pas mthar chu'i bdag po zhal du 'jug par bsam te cho ga de nyid kyis khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad 'khrul pa med par sbyin par
296a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de'i tshe phyag gis mthil gyi bum pa dang ne'u le dang ltos 'gro rnams kyi kha dang sna'i sgo la sogs pa bu ga'i rnam pa thams cad las rin po che'i rigs mi 'dra ba sdug cing yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma'i char chen po phab pas gnas
296a6(rgyud 'grel): khang la sogs pa mdza' dag g.yogs cing nor bar gyur par bsam mo/ /de'i rjes la yi ge bcu pa la mchod pa lnga'i sngags sbyar bas mchod cing/ thun mong dang khyad par gyi sgo nas bstod do/ /sngags de dag nyid kyis gtor ma byin gyis
296a7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs te dbul bar bya'o/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra yA/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye swAhA/ oM dzaM b+ha la dza len tra ye swAhA/ zhes lan bdun nam brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du zlas te ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas
296b1(rgyud 'grel): yang mchod pas gtang rag phul te me tog dbu la bzhag nas yi ge brgya pas lhag chad kha bskangs la rten sbyin po dang chu'i phung srin lag gis reg ste lce la bzhag cing/ chu'i cho gas rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i dngos su dor bar bya'o/ /de ltar zla ba drug
296b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bar ma chad par chu sbyin pa la brtson par byed na/ des ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i 'byor pa thams cad gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug snying po gter bum las/ /
296b3(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyus lcag btab zas nor ster/ /bram ze'i tshangs skyogs lnga tshan lngas/ /bskangs te bcud bsdus dngos grub len/ /rin chen snying po nyi zla dang/ pad+ma rab sbyangs bde chen thob/ /rim bzhin gnod sbyin ne'u le mo/ /thod khrag bur ling sbyor bar
296b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /dbyar dgun ston zla tha chungs dang/ /dpyid zla 'bring po rten bzhengs nas/ 'di nyid rgyal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis dam tshig ye shes mnyam sbyor bya/ /rna ba mnan dang mdangs 'phrog dang/ dgra bo byis pa'i gzugs 'jigs pas/ /rigs
296b5(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'dug pa'i las gsum byed/ khro zhal phrin las bgegs skod yin/ /klu rgyal gdon 'grol char 'bebs byed/ /nor bdag gzir bas nor rnams 'phrog /rig 'dzin dgug dang gter 'byed dang/ /'jigs skyob rkun po bsrung ba nyid/ /bu ster tshe?
296b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bsring ba dang/ /phyug skyod shing gzugs ba dang/ /dbang bskur bkra shis gsol ba dang/ rim bzhin oM nas swAhA'i bar/ 'od dang lhan cig rjes 'gro dang/ /slar bzlogs yi ge bcu yis so/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad khros pa yis/ /tshwa ba drug dang khrag skye tshe/
296b7(rgyud 'grel): mar khu lus bugs pu re ling gdung/ /bdun phrag gcig gis dpogs na 'grub/ /ye a d+he bam swAhA/ snyigs dus sgrubs rnams rab dbul nyen rnams kyis/ /phan 'dod bzhin yang rang gzhan don nyams par/ /mthong nas rmugs 'dzin cho ga
297a1(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin bris/ /dge bas kun la 'dod sbyin gter gyur cig /dpal rmugs 'dzin 'chol pa nag po'i sgrub thabs/ /gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba sbas pa'i bum pa zhes bya ba slob dpon nor sbyin gyis mdzad pa
297a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so/ /dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya b+ha dra dang bod kyi lots+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bod yul dbus kyi bsam yas kyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o/ /dge'o// //
297a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Arya dzam+b+ha la kriSh+Na sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /'phags pa 'dzam+b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa dzam+b+ha la bsgrub par 'dod pas/ /yid dang 'thun pa'i gnas su
297a4(rgyud 'grel): stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i go 'phang thob par byas te sems can thams cad mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya/ /de'i ched du dzam+b+ha la la mchod par bya snyam du sems bskyed la/ /
297a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang bdag dang/ rnal 'byor bsrung ba ni gzhan dang 'thun/ rang gi snying khar yi ge A dkar po 'od zer 'phro ba dang ces pa yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du yi ge hUM nang gnag la phyir ser ba 'od zer ser po
297a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba bsams la/ /de yongs su gyur pa las/ /rdo rje rtse dgu pa hUM dang kha dog mtshungs pa bsgom/ /de'i lte ba'i? nang du bsams/ /hUM de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros shing dag tu oM A:- zhes brjod pas phyogs mtshams thams cad nas
297a7(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don byed pa'i u tsusma bsam gyis mi khyab pa spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la/ /dad cing gus pas phyar btsal dngos su 'byor pa dang yid las byung ba'i mchod pa mngon du 'gro ba'i bdun rnam dag
297b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ni bsod nams gyi tshogs sog pa yin/ de nas yang rdo rje hUM zla ba rnams la 'phros pas snod bcud la phog /de 'od du zhu slar 'od kyi gnas la thim bdun gyi 'phags pa'ang oM A:- zhes brjod pas rdo rje dang hUM dang tha
297b2(rgyud 'grel): mi dad du gyur rang lus kyang 'od du zhu nas rdo rje la sogs pa la thim de rnams rmi lam sgyu ma ltar bsam de ye shes kyi tshogs bsag pa yin rdo rje hUM zla ba u tsusma hUM gis 'od zer/ /de lnga po yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du rnam
297b3(rgyud 'grel): thos kyi bu sku mdog ser po mgo g.yas su bstan pa gan rkyal du nyal ba kha nas rin po che sna tshogs skyug pa dbu rgyan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pas brgyan pa de'i mgo thur du mnan pa/ /'od zer gyi phreng ba 'khrug cing
297b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba'i gdan gyi lte bar/ dbang po sbas pa ltar gnag pa'i dza yig yongs su gyur pa las u tsusma byis pa'i gzugs can shin tu gnag pa/ /rna ba ma phug pa/ /sna thung ba/ /skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ /lus thung ba mthug pa/ gsus pa
297b5(rgyud 'grel): che ba mche ba gtsigs pa/ /spyan dmar ba/ khro gnyer gnyer ba/ /spyan zlum pa/ phyag gnyis kyi g.yas pa na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa nu ma g.yas pa la bsten cing/ zhal du gsol ba'i tshul gyis bsnams pa/ /g.yon pa na rin po che
297b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs skyug pa'i ne'u le pus mo g.yon gyis steng du bzung ba/ /zhabs g.yas bskum pas gdan gyi mgo bo mnan pa/ /g.yon brkyang ngas rkang ba mnan pa/ /mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa/ /cer bu thor tshugs la klu mdza' 
297b7(rgyud 'grel): yas nag pos bkra shis pa/ /rna ba do shal/ tshangs skud/ dpung pa lag pa/ rked pa/ rkang pa rnams la rim pa ltar/ 'jog po dmar po/ pad ma chen po dkar po/ stobs kyis rgyu sngon po rigs ldan khra bo/ dung skyong ser po/ ba su ki
298a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po/ pad+ma dkar po ste klu chen brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de'i thugs khar zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ de'i lte bar zla ba'i gdan la hUM/ dpral bar oM lce? la dzaM/ dpung pa g.yas la b+ha/ g.yon la la/
298a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs khar dza(rgyud 'grel): lte ba len?/ bar gdang g.yas la tra/ g.yon la ye/ bol gong g.yas la swA g.yon la hA/ yi ge de rnams zla ba'i gdan dang ces pa'o/ /kha dog nag cing/ 'od ser po 'phro ba'o/ /yi ge de rnams dang/ thugs ka'i
298a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang gi hUM zla ba'i gdan rnams las 'od 'phros te/ sems can la reg pas thams cad dzam+b+ha lar gyur nas yid kyis hUM la bsdu/ yang de rnams las 'od 'phros pas/ rin po che thams cad bsdus te rlung nang du rdubs
298a4(rgyud 'grel): pas/ klu chen brgyad dang rnam thos bu dang ne'u le'i kha nang du song/ phyir rdubs gyur? pas de rnams kyi kha nas skyugs/ rin po che'i phung po chen po byung yang zos yang skyugs pa lan mang du bsgom/ de rjes su rang gi lag pa g.yas
298a5(rgyud 'grel): pa oM las dka' i gzugs kyi lag pa'i mthil du bam yig las 'od zer 'phros pa las skyes pa'i bum pa'i lag pa bsam pa'i/ bum nang du dzaM/ khrig ma la oM/ mdzub mo la b+ha/ gung mo la la/ srin lag la dza/ mthe
298a6(rgyud 'grel): chung la len/ mthe bong la dra/ khrig ma'i mtshams? su ye/ g.yon la swA/ g.yas la hA re re la zla ba'i gdan re'o/ /de nas zang gi zhong ba'i nang du rten yod na bzhugs/ med na rang dang 'dra ba'i rten du bskyed la chu khyor gang/
298a7(rgyud 'grel): oM inda ni? mu khaM b+ha ma yi swAhA/ ces pa lan bdun gyis byin gyis brlabs la chu khyor ba gang khar blugs par bsams te phul ba khar song bas kha nang gi dzaM gyis ser por gyur/ snying kha'i hUM la sogs pa'i nus pas bdud
298b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsir gyur pa slar gyen du log ste rang gi lag pa'i mthil du byung ba/ mdun gyi dzam+b+ha la'i zhal du phul bar bsams shing/ /oM dzluM swAhA/ ces pa lan re dang chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa 'di nyid kyis so/ /'jug tu/ na mo ma Ni b+ha dra
298b2(rgyud 'grel): yA ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ oM dzam+b+ha la dza len dra ye swAhA/ zhes lan bdun brjod la chu khyor ba bdun dbul/ 'di nyid gtor ma'i sngags kyang yin/ de nas rten chu nang nas bton te/ logs su bzhugs/ bskyed pa yin na badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): sa
298b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ gtor ma gtsang sar gtang/ rgyun du sngags zlos na/ oM dzam+b+ha la dza len dra ye swAhA/ zhes pa dang na mo rad na tra ya la sogs sngags phreng 'dam kha yin gsung zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub par the tshom mi
298b4(rgyud 'grel): dgos gsung/ rjes su bdag gzhan thams cad kyi tshe dang/ bsod nams 'phel ba dang dpal 'byor rgyas pa dang 'khor dang chab sring 'phel ba dang/ 'dod pa'i don ci dang ci bsam pa thams cad myur du 'grub par mdzad
298b5(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ zhes gsol pa bde ba/ bsngo ba dang smon lam gdab po/ /dzam+b+ha la nag po'i sgrub thabs bsdus pa paN chen shakya sh+ri'i zhal nas gsungs pa/ bsnubs lots+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyi bsgyur ba'o/ sa brgyad dbang
298b6(rgyud 'grel): phyug lha yi lha/ mgon po 'gro kun phongs pa sel/ /mi'u thung gzugs can nag po che/ u tsuSh+ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes pa'i bstod pas bstod par bya'o/ /dge 'o/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya dza b+ha la dza len
298b7(rgyud 'grel): dra ye ba She sha stod tra nA ma/ /bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po la khyad par gyis bstod pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor gyi dbang phyug rin chen gter mnga' ba/ /lcags kyus lcags
299a1(rgyud 'grel): btab 'dod dgu sbyin par byed/ /nyi shu drug ldan gsang sngags yi ge yis/ /lha min lha dang mi 'am ci bdud rgyal/ /nyi shu lnga'i sman mchog gis gang ba'i/ /tshangs skyogs las bsgrub dngos grub
299a2(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /rab 'bab bcud kyi ril bu sbyin mdzad gang/ /nor rgyun lha mos legs bsten khyed la 'dud/ /thabs chen shes rab zab rgyas rin chen bgyis/ /snying po nyi zla'i sbyor ba las byung ba/ /dga' chen
299a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bzhin sam bu te/ /mchog brnyes rmugs 'dzin khyed zhabs rtag tu 'dud/ /dzaM yig las skyes lha chen yi ge bzhes/ /legs drangs rdo rje'i thugs gsung skur ldan pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan brgya rab ldan pa//
299a4(rgyud 'grel): nyams dgu'i gar gyis brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /Sh+ToM pa Ni ro d+ha yis rna ba mnan/ /phu brgyad kha yis dgra bo'i mdangs 'phrog byed/ /lugs bzlogs lugs 'byung bzhi gnyis yi ge yis/ /byis pa'i srogs dang gzugs
299a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig mdzad la 'dud/ /k+Shu brgyad rgyan gyis nor bu'i gdon 'grol zhing/ /chu 'dzin sprin 'dra'i lus la char chen 'bebs/ /khyod ni nor bdag gzir bas sa gsum gyi/ nor 'phrog zhal bzhi bgegs 'joms mdzad la bstod//
299a6(rgyud 'grel): stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod kyi ye shes yi ge bcu/ /rig 'dzin dgug dang gter 'byed 'jigs las skyob/ /rkun po bsrung dang bu ster tshe bsring dang/ /phyugs skyong skyed shing dbang bskur shis mdzad 'dud/ /gang phyir
299a7(rgyud 'grel): sa gsum skye bo rmugs byed pa'i/ /nor 'dzin sa brgyad dbang phyug yud tsam zhig/ mthong nas gus 'phel nyi shus bstod bgyis pas/ /sgrub rnams 'phrin las nyi shus rgyal gyur cig /'phags pa rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang
299b1(rgyud 'grel): po la phrin las nyi shu'i sgo nas khyad par gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po nor 'dzin dpal gyi zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po bud+ha sh+rI dz+nyA na dang lots+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyis/ mang yul gyi grong du 'phags pa
299b2(rgyud 'grel): warti'i pho brang du bsgyur ba'o/ / /rgya gar skad du/ Arya dzam+b+ha la sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das dzam+b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod sbyin brgya ba me lha gdong
299b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang/ seng ge 'phro byed nyin mor byed rnams kyis/ zhabs gnyis la btud bcom ldan sdug bsngal ba/ /bdag la pad ltar yangs pa'i spyan ras gzigs/ /bcom ldan chab khyor gang gis mnyes 'gyur na/ thugs
299b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes mnga' ba gzhan gang lags pa gsungs/ /de phyir mchod pa bshams la mi rtsi zhing/ khyod dang 'dra ba phal cher rnyed par dka' / /brtse bas 'bad pa'i sgo nas brtsal brtsal nas/ /phongs par gyur pa dag la bde mdzad na/ /kho bo
299b5(rgyud 'grel): mchi ma dag gis gdong spags pa/ /spyan sngar mchis kyang ci ste gzigs ma lags/ e ma'o rab tu rgyas pa thugs rje yi/ gzhu mo mnga' ba khyod lta bzhugs gyur kyang/ skye tshogs bzlog dka' i sdug bsngal chom rkun gyi/ /sde
299b6(rgyud 'grel): yis rnam par 'joms pa ji ltar lags/ /sems can sman slad nor bu rin po che/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dgung char 'debs grags na/ /kho bo khyod nyid gcig bu'i mthar thug pa/ ci ste thig pa yangs ni 'bebs ma lags/
299b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod bzhugs bzhin du me yis 'bar ba ltar/ kho bo phongs pas shin du cher bsregs ni/ khyod kyi lta zhig thugs rje 'od ba'i ba/ sa gsum khur du khur ba gang du thal/ bum pa dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi/ nor
300a1(rgyud 'grel): bu sems pa dang ldan ma lags pa/ de dag gis kyang sems can phan bgyid na/ /thugs rje'i bdag can bcom ldan smos ci 'tshal/ gang zhig rmugs 'dzin chu yis dbang po zhes/ /skad cig kyang ni khyed kyi
300a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan smos pa/ de la pad ma'i 'byung gnas legs bzhin du/ pad rgyas dpal ni 'jug par dgyes pa lags/ /de ltar bcom ldan srid 'joms khyod spyan sngar/ tshe nges btab pa'i bsod nams 'byams klas pa/ gang yin de'i skye bo
300a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod bzhin du/ mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin par shog /bcom ldan rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa slob dpon chen po btsun pa zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu ti ta shI
300a4(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis legs par bsgyur ba'o/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya dzam+b+ha la sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa/ 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la la phyag
300a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan chu dbang mgon po ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis brjid pa'i sku/ sku mdog sngo nag 'od zer 'phro/ /mi bskyod sangs rgyas dbu la bzhugs/ klu chen brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan/ dgos 'dod 'byung la phyag
300a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod/ phyag g.yas thod pa khrag bkang bsnams/ /g.yon pa gter gyi ne'u le 'dzin/ 'gro ba dbul bas rab gdungs pa'i/ re 'dod skong la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro bo'i cha lugs dbu skra gyen du rdzes/ /me'u thur gyis
300a7(rgyud 'grel): ba gzhon pa'i sha rgyas pa/ nor bdag gdan la rkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /dgos 'dod ma lus 'byung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ mche ba rab gcig hUM sgras ma rungs 'dra la/ /dran pa tsam gyis ci bsam 'grub pa mdzad/ /yid
300b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu yon tan kun ldan pa/ /dpal ldan chu dbang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /u tshtsuSh+mA? la gus pas bstod pa yi/ /bsod nams mdza' yas dam pa gang thob des/ /bdag dang sems can ma lus thams cad kyi/ /dbul phongs sdug
300b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngal 'ching las grol bar shog/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa/ /paN+Di ta dz+nyA na badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ dzam+b+ha la sto tra/ bod skad du/ /dzam+b+ha la'i bstod pa/ dzam+b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha dang lha min dri za mi 'am ci rnams kyi/ /cod pan
300b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis zhabs kyi khri ni gsal mdzad pa/ byang chub mchog du nges mdzad gnod sbyin dbang phyug la/ /sems can rnams la sman pa'i bsam pas bdag gis gsol/ /gang zhig brtse ba'i bdag nyid byang chub sbyin mdzad khyod/ /snying rje'i rtse
300b4(rgyud 'grel): ba sems can don du rab tu grags/ mgon khyod sems can rnams la rtse bar mi mdzad na/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas dran par gang gis 'gyur te mtshar/ /shin tu mi bzad dbul ba'i rgya mtsho'i nang du ni/ /'gro rnams lhung ba khyod kyis
300b5(rgyud 'grel): mthong bar ma gyur tam/ /rin chen gter chen rnams ni mtshan ni bzung byas nas/ khyod kyis chu bo yang ni rdzing gis bcing bar mdzod/ /shin tu dbul ba'i byin za mi bzad drag po yis/ /'gro ba gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du bsreg
300b6(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /rtse ba nyid kyis ser sna rnam par spongs mdzad la/ /rin chen bdud rtsi'i char gyis char rgyun drag tu phob/ /khyod ni bsgom pas brgya byin gyi ni rgyal srid dang/ /spyan zur tsam gyis khyab 'jug gis ni dpal mo dang/ /mnyes pas
300b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug gis ni ri'i gnas kyang thob/ /mgon po sdug phongs 'gron bu tsam yang mi ster na/ /'gro ba'i dbang phyug rnams la dpag med bde ba rnams/ rtag tu khyod ster sdug sngal can la de lta min/ khyod kyis sngon ma mthong ba snying
301a1(rgyud 'grel): rje'i yul gyur pa'i/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal can la ji ltar khyod 'jigs sam/ /nor gyis nor slod grub ldan rnams la khyod 'gengs kyi/ /yang dag skal med sdig byas rnams la khyod min zhing/ /nor
301a2(rgyud 'grel): gtor nor gyis nor ldan par ni 'dzin gyur te/ /mgon po slong ba'i tshogs rnams nges par spyod byed dam/ /gal te khyod kyis nor gtong rnams la khyod kyis ster/ /skye bo'i tshig ngan rnams la ji ltar khyod 'jigs sam/ /rab tu
301a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas nges par smra ba de yis mchog /gnod sbyin rgyal po bdag gis gsol ba gsan du gsol/ /rab tu 'bad byas de 'dra'i nor dang ldan gyur na/ /ji ltar dbul po'i sgra ni thos par ma gyur cig/ dbul ba'i me ni rab tu 'bar bas
301a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba rnams/ /bsreg par ngas mthod yid kyis ngo mtshar nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zhig bdag gis smras pa'i tshig rtsub tshig rnams ni/ /chu'i dbang po brtse phyir 'di rnams bzod/ /gang zhig bstod pa 'di yis ni/ /rtag tu 'bad pas dzam??
301a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /de ni dbul por mi 'gyur zhing/ /shin du mi g.yo'i dpal thob shog /mi'i dbang po nyi ma rnam par gnon pas dzam+b+ha la la bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs sto/ /ka lyA Na mi tra gzhon nu shes rab kyis bskul nas//
301a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA d+ha ra dang/ /yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal ldan sa skye'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o/ /rgya gar skad du/ u ts+tshuSh+mA dzam+b+ha u pa de sha sto tra/ /bod skad du/ rmugs 'dzin
301a7(rgyud 'grel): 'chol pa'i man ngag gi bstod pa/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po nam mkha' i mdog can nor gyi char 'bebs pa/ /ma skyes rang bzhin dag pas sku mdog nag por bzhugs/ /khyod ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid
301b1(rgyud 'grel): de bdag dran na/ khyod la 'dud kyis thugs rjes ci'i phyir mi gzigs/ /lo drug byis pa'i gzugs la gzhon pa'i sha rgyas pa/ 'dzum zhing khro la byams pa'i mche ba dkar po gtsigs/ /khro gnyer dpral bar bsnyer zhing ral pa dmar ser
301b2(rgyud 'grel): langs/ /dbul pa sel mdzad spyan yangs snying rje can la 'dud/ /mi bskyod dbu la bzhugs pas thugs kyi rigs 'dzin cing/ /byams pas kun la khros te gcer bu sbul gyi brgyan/ /oM A las skyes nor sbyin gdan la bzhugs
301b3(rgyud 'grel): shing 'gying/ /re ba bskong mdzad dpag bsam shing 'dra khyod la 'dud/ /phyag g.yas snying rje don mdzad thod pa khrag gis bkang/ phyag g.yon nor sbyin ma bzung ne'u les rin chen 'bebs/ /g.yas g.yon zhabs kyi rnam thos sras kyi rkang
301b4(rgyud 'grel): ba brdzis/ /nor bdag gan rkyal gnon cing brkyang bskum bzhugs la 'dud/ /rna ba ma phugs rigs don cha lugs du ma bzung/ /lag nas kha ru 'o ma'i bdud rtsi rtsa lam rdo rje nas byung ste/ /gur kum mdog 'dra zhal du phul bas
301b5(rgyud 'grel): mnyes mdzod la/ /nyid kyis bdag gis bsam mkhyen re ba myur du bskongs/ /yi ge bcu pas byin brlabs me tog dang bcas pas/ /oM las 'od 'phros gdub bu rin chen spras pas brgyan/ /oM las byung ba'i bum pa bzang pos chu phul nas//
301b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan mgon po ci phyir re ba mi bskod lags/ /'gro drug kun la re bskong nor gyis char pa dag /ci 'dod mang po 'bebs pa'i thugs rjer grags lags na/ /bdag gis mos pas khyod kyi yon tan rtag tu brjod/ /thigs pa
301b7(rgyud 'grel): gcig kyang mi gsol skal ba med dam ci/ /nyi ma re re bzhin du rtag tu khyod 'bod na/ /bdag ni yid chad sgyid lug gdong pa dag mod kyang/ /khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas thugs rje gang du thal/ /gter chen bskal pa med kyang log 'tsho
302a1(rgyud 'grel): med tsam byin/ /bdag gis snying nas smos kyang bdud ma gzigs na/ sa gsum kun la snyoms par dam ni ma bcas sam/ /bdag la skal pa med kyang thugs rjes ci mi gzigs/ /sems can min nam dbul ba'i sdug
302a2(rgyud 'grel): sngal bral bar mdzod/ /bdag gis pos pas khyod kyi thugs rje'i zhags pa yis/ /srid 'dir dbul phongs sol la bde chen gnas su drongs/ /'jigs 'jigs 'jigs pa rmi byed khyod kyis byin brlabs te/ 'di dang pha rol gnyis
302a3(rgyud 'grel): kar rtag tu skyab bar mdzod/ /rmugs 'dzin 'tshol pa'i man ngag gi bstod pa/ /bla ma d+ha byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa rdzogs sto/ /kha cig slob dpon nyi ma spas pas mdzad zhes kyang zer ro/ /rgya gar skad du/ de pi ba su d+ha rI 
302a4(rgyud 'grel): sto tra/ /bod skad du/ lha mo nor rgyan ma la bstod pa/ lha mo nor rgyu ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ma bum pa rin chen gter ldan ste/ de steng skyon bral nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /gdod nas dag pas sku mdog gser lta bu/ ma bcos
302a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin byis pa'i gzugs 'dra pa/ /snyen mgur phyag zhabs rin chen phreng bas brgyan/ /zla rgyas ltar mdzes 'phags ma'i sku la 'dud/ brtse ldan sten pa grub pa'i tshul mda' ba/ pad ma'i zhabs mda''gag
302a6(rgyud 'grel): med seng+ge'i sbras/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus sel byed ma/ /dpal ldan lha mo khyod 'dra'i gsung la 'dud/ /tshogs gnyis mthar phyin sa bcu rim bgrod nas/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can re 'dod bskyod//
302a7(rgyud 'grel): spros pa'i mdza' bral bde ba chen po'i ngang/ yang dag don rtogs lha mo'i thugs la 'dud/ /phyag g.yas mchod sbyin bi dza pha la yis/ /'jigs pa brgyad skyob 'gro rnams dbang du bsdud/ /dbul bsel zhing mkha' spyod
302b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dre na mdzad pa/ g.yon pa thugs ka rin chen snye ma 'dzin/ /dges 'dong re skong dpag bsam shing lta bu/ /yid bzhin nor 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bdag gis khyod la rtag tu mchod byed cing/ /gus dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rab bstod
302b2(rgyud 'grel): na/ /gdong la mchi mas rab tu gos gyur kyang/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal skad cig ma 'dor na/ sngon gyi thugs rje'i smon lam gang du thal/ /las kyis 'phro med sbyin shugs zad pa yin/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i skal pa med gyur kyang/ /tshe 'dir
302b3(rgyud 'grel): phongs pas log 'tsho spong tsam gyi/ /thugs rje'i thigs pa 'ga' tsam cis mi sbyin/ /dus 'di nas bzung tshe rabs thams cad du/ /'phags ma nor rgyun ma la mchod byed cing/ /theg chen gsang sngags chos la spyod pa dang/ bla ma rdo rje
302b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i bka' nyan cing/ /dbyer med phyag rgya chen po'i don rtogs shog /rta dang glang po rin chen gos rnams 'grub pa dang/ /khrus kyi rdzing bu rin chen bang mdzod dang/ /'dod 'dzo'i ba dang ma rmos 'bru rnams la/ /rtag tu chos dang ldan
302b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i longs spyod shog /paN+Di ta dza mA ris lha mo nor rgyun ma la bstod pa rdzogs so// //dza ma ri'i rad 'gyur ro// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha a pa ra dzI ta sA d+ha ni tra na tra/ bod skad du/
302b6(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyud/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor bdag gi sgrub thabs 'di gsungs so/ /nor rgyas sgrub par 'dod pa gang dag gis gnas dpen zhing
302b7(rgyud 'grel): nyams dga' ba'i sar man Dal legs par byas te/ der me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dang/ byug pa dang/ bshos dang/ snyil snyan dgod pa'i dbus su bum pa mdzes pa 'o ma dang/ sman dang/ 'bru dang/ rin po che dang/ spos
303a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ snying po dang/ chus bkang ste/ lhu sdug? dang bcas pa snam bu gtsang mas dkris te/ srad bu sngon po btags la phyag na rdo rje'i bsnyen pa byas te/ yid bzhin nor bu 'bum du bzlas la bdag nyid la
303a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM tsa Na Da mahA ro kha Na hUM phaT/ de nas nor lha nyid bsgrub pa ni khang bu shin tu dben par dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la ba'i rnam lngas byugs te/ de la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad lte pa dang bcas pa bri/ lte ba dkar
303a3(rgyud 'grel): po 'dab ma brgyad ser por bya'o/ /de la rin po che dang me tog dkram/ /dbus su bum pa dgong steng du sku bzhag/ mdun du zas dkar gsum dang/ dngar gsum dang/ tshong ma sna tshogs dang/ dri dang rtsi sman gyis brgyan te gzhag go/
303a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod ba'i rdzas dag kyang bkod la/ dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ dpal phyag na rdo rje bskyed rims ji lta pa bzhin bsgoms pa'i mdun du paM las rin po che'i pad+ma'i lteng la hUM dkar dmar las skyes pa'i nor lha zhal cig phyag
303a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa/ dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa phyag g.yas pas rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa g.yon gyis rin chen bai DUrya'o/ /rin po che'i gdan la 'bab bzhugs kyi skyil krung du bzhugs ba/ gsus po che byis pa'i gzugs lta
303a6(rgyud 'grel): bu can/ bzhin mdzes pa can 'bor la che ba/ rin po che'i rgyan gyis kun tu klubs pa'i dam tshig gi gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa bsams la/ bdag dang g.yog pa'i dpral par oM/ mgrin par h+rIM/ snying khar phrim/ /
303a7(rgyud 'grel): lte bar hUM/ gsang bar phaT kyis bsrungs te/ ye shes dgug gzhug bya'o/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po kun gyis rgyal/ /gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /gnas 'dir mchod pa 'bul gyis myur du
303b1(rgyud 'grel): spyon/ /bdag la zas nor gsol zhing bzhugs su spyon/ /e hya hi yak+Sha a pa ra dzI ta sa pa ri wa ra a bar? dzi ya hUM dza /de nas ni mdun du byon par bltas te /bdud gsal ba'i phyir rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya 'am yungs dkar 'phangs zhing oM A:- big+ha na Na ta kri da
303b2(rgyud 'grel): ni hUM phaT/ ces pas rnam par phye nas/ mchod yon phul te/ dam tshig la mngon par gcug la mchod pa phul nas/ bstod pa bya ste/ oM gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis byis pa'i gzugs 'dra can/
303b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yon yid bzhin rin chen bai DUrya/ /thugs kar 'dzin mdzad mi zad nor gyi bdag/ phyag g.yas lcags kyu 'dzin zhing rgyal po dang/ /btsun mo la sogs dgug dang dbang du mdzad chung mdog 'od 'phro rin chen rgyan mdzes ldan/ /rin
303b4(rgyud 'grel): chen gdan la rgyal sras skyil krung bzhugs/ /'jig rten zas nor kun gyis bdag po ste/ /gang gis khyod bsgrub 'phongs pa'i 'jig sel mdzad/ /nor lha'i rgyal po bkra shis 'byung ba'i gnas/ /'dzam pa'i rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
303b5(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la rgyal ba sras bcas mchod la/ de dag gis lha mo mngon par sprul te/ bum pa lha'i bdud rtsis bkang bas mngon par bkrus bkrus pa bsam mo/ /spyi bor dpal phyag na rdo rjes rgyas gdab po de nas snying po'i sngags 'di/ skad che bar ma
303b6(rgyud 'grel): yin/ chung bar ma yin/ myur bar ma yin/ bul bar ma yin par smra ba bcad cing rnam par g.yengs pa la sogs pa spangs te bzlas so/ /oM hUM phriM a pa ra dzI ta dza dza hI phaT/ bzlas pa gtong pa'i dus su mchod pa phul la/ gtor ma yang sbyin te/ gtor
303b7(rgyud 'grel): snod brum las rin po cher bsam/ gtor ma oM gyis sbyangs/ A:- yis spar/ hUM gis bdud rtsir bsgyur te phyag na rdo rje la rang sngags kyis dbul/ gnod sbyin lha la sngags oM h+riM dza yak+Sha a pa ra dzI ta sa pa ri wa ra a mri ta ba ling kha kha khA hI khA hi
304a1(rgyud 'grel): i dam ba lim bak+Sha yam/ ma ma bsu puSh+Ta ku ru sarba dza ga b+ha shi ku ru me da swAhA/ oM akA ro mu khe sarba d+harma Na a dyA nud pan na twad oM A:- hUM phaT swAhA zhes pa dang/ tshigs su bcad pas kyang bsngos la/ bstod pa bya/ chos
304a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad de phrin las bcol/ oM b+hu ta tri a pa ra dzi ta ran ma sarba tri sa ma pa ti swAhA/ zhes pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te bskul lo/ /de nas dge ba bsngos la a pa ra dzI ta badzra mu zhes pas gshegs su gsol/ /thun gnyis pa la sogs
304a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la dam tshig tshig rdzogs su bskyed la/ ye shes dgug pa la sogs pa sngar bzhin du bya'o/ /tshes gcig nas bcw? lnga'i bar du sgrub bo/ /bcwa lnga'i zhig dang po nas tho rangs kyis bar du sngags rgyun ma chad par bzlas /lce pog dkar po'i 
304a4(rgyud 'grel): bdug pa dbul/ tho rangs grub pa'i rtags snang ba ni rang gzugs mngon sum du ston te bdag gis ji ltar bya zer te/ sgrub pa pos bdag gis bka' nyon cig bya'o/ /mna'i bsgag dam chu klung ci 'dod bcol/ rgyal mtshan gyi
304a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bstan/ de phan chad bka' nyan te de la zhon nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthong ngo/ /lha'i gnas su bskyal nas lha'i dbang pos dbang bskur bar byed do/ /'bri sgra dang tug chem 'ongs/ gzugs sgra gang byung yang skrag par mi bya'o
304a6(rgyud 'grel): de lta bu'i mtshan ma ma byung na nam langs pa'i dus su rmi lam brtag /des ma grub na phyi ma'i zla ba la de bzhin du bsgrub/ des kyang ma grub na yang phyi ma'i zla ba la sgrub po/ de nas dngos grub ni rab rig pa'i rgyal po'i dbang 'thob bo/ /
304a7(rgyud 'grel): lha dang/ mi dang/ gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /dgra dang nad thams cad zhi bar byed to/ /tshe ring ba bskal pa bdun thub par 'gyur/ /nor mdzad pa med cing dpag tu med pa brjod kyis mi langs ba 'gyur ro/ /gal
304b1(rgyud 'grel): de gnod bar byed pa byung na yang khros ba tsam gyis de ma thag tu 'chi bar byed do/ /'bring ni lta sgom gyis nyams myong skye/ bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing nor gyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur bkra shis par byed pa dang/ dgra 'chi bar yang byed do//
304b2(rgyud 'grel): lam? yang nor 'phel bar byed cing dgra 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /grub nas rtag tu bsten pa ni zla ba nya gang pa thams cad la gtor ma gtang bar bya'o/ /dngos grub gang byung ba de cha drug tu bgos te/ bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum spyi dang /sems can
304b3(rgyud 'grel): dag la cha re re sbyin khyed kyis grub pa po'i 'tsho ba bya'o/ /sgrub pa'i dus su zas dkar gsum bza' zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan par bya'o/ /rtag tu khrus la brtson par bya'o/ /'di 'grub na yon tan dpag tu med do/ /'di la gdeng bzhi dang ldan
304b4(rgyud 'grel): pas 'grub ste/ 'og gnon ye shes bsnyen pa'i gdeng/ yang dag lta ba'i gdeng/ mi nyams pa dam tshig gi gdeng/ the tshom med pa nges pa'i gdeng/ de la lta ba ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rmi lam lta bur shes par bya'o/ /dam tshig ni bla
304b5(rgyud 'grel): ma mnyes par bya zhing/ gsang la sgrub te/ gzhan la thabs? 'di bstan par mi bya'o/ /gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi ma dza mA ris bsgyur ba'o// //
304b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badzra kun la tan tra kar ma ma d+ha la sa ta kra ma a trI sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor bdun pa'i rim pa rnam pa phye ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /bcom ldan
304b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid du la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM khro la khros pa'i rgyal po yis/ /khro bo nye bar zhi mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi mdzad/ /khro zhi che la phyag 'tshal te/
305a1(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud dag la/ /dkyil 'khor bdun pa'i rim pa dag /sems can ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir/ /legs par bsdus te bstan par bya/ slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing/ /dbang rnams thob
305a2(rgyud 'grel): par ma byas na/ nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams/ /'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/ /yi ge'i sgras btags ming tshogs la/ /brten pa'i tshig gis rab mchog ste/ khongs nas gab rdzas don 'phyin pa/ /ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas
305a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yin/ /'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /'di las gsang ba'i nges don med/ /kun gyis phyag rgya rdzogs chen mchog /snod ldan dang tshul bzad la sbyin/ /gzhan du nams kyang
305a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin mi bya/ /rmongs la brgyar bas gzhan du min/ /dus min par ni srog zad nas/ /bsreg dang sgribs pa yun rings gnas/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /
305a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon 'byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /stong nyid ther zug 'gog pa dang/ /khro gtum log lta bkam zhing 'dzum/ /le lo gti mug chags sogs pas/ /log lta dgu pos de myos 'gyur/ /de dag rnam par
305a6(rgyud 'grel): grol bya'i phyir/ /rgyal bas dkyil 'khor bdun du gsungs/ /de rtsom gang zag lngar 'dod do/ /bdun pa dang ni ma rigs chen byed/ /dbyugs chen 'byin dang lung chen thob/ /rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /drag shul can
305a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i gnas/ /dgon pa chen po'i gnas che ni/ /ye shes snying po can rnams kyi/ /thub chen gsang ba 'byung bas ni/ /dam pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ /de gnas nges don dgod pa ni/ /ji bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /
305b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dngos grub dkyil 'khor dang/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /bsod nams tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor sprin/ /bka' stong pho nya'i dkyil 'khor drag /'brug dung las kyi dkyil 'khor che/ gtang khram gnan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de ni
305b2(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba'i sgo nas gsungs/ /mi bskyod zhing khams mngon dga' na/ /dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu yis/ /khyim bdag kau shi ka'i bu/ /dge slong thar pa nag po dang/ /g.yog po ngan 'phags gnyis po la/ /ji bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs/ /ji bzhin
305b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid de ma bcos na/ /dngos po bzhi la gnas spyad kyang/ /nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin du/ /'di ni rnal 'byor dam pa'i lam/ /ji bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /phyag rgya dngos grub dkyil 'khor ni/ /mi 'khrugs pa'i zhing khams na/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
305b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud dag las/ /drag po rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /mi 'khrugs rgyal po nyid la gsungs/ /gnas chen dam pa dag tu ni/ /tshul? dang ldan pa'i rdzas bsogs nas/ /maN+Dal la sogs mdzes byas la/ /khrus byas snying kar nyid kyi la hUM/ /'od
305b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi snang ba dkon mchog rnams/ /spyan drangs dkon mchog bskor phyag 'tshal/ /de nas mchod pa dbul ba ni/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta badzra he ru ka badzra da re mahA dz+nyA na maN+Da la badzra a ha ra pU dza hUM swAhA/ de bzhin du badzra d+hU pa/ puShpe A ??
305b6(rgyud 'grel): gand+he/ nai bi dya pU dza hUM swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ zhes byin gyis brlab/ de nas ragta sbed zhing bdud rtsi yis tshogs mchod de rak+ta khA hi/ ba le te khA hi/ a mri ta khA hi/ go ro tsa na khA hi/ ba su ta khA hi/ tsi ta khA hi zhes brjod de/ thugs ka nas
305b7(rgyud 'grel): byung lha mos mchod rjes la/ /hUM bdag 'dra log pa'i stobs ldan pas/ /thog ma med pa'i dus mdza' nas/ /srid pa'i 'khor bar 'khyams par nges/ /skye ba mang por lus blangs pa/ /sus kyang ma byas rang gi las/ /de tsam cha gcig
306a1(rgyud 'grel): don spyad na/ de tsam don gyi sangs rgyas zin/ /rang lus gtod par ma phod cing/ /chags pa'i mdza' la mngon zhen pas/ /zug rngu nad kyis zin pa yin/ /srid pa'i btson rar chud pa 'di/ /mkha' la 'dud pas nyes par nges/ /'khor
306a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rlung sgor ltung ba 'di/ /las kyi rlung gis nyes par nges/ /dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus la/ /'di dag mi 'chab mthol lo bshags/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dam tshig rjes su srung/ /ye shes sems dpa' nye ba nyid du sbyon/ /rig pa'i rgyal po bdag
306a3(rgyud 'grel): la rtag par dgongs/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug bdag la dgongs par gsol/ /rtogs pa mchog sbyin bdag la dgyes par dgongs/ /'dod pa kun byed bdag la chags par dgongs/ /dang po mnyam nyid sangs rgyas thugs rje can/ /
306a4(rgyud 'grel): las rnams kun byed bdag sems dge 'gyur ba/ /dus gsum dge bshes dag dang thams cad/ /rdo rje can dang dam tshig sems dpar bsgrub/ /bdag kyang rdo rje sems dpa' gtan du mi stong na/ /rdo rje sems dpas gtan du bdag ma
306a5(rgyud 'grel): btang/ rjes su yi rang bskul dang skyabs 'gro dang/ lam rten bsngo dang sems bskyed dang/ /tshangs par gyur pa'i las rnams kyis/ /'gro ba kun bral bzhin du smon ta ke ma ta ke ma phaT/ /ha la ha la raM/ tig sna tig sna khaM/ kro ta kro ta
306a6(rgyud 'grel): ya ma zhes/ dngos po thams cad stong par sbyangs/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar smad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang/ /skye ba med las thams cad skyes/ /skyes ba nyid nas skye ba med/ stong nyid rab tu bsal ba yi/ /snying rje
306a7(rgyud 'grel): yum ni bsgom par bya'o/ /des pa las ni rdo rje gur/ /brum bi sha tsa shud de zhes bzlas/ /dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa'i/ /khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrug cing 'khyil/ /rkeng rus chen po ri rab kyi/ /steng gi 'bar ba'i klod dkyil na/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i
306b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang/ /phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa/ /phyi dang nang med kun du snang/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/ /gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i bar 'khyams gnyis kyis mdzes/
306b2(rgyud 'grel): thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid/ /'bar ba'i khro bo mang po 'khrug /khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ /gtum pa dom gyi yar ba ni/ /dbang phyug lha chen la sogs gzung/ /dbus kyi nyi ma'i snying po la/ /hUM las ri lu'i sgra grags pas//
306b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i sku ru gyur pa yis/ /rang gi ngang tshul de bzung la/ /lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /khro rgyal rnams la bskul bar bya/ /bdag 'dra sems can ma lus kun/ /mchog nyid sgrub par sbyor bas na/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun
306b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pas/ /sku'i dbyib tu bdag skyed cig /de nas phyogs 'dus khro rgyal gyis/ sems dpa' bdag la der dbang bskur/ /rim pa gsum gyis sku ru bskyed/ /de nas bcom ldan dges chen po/ /dbu dang phyag zhabs stong khams kyis//
306b5(rgyud 'grel): rdul snyed mtshon cha 'dzin pa ste/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal/ /rdo rje kha TwA nga rde chud g.yas/ /g.yon dril dung dmar rgyu zhags 'dzin/ /'bar chen klong dkyil 'khor lo'i dkyil/ /dbang phyug che dang dur khrod kyi/ /steng na
306b6(rgyud 'grel): zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /dur khrod rgyan can gar gyis rol/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag /khro rgyal ye nas yin pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las ni/ /khro mo dbang
306b7(rgyud 'grel): phyug mngon phyung ste/ he hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis/ /rin chen pad+ma rgyas mdzad de/ /hUM hUM rol pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /bde chen thugs mtshan byin brlabs nas/ /gnyis med dgyes pa 'khril bas thim/ /rdo rje lam byung yum gyi mkha' 
307a1(rgyud 'grel): chos sku byang chub sems su gnas/ /lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgra/ /hUM dang he he phaT byung nas/ /gsung gi phyag rgya nyid rdzogs te/ /'od zer spro bsdu'i sbyor ba yis/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya rab tu 'bar/ /de las phra mo'i sku spros bsdus//
307a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po'i sku rdzogs nas/ /phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed 'thon par 'gyur/ /sems can rgyal ba'i sras byas nas/ /slar bsdus rang gi gnas 'khod pa/ /dpal ni khrag 'thung chen po dang/ /rin po che dang pad+ma dang/ /las su gyur te so sor
307a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /de kun 'jigs byed chen po yis/ /cha lugs rngam pa'i nga ro yis/ /'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum pa/ /phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang/ /gnod sbyin chu bdag gshin rje sogs/ /dregs pa khyo shug stan la bzhugs/ /btsun mo
307a4(rgyud 'grel): khrag 'thung chen mo rnams/ /so so'i sku la 'khril de 'khod/ /dkar mo tshogs dang rkun mo dang/ /rmongs pa dang ni thal byed ma/ /lcob mo dang ni gtum mo dang/ /sme sha can dang tsan d+ha laM/ /sgo'i khyams kyi nang du 'khod/ /seng+ge gdong chen ma mo'i
307a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs/ /stag dang rtsa dang khyi dang gzhad/ /kang ka dur bya 'ug gdong che/ 'khor bar rngam pa'i mdangs dkyil 'khor/ /rdo rje srid 'gro ma tshogs dang/ /gdong mi 'jig rten ro langs ma'i/ /sgo bzhir rngam pa'i gzugs kyis gnas/ /srin po
307a6(rgyud 'grel): smug nag la sogs pa'i/ /'jig rten ma mo nyi shu brgyad/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol na/ /bran gyi tshul du gnas shing 'khod/ /de ltar gsal bar dgod pa'i sngags/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA sh+rI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sa dur tan+ta
307a7(rgyud 'grel): ka ha na da ha pa ni? hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra sh+rI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM ratna mahA sh+rI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma mahA sh+rI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT
307b1(rgyud 'grel): oM karma mahA sh+rI he ru ka mahA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA kro ti shwa ri sarba duSh+Tan hUM/ oM badzra da ra mahA kro ti shwa ri dzA la hUM phaT/ oM mahA su rya ratna mahA kro hi shwa ri bi da ma hUM/ oM d+hi shwa bi mu ka mahA kro to shwa ri kha'i hUM phaT/ oM
307b2(rgyud 'grel): sarba a mo ka ma hA kro ti shwa ri hUM phaT/ badzra ke ri ha/ badzra tsi ri ha/ badzra pra mo ha/ badzra ba ta li ha/ badzra pu sa ha/ badzra kasma ri ha/ badzra sma sha ni ha/ badzra tsaN+Da li ha/ badzra sid mu kha he/ badzra bya kri mu ka he/ badzra sri la mu kha he/ badzra sho na mu kha he/ badzra kri ta mu ka
307b3(rgyud 'grel): he/ badzra kang ka mu ka he/ badzra kha kha mu kha he/ badzra hu lu mu kha he/ badzra a rya ta dza te da dza/ badzra u mu ka hUM/ badzra lo ka paM/ badzra ba sme pa la ya ba de ho/ /badzra ma nu raksha si b+hyo/ pra mo ni b+hyo/ ro 'u tri b+hyo/ pe sna pi Dhyo/ ko ma ri b+hyo/ oM na tra yo b+hyo/ badzra bid ga
307b4(rgyud 'grel): laM b+hyo/ a mri taM b+hyo/ sai me b+hyo/ da na taM b+hyo/ bag raksha si b+hyo/ bakshaM si b+hyo/ ra ti badzra haM b+hyo/ e ka tsa raM b+hyo/ si ti ka b+hyo/ ba ya b+ha b+hyo/ mahA ma ra na b+hyo/ agne ye b+hyo/ ba raM hi b+hyo/ tsa mun+ti b+hyo/ pu ta na b+hyo/ ba ra na b+hyo/ badzra mahA ka ha la b+hyo/ badzra tsa ka su saM gar na b+hyo/
307b5(rgyud 'grel): badzra laM po dar b+hyo/ /de dag gis ni dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs/ /da ni ye shes 'khor lo ni/ /rang gi snying kha nas 'od 'phros/ /dbyangs dang ldan pa'i lha mo yis/ /phyogs bsdus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che//
307b6(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo/ /dmigs med mkha' ltar dag pas khyab pa'i sku/ /spyan brangs gshegs su gsol bar mi dmigs kyang/ /thugs rje'i dang gis chos sku dag pa las/ /ye shes
307b7(rgyud 'grel): sgyu mas rol cing gshegs su gsol/ /ru rlung lu hUM ye hye hi badzra dza dza/ badzra kro ta sa ma ya hUM zhes brjod nas phyag byas te/ bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chung cing/ /byams dang snying rjes 'gron zur mi mnga' yang/ /thugs rje chen pos
308a1(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/ /'jigs med he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' i lus can gar yang thogs med cing/ /'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo cho/ /ma srid byams pa'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad ma/ /phyi nang
308a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug ma/ /ci bgyi bka' nyan yang sbrul bsam mi khyab/ /bdud 'dul ye shes pho nya drug cu'i tshogs/ /'khor bcas rab 'bar kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /a ti
308a3(rgyud 'grel): pu ho pra ti pu ho sarba ta thA ga ta b+hand+ha naM ka ro mi/ /i daM d+hu pa puShpa b+ha liM pra tits+tsha ho/ sh+rI ban yo ki ni ho/ ta ki na ho zhes gus byas/ /hUM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/ /thugs rje khros pas rngam pa'i tshogs/ /'bar ba'i byin brlabs
308a4(rgyud 'grel): rmad po che/ de nyid du ni bdag la rtsol/ /badzra kro ta sa ma ya hUM/ badzra kro ta sa ma ya phaT/ badzra kro ta sa ma ya ho/ /der bstim lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar ldan/ so so rigs kyi 'bras bur 'gyur/ /snying
308a5(rgyud 'grel): gar mi bskyod rdo rjes mtshan/ /de las ma mo brgyad spros te/ /phyi rol mchod pa byin gyis brlab/ /dbyangs dang ldan pas dbul byas te/ /ngang la thun mong rdzas lngas mchod/ /de nas khyad par rdzas kyis mchod/ /bdud rtsi smad kyis mchod
308a6(rgyud 'grel): rjes la/ /spreng zhing brtags pa bya ba ni/ /bla med mchog gi mchod pa dam pa sbyar ba 'di/ /ye shes lnga'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis rab brgyan te/ dam chos gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol/ /he ru ka'i gnas
308a7(rgyud 'grel): bcu dang/ /dur khros chen po'i gnas brgyad nas/ /dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drangs te/ dur khrod mchog gi gnas chen 'dir/ /zhing chen g.yang gzhi ste cing? bcas/ /dmar gyi arga rgya mtshor 'khyil/ /mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs
308b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas kyis/ /ma lus bzhes nas bsnams su gsol/ /hUM mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po 'di/ /bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul/ /bza' dang bca' dang btung dang? ?/ longs spyod ltar ldan mchod pa 'di/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor
308b2(rgyud 'grel): thim/ mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol/ /kha hi mahA mi se kha hi/ /mahA rag ta kha hi/ de nas 'khril te snyoms zhugs pas/ /dgyes mnyam mchog gi mchod pas rol/ mi dmigs thugs kyis mchod pa 'di/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis dang/
308b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyi rol 'thon po las/ /ma mo rnams kyis bstod pa ni/ /hUM gtum chen du mdza' i me ltar 'bar/ /'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi/ /khro gnyer glog stong 'gyur ba bzhin/ /mtsho? bzang yang za byed che ho/ /hUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'drug stong di
308b4(rgyud 'grel): ri ri/ /thugs chen ri rab 'bum snyil skad/ /ha hA ha la gad rgyangs che/ /sbyugs pa 'khor lo g.yeng ba che ho/ /hUM khro bo shes rab 'od po che/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor kun la gsal/ /'bar ba'i ye shes kun la 'joms/ /sna tshogs ye shes
308b5(rgyud 'grel): thig le che ho/ /hUM khro bo rgyal po sprin chen po/ /khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'babs/ /dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/ /sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho/ /hUM bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po/ /bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams
308b6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs par byed/ /'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho/ /hUM rdo rje brag chen sar ba che/ /rdo rje chu bo sud chen po/ /rdo rje med ste kun char che/ rdo rje rlung 'thor g.yeng ba che ho/ hUM sgeg po dpa' o 'jigs su rung
308b7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs pa/ /sku'i dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yin/ /gar gyi phyag rgya 'bar ba'i dbang phyug gnon/ /h+ri mos byed stong pas lhag par 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /gdul 
309a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag par 'jigs tshul ston/ /zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas lhag pa ston/ /thams cad dkyil 'khor gsum du snang bar mdzod/ /h+ri rnam par 'dul ba'i ngo mthon thabs kyis non
309a2(rgyud 'grel): pas gnon/ ho ho ha ha he he hi hi/ /dgyes pa'i gad mo khong/ /dbang phyug thams cad rab bshig rab tu bshig /rab kyi rtsal gyis ngo mtshar rmad byung ba/ /rtog pa mang po rgyud kyi gdul bya ma lus pa/ /ye shes sgyu ma ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par bstod//
309a3(rgyud 'grel): de rjes sngon gyi gnas su bzhugs thim nas/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal ni/ sngon du gsungs pa'i khro bo 'am/ /yang na spyan ras gzigs sprul ba'i/ /khro bo 'bar ba dbu dgu pa/ /phyag ni bco brgyad lta bu yi/ /snying gar drag po'i
309a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bsam/ /ru lu rtsa ba'i sngags dag ni/ /'bum mam bye ba'i bar du bzlas/ /phyag rgya dngos grub dkyil 'khor ro/ /thun mtshams mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ /rang gi nor du rin po che/ /yod par ma shes stor bar dran/ /
309a5(rgyud 'grel): tshol bar 'dod na 'di ltar bsam/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /chos 'dzin rigs kyi grub gnas su/ /thugs rjes sa la mngon sprul gshegs/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /byams mgon dam
309a6(rgyud 'grel): pa zhig gis bstan/ /e ma byed kyis ma shes sam/ /mthun yun kun tu bde ba yin/ /sgron mas mun kun gser tshol ltar/ /gsang ba'i snying po mdzod brtol te/ /thig le gcig gis kun la khyab/ /thams cad lung
309a7(rgyud 'grel): chen nges par bstan/ /'jig rten g.yo rdul mi'i rang bzhin rnams/ /'bar ba lnga bcu'i khro bo dang du snang/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i rang bzhin rnams/ /brtsal med ma bcos de nyid rnam dag nas/ /thig le yungs kar
309b1(rgyud 'grel): tsam zhig gsal bar bsgom/ /de las 'od zer rdul snyed spros/ /mun bsal dngos po kun sbyangs te/ thams cad me bcos sku ru gsal/ /slar 'dus thig le la thim nas/ /'od du zhu nas rim gyis bsdus/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
309b2(rgyud 'grel): snying gi nang/ /a gzugs pad+ma 'dab bzhir gnas/ /de steng gsang ba nad gnas sa rlung dang/ snying ga nad gnas chu rlung gnyis/ /rnam par dge las zla ba ste/ /rdo rje rin chen gnyis rang bzhin/ /de steng rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /thig le 'od zer lnga ldan
309b3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /de steng mgrin pa gnas me rlung dag /mgo ba'i nad gnas rlung dkyil gnyis/ /dag pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng/ /pad+ma'i rigs dang las rigs so/ /kha sbyar dbus su thig le bsam/ /yang dang yang du 'dris bsams pas/ /mar 'gro mar 'gro
309b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'gog go /'gog pa bzhin du mtshan ma ste/ lam skye 'gag med pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o/ /maM mi zad pa chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o/ /paM gnyis skyon med pa chos nyid rnam par snang ba'i sgo'o/ /ta thogs pa med pa chos nyid rnam
309b5(rgyud 'grel): par snang ba'i sgo'o/ /muM brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang pa'i sgo'o/ /hUM mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid yongs su snang ba'i sgo'o/ /oM cir yang snang pa'i chos nyid rnam par snang pa'i sgo'o/ /sa ni chu la thim pas ni/ /kun tu mnyam blos zag med pa'i
309b6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi ye shes dang por skye/ /chu ni me la thim pas na/ /sems la dbang thob du ba 'dra/ /me ni rlung la thim pas na/ /ting 'dzin 'ba' zhig ldan pa ste/ /rlung gi rnam pa lta bur mthong/ /rlung ni rnam par rig pa la/ /thim pas 'dod pa rnam bral te/ /mar me
309b7(rgyud 'grel): lta bur mthong ba'o/ /rnam par rig pa'i 'od gsal la/ /thim pa thams cad snang ba ni/ /phyi nang mun pa thams cad sbyangs/ /nam mkha' lta bur mthong ba'o/ /e ma'o dngos po med pa las/ /smon dang snying rje'i dbang gis ni/ /ji ltar snang ba ma bkag pa'o//
310a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dun pa'i dus na rigs kyi bu/ /yid la byed pa zhes thob ste/ /sems gsum bskyed cing mdza' bcu grol/ /brten pas gzhi yis bar gnas/ /rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /'phro 'du cig pa'i ting 'dzin thob/ /sems
310a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhi rdzogs te mdza' bcu shes/ /bdag nyid yi ge'i phreng bar ni/ /snang ba'i ltas mthong bsod nams gter/ /dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /sems cig rdzogs te mdza' chub nas/ /'jig pa lnga yangs khyad par sa/ /yongs su mi
310a3(rgyud 'grel): ldog ting 'dzin sa/ /'jig rten nor bu rin chen gyis/ /gang bar spyod pa'i ltas mthong 'gyur/ /sgyu ma sbyor ba'i skyes bu ste/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i cha byad du/ /rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kyis/ /dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa ston/ /lung
310a4(rgyud 'grel): chen thob pa'i skabs su ni/ /seng+ge dag la zhon nas ni/ /thams cad gnon pa'i ltas mthong 'gyur/ /sems bdun rdzogs pa'i sa phar gnas/ /'bras bu nyid la laM shes pas/ /lam gyi yan lag bde rdzogs te/ /gzhan dag smin par
310a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dod ltar thabs mchog sbyor/ /rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skabs su ni/ /kun snang ting 'dzin nyid thob ste/ /des ni nyi zla'i chad bskor bas/ /thabs dang gsol bar byed ltas mthong/ /sems gsum bskyed cing mdza' 
310a6(rgyud 'grel): drug chub/ /gdeng du gyur pa'i ngo bo las/ /de nas rgyal mtshan skyes bu de/ /chos kyi rgyal po gang de yi/ /gdung 'tsho ba dga' ldan theg chen ston/ /mi gnas bcu dus cho 'phrul snang/ /bshes gnyen dam pas bka' stsal pa/ /sa bcu pa la
310a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ??/ /chos nyid du 'jog spyod par byed/ /ma rtog dang du mi gnas te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi byed do/ /e ma'o skyes bu dam pa blong/ /gang gi ngo bo ci phyir lags/ /skyes bu dam pas bka' stsal pa/ /gsang sngags dngos
310b1(rgyud 'grel): po brgyad kyis bcings/ /mnyam par ma bzhag par du ni/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pa myong ma yin/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod ci gu /gang zhig mos pa su zhig gis/ /ji ltar grol 'gyur ngo bo ci/ /skyes bu dam pas bka' stsal pa/ /grol bar 'dod pas bla ma
310b2(rgyud 'grel): bsten/ /rig pa rang 'byung rang bzhin ni/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /zhing khams rin chen yod pa na/ /rgyal ba kun tu bzang po yis/ /sras mchog 'jam dpal chen po la/ /ji ltar rims
310b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyud pa bzhin/ /de bzhin 'byor pa'i yo byad la/ /rnam gsum tshul du nan tan bya/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /bka' bstod pho nya'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa yi ni/ /zhing khams mngon par
310b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba na/ /rgyal tshab skyes bu kun gyis gsungs/ /de'i gdam ngag mdor bkod pa'o/ /rtags dang rten ni gzhung ltar bsham/ /dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa'i/ /mcho ni rkong rkang thang dmar na/ /ri ni byin lag mchongs kyi rtse/ /steng na
310b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dab chags rgyal po gnas/ /rkeng rus thod pa mkhar du brtsigs/ /ru las tshogs bdag bskyed nas ni/ /nye nas kro ti shu rim/ /rang gi 'khor tshogs ldan pa bskyed/ /de nas dpa' bo chen po'i ru lu hUM gi 'od zer spros/ /drag pos gnas
310b6(rgyud 'grel): nas gdug pa dgug/ /zhal du rdubs te sna nas bton/ /gzhon nu sme brtsegs zhes gyur te/ /bskyed dang gnyis su med par byas/ /de la ming dang mtshan btags pa/ /ging gi rgyal po zhes kyang bya/ /lha chen legs ldan nag po ste/ /lha'i sde dpon ka ru
310b7(rgyud 'grel): na/ /tshogs bdag chen po bdud kyi rjes/ dge slong thar pa nag po yin/ /tshogs bdag chen po de gsol la/ /dpa' bo chen po gshegs su gsol/ /bdag cag skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs/ /sgo 'dir 'jug par 'tshal lags na/ /rgyal ba'i
311a1(rgyud 'grel): sras su bzung du gsol/ /dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal ba/ /hUM hUM hUM byi sha badzra kro ta/ badzra la maN+Da la phaT/ ta keM ta ke phaT/ ha la ha raM/ tig sna tig sna khaM kha ta kro ta yaM/ /oM hUM muM/ skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs chen khyed/ /bde bar 'ongs so
311a2(rgyud 'grel): legs par 'ongs/ /grub pa'i rlung sgo gsang sgo 'dir/ /su dag 'ongs pa slar mi ldog /tshogs bdag chen pos yang gsol ba/ /bdag cag mdza' yas sems can rnams/ /don gyis sangs rgyas yin mos kyang/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis
311a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba la/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa la/ /mun pas bsgribs pas de mi shes/ /byang chub sems kyi lam 'di nas/ /sangs rgyas sa la 'jug par bgyi/ /dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa/
311a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can gyi rnal 'byor khyer/ /rdo rje can du cig nges na/ /gsang ba gsum du mnyan pa nyid/ /mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig sbyin/ /mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig ni/ /gsang ba gsum gyi dbyings nas byung/ /dkyil 'khor gsum gyi dam tshig ni/ /grub na
311a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i dus med do/ /nag po chen pos yang gsol pa/ /ye shes rin chen dbu rgyan mchog /gzi brjid phung po bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rin chen kun 'dus pa/ /rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyig gi ye shes gtso mchog
311a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /rdo rje dam pa mchog 'dzin pa'i/ /khyod ni dam tshig gtso lags kyis/ /dbang phyug rgyal pos bdag dbang bskur/ /dpa' bo chen po des gnang pas/ /oM badzra a mri ta a hi ha sarba maN+Dal hUM/ /e be she ka h+ri ta/ nag po chen
311a7(rgyud 'grel): pos yang gsol pa/ /bdag ni skyes bu khyod kyis dbang bskur bas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi de nyid bdag dang bskur/ /bcom ldan thams cad mchog nyid bdag lags te/ /mchog nyid bsgrub phyir dbang rnams blang bar bgyi/ /de'i rjes su
311b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnams kyis/ /mos dang snyan pa'i tshil gsol te/ seng ger sbrul te gdan du phul/ /la las lus kyis rgyan du phul/ /la las sham thabs dag tu phul/ /la las thig ler phul byas shing/ /la las byug par mnyes byas nas/ /la las
311b2(rgyud 'grel): phreng bar mdzes pa'i rgyan/ /la las phyag mtshan phul te gnas/ /de nas gang gi rgyal po la/ /mnga' gsol mchod pa'i tshul du bstag /nye bar spyod pa lnga yang bzhin/ /dam tshig dam rdzas bsngo ba ni/ /dka' thub chen po tshur gson cig /
311b3(rgyud 'grel): legs ldan nag po ma rungs pa/ /rang gi rgyal srid la gnas te/ khrim la btab pa'i dgra bgegs rnams/ /rol gcig dgongs shig dam tshig gtso/ /khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab/ /bso byang khram la btab pa yi/ /ma dang sring mo bud
311b4(rgyud 'grel): med la/ dpa' bo khyod kyi rol mdzod cig /dam tshig chen pos ma gtang cig /zhe sdang can gyi bdag po rnams/ /sems can kun gyi srog 'phrog pa/ bse byang khram la btab pa yi/ /sha dang khrag la longs stod kyis/ /gnod sbyin chen
311b5(rgyud 'grel): po ma rungs rnams/ /bse byang khram la btab pa yis/ /gser sogs yul 'khor blangs nas ni/ /rang gi 'dod pas longs spyod kyis/ /rtog pa'i rgyal po rnams gson cig /bse byang khram la btab pa yis/ /mgo thod bcad nas rtags
311b6(rgyud 'grel): rten dang/ dge mtshan rnal 'byor des 'dod na/ /yid bzhin lta bus dngos sgrub gsol/ /rigs ngan sme sha can gyi tshogs/ /ba lang gi sha rta sha dang/ /mi sha rlang chen sha sogs bzhes/ /srin mo khrag 'phrog ma lus la/ /bsang
311b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i khrag ni dron mo dag /bzhes shig dgra bo'i khrag la rol/ /sprul pa'i phre men chen mo rnams/ /thod ?? dang 'bru mar khrag /chad dang a mri tar sbyar ba yang/ /rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa'i dam rdzas bzhes/ /rig ngan chen po ma rungs pa//
312a1(rgyud 'grel): sha chen bshang gci khu ba khrag /dam rdzas 'bar ba 'di bzhes la/ /bdag gi nad rnams bzlog tu gsol/ /dmigs bya 'di la rims nang thong/ /srid pa'i bud med ma rungs khyed/ /bro gar glu tshig mchod pa bzhes/ /dmigs
312a2(rgyud 'grel): bya 'jo tshul stobs kyis 'phrogs/ /shor ba gzhon nu bdud mo'i tshogs/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i bka' 'byung gis/ /sngags sgra rang gi mchod pa bzhes/ /dmigs bya'i phung po rdul du rlogs/ /log 'dren can gyi gdon rnams nyon/ /
312a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nang du kun rig na/ /che chung las ni gang byas kyang/ /gnyis kyi dbang du mi 'gyur gyis/ /rnal 'byor de'i las 'di bsgrubs/ /gsang tshig sten pa'i tshogs rnams nyon/ /bshang gci khrag dang sol khu'i gos//
312a4(rgyud 'grel): brgya 'am stong du gon nas ni/ /ling ga bcad na sangs rgyas 'jig /dam rdzas mchod pa 'di bzhes la/ /bcol ba'i las rnams grub par gyis/ /mnga' bdag chen po ma rungs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sprul pa ste/ /khro ba chen po ging
312a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ /mnga' bdag bdud kyi rgyal po bzhengs/ /rnal 'byor chen po nges bstod cing/ /khyod kyis mthun pa'i rdzas phul bas/ /sngon gyi bskal pa bzang po la/ /khas blangs dam bcas mna' bor ba'i/ /sngon du rigs 'dzin gong
312a6(rgyud 'grel): mas bsgrubs/ /da lta rnal 'byor bdag bsgrub na/ /baM ri thod pa mkhar gyi rtser/ /du mtshon nag po pu ru ru/ /mtshon cha nag po char du phab/ /bdud bya nag po lding zhing 'jums/ /dur khrod mang po rgyan rnams rdzogs/ /mche gtsigs rngaM
312a7(rgyud 'grel): can? zhal gdangs nas/ /khro bo khro mo'i sprul bar khrims/ /srin po srin mo rkan sgra rdebs/ /gnod sbyin pho mo 'brug ltar sgrog /za byed pho mo glog ltar 'gyur/ /so so mos pa tha dad pa'i/ /yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ni/ /yongs su rdzogs
312b1(rgyud 'grel): pas blang par byos/ /de ltar mchod bstod byas rjes la/ /rang rgyud dam tshig gis gnas te/ /de dag rnams la mthun rdzas bsngo/ /de nas ging chen 'khor bces kyis/ /'bangs su mchi'o bdag lus 'bul/ /'bangs la nan tan ma chung zhig /de
312b2(rgyud 'grel): nas slan chad bka' bzhin du/ /bka' lung bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs/ /gal te bka' bzhin ma bgyis na/ /dam pa'i lung las 'gal 'gyur bas/ /bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying/ /rul myags skams nas tshig par 'gyur//
312b3(rgyud 'grel): ma srid bu mo chung ma rnams/ /'bangs su dbul lo tshig ma chud/ /dbus su mchis skal mi ldan gyis/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mdza' la zhog /phud la 'tshal skal mi ldan gyis/ /lhag ma zhal chab bron la gsol/ /nye gnas gdung mo ma
312b4(rgyud 'grel): srid rnams/ /deng nas rgyal ba'i 'bangs yin gyis/ /khyod kyi ci bgyi las mkhan te/ bka' i las byung rtag par myur du bsgrubs/ /ru lu ru lu b+hyo zhes pas/ /rang gi srog la tshang du bzhag /dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /brtse?
312b5(rgyud 'grel): bar byed na mar bya'o/ /gdud bar byed na sring mo ste/ /brtson par byed na bran du bya/ /byang chub dag ni bur bya'o/ /bdud bral med na slob mar bya'o/ /bskul ba mgyogs na pho nya bya'o/ /bka' bzhin byed na bka' la gdags/ /rdo rje
312b6(rgyud 'grel): ljags kyi 'od zer las/ /rag sha sh+ri raM he ru ka /ru tra ma tra ha haM zhes bsdus te bzlas pa bya/ /bsnyen pa bzlas pa 'bum byas la/ /don chen brtsal pa zhes su bshad/ /thun mtshams kun tu mched pa yang/ /dung chen la sogs btang bar
312b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /don chen rnyed par gyur nas ni/ /sna'i bu ga'i hUM rings las/ /khro bo ging gi rgyal po ste/ /las kyi rgyal po srog bdag ni/ /ljang sngon drag po gsal zhing can/ /spros dang gnyis su med par bstim/ /rgyu zhags khar nag skud pa 'am/ /mthing nag
313a1(rgyud 'grel): dar chen 'bar ba la/ /phyi ma'i ri lu gsum sprul te/ /rang gi lag pa g.yon par gzung/ /gzung thag blangs te sngags bzlas pa/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa 'bum du bzlas/ /don chen bsnyen par gyur pa yi/ /de nas don la 'jug
313a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /rang gi lag pa g.yon pa yi/ /thum po bar pa kha phye nas/ /mkhar gyi nang du pho nyas bskul/ /'bum du sgrub pa dag ni bzlas/ /de nas tshogs kyi mchod pa ni/ /gsum du byas te dbul byas nas/ /gdeng du gyur pa'i gsang
313a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags mchod/ /bsgrub pa chen po 'bum du bzlas/ /pho nya mnga' gzhug bdag dkyil 'khor/ /'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams na/ /rnam dag lam gshegs rgyal ba rnams/ /rkong rkang thad
313a4(rgyud 'grel): mar rgya mtsho'i de/ /'grub khung drag shul can gyi gnas/ /rdo rje thabs kyis blta ba'i yul/ /dur khrod bdag po tshogs dang bcas/ /bdag ni bka' i las mkhan te/ /bka' yi las kyi dus byung bas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gdul
313a5(rgyud 'grel): bka' ba/ /de dag ma lus bdag gis gdul/ /bka' las de dag mdor bkod pa'o/ /lho phyogs las kyi maN+Dal sum rtseg la/ /dang po thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /de 'og mtshon cha'i char gyis spres/ /de 'og me ri 'bar bas
313a6(rgyud 'grel): spras/ /nang du rgyal sol nag po byugs/ /de'i nang du ling ka ni/ /ji ltar ba'i tshul gyis bzhag /yan lag phyag rgya bzhi yis brgyad/ /kho ran dang por 'phra men mkhar ma la ni mgo mnyan te/ /tha ma la ni srin po tshogs//
313a7(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa'i cher ma'i pur bu la/ /mtshon par byas te rnam par bkod/ /mgul nas gdags shing rten la 'dud/ /de ni ? sgyur ba yi/ /gtor ma la sogs mchod pa rnams/ /mnyes shing mgu ba gzhung bzhin bya/ /ji srid mtshan
313b1(rgyud 'grel): ma rnyed kyi bar/ /las la sbyor ba drug pa'i sngags/ /rngam pa'i da ros gdon par bya/ /mnyems la sogs pa gzhu dper gsol/ /de nas pho nya mdag par bya/ /'di tha dag po mi bzad pa'i/ /rtog pa med pa'i rgyal po las/ /rdo rje lcags kyi 'od zer gyis//
313b2(rgyud 'grel): badzra kro ta la sa ma ya/ /khro bo rgyal po sprin phud po/ mdag gzhug tho nyar spro bar bya/ /rag sha dzwa la sa ma ya/ /sngon po mdag pa'i drag sngags so/ /gnod sbyin rbad pa'i dreg sngags so/ /tsit+ta dzwa la sa ma ya/ /zang byed bskul ba'i pho nya'o/ /sngags dang mang du spel nas ni/ /khros pas
313b3(rgyud 'grel): khri 'am 'bum du bzlas/ /dung chen btang la bskul ba ni/ /sngon tshe dpal chen nyid kyi bka' / /de nas rnal 'byor rigs rgyud bka' / /da lta rnal 'byor bdag sgrub kyis/ /khas blangs dam bcas brjed dam ci/ /dam bcas bzhin du phrin las mdzod//
313b4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar ma byams bu la gdung ba bzhin/ /dam tshig can la dung dung gdung bar gyis/ /gang du sing byams ming la gdung ba bzhin/ /dam tshig can la ltar ltar brtse bar gyis/ /mdza' bo grogs la ji ltar gdung tshul bzhin/ /rnal 'byor can la/
313b5(rgyud 'grel): kril kril brtse bar gyis/ /ji ltar g.yog byams dpon la snying brtse bzhin/ /dam pa rnams la mnyes par nye par gyis/ /rgyal pa kun gyi cho sku pad+ma'i gdung/ /chos rje 'od dpag med la rdo rje chos/ /spyan ras gzigs sprul h+ri las
313b6(rgyud 'grel): ? tshul ston/ /ngag gi dbang phyug rta gdong zhabs kyis gnon/ /'jigs byed chen po 'bar ba la/ /sngon ba 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ /dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad pa/ /rdo rje gshog pas bar snang khebs/ /pa spu lcags kyu bsreg 'dra yi//
313b7(rgyud 'grel): snga ma dang sdig dang smig pa sprul/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi sa gzhi khebs/ /thogs skyob sa sti ru rgyu zhags dang/ /nyi zla khyud dang 'ug pa khra/ /rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ /za ma tog dang rdul yab rnga/ /ri rab phyi bskor stong gsum 'ben/ /
314a1(rgyud 'grel): ? dang 'bum gyis brgyan gyis klubs/ /dus mdza' bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ /khro gnyer sdang mig 'bar ba ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun spyan ras gzigs/ /zhabs kyis 'bar ba'i lha brgyad gnon/ /rdo rje srin po
314a2(rgyud 'grel): khro bor gyur/ /lha dang bdud las rnam par grags/ /mi mchog thugs kyi sprul pa las/ /lha chen nag po mi bzad pa/ /mtsho ni rkong rkang thang dmar na/ /ri bo byan lag mchongs kyi rtse/ /ma la ya'i rtse la lhags/ /sku gsung thugs
314a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje las/ /sprul pa'i sras mchog rdo rje 'dzin/ /gzhon nu bye ba sa yar mdzad/ /baM ri thed pa mkhar gyi rtsar/ /mgon po thugs kyi sprul pa ni/ /bdud kyi spyod yul kun mdzad de/ /drag tu mdag cing bskul ba'i tshe/ /'jig rten
314a4(rgyud 'grel): khams kun 'phung bar byed/ /thams cad dbyar gyi sprin phung bzhin/ /nam mkha' i dbyings kyi mdza' klas par/ /baM ri thod pa'i rtse la lhags/ /mthun 'jug thabs kyi cha byung du/ /baM ri thod pa mkhar gyi rtsal/ khrag dang bshang gci sha
314a5(rgyud 'grel): chen dang/ /rkang dang klad pa klang rgyas dang/ /rnag dang chu ser la sogs pa'i/ /'bu dang shin tu 'bu chen po/ /sbrag ma sbrang rgod bung ba dang/ /sprul dang sdig pa sdom la sogs/ /ci sbyang stag seng la sogs pa'i/ /gdug pa can gyi 'khor gyis
314a6(rgyud 'grel): bskor/ /lha'i sde dpon ka ru na'i/ /bu mo chung ma ma srid dang/ /'jig rten dbang phyug lha chen gyi/ /ma sring bu mo chung ma rnams/ /phyogs nas dbang du byas pa rnams/ /zlas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad la sogs
314a7(rgyud 'grel): ma mo 'phra mo na gnod sbyin ma/ /srin mo sha za khrag 'phrog ma/ /bdud kyi ming 'dzin bla kun ma/ /dam nyams 'di'i bla la yang/ /blon po sde dpon sde dpon mo/ /ru mtshon nag po phyar nas ni/ /ru dpon pho nya mdag par bcas/ /rang rang
314b1(rgyud 'grel): stan dang lag char chas/ /ci bgyi bka' nyan bka' stong 'khor/ /sbad dang rngam pas dgra snying khos/ /srid pa'i bu mo dri za brgyad/ /stag seng ce spyad bzhad sogs dang/ /dur bya rog po 'ug pa'i tshogs/ /bstod cing rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod/ /nyams pa 'di'i
314b2(rgyud 'grel): snying dkyil du/ /cho 'phrul sna tshogs khyed la bsregs/ /srin mo'i nye gnas chen mo brgyad/ /ke ri tse ri phra mo ha/ /be ta li dang pu ka si/ /g+hasma ri dang sma sha ni/ /maN+Dal li la sogs pa yis/ /srog la hur thums dus la bab/ /dur khrod sa'i sgo
314b3(rgyud 'grel): srungs pa ni/ /brtson mo gdong mo gar la gam/ /de bzhin 'jug mo chen mo bzhi/ /gsang sgo 'dzin cing bka' sgo srung/ /rnal 'byor 'khor ded bcas pa la/ /bar chad bsrung ba'i dus la bag/ dam nyams 'di'i yan lag chings/ /dur khrod bdag
314b4(rgyud 'grel): mo grub 'debs ma/ /rkam ma shin tu rkang ma dang/ /ra ro ma dang khrag mthung ma/ /chags pas myos pa'i mdangs kyis 'khor/ /dam nyams 'di'i dbugs long la/ /smyo 'bogs gtang ba'i dus la bab/ /nyams su myong bar khros dus ni/ /
314b5(rgyud 'grel): sngon du snyen phul mnga' gsol ba'i/ /mtshon cha nag po thogs nas ni/ /skab der thun gzer brdeg par bya/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba ma lus kyis/ /mar ku lta bu'i snying po gsungs/ /de 'dra'i bstan pa dam pa la/ /sgro skur rnal 'byor
314b6(rgyud 'grel): yongs la 'tshe/ /da lta rnal 'byor nga yi dgra/ /pho nya mdag gzhug ma lus kun/ /'di la dam tshig ma gnas kyis/ /drag po las kyi thun la bab/ /rdo rje gzhon nu sme ba brtsegs/ /mthing nag khro gnyer ral pa can/ /'bar ba chen
314b7(rgyud 'grel): po gar dgu mdzad/ /dur khrod bdag po ji bzhin du/ /dbu dang phyag zhabs der mdzad de/ /sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab/ /rdo rje zla rtsal nyi ma'i mdangs can dang/ /rdo rje seng ge nam mkha' i rdo rje dang/ /rdo rje spyang ki rdo rje dus mtshams
315a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rdo rje phyogs 'dul rdo rje dur khrod bdag/ /rdo rje ro langs rdo rje ma rungs pa/ /legs ldan nag po bdud kyi rje/ /gsung gi ngar drag po mi bzad pa/ /'ur 'ur chem chen drag po'i sgra dang ldan/ /rab tu brtsigs pa'i sku ni mi zad pa//
315a2(rgyud 'grel): mgul ldag rab g.yas dgra la thun/ /dpa' o khyed kyi shes rab ma/ /baM ri thod pa brtsegs pa'i dbus/ /gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzer chen gyis/ /brtan par btab pa'i nang bdag mo/ /nye gnas kro ti shwa ri ma/ /thod skyogs khrag gis
315a3(rgyud 'grel): bkang ba dang/ /'bru mar rdzas lnga tshang sbyar ba/ /rtag par rang gi longs spyod 'dzin/ /chags bas myos shing rkang pa nas/ /ches 'ga' drag tu bskul ba'i tshe/ /sngags sgra drag po mi bzad pas/ /rang la rang yang brtsig cing 'dum/ /srin po srin
315a4(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshogs rnams kun/ /drag por sngags drag ngas bzlas shing/ /gdug pa'i lus can mtshon char bcas/ /glang pa'i dkyil du rgyab pa yis/ /rkang pa'i mthil dus ma ya/ /a bi ra tsa'i gnag pa yin/ /thun 'jug khrid pa'i sbyor thabs kyis
315a5(rgyud 'grel): ? rtsa lnga'i mdangs sbyor bas/ /gshung ba lnga ni bdud rtsir bsgyur/ /byas la mi rtsogs phrin las dang/ /spyod lam chags ye shes kyis/ /thams cad stong zhing rdo rje sbyangs/ /sgyu ma'i phung po lhag ma la/ /khro bo khro mos rta pra brdung/ /'dod chags
315a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhe sdang gti mug gsum/ /mnan no mnan no 'og tu mnan/ /sha khrag rus spungs lhag ma rnams/ /za byed cho gas kyi zhal du btab/ /las rnams gzhan yang bstan bya'i phyir/ /drag po'i las rnams sgrub pa ni/ /nag po phyir
315a7(rgyud 'grel): la sbyor goms pas/ /drag po yi ni sbyin bsreg brgyad/ /rnal 'byor khros pa'i sems kyis byas/ /ling ga bcad cing bsregs pas na/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'jig 'gyur na/ /gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /'brub khung las
315b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /gtang khram gnan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /gdug 'dul zhing khams chen po ni/ /ston pa gsang bdag nyid kyis gsungs/ /de'i gdams ngag rgyud ba ni/ /slob dpon hUM ka ra yi ni/ /de'i gdam ngag mdor bkod pa'o/ /gong du las
315b2(rgyud 'grel): la sbyor ba na/ /sa sna bdun gyis 'dag pa las/ /tshad ldan pa'i mkhar byas la/ /steng du bya khyung rgyal po bya/ /nang du mgon po nag po ste/ /mche gtsigs zhabs ni bgrad pa'i 'og/ /sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang/ /dri ma la sogs rjes rnams
315b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ ling ga ming byang bris te bzhag /a ra ma ru sha dang ni/ /kra sne sku ra bzhi chad yi/ /thod pa kha sbyar zhags pas gsum/ /ka ru na'i phyag rgya dang/ /gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzer chon gyis/ /blangs te dur khrod nag po'i tshal/ /mi mthun
315b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i sar song la/ /gtor ma la sogs rngan pas mchod/ /gru gsum khru do rko byas la/ /gong gi mkhar chen bcug nas ni/ /g.yam pa nag pos kha bcad nas/ /rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan bya/ /chu mig nag po ma rungs dang/ /lha khang
315b5(rgyud 'grel): mgon po'i zhabs 'og tu/ /mnan pa byas kyang 'grub par gsungs/ /gtad khram mnan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de gting sgrub pa'i gnas phyin nas/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /spyan drangs lha rnams ma lus la/ /mchod
315b6(rgyud 'grel): bstod bshags pa bya ba dang/ /gtang rag lhag mi'i gtor ma gtang/ /de nas dbyings su ci bder gshegs/ /bskyed pa'i lha rnams lus la bsdu/ /mtshams dang phyag rgya la sogs la/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dgrol bar bya/ /smon lam gdab cing spyod lam la
315b7(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma'i tshul gyis ci bder sbyang/ /grub dang lung bstan ma thob kyang/ /bdag pas blo dman ched du ni/ /dkyil 'khor ba dan pa'i sgrub thabs phye/ /tshang ma dang ldan mkhas pa rnams/ /bdag gi blo la mi bya zhing/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi bzod pa
316a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhes/ /'di brtsams 'di la mos pa rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob shog/ /slob dpon chen po sti ra ma tis dgongs pa las/ rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud bstan pa bsrung ba/ /rnal 'byor yongs kyi mgon po legs ldan nag po'i
