344a4(rgyud 'grel): ma mchod/ /cham dang skom dang spyod lam dang/ ting 'dzin ? pa thar thug pa/ /brgyad po 'di ni bsdus pa'o/ /zhes sprin las grol gsungs te/ mdor bsdus pa'o/ /da ni de dag gi mtshan nyid re re nas rgyas par bshad par bya ste/ /de la dang po 'gos dang zhes pa ni/
344a5(rgyud 'grel): thog mar mal nas langs gos bgo ba'i phyir/ /gos kyi rnal 'byor bya ta/ /rang gi gos byin gyis brlabs pa 'am/ ma brlabs pa yang rung ste/ gos cung zad stong pa nyid du bsams te rang gi snying ga nas 'od 'phros pas/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi thugs ka ??
344a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de las yi ge hUM dpag tu med pa bkug ste rang gi ges la bstim /de zhu rdo rje rgya gram du gyur/ /rang gi sngags brjod gos gyur te/ /rang lha'i nga rgyal la gnas pas/ /bgos pas bar chad rnam sel dang/ ma 'ong pa na rdo rje 'chang/ /'gro ba'i don
344a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir nan tan thams cad kyis/ /dang po dbang bskur dus dag tu/ /gos kyi dbang bskur bya ba bcas/ /khrus dang zhes pa ni/ de nas khrus kyi dus dag tu/ /rang gi lha yi nga rgyal gyis/ /bum pa'am gzhan yang rung ba ni/ /chu
344b1(rgyud 'grel): yis bkang ste mdun bzhag nas/ /thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas/ /dbang bskur bla ma'i thugs kar phog /de las kyang 'od 'phros pa las/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ /rang 'dod lha la 'od zer las/ sgra byung gsol ba btab par bsam/ /
344b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod chen bgyid pa ltar/ /bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dang bdag stsol/ /zhes bskul bas de dag gi thugs ka nas/ /bgegs rnams ma lus tshad gcod pa'i/ /rigs pa'i rgyal po ma lus 
344b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' grangs med rnams/ /ji ltar bltams ba tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gi khrus bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka la sha a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI hUM zhes
344b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod mkha' la sprin phung bzhin/ /lha mo phyag dang bum pa ni/ /bdud rtsis gang pa gar skar gyi/ /phyag rgyas bzung ste glu 'di len/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum kun gyi phyag byas pa/ /gsang gsum gnas las byung ba 'di//
344b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis byin pa yin/ /zhes pas bdag pa dbang bskur bsam/ /lus kyi dri ma dag pa ltar/ /sgrib pa rnams ni dag par bsam/ /chu yi zer ma 'phros pa las/ /mdza' yas sems can ma lus pa'i/ /sgrib pa rnams ni dag par bsam/ /rang
344b6(rgyud 'grel): gi? khrus ? ? ni/ /mi bskyod pas ma zhing sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM badzra sna na hUM/ bla ma mchod ces pa ni/ de nas bla ma mchod pa ni/ thang la maN+Dal byug bya zhing/ /byin gyis brlabs par bya ba ste/ lci ba chu dang bcas pa yis/ /badzra re ge zhes brjod cing/ /ra ri
344b7(rgyud 'grel): a? ye med par byug /de nas rang snying? sa bon las/ /yi ge hUM 'phos maN+Dal stong/ /gnas la sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /oM tAM ratna maN+Dal badzra re? hUM/ /lan bdun nam gsum mam gcig kyang rung/ /brjod pas zhu ste sa gzhi ni/ /rin po che yi rang
345a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyur/ /de yi steng du a dkar 'phros/ /sngags 'di bzlas la zla bar bsam/ /oM tsan+d+ra maN+Dal la badzra re ke hUM/ de'i steng du tsan dan gyi/ /chu gtor yi ge hUM gyur te/ /sngags 'di bzlas zhu dri zhim pa'i/ /rang bzhin maN+Dal gyur par bya//
345a2(rgyud 'grel): oM d+hU pa ra ya ratna maN+Dal badzra re ke hUM/ de nas nor buAm sman nam 'bru/ /me tog nyid kyis dgram bya ste/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i bye brag gis/ /ji snyed 'dod pa'i tshom bu bya/ /de dag baM bsam sngags 'dis zhu/ /pad+ma'i gdan du gyur par bsam/ /oM pi pad+ma
345a3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal badzra re ke hUM/ de'i steng du brum yig bsam/ /oM bruM bi sha bi shud+d+he maN+Dal badzra re ke hUM/ rin chen las byung gzhal yas khang/ /mdzes pa nyid du gyur par bsam/ /de dbus bla ma yi dam lha/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
345a4(rgyud 'grel): sras dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ /dang por lus ngag yid kyis ni/ /gus ba yis ni phyag 'tshal te/ /phyi nang gsang ba bla med pa'i/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par bya/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum po dang/ zhes pa la sogs tshig rnams kyis/ /sdig bshags sdom pa
345a5(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bya/ /de yi rang rgyud dag 'gyur te/ bdud rtsi'i snod du 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas yi ge brgya brjod cing/ /bzod gsol oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /gshegs gsol smon la gdab par bya/ /zas dang zhes pa ni de nas zas kyi dus dag tu/ /sbyang ba rnam pa bzhi bya ste/ /zas
345a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyang gter ma dang mthun no/ /de nas lte ba'i lkog tu yaM/ /zhu bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de steng raM las tsan+d+ra li/ /mar me rtse mo lta bur gsal/ /de ni lto ba sbyang ba'o/ /de nas rlung gis me sbar ba/ /snying nang lha dang phung po khams/ /skye mched la sogs lhar gsal bya//
345a7(rgyud 'grel): de ni snying gar sbyar bar 'dod/ /gal te la la 'di skad du/ snying ga'i lha nyid gsal ba ni/ /snying ga sbyang par rigs mos kyi/ /phung po khams la sogs pa la/ /snying ga sbyang zhes ci'i phyir/ /zhe na de ni gtso bo ste/ dang po dbang bskur dus na ni/ /ye shes lha ni du ma
345b1(rgyud 'grel): dag/ lus la bcug cing byin brlabs la/ /snying gi gcig bur bcug pa ni/ /mthong dang thos pa med phyir dang/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ni du ma las/ /phung po khams dang skye mched sogs/ /lha nyid yin pa gsungs phyir ro/ /de nas kha ni thab khung la/ /lce la me lha
345b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsam/ /de nas lag gnyis dgang blugs kyis/ zas za sbyin bsreg yin par 'dod/ /yang na lce la rdo rje la/ /rkan la pad+ma rab bsams ta/ /gnyis sbyor ba byas pa las/ /byang chub sems byung lha rnams kun/ /tshim par byed pa la la 'dod/ /de ni lce rkan sbyang pa'o//
345b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas lus kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /tshim par bya phyir ma yengs par/ /za ba 'di ni mchog yin no/ /skom dang zhes pa ni/ /de nas skom gyi rnal 'byor ni/ /rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /lag mthil g.yas par nyi ma ni/ /mam las skyes pa blta bar bya/ /de steng char
345b4(rgyud 'grel): snod a las ni/ /thod pa chang gis bkang ba yi/ /kha ni zla bas mnan pa'o/ /de nang ha zhu kha dog sbyangs/ /hos ni ro yi rtog pa sbyang/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ni bdud rtsi chen por zhu/ /de nas ye shes dbab pa'i phyir/ /srin lag tshigs ni dang po la/ /mthe bo rtse mo sbyar byas
345b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ /sum las srin lag ri rab bskyed/ /hUM las mthe bong sa bzhir bsam/ /bar du mam mar bsam byas te/ /de las 'od 'phros 'og min du/ /rang 'dod lha yi smin mtshams phog/ /yab yum snyoms bzhugs bdud rtsi dbab/ /thod par bab ste sa gzhi dang//
345b6(rgyud 'grel): ri rab bcas las dkrugs pas ni/ /sa gzhi ri rab nyid kyang zhu/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM dam ha he h+rI/ /lan gsum bdun sogs bzlas par bya/ /de yi nang du chos 'byung dang/ /zla ba lta bu bri bya la/ /de stengs bla ma yi dam lha/ /gzhan sogs bsams te mchod pa
345b7(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ /yang na bdun gyi bar snang la/ /de dag bsams la mchod par bya/ /rang rang sngags la bdud rtsi'i sngags/ /btags pas lus ngag yid gsum dang/ /bla ma la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas gong du bshad mchod bya/ /de nas ci ran gnod
346a1(rgyud 'grel): med par/ /tshod zin par ni btud par bya/ /tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dus su ni/ /nad la gnod par gyur na yang/ /thigs pa gsum ni dam tshig go/ /de ltar ma byas glang po che/ /smyon pa bzhin du 'thung byed na/ /skye ba lnga brgyar smyon bar 'gyur/ /
346a2(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam dang zhes pa ni de nas spyod lam gyi dus su so sor brtags pa rnam pa gnyis te/ /snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang/ /bcud kyi sems can bye brag gi/lha dang lha mor mos par bya/ /rang gi bya ba ci byed kyang/ /lha yi nga rgyal la gnas nas
346a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs so/ /pa ti klog pa'i tshe bdag nyid/ /lce la rda rdungs rdo rje bsam/ /rkan la rnga chen rab bsams te/ rdo rjes rnga la rab brdungs pas/ /sgra skad chen po phyogs bcur khyab/ /mdza' yas sems can ma lus kyi/ /rna bar
346a4(rgyud 'grel): gang dang gang mos la/ /de dang de ltar rtog par bsam/ /yang na mdza' yas sems can rnams/ /ma lus mdun du bkug byas la/ /bdag gi skad ni gang mos par/ /so sor go bar chos byas la/ /rtag tu dag par bsgrag par bya/ /'dir mang smra bas ci
346a5(rgyud 'grel): zhig bya/ /gang byed lha yi nga rgyal gyis/ kha dge dang gzhan gyi byang chub ni/ /thob par bsam zhing bya ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin zhes pa ni/ /de nas phyi dro'i thun dag la/ /rang gi rtog pa'i don la ni/ /blo gzhag lha yi nga rgyal ni/ /cho ga lnga 'am cho ga gsum//
346a6(rgyud 'grel): skad cig bsdus rgyas shin tu bsdus/ /gang mos pa la bol? gzhag la/ /thun mong dngos grub 'dod pa 'am/ /dag gi sgrib pa sbyong 'dod pas/ /bzlas pa gang mos las gzhi la/ mi skye'i bar du bzlas par bya/ /bzlas pas skyon rdzogs
346a7(rgyud 'grel): rims? mi/ steng dang 'og gi sgo dag la/ /bsten nas bsgom par bya ba'o/ /de nas gal te gtong 'dod na/ /man ngag bzhin du gtor ma ni/ byin gyis brlabs te dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas bstod dang bshags pa dang/ phrin las bcol la
346b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /rang gi ye shes gshegs par bya'o/ /de nas smon lam gdab pa dang/ /stong pa nyid kyis rgyas gdab bya/ /nyal ba'i mthar thug ces pa ni/ /de nas nyal na rnam gsum ste/ /stong pa nyid kyis nyal ba dang/ /bskyed ba'i rim pa'i nyal lugs dang/ /
346b2(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ba bslu ba'i nyal lugs so/ /stong pa nyid kyi nyal ba ni/ /snod kyi 'jig rten bcud la bsdu/ /bcud kyi sems can yum la bsdu/ /yum yang bdag la bsdus nas ni/ /bdag nyid ye shes sems dpa' la'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje la'o/ /rdo rje hUM ste hUM rims
346b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /nA da'i bar du bsdu ba'o/ /nA da stong pa nyid la bsdu/ /de yi ngang la nyal ba'o/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i nyal lugs ni/ /ye shes lha rnams gshegs gsol te/ /dam tshig sems dpa' i nga rgyal gyis/ /gnyid kyis dub ba bsal ba dang/ /snga bar ldang zhing
346b4(rgyud 'grel): snang ba yi/ /dran pa yid la gzhag pas nyal/ /'chi ba bslu ba ka pA ra la/ /skam po dmigs te nyal ba'o/ /brgyad ba 'di ni bsdus par zhes pa'i don ni/ /nad par langs te snga ma bzhin/ /kos nas brtsams te nyal ba'i bar/ /bya ba brgyad po rdzogs par bya/ 'di
346b5(rgyud 'grel): lta'i bya ba brgyad pa ni/ /dbang bskur thob cing dam tshig skyong/ /bla ma la gus gtod phong che/ /dad ldan brtson 'grus che ba dang/ /lus ngag spyod pa mdzes pa yis/ /bla ma rdo rje spun la gus/ nga rgyal chung zhing bshags la brtson/ /gsod par smra zhing gzhan don
346b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag/ de? lta bu la sbyin bya yi/ /bla ma mi bsten dam tshig med dang rnam par smin la mi 'dzem rang tshul dregs/ /thos bsam bsgom la ma sbyangs dro ni rtog pa'i dra bas rnam par g.yengs/ /tsan dan shing bzhin yon tan chung la nga rgyal tshe phyir bla ma rdo
346b7(rgyud 'grel): rje spun sogs la/ /bskur sti'i sems bral 'jig rten grags pa don du gnyer zhing gzhan tshig khyad du gsod/ /'di 'dra'i gang zag rnams dang stan gcig la yang mi 'dug po ti'ang mi bstan na/ /bshad dang gdams ngag sbyin par bya ba yid kyis kyang
347a1(rgyud 'grel): ni bsam par mi bya dngos su smos ci dgos/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i man ngag /slob dpon shI la sam b+ha bas las dang po pa'i ngor? bsdus te mdzad pa rdzogs so// (//rgyud sna tshogs las btus pa'i gtor ma'i tshogs zhu?)
347a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nA nA tan+tod+d+hi to pa li bid+hi/ bod skad du/ rgyud sna tshogs lA btus pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /sku mchog rang gi snang bas 'khyud/ /skyob pa ma lus
347a3(rgyud 'grel): spre? mdzod pa/ /rdo rje sems dpar phyag 'tshal nas/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams rab ster ba/ /lha mo chos dbyings dbang phyug ma/ /ma lus rgyal ba rnams kyi yum/ /'gro ba skyob la rab btud nas/ /gang gi sku drin chen po yis/ /gsung ni bla med thob 'gyur ba/ /'jam
347a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs pad+ma/ /chu skyes gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi reg pa 'khor ba yi/ /gdung ba dag ni zhi 'gyur ba/ /bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyi zhabs/ /pad+ma dang 'brel brtul bstod nas/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /gtor
347a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sgrub thabs bdud rtsi mtshungs/ /sna tshogs rgyud kyi rgya mtsho las/ /yang dag btus nas bdag gis bshad/ /sngon gyi dus su bcom ldan gyis/ /zhal gyi man ngag gsungs par gyur/ /de tsam kho nas sems can rnams/ /grub gyur glegs bam
347a6(rgyud 'grel): dag las min/ /de nas gsum ldan du gyur nas/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud rnams sbrul par gyur/ de las don gyi 'brel rtogs nas/ /bsams te skye bos dngos grub thob/ /gnyis ldan du ni gtsor rgyal bas/ /bshad pa rgya chen mdzad par gyur/ /de
347a7(rgyud 'grel): don rtogs pa nyid kyis ni/ /mkhas pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ rtsed pa'i dus gyur deng sang ni/ /gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis po/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du gsungs/ /'on kyang skye bos zhi ma gyur/ /ci phyir 'di ltar sems can
347b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /rtag tu tshe dang brtson 'grus chung/ /chags sogs nyon mongs gdung ba yis/ /rtag tu rang gi sems gdung gyur/ /rang gi lto ba dag la brtson/ /'ba' zhig lhur len yid ldan pa/ /rgyal po mnyes sogs byas pa dang/ /tho rangs langs nas s? par ?//
347b2(rgyud 'grel): nang par bshad gci dag gis te/ nyi ma phye 'phreng zas skom gyis/ /tshim nas 'dod pas gnod 'gyur te/ /skye bo mtshan mo gnyid kyis so/ /re zhig lo ni brgya thub pa/ /tshe yi mchog tu brjod par bya/ /sems can de dag gnyid kyis ni/ /phyed ni yongs su zad par
347b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /byis pa rgas pa nad rnams kyis/ /de las kyang ni phyed zas 'gyur/ /tshe yi cha shas lhag ma yis/ /nang du dge ba ji snyed byed/ /'on kyang gal te dge ba yis/ /las la brtson 'grus dang bcas 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni thob 'gyur na/ /de min
347b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi dbang gyur pas/ /'dod ngan kha cig bud med kyi/ /dbang po'i chu sgo nyam pa ru/ /lhung bar gyur nas 'khor ba yis/ /rgya mtshor rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi lam las yongs nyams shing/ /skad cig longs spyod la bskul brtson/ /de nyid
347b5(rgyud 'grel): nyams? pa'i grogs? ngan? gyis/ /kha cig rnam par nyams par 'gyur/ kha cig tshol ba'i sdug bsngal nyen/ /bza' btung dag ni brtsal pa'i phyir/ /rmongs pa 'phad pa dang ldan pas/ /phyogs bcu dag tu 'khyam par 'gyur/ /nyin mtshan gnyid ni mi ldog cing/ /rgyal po mnyes
347b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs nyon mongs kyis/ /yongs su gdungs pa'i sems ldan pa/ /gzhan dag 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /de ltar sems can rnam dpyad nas/ /rtag tu mi khom pa yi tshogs/ /brtson 'grus mi ldan de bas na/ /bdag gis ngal 'di 'bras bur bcas/ /sems can
347b7(rgyud 'grel): la ni phan 'dod pas/ /rtogs par sla zhing gzhung nyung la/ /rab tu don mang yid 'ong ba/ /gtor ma'i las kyi cho ga bshad/ /'di na kha cig phyogs snga ma/ /rab tu byed pa 'di lta ste/ /chos rnams dag ni ma skyes shing/ /gnyis kyis stong la sngags
348a1(rgyud 'grel): rig par/ /ji ltar gtor sbyin gang zhig la/ /yang dag par ni bgegs gang yod/ /byung nas rab tu zhig 'gyur na/ /sngags kyis gang zhig rab rgyas byed/ /rang bzhin gyis ni bskal pa yi/ /lha tshogs rnams la gtor
348a2(rgyud 'grel): ma ni/ /de nyid rig pas ji ltar gtang/ /de rnams de ni ji ltar za/ /mtshan ma gcig sogs gnas su ni/ /gtor ma ji ltar bor par bya/ /gzhan du min zhing der gtor yang/ /de rnams kyis de ji ltar 'khyer/ /gzhan yang shin tu nyung ba yi/ /
348a3(rgyud 'grel): chu dang bza' ba la sogs pas/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs grangs med pa'i/ /'byung po kun ni ji ltar tshim/ /yi dags la sogs gang 'ga' zhig /khrag gi btung ba mthung byed pa/ /sngags pas gtor ma tsam gyis ni/ /de dag ji ltar mgu bar
348a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /gzod nas ma skyes rdzogs byang chub/ /thob pa'i skyob pa rnams dang ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang de rnams la/ /gtor sbyin rig pa ci zhig yod/ /de tsam gyis ni mnyes gyur nas/ /bskal ba mang por rnal 'byor pas/ /thob 'gyur
348a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i dngos grub gang/ /mi rnams la ni ji ltar ster/ /'dir ni brjod bya rang bzhin gyis/ /chos rnams re zhig bdag med cing/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za yi/ /grong khyer dang ni rmi lam mtshungs/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /'gro 'di
348a6(rgyud 'grel): bden pa gnyis su bstan/ /rnam rtog dang bas cig shos las/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam mo/ /chos nyid la ni rab zhugs pa/ /gnyis med rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /re zhig gtor ma dag gi las/ /dam pa'i don du ji ltar bya/ /'on kyang kun rdzob
348a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs brten nas/ /bsod nams tshogs ni 'phel bya'i phyir/ /de la dang po'i las can gyis/ /gter ma'i las ni bya ba yin/ /de nyid kyi ni rim gyis 'dir/ /bgegs rnams kun tu 'byung ba yod/ /de bas de rab zhi bya'i phyir/ /mkhas pa rnams
348b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi gtor ma bsngags/ /dngos rnams skad cig nyid yin yang/ /sngags rnams la ni nus pa yod/ /dug 'joms pa'i sngags bzhin du/ /de dag mngon sum nyid du 'grub/ /sngags rnams nus pa 'di 'dra ste/ mi snang lha tshogs gang yin pa/ /de nyid re zhig spyan
348b2(rgyud 'grel): drangs pas/ /mi'i mngon sum nyid du 'gyur/ /shing gcig drung la sogs pa yang/ /dngos grub gnas su bcom ldan gsungs/ /des na rnam pa de lta bu/ /gtor ma'i gnas su gsungs par gyur/ /lha rnams rang mthus gtor ma las/ /ro dag myang bar byed pa nyid des na snang bar
348b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur kyang ni/ /nyes pa rtsod pa ma yin no/ /gzhan yang dngos grub mchog thob pa'i/ /rnal 'byor la gnas gtor ma mi/ /glangs na lha rnams za bar byed/ /nags su klu'i byang chub bzhin/ /sngags kyis bdud rtsi lngar byas nas/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis gtor ma gtong?/ /de'i
348b4(rgyud 'grel): mthu yis lha tshogs rnams/ /mnyes 'gyur chung ba'i nyes pa med/ /zang zing la sogs rab dbye ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pas sbyin rnam bzhi/ gsungs te de bas yi dags kyi/ /gtor ma la ni chos bshad gyur/ /'di ltar 'dam gyis rnyogs pa bzhin/ /gang+gA'i
348b5(rgyud 'grel): chu bo gang gi rgyun/ /mthong nas kyang ni khyed rnams khrag /lag pa dag gis ci phyir 'thung/ /des na ma byin blangs pa yis/ /'di'i rnam smin mi bzad yin/ /de bas tshim byed gtor ma ni/ /khyed rnams kyis ni blang bar gyis/ /de ltar rim pa 'di bzhin du/ /rnal
348b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa 'di sa yi dags rnams/ /chos 'dod par ni de bas skyon/ /cung zad tsam ni yod ma yin/ /bcom ldan 'das dang ma mo la/ /cung zad sogs pa med mod kyi/ /'on kyang bsod nams tshogs dag la/ /dang po'i las can bskul bar bya/ /rim gyis ye shes tshogs
348b7(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang/ /thob nas rnal 'byor pa dag ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub snod 'gyur te/ /des na dngos grub cis mi 'thob/ /grangs med bskal pas byang chub ni/ /thob 'gyur 'di ni bden mod kyang/ /thabs dang ma tshad nyid gyur pa/ /rim 'di theg pa chen po yin/ /sngags 
349a1(rgyud 'grel): tshul chen por rnal 'byor pas/ /skad cig gcig gis nges pa ru/ /rdo rje 'chang ni chen po'i gnas/ /thob 'gyur blo yis khyad par gyis/ /de ltar phyogs rnams brtsams nas ni/ /gtor ma'i cho ga'i gzhung lugs 'grub/ /yang dag byang chub
349a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod rnams kyis/ /de yang mgu bar bya ba yin/ /nyin dang mtshan du rnal 'byor pas/ /de thun gsum mam bzhi dag tu/ /bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes kyi/ /tshogs ni spel phyir bya ba yin/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga gang/ /de ni gtor ma chen por bshad/ /
349a3(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ /rnam pa dang bcas rab brnyes phyir/ /re zhig de'i rim pa 'di/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ /phyi rol mkhas pas tshim bya ba/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis mnyan par gyis/ /re zhig dang po rnal 'byor pa/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i
349a4(rgyud 'grel): lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar las langs te/ /sngar bsdus pa pul+li ra ma la sogs pa gnas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo sna khur g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i srog dang rtsol bas bskul ba
349a5(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'od zer spro ba'i sbyor ba sa'i rdul tshon la sogs pas sbrul pa'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lor so so'i gnas su rnam par spros te bkod la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa bzhin du yang dag par mchod de gtor ma'i las bya'o/ /
349a6(rgyud 'grel): de la re zhig dang po dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i lha dang/ /klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ 'byung po rnams la rim pa 'dis gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu rnam par dgod pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ /
349a7(rgyud 'grel): nang gi dkyil 'khor las phyi rol gyi rdo rjer ba las phyi rol gyi shar du dur khrod ma dang/ dra mi ri dang/ gtum mo bdud rtsi'i chu'i snod lag na thogs pa dkar mo dang/ ser mo dang/ dmar mo'i bdag nyid can dgod par bya'o/ /byang du drag mo dang/ khrag ma dang
349b1(rgyud 'grel): sha za ma lcags kyu lngas gang ba'i snod lag na thogs pa ser mo dang dkar mo dang/ /dmar mo'i mdog can rnams so/ /nub tu mi ? ma dang/ 'bar ma dang/ 'jigs rung ma lag na gtor ma'i snod thogs pa dmar mo dang/ ser mo dang/ sngon mo'i mdog can rnams so/ /lho
349b2(rgyud 'grel): ru thod pa mo dang/ rdo rje ma dang/ bum pa ma bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs gang ba'i snod thogs pa nag mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ dkar mo'i mdog can rnams so/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su sgeg mo dang/ dri ma dkar mo dang/ ser mo'i mdog can dag go/ me'i phyogs su pi bang ma dang
349b3(rgyud 'grel): me tog pa dkar mo dang/ nag mo'i mdog can rnams so/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su glu ma dang/ bdug pa ma nag mo dang/ dmar mo dag go /rlung gi phyogs su gar ma dang/ mar me ma dmar mo dang/ ser mo dag go /de dag thams cad 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/
349b4(rgyud 'grel): sgra bshig pa sbrul rnams kyis brgyan pa/ gos dang brgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ /bzang po'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa rnams so/ /de nas phyi rol gyi sa gzhi'i g.yas phyogs nas bskor bar 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma'i sngags kyi rjes su 'brangs nas zhing skyong
349b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad yongs su brtag ste/ phyogs brgyad du drag po nag po la sogs pa zhing gi bdag po rnams blo yis dgod par bya'o/ /de la rim pa 'di yin te/ shar du drag po nag po/ byang du drag po chen po/ nub tu lha sbyin/ /lho ru nag po/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su brtsigs pa/ me'i phyogs su
349b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs su rung ba/ bden bral gyi phyogs su rnon po/ rlung gi phyogs su log 'dren te/ de dag thams cad kyang mig gsum pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ gdong gcig pa ji skad bshad pa'i phyag mtshan dang/ gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dkar po dang/ dmar
349b7(rgyud 'grel): po'i mdog can dang/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams kyi dkar nag dang/ dkar ser dang/ dkar gnag dang/ dmar gnag rnams te 'khor dang bcas pa dag go/ nag po drag po'i mdun du tsA muN Di/ g.yon du drag mo/ rgyab tu 'jigs su rung ma/ g.yas su
350a1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo dbu ma bsam par bya'o/ /lha mo de dag kyang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i mdog can mchod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pas lag pa brel ba mchod pa rnam pa lnga kho nas yang dag par mchod par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin du byang du rgyal ma dang/ rnam
350a2(rgyud 'grel): par rgyal ma dang/ rgyal byed ma dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba drag po chen po'i 'khor rnams te/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mdog can no/ /de bzhin du nub du nag mo chen mo dang/ nag mo sbom ma dang/ rnal 'byor ma dang/ lha sbyin gyi
350a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma gsung gi 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma'i mdog can rnams bsam bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho ru dbang ma dang/ zla ba ma dang/ drag mo dang/ gdug pa zhi byed ma dang/ 'phyang ma dang/ lha'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba nag mo'i lha mo sku'i
350a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma'i mdog can rnams so/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su kam po dzi ma dang/ 'bar ma dang/ 'jib ma dang/ grong na kun tu gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma rtsigs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma khwa'i gdong can ma'i mdog can rnams so/ /me'i phyogs su
350a5(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i gzugs can mdang/ mche ba'i gzugs can ma dang/ gtsigs ma zhes bya ba 'jigs su rung ba'i mkha' 'gro ma 'ug pa'i gdong can ma'i mdog can rnams so/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su thod pa'i phreng ba can ma dang/ phreng ldan ma dang/ mgo can
350a6(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ mthu chen ma zhes bya ba'i rnon po'i mkha' 'gro ma khyi'i gdong can ma'i mdog can rnams so/ /rlung gi phyogs su lag na ral gri ma dang/ lag na dgra sta ma dang/ rdo rje ma dang/ lag na gzhu thogs ma zhes bya ba log 'dren gyi mkha' 'gro ma dag
350a7(rgyud 'grel): gi gdong can ma'i mdog can rnams so/ /de nas shar gyi sgar khyab 'jug dbyig pa thogs pa/ lhor tshangs pa rnga yab thogs pa/ nub tu drag po mtshan nas sgrogs lhung len pa/ byang du dbang po gdugs thogs pa/ de bzhin du lho'i snam bu la dbang
350b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyi phyogs su brgya byin/ /me'i phyogs su lus ngan po/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag po/ /glu'i phyogs su rlung gi bdag po'o/ /de rnams bu dang chung ma dang 'khor dang bcas pa ste/ kha dog dang lag pa dang phyag mtshan ni sgrub thabs gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang bar
350b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de la phyi rol gyi khyams kyi shar gyi char rus gong 'jigs byed dang/ kha TwAM ga dang ldan pa'i tshogs kyi srin po dang/ tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang/ dril bu'i rna ba can zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i mdog can rnams bsam bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du
350b3(rgyud 'grel): byang du gtum mo'i dbang phyug dang/ 'dun sa'i lha dang/ rga po'i dbang phyug dang/ sil sgras 'jigs byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'i mdog rnams so/ /lho ru ni gtum po ra'i dbang phyug dang/ sgra chen dang/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang gzhu 'dzin ces
350b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba kam po dzi ma la sogs pa'i mdog can rnams so/ /de bzhin du 'dod pa drag po dang/ gnas kyi dbang phyug dang/ cang te'u 'dul ba dang/ rnga sgras 'jigs byed ces bya 'jib byed ma la sogs pa'i mdog can rnams so/ /'di rnams kyang lag pa bzhi
350b5(rgyud 'grel): pa kha TwaM ga thogs pa lha mo la 'khyud cing lag na rtsi gsum thogs pa mig gsum pa stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can sprul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa thod pa'i phreng ba can rnams so/ /de nas phyi rol gyi mu khyud kyi sa gzhi la 'byung po dang/ /sha za la
350b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ca co'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams dang/ de dag gi 'khor rnams kyang blta bar bya'o/ /drag po la sogs pa dang/ rus gong 'jigs byed la sogs pa rnams kyi yi ge ni rang gi ming gi dang po'i yi ge de kho na yin no/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
350b7(rgyud 'grel): bcings te gung mo dang mdzub mo dag brkyang nas lcags kyu'i rnam par sbyar bar bya'o/ /oM A karSha ya hUM phaT ces bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM yuM swAhA zhes bya ba dang/ rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya ni dur khrod ma la
351a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags so/ /thal mo sbyar nas de nyid g.yas su phab ste gzung bar bya zhing/ /oM g+haM swAhA zhes bya ba ni drag mo la sogs pa rnams kyi'o/ /rdo rje thal mo bcings nas dbye bar bya zhing/ /oM ku ru ku ru swAhA
351a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni gtsigs ma la sogs pa rnams kyi'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa kyang nas rgyab gnyis sbyar te sor mo rnams so sor bcing zhing/ oM pa ta li hUM swAhA zhes bya ba ni mi bzad ma la sogs pa rnams kyi'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ dgu dag
351a3(rgyud 'grel): tu gzung zhing/ oM hUM swAhA zhes bya ba ni sgeg mo'i 'o/ /g.yon gyi brkyang ste mthe bong dang srin lag sbyar nas g.yas pas gzung bar bya zhing/ oM su pri ya gan d+he hUM zhes bya ba ni dri ma'i 'o/ /pi bang gi zlos gar dang/ oM hUM ho swA hA zhes bya
351a4(rgyud 'grel): ba pi bang ma'i'o/ /thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor gzhag nas/ /oM sh+rI swAhA zhes bya ba ni me tog ma'i 'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas 'dzum mo bsgrengs te/ bar bskyod nas hUM hUM hUM swAhA zhes bya ba ni glu ma'i 'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te lag pa
351a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa'i tshigs su bzung zhing/ oM i? swAhA/ zhes pa ni gdug pa ma'i'o/ /lag ba g.yon pas g.yas kyi rked pa'i char sgeg pa dang bcas par gzhag nas g.yas phrag par gzhag cing/ oM su ni ra te swAhA zhes bya ba ni gar ma'i 'o/ /thal mo
351a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba spyi bor gzung zhing/ /oM kluM swAhA zhes bya ba ni mar me ma'i 'o/ /g.yas pa khu tshur bcings nas mdzub mo dang gung mo dag bsgrengs te dpral bar reg par bya zhing oM mu mu hUM swAhA zhes bya ba ni brgya byin gyi'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings
351a7(rgyud 'grel): nas mdzub mo gnyis rin po che'i rnam par sbyar zhing/ /oM ratne gre swAhA zhes bya ba ni nor sbyin gyi'o/ /g.yas pa khu tshur bcings te sdigs mdzub bsgrengs nas g.yas pa'i ba dan gsum spyi bor gzhag nas oM hUM swAhA zhes pa ni drag po'i'o ?
351b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i khu tshur snying gar bskyod cing/ oM swAhA tshangs pa'i 'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste kha spub nas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis khro bo'i sor mo brkyang ste dbus su sbyar zhing gdugs kyi rnam par byas nas/ oM mu swAhA zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i 'o/ /drag po nag po la sogs
351b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams dang/ rus gong 'jigs byed la sogs pa rnams kyi ni drag po'i dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya kho na yin no/ /de la lha rnam par bkod pa'i rjes thogs la mchod pa rnam pa nyi shus yang dag par mchod de/ sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings te yi ge hUM gi sgra
351b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas/ hUM hUM hUM hUM TuM hUM hUM hUM/ oM g+he g+he g+he/ hUM oM g+he tya g+he tya hUM swAhA zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis shin tu mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje de nyid kyis bzung nas/ /dril bu chos kyi dkrol bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings gnas/ /rgyab tu rgyab ni sbyar bar
351b4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /mthe'u chud gnyis ni bcings byas nas/ /cung zad du ni bcing bar bya/ /oM badzra g+ha Na Te ho/ /de nas oM badzra g+ha Na Te/ ra Na ra Na/ pra ra Na pra ra Na/ saM pra ra Na saM pra? ra Na/ sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsa ni te/ pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA nAM saM b+ha pe/ badzra h+ri da yaM saM shi ni
351b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM swAhA zhes bya pa'i sngags kyi dril bu bzung ste/ dpal mchog dang pUM rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod la/ /rdo rje'i glu blangs te/ de bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs ba'i bstod pa dang mchod pa byas la/ /yang dag par
351b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par bya ba'i phyir dril bu dkrol bar bya'o/ /de nas snying gar rdo rje thal mo bcings te snying khar gzhag la/ /oM shud+d+ha d+harme hUM a A oM a zhes bya ba brjod pas lha'i nga rgyal brtan par byas phyi rol gyi lha rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /ji skad
351b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i gos dang rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa/ brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa'i slob dpon rkang pa g.yas pa sems dpa' i skyil mo krung du gnas pa g.yon brkyang bas rol pa'i tshul du gnas pa rdzas
352a1(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim po rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la/ /kha dog dkar po la sogs pa'i me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ 'bras sA lu'i dri zhim po'i 'bras chan zho dang sha kha ra dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar nag dag
352a2(rgyud 'grel): bsres pa rdzas? la sogs pa las byas pa'i snod rnams su bzhag pas shar gyi sgor gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM wad ta li mahA wad ta li/ hUM hUM hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA zhes bya ba'i bar sngags 'dis lha rnams dgug par
352a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /oM wa hi nI/ mahA wa ni sUrya tsan+d+ra sid+d+hya mu khi/ dza ya ra dzi sau ma dzi u ma de ba ga gsu ru pi ta ra ya/ sa tod gra ha ga Na sarbe ga Na pa ti karti kar sh+ri sha sh+rir te be di ga lo a su ra sa ro tse/ puk+ka si/ mahA puk si hUM he ho/ arSha ya a karSha ya/ sa ma
352a4(rgyud 'grel): ya de be hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya gnyis bsgreng ba dang/ oM b+hakA ya b+hakA ya/ sa ma ye tiSh+Tha ba hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya bas mnyes par byas te se gol gsum grdabs la gtang bar bya'o/ /de nas shar gyi phyogs su sa phyogs gtsang mar dor
352a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /de nas lha'i gtor ma'o// //de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'o ma la sogs pa las byas pa'i lha bshos kyis yongs su bskor bar mngar gsum dang bsres pa'i 'o thug gis bkang
352a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i snod du bzhag ste/ sngags dang phyag rgya de nyid kyis mdza' yas dang/ nor rgyas dang/ 'jog po dang/ stobs kyi rgyu dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma chen po dang/ dung skyong dang/ rigs ldan dang/ lha ldan dang/ lha ldan chen po
352a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ zla ba dang/ gtsug tor dang/ gtsug tor chen po dang/ dbyig pa thogs pa dang/ /hU lu dang/ dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo dang/ rgya mtsho chen po dang/ gdung ba dang/ gdung ba chen po dang/ dpal 'od dang/ 'od chen dang/ rin po che'i 'od dang/ gzugs bzangs dang
352b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs chen dang/ sbrul bzangs dang/ gsus po che dang/ dzi li dang/ mahA dzi li ste/ oM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ ma hA nA ga a d+hi pa ti sarba b+hur b+hu phruM phruM phruM phu rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /mthe bong dang ni mthe chung sbyar/ /dbus kyi sor mo dag brkyang nas/ /gdengs ka'i
352b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par sbyar bar bya/ /de lta bu 'dis srin lag bzung ste btang bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs su chu bo la dor bar bya'o/ /klu'i gtor ma'o// //de nas nub phyogs su mngon par phyogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram na gnas pas tsan dan
352b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar po la sogs pa las byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum me tog dmar po la sogs pas mdzes par byas la/ snga ma bzhin du zho dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa'i 'bras can bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag par ldan pa'i snod mdun du bzhag la snga ma bzhin du nor bu bzang po dang
352b4(rgyud 'grel): gang ba bzang po dang/ rgyal ba bzang po la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnams bos te/ rdo rje bsngags pa snying gar bcings pas bzung zhing/ oM nA gA d+hi pa ti pat+ta li hUM swAhA zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis mnyes par bya'o/ /de kho na bzhin du btang nas lho'i
352b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su shing gcig par dor bar bya'o/ /de ni gnod sbyin gyi gtor ma'o// //yang de kho na bzhin du lho ru mngon par phyogs par gnas pa rdo rje'i 'gros dang ldan pas tsan dan dmar po la sogs pa las byas pa'i dkyil
352b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gru gsum me tog dmar po la sogs pa bkram par lha bshos la sogs pa yang phul te/ nya sha skam po dang/ sgog pa dang/ btsong dang/ khrag dang/ til dang/ bag phye la sogs pa'i khur ba dang/ bdud rtsi lnga dang/ bza' ba dang/ bca' ba
352b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ btung ba dang/ myang ba dang/ gzhib pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang nya'i gzugs brnyan gyis gang ba'i mdun du bzhag la/ sngags dang phyag rgya de rnams kyis snod la reg ste/ gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i e ka prikA zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags
353a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings te mdzub mo gnyis lu gu rgyud byas la/ phyag rgya de dang/ oM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha dza(rgyud 'grel): phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis mgu bar btang la/ rnga la sogs pa'i
353a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra dang/ dril bu'i sgra dang/ 'byung po'i gtor ma yo byad kyi sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang nyid kyis gdan dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi yod pa de la phyi rol gyi mtshams kyi phyogs brgyad du gtor ma dor bar bya'o/ /de ni 'byung po'i gtor ma'o// //
353a3(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma de dag thams cad la/ /sngags pa bzang pos gtong dus su/ /dge bsnyen gyi ni spyi bo ru/ /lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya/ /gtor ma skyel byed dang ldan gang/ /'phags pa 'khyil ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /de la bsang gtor bya ba nyid/ /min na de
353a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis zos 'gyur/ nang gi dkyil 'khor dag gi ni/ gtor ma gang gis rnal 'byor pas/ /dngos grub mchog ni 'grub 'gyur ba/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ sgyu ma'i rgyud las ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /skra bshig rkang pa yis ni gar stabs
353a5(rgyud 'grel): byas/ /gcer bu lho phyogs gnas pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /thun mtshams kun tu gtor ma rab sbyin bya/ /dang por phyogs ni brgyad rnams su/ /khro mo mkha' 'gro ma bsam bya/ /de rnams la ni blo rgya ches/ /bdud rtsi lnga ldan gtor ma sbyin/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang
353a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan/ /thun bzhi ru ni rab tu bya/ /snga dro rdo rje mkha' 'gro la/ /mkha' spyod rnams la nyin byed na/ /mtshon dus sa spyod rnams la'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma la mtshan byed na/ /g.yas brkyang gnas pas mkha' 'gro la/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis mkha' spyod la
353a7(rgyud 'grel): sa? spyod rnams la khyad bar du/ /rkang pa mnyam par bya ba yin/ /pad+ma'i bskor ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /gcer bu gang dang yang dag ldan/ /drag po'i lha stangs dang ldan pa/ /mig ni g.yon pa dag gis blta/ /rus sbal phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /dpral ba'i steng du
353b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bzhag/ skad cig rnam pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /he ru ka'i gzugs su bya/ /cig car sngags ni brjod bya zhing/ /cig car phyogs ni rgyas gdab cing/ /dur khrod dam ni chu bo'i 'gram/ /mtshan ma gcig gam bzhi mdo ru/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu rab ster ba/ rnal 'byor rgyal
353b2(rgyud 'grel): pos rtag tu sbyin/ /bdud rtsis kha ni bkang nas su/ /rus gong steng dag gnas byas la/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'ching ba yis/ /sngags ni brjod cing gtor ma sbyin/ /oM sarba kro d+ha DA ki n+ya maM ba laM pra tits+tshan+tu hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas gtor ma dur khrod la sogs su/ /rnal 'byor skyes
353b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog dag gis dor/ /de nas me tog mgor bzhag ste/ rang gi gnas su 'jug par bya/ /de ni nang gi rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gtor ma'o// //grangs ni bzhi ru gyur pa yi/ /rgyal chen ji ltar tshim gyur pa/ /gtor ma'i las ni
353b4(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong ba/ /de'i rjes la bshad par bya/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor shar sogs kyi/ /phyogs rnams su ni 'khor lo bzhi/ /rnam par bsgoms nas gang ba'i snod/ /bzhi ni de ru bzhag par bya/ /yul 'khor skyong gi snod gang yin/ /de ni bza' ba chang sbangs pas/
353b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gang bar rab tu bya/ /de bzhin rnam thos sras kyi ni/ /sha dang chang la sogs pas dgang/ /de bzhin lus 'phags po'i snod/ /khrag gis gang bar gyur par bya/ /mig mi bzang gi snod dag ni/ /'o ma dag gis dgang bar bya/ /de ni snod kyi cho ga
353b6(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /byas nas rgyal po chen po ni/ /bskyed pa'i phyir ni bsgom par bya/ /dang po'i yi ge las byung ba'i/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po ni/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs shing/ /ye shes sems dpa' dang ldan bsgom/ /he ru ka yi skur gnas te/ /lag na rdo rje
353b7(rgyud 'grel): dril bu thogs/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos sngags 'di yis/ /de rnams so sor gtor ma sbyin/ /oM d+h+ri ta raShDA ya gand+harba sa nA d+hi pa ta ye i maM pa liM pra tIts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM na mo bai sh+ra ba NA ya yak+Sha se nA d+hi pa ta ye i mi
354a1(rgyud 'grel): ba liM pra tIts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bi ru b+ha kA ya mahA ku be ra ad+hi pa tA ye i maM pa liM pra tIts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bi rU b+hak+Sha ya ma hA nA gA d+hi pa ta ye i maM ba liM pra tIts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu
354a2(rgyud 'grel): sma ra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ sngags tshig bla med 'di rnams kyis/ /snod bzhi byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rim bzhin du/ /shar la sogs par dor bar bya/ /de ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o// //bde mchog
354a3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga las gsungs pa'i/ /skye bo rnams ni mchod 'gyur ba/ /gtor ma 'byung po thams cad la/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/ /dam tshig 'khor lo'i phyi rol tu/ /hUM gi sa bon las byung ba/ /shing gcig dang bcas dur khrod brgyad/ /rnal
354a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor rig pas bsam par bya/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang/ /de bzhin yi dags sha za dang/ /grul bum brjed byed mkha' 'gro dang/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs nyid dag/ shing drung gcig ni brgyad po'o/ /rtse mor drag po rnams bsam bya/ /shing
354a5(rgyud 'grel): gi rtsa ru de mtshungs pa'i/ /'khor dag rnam par bsam par bya/ /khwa'i gdong can la sogs pa'i/ /'khor gyi rang gi gzugs dag ni/ /thams cad hUM las yang dag byung/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs dag thogs pa/ chang dang sha dang gtsong la sogs//
354a6(rgyud 'grel): khu ba de bzhin sha'i gzugs/ /snod du bcug nas de nyid ni/ /bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin nyid du bya/ /sngar bzhin skra bshig la sogs ldan/ /g.yon brkyang la sogs sbyor byas pa/ /brtul zhugs bzang pos sngags 'di yis/ /de rnams nyid ni
354a7(rgyud 'grel): bod? par bya/ /oM badzra a ra li to dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra DA ki ni sa ma ya stwaM dra sh+ya ho(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di lan gsum brjod nas ni/ /rang nyid kyi ni snying gar yang/ /snod kyi phyag rgya lan gsum du/ bskor nas gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /mkha' spyod phyag rgya bcings nas ni/
354b1(rgyud 'grel): khro cig mtshan cig la sogs su/ /sgrub pa po yis sngags 'di yis/ /dogs pa med par gtor ma btang/ /oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa b+hUd tra ta pi shA tson ma da a ba sma ra DA ka DA ka n+ya da ya i maM pa li grih+naM tu sa ma ya rak+Sha d+hu ma ma sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tshandu
354b2(rgyud 'grel): ya the paM/ ya the Sh+TaM /b+hu ny+dza tha pi pa tha/ dzi Ta tha/ ma ti kra ma tha ma ma sarba karta ya sad su khaM bi shud+d+ha ye/ sa ha yi ka b+ha bandtu hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de 'dra'i sngags chen brjod byas nas/ /dur khrod du ni gtor ma sbyin/ /'jigs byed sems can drag
354b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i bdag/ snying rjer ldan pas gtor ma dor/ /de lta bu yi rim 'di yis/ /'di ni 'byung po thams cad brjod/ /bgegs rnams zhi bar bya phyir yang/ /gtor ma 'di ni sngags pa yin/ /de ni 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o// //
354b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /gur las gsungs pa'i gtor ma'i las/ /khams gsum dag tu gcig car du/ /tshim par bya phyir yang dag bya/ /nam mkha' i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /chu skyes 'dab brgyad dbus su sgom/ /dbang po shar gyi 'dab mar
354b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ gshin rje lho ru dgod par bya/ /chu lha nub kyi 'dab mar te/ byang du gnod sbyin dgod par bya/ /me'i phyogs su me chen po/ /bden bral phyogs su bden bral te/ rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha bsam/ /'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan du/ /zla ba nyi ma tshangs la
354b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /tshangs ris dam pa rnams dang ni/ /tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don bdag nyid/ /dga' ldan 'thab bral na gnas dang/ rgyal po chen po kun du skyes/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dag dang ni/ /'phrul dga' yi ni lha
354b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ /gang dag gtsang ma'i gnas 'dug dang/ /bde ba can na kun tu gnas/ /'og min na ni gnas pa dang/ /'od can 'jig rten khams gnas dang/ /sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas pa/ /de dag thams cad steng du bsam/ /stobs rgyu dang ni dung skyong dang/
355a1(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas de bzhin nor? rgyas dang/ 'jog po dang ni rig ldan nyid/ /pad+ma che dang pad+ma ni/ /chos 'byung gi ni dbus na gnas/ /lha ma yin dang sems dmyal dang/ /chos 'byung gi ni 'og tu'o/ /oM las tshangs pa la sogs pa/ /yi ge hUM
355a2(rgyud 'grel): las dbang po sogs/ /a las stobs rgyu la sogs pa/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa'o/ /steng ga lha ni shin tu dkar/ /dbang po la sogs mdog sngon po/ /stobs rgyu la sogs shin du dmar/ /rang snang rig mas yan lag 'khyud/ /rdo rje dril
355a3(rgyud 'grel): bus phyag brel ba/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas/ /tshangs sogs rtag pas rgyas gdab cing/ /rdo rje can gyis brgya byin sogs/ /ltos 'gro la sogs gar dbang gis/ /thams cad rigs las byung ba yi/ /go'u rI yis ni dgug par
355a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rkun mos gzhug par bya ba ste/ ro langs ma yis zhags pas bcing/ /dril bu za bod ma dpang bya/ /de nas mchod yon zhal bsil dbul/ /de bzhin me tog bdug pa sogs/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sngags 'di yis
355a5(rgyud 'grel): ni tshim par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ gsang sngags 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /sngar bzhin rdzas kyis gang ba yi/ /thod pa de rnams dag la dbul/ /mtshan gcig la sogs rnams su dor/ /gtor ma'i cho ga bzhin byas nas/ /dogs pa
355a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de nas 'thor 'thung phul byas nas/ /sngags 'di yis ni gshegs su gsol/ /oM badzra DA ki sa ma ya me nu pA la ya/ /badzra DA ki twe na pa tiSh+Tha dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me
355a7(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi ma me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga baM sarba ta thA ga ta mA me muny+dza DA ki b+ha ba mahA sa ma ya satwA a(rgyud 'grel): mu/ de nas gtor ma'i las byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor rang gi yan
355b1(rgyud 'grel): lag la/ /bsdu ba byas nas sngar rim bzhin/ /ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol/ /snga dro'i thun la de bzhin du/ thams cad mnyam par gzhag par bya/ /thun bzhi dag ni thams cad la/ /skad cig gis ni bsgom par bya/ /de ltar gur gyi rgyud gsungs
355b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /cig car 'byung po thams cad ni/ /tshim pa ru ni byed pa'i mchog /gtor ma bdag gis bshad pa yin/ /de ni dus gcig tu khams gsum pa tshim par byed pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /gang tshe rnal 'byor sngar bshad pa'i/ /gtor ma'i cho ga byed pas
355b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /gnod pa bya byed bgegs mthong ba/ /de tshe der bzhi bya'i phyir/ /gtor ma bya ba de rim pa/ /dpal ldan rgyud dra dgyes rdo rje/ /rgyud gnyis kyi ni rjes 'brangs nas/ /bdag gis bzang por bshad par bya/ /re zhig dang por rnal 'byor pas chos thams cad
355b4(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid du bsams te/ de nas ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge kha dog sngon po las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa phyag g.yas pa na ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang/ /rtse gsum bsnams pa/
355b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa na dril bu dang/ dgra sta dang/ tho ba bsnams pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ /ljags bskyod pa/ /dbu skra dmar ser/ spyan dmar po/ mgul ba sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i sa'i steng mnan pa/ /khro bo 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'phro ba/ /snying gar yi
355b6(rgyud 'grel): ge hUM gis mtshan pa/ ha ta zhes sgrogs par bdag nyid bsgoms la/ /de nas mdun du ci nus par rdul tshon la sogs pas dkyil 'khor kun tu dris te/ bum pa srog chags med pa'i chu dri bzang po dang ldan pas/ yongs su bkang ba lcug mas kha rgyan
355b7(rgyud 'grel): byas pa/ gos kyis mgrin pa dkris pa/ /nang du 'bru dang/ rin po che dang/ sman bcug pa bcu 'am/ lnga 'am/ gcig de nyid du gzhag la/ g.yon du mchod yon gyi snod dang/ g.yas su me tog la sogs pa'i yo byad gzhag ste/ mchod yon gyi
356a1(rgyud 'grel): snod la rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i sngags lan nyi shu gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /las thams cad pa'i snod la yang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags de kho na bzhin du yongs su bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i
356a2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa mdor bsdus pas bum pa rnams su rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la thug pa'i gzugs bskyed la rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod nas oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rdo rje yang dag
356a3(rgyud 'grel): par mchod de oM badzra g+haN+Te ra na zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis mchod la/ spos kyis gdugs te/ oM badzra d+h+rika ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bum pa dag spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog dang spos dang/ yon chab dang/ dri dang/ lha bshos

356a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la ni me long la dang/ sku gzugs rnams la ni dngos su'o/ /sku khrus kyi yo byad 'bru la sogs pa rnams ni khrus kyi cho ga las bstan te/ de nyid las shes par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi sngags kyis dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa dag
356a6(rgyud 'grel): gis dbang bskur la dkyil 'khor mchod pa lnga la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i sprin nag po dang mtshungs pa'i gnod sbyin dang srin po dang sha za la sogs pa lag na ral gri dang /
356a7(rgyud 'grel): tho ba dang/ mda'o che la sogs pa thogs pa rnams te/ nam mkha' la yang paM las byung ba'i pad+ma chen po de'i 'dab ma brgyad la 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kha dog dang dbyibs dang/ cha byad ji lta ba bzhin dang ldan pa/ lte ba'i
356b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bgegs kyi rgyal po log 'dren mdog dmar po glang po che'i gdong can/ /gdong gcig pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa g.yas na dgra sta dang/ ral gri thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon na phreng ba dang/ lag du thogs pa/ gsus ba 'phyang ba gar byed pa/ tshangs pa
356b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyab tu rkang pa gnyis mnan pa/ glang po che'i sgras gang ba'i mchu'i rtse mo'i sgras phyogs bcu'i gtos kyi nang 'gengs pa/ me tog gi mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis rkang ba'i pad+ma gnyis la phyag byas pa rnam par bsgoms la/ /oM badzra a ra li ho dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM paM ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra DA
356b3(rgyud 'grel): ki ni sa ma ya stwaM dri sh+ya ho zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bos la/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bcu kun tu bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yi ge hUM gi sgra 'jigs su rung ba brjod nas 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis yungs kar byin gyis brlabs te bgegs thams cad la dmigs
356b4(rgyud 'grel): nas oM ri ri ti ti phaT swAhA zhes bya ba'i sngags dang oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swAhA zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis me'i snod du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas bgegs rnams kyi spyi bo dang snying ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te dam tshig
356b5(rgyud 'grel): la gnas par mi byed na de'i tshe bag phye las bgegs rnams kyi gzugs brnyan byas te dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gsor ba'i rdo rjes phye mar byas na skad cig de nyid la de rnams dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sum b+ha ni suM b+ha zhes bya ba
356b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas phur bu gdab cing/ /de bzhin du sngags rkang pa phyi mas brdung bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes las la sogs pa'i bum pa 'am phru ba tshad chen po dang ldan pa chus yongs su gang bar bya ste/ nya'i sha rlon pa dang/ btsos pa dang/ bsregs pa'i dbye ba rnam
356b7(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum dang/ de bzhin du pri yang ku dang ko la tha dang tsa na ka dang/ 'breng bu'i chun po dang/ 'bras yos dang/ star ga'i 'bras bu dang/ snum khur dang/ sha dang/ ma yo sta dang/ thug ba dang/ btsong dang/ sgog spya dang/ ke'u dang/ khab dang/ 'gron bu dang

357a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta kA ya bIk+tsi t+tga? badzra NAM na mo badzra kro d+ha ya mahA daMSh+Tod ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha ha sta ya/ oM a mri te kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/
357a3(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bi spho? Ta ya bi spho Ta ya/ sarba bag+h+ni bi nA yaka? na/ mahA ga na pa ti dzi bi ta an+ta ka rA ya swAhA/ de'i rjes la rje btsun yi ge brgya pas me tog dang spos rnams kyis mchod la/ g.yas brkyang ba'i 'dug stangs nye
357a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bcings te dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje gsor bas sngags 'dis brjod par bya'o/ /oM iN+Ta dza ma dza la dzek+kha/ b+hud? ba N+Ni? bA u rak+kha tsa n+d+ra su dzdza mA da ba phu/ ta la pa ta laM aN+Tha? sa bu sa hha/ i daM ba lim+b+hu dza dza g+ha/ phu l+la TU? pu maM sa bi g+haM/ a
357a5(rgyud 'grel): ma sa pa kA dzdza sA da/ khanhi kha NI phe Da ga ta/ de bzhin du oM a kA ro mukhaM? sarba d+harmA NaM A dyA nu ta pan na twa ta ta oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swA hA yang na so so'i gtor ma sbyin bar bya'o/ /'di lta ste oM in+d+ra ye swA hA/ dbang po'i phyogs su'o/ /ge? ba swa ye swA hA
357a6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i phyogs su'o/ /oM a pAM pa ta ye swAhA/ chu'i phyogs su'o/ /oM yak+Sha baryi d+ha raM swAhA/ lus ngan po'i phyogs su'o/ /oM ru drA ya swAhA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su'o/ /oM agna ye swAhA/ me'i phyogs su'o/ /oM rak+Sha sid+d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/
357a7(rgyud 'grel): bden bral gyi phyogs su'o/ /oM wa ya be swAhA/ rlung gi phyogs su'o/ /oM gaM ka ri swAhA/ srin po rnams kyi'o/ /oM be tsi li tsi swAhA/ sha za rnams kyi'o/ /oM g+huM g+huM swAhA/ 'byung po rnams kyi'o/ /oM gaM ra la ye swAhA/ lha ma yin rnams kyi'o/ /oM
357b1(rgyud 'grel): ma ti b+hyo swAhA/ ma mo rnams kyi'o/ /oM bi shud+d+ha swAhA/ ba ha ni swAhA/ dri za rnams kyi'o/ /oM yak+Sha shar ya swAhA/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi'o/ /oM pi shA tsa ga ti swAhA/ sha za rnams kyi'o/ /oM gra ha sardza prab? ta dzhyo? ti ma yaswAhA/ rgyu skar rnams kyi'o/ /rim pa 'di kho na
357b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du sngags 'di rnams kyis chu snyim pa gsum sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas thams cad phur bu las thal bar 'gyur ro/ /'dir phyag rgya yang 'byung ste/ mdzub mo 'dus byas god? mo sbyar/ /mthe bong rdo rje brten por sbyar/ /de ni dbral ba'i dbus bzhag
357b3(rgyud 'grel): nas bskor zhing bskor nas bskyod par bya/ /lho ru lus ni bltas byas nas/ /gcer bu sgra ni bshig gyur cing/ /drag cing khros pa'i sems ldan pas/ /thun gsum du ni gtor ma sbyin/ /yang rkad? pa'i phyogs? su lag pa g.yon pa'i dril bu dang
357b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bzhag la g.yas pas snyems tshal dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gsor zhing gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /yang na gung mo dang srin lag dag bkug nas de dag gi rtsa bar mthe bong bcug ste/ mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung dag lcags kyu'i rnam par bya zhing
357b5(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pa'i rgya tshigs rgyab tu lag pa g.yas pa'i rgya tshigs bzhag ste snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o/ /de lta bu de yang gtor ma'i phyag rgya yin no/ /thun mtshams thams cad du rgyu'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin du
357b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas sgrub ba'i grogs mchog gis oM a mri te hUM phaT ces ba'i sngags brjod pas sgrub pa pos bsrung ba byas thor tshugs bcing bar byas shing gcig gam/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ /sum mdo 'am/ /mtshan
357b7(rgyud 'grel): ma gcig pa 'am/ /chu bo dag tu gtor ma dong bar bya ba 'am/ bkres pa rnams la sbyin bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi rdul tshon chu ba'o la dbo? bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi ba'i lci bas byugs la bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab
358a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin ma klag par bya'o/ /bsod nams yongs su bsngos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas bskor ba byas te langs nas khyed kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang/ ngo mtshar gyi phyag rgyas btab la
358a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis spyod lam rnam bzhi'i sgo nas ji ltar 'dod pas gnas par bya'o/ /de ni bgegs rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o// //gdon dang phyogs skyong tshim bya'i phyir/ /dpung bzangs rgyud las ji skad
358a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /gtor ma'i las ni lung bzhin du/ de nas dang po rab bshad bya/ /re zhig dang por sngar bshad pa'i/ /bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa nye bar bsogs te/ cha gnyis su byas nas cha gcig la gdon rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad
358a4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di rnams brjod par bya'o/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang/ gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bdag cag pus mo sa la btsugs nas
358a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /thal sbyar khyed rnams la yang gsol 'debs na/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa rnams/ /gsan nas phan 'dogs slad du 'dir sbyong cig/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang/ dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yul kun gnas dang
358a6(rgyud 'grel): shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang/ grong khyer kun na gang dag gnas pa dang/ /chu bo kun dang chu bo'i dong rnams dang/ rin chen gnas na lhag par gang gnas dang/ rdzing dang mtsho dang lu ma lter ka dang/ khron pa dang ni ngam grog chu mig
358a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ grong dang phyugs dag dang ni nag tshal dang/ /khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang/ gang dag gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas/ /so nam khyim dang glang po'i khang rnams dang/ /gang dag rgyal po'i dkor khang gnas pa dang/ srang dang
358b1(rgyud 'grel): khyams dang grong dang 'dun sa dang/ /gang dag shing gcig drung dang lam chen gnas/ /dur khrod dang ni nags tshal che gnas dang/ /seng ge glang chen dred kyi gnas rnams dang/ /'jigs su rung ba'i dgon pa che gnas dang/ chu gling mchog dag tu ni gnas
358b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas dang/ gang dag 'brog dgon dur khrod gnas na gnas/ dga' zhing mgu nas dri dang me tog 'phreng/ /spos dang me tog mar me gus phul ba/ /'di dag snoms te so sor bzhes nas kyang/ /las 'di dag gi 'bras bu mchim par brjod/ /gdon
358b3(rgyud 'grel): la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de ltar bya ste /de nas cha gci la phyogs skyong rnams la mchod par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams brjod par bya'o/ /shar phyogs rdo rje can te lha tshogs bcas/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang
358b4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag/ chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang/ /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang/ lha rnams la lus sa'i klu dag dang/ ri'i lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus la/ /so so so sor gtor ma phul ba rnams/ /rang rang gi
358b5(rgyud 'grel): ni phyogs su bzhugs nas kyang/ /rang gi bu smad grogs dang g.yog 'khor bcas/ /dpung dang sde bcas mnyes nas bzhes su gsol/ /spos dang me tog gtor ma lha bshos ni/ /'di dag bzhes shing so sor sngo nas kyang/ /bya ba 'di ni 'bras bu mchis par mdzod//
358b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i don duAm/ dgos pa gzhan 'dod pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis sgrub par bya'o/ /gtor ma 'di la sngags rnams ni/ /kun tu 'byung ba med mos kyi/ /'on kyang tshigs bcad tsam gyis ni/ /'dir ni gdon sogs tshim
358b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /dka' thub mthu dang bden ba rnams/ /lhag par yang dag thob 'gyur ba/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bkang lung ni/ /'di ltar sngags dang mtshungs par brjod/ /slu ba med pa'i tshig gang yin/ /de ni gsang sngags nyid du 'dod/ /mu stegs kyi ni
359a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i sngags/ /de nyid phyir ni tshad ma min/ /de bas dngos grub thob rnams kyi/ /tshig gang de sngags nyid yin te/ /spyod lam bzhi po de dag ni/ /phyag rgya nyid du bshad pa yin/ /de bas gtor ma'i las 'di la/ /tshigs bcad
359a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags nyid du 'grub/ /de bas 'dir ni swAhA sogs/ /spel ba'i sngags ni dgos pa med/ /de ni gdon dang phyogs skyong rnams kyi gtor ma'i cho ga'o// //dkyil 'khor thams cad tshim bya'i phyir/ /dus kyi 'khor lo
359a3(rgyud 'grel): las gsungs pa/ /gtor ma'i las ni shin tu gsang/ /de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo rnams/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor rnams dang/ khro bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis/ /sum cu drug gi bar gsal bar/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/
359a4(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i sbyin pa sogs dbye bas/ /ting nge 'dzin ni gsum du 'dod/ /de'i tha mar rnal 'byor pas/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor tshim par bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo rab snying nas/ /sna'i bu ga g.yas dang g.yon/ /gnyis nas kun tu spro bya zhing/ /dkyil
359a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ni yang dag dgod/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs kyi mdza' / /bzhi po las kyang mkha' 'gro sogs/ /gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi las/ /rab tu gtum mo la sogs spro/ /khwa'i gdong can la sogs pa/ /thams cad za byed mkha' 'gro ma//
359a6(rgyud 'grel): rul pa'i dri ldan la sogs sgo/ /dur khrod rnams nas yang dag spro/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor nang du ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yid dkyil 'khor mchog /mthong nas mchod yon zhabs bsil sogs/ /sngar bzhin rnal 'byor so sor dbul//
359a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas sngar bzhin chu skyes sogs/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rnam par bsam/ /bdud rtsi lnga yang bsam par bya/ /rang gi sa bon byin brlabs shing/ /'od kyi tshogs ni rnam par 'phro/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du/ /de dag brtul zhugs chen pos
359b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /de las rnam par sbyang ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi tshig ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI badzra DA ki ya oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ yi ge oM gyis sbyang bar bya'o/ /yi ge hUM gis spar bar bya'o/ /yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yis bdud rtsir bya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pas
359b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyang bar bya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pas rtogs par bya'o/ /thal mo bkab nas spar bar bya'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgyas zla ba zhu ba'i rang bzhin du bdud rtsir bya'o/ /de nas g.yon pa'i srin lag gis dbus nas thig le blangs te sa la chos 'byung gru
359b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum bya zhing/ de'i nang du zlum po'i thig le'i gzugs can bya'o/ /de'i nang du me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsam zhing de tshim par bya'o/ /oM A hUM/ a A/ i a'i/ u a'u/ ri rI/ li lI/
359b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dang/ nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams rnams so/ /a A/ i a'i/ e i/ ar Ar/ o aau al Al/ oM A hUM zhes bya ba ni dbang po drug go/ ya yA/ ra rA/ wa wA/ la lA/ ha hA/ zhes bya ba
359b5(rgyud 'grel): ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sku can gyi khro bo bcu dang/ las kyi dbang po dang/ zhe sdang rdo rje la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can dag go/ ka kA kha khA ga gA g+ha g+hA da dA/ tsa tsA tsha tshA dza dzA dzha dzhA nya nyA/ Ta TA Tha ThA Da DA Dha Dha Na NA/ pa pA pha phA ba bA b+ha b+hA ma mA
359b6(rgyud 'grel): ta tA tha thA da dA d+ha d+hA na nA/ sha shA Sha ShA sa sA ha hA/ tsh+ya tsh+yA ha hA ya yA ra rA wa wA la lA k+Sha k+ShA zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rigs su sum cu rtsa drug tshim par bya ba'i cho ga'i sngags so/ /de ltar brjod nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i mkha' 
359b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma tshim par bya ba'i phyir srin lag dang mthe bong dag gis thig le phul te/ dkyil 'khor rang gi yan lag la bsdu par byas nas/ /rang gi kha mtshan ma gcig par bdud rtsi lnga'i thig le mkha' 'gro ma'i grangs dang mnyam pa sngags
360a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis gtor bar bya'o/ /oM sarba kro d+ha DA ka n+ya i maM pa lim pra tIts+tsha na tu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i don du yang sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ /oM di bya na ne sa mA d+hyi d+hya na pri Na ne swAhA
360a2(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo ma lus pa yongs su mnyes par gyur nas khams gsum pa yang de kho na bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas langs te ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol pa/ /dam tshig gi 'khor lo nang du bcug ste/ /
360a3(rgyud 'grel): smon lam btab la bsod nams yongs su bsngos te/ rang gi lha'i nga rgyal du dmigs la/ snang ba tsam gyis rang gi ngo bo sbyod lam rnams kyis gnas par bya'o/ /de ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag gi rim pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nams kyi
360a4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i cho ga'o// //gang gis lus ni rab rgyas shing/ /bde ba chen po thob 'gyur ba/ /yi dags tshim byed gtor ma ni/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /dang po chu ni drag blugs shing/ /chu bo nub bltas
360a5(rgyud 'grel): song nas ni/ /lag pa la sogs bkrus nas ni/ /gus pa yis ni bzlas par bya/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba blangs nas ni/ /mkhas pas brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /sngags ni yi ge drug pa ste/ dngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /oM dang ma Ni padme dang/
360a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi mdza' can sngags rgyal po/ /yi dags rnams kyi bkres skom sogs/ /nyon mongs gdung ba 'joms byed pa/ /'o ma'i 'tsho ltar dkar ba'i 'od/ /zhi ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ /zhal
360a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ mchog sbyin chu skyes dag gis mtshan/ /thugs rje'i rang gi shugs kyis ni/ /gdungs par 'gyur ba'i yid mnga' ba/ /mtsho skyes chen po'i ge sar gyi/ /lte ba'i dbus na yang dag bzhugs/ /skyil krung phyed
360b1(rgyud 'grel): par bzhugs gyur pa/ 'od dpag med pas dbu rgyan byas/ /zla pa'i 'od kyis brgyan gyur cing/ /'od kyi 'khor los rnam par brgyan/ /sdug bsngal gsum gyis sdug bsngal gyur/ /ma lus 'gro ba skyab brtson pa/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bdag nyid bsam//
360b2(rgyud 'grel): skrag 'gyur ri dags gzhon nu ma'i/ /g.yo ba'i mig ni zil gnon mdzad/ /yid 'ong lha mo sgrol ma ni/ /g.yas logs su ni bsgom par bya/ /g.yon du de bzhin ser por snang/ /phyag byed pa la yang dag brtson/ /zla ba phyed pa dang mtshungs pa'i//
360b3(rgyud 'grel): phral ba dang ldan khro gnyer can/ /de nas snying ga'i pad dbus su/ /yi ge hwi(rgyud 'grel): ni yang dag bsam/ /de'i 'od kyis 'gro ba kun/ /gsal bar byas nas rab tu dgang/ /'od zer mang po de nyid kyis/ /shin tu skem pa'i yi dags blta/ /rang gi skra dang ba spus
360b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yogs/ /gsus pa ri bo dag dang mtshungs/ /mgrin pa'i wa las byung ba yi/ /rnag ni 'thung bar kun du 'dod/ /rus pa snabs lud bkres pas nyen/ /rang gi mchu dang lkog ma rnams/ /de rnams bltas nas bsod ldan pas/ /snying rje chen po
360b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed byas nas/ /de rnams stong du bkrus byung ba'i/ /'od zer 'khor lo dbab par bya/ /de nas snying rje'i shugs kyis ni/ /lag pa dag las shin tu byung/ /'o ma'i rgyun gyis de dag ni/ /snying ma kha dang 'brel pa dgang/ /de nas lo ma 'bras
360b6(rgyud 'grel): ? ? dang?/ 'o ma dang ni ? gsum gyis/ /snod ni shin tu gang byas nas/ /de rnams 'di ltar bod par bya/ /oM a yan tu a ya ni tu ma ha pre ta sang g+ha shuSh+ka ma kan tho ShA pu ta/ k+Shad pi pA sA wa sh+rI kri ta d+hi ni tsit+ta i mi bi bi?
360b7(rgyud 'grel): grih+na? ta dzi gra tha/ pi ba tha/ b+huny+dza tha/ su kha wa tyaM raM ma tha/ pu na ra ku sha la d+hi ma ra tha swAhA/ sngags 'di yis ni yi dags kyi/ /rigs chen pos la de nas ni/ /gtor ma sbyin phyir sngags 'di ni/ /rnal 'byor pas ni gsal bar brjod/ /oM na mo b+ha
361a1(rgyud 'grel): ga ba te a ba ya b+hi ru ka te dzo rA dzA ya ta thA ga ta ya arha te samyaksaM bud+d+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM sarba ba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha saM b+ha ra/ hUM dzdza sarba pre ta ka la ni san tar ba ni swAhA/ de nyid kyi phyag rgya 'byung ste/ lag pa gnyis
361a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis thal mo ba cung zad phye ba byas la mdzub mo dag rna cha'i rnam par byas phyag rgya byas te/ yi dags kyi gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de nas chu bo de nyid 'o mar 'brug par bsams la/ de nyid du gtor ma de dor bar bya'o/ /yi dags de rnams kyang lus
361a3(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rgyas pa 'od zer gyi tshogs de nyid kyi steng du bteg la/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhin du pad+ma'i stan la nye bar gnas pa bsam gtan la dga' ba'i yid can du bsgom par bya'o/ /de ni yi dags kyi gtor
361a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// //bdag nyid skal bzang bsgrub pa dang/ rgyal po la sogs dbang bya'i phyir/ /dri za'i gtor ma bsgrub pa na/ /de nas gtor ma rab bshad bya/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya ste/ gla rtsi dang/ ga bur dang/ gzhi mnyam dang/ gur gum
361a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ tsan dan dang/ si la ra sa dang/ ba laM la sogs pa rnams kyis nye bar byug la/ dbus kyi gnas su a ka ru'i spos dud sna tshogs kyis dri bsung yid du 'ong ba/ /nor bu mthing shun rang bzhin can shin tu mtho ba/ /dngul dang/ byu ru
361a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gser las byas pa'i rtse mo gsum gyis nye bar mdzes pa'i gzugs kyis dri za'i rgyal po rnams rkang pa'i cha sna tshogs la sna tshogs rgyan ldan dang/ /sna tshogs mthu ldan la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal pos rnam par brgyan pa'i ri'i rgyal
361a7(rgyud 'grel): po spos kyi dang ldang rnam par bsgoms la/ de'i steng du sngar bshad pa'i dri za'i bdag po lus rdzas dri zhim po dag gis nye bar byugs pa dri zhim po'i tshogs kyis phyogs bcur gtogs pa'i khong gang bar byas la/ /lus lha'i me tog sna tshogs
361b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa/ dri za'i bu mo nu ma'i ljid kyis skyibs dgu pa la 'khyud pa las byung ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa/ sa 'dzin pa la sogs pa glu'i bye brag glu yongs su len pa'i sgra snyan pas lkog ma khyab pa dag rnam par bsgoms te/ dkyil
361b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi 'gram du gtor ma'i snod chu dri zhim po dang/ /zho dang 'bras yos dang/ sman thams cad dang/ yungs kar dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ tsan dan dmar po dang/ gla rtsi dang tsan dan dang/ gur kum dang/ spang spos dang/ dwa tshwa dang/ a
361b3(rgyud 'grel): ka ru la sogs pa'i dri zhim po rnams kyis yongs su bkang la/ /snod gzhan yang zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar sar dang/ sha kha ra dang/ bu ram dang/ 'bras can dag gis gang bar bya ste/ de rnams bod pa'i don du sngags 'di gsum brjod par bya'o/ /oM gand+ha ?
361b4(rgyud 'grel): sarba a d+hi pa ta ye/ pi tsa tri ang ga d+ha d+ha ye/ ma ma ka tya sid+d+ha ye/ i hA a yan du/ sa sa ma yaM pa la yan+tu/ b+ha ga bang badzra d+ha ra shA sa ne tiShthan+tu/ a tra sa na ni ho ta b+ha wan+tu swAhA/ dri rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas gtor ma'i snod yongs su brgyas btab
361b5(rgyud 'grel): ste sngags brjod par bya'o/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+ha ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NI AdyA nud pan+na? twat oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas gtor ma'i snod ri'i rtsa ru dor bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas btab
361b6(rgyud 'grel): ste rnal 'byor pas gnas par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po la sogs pa rnams 'dis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de ni dri za'i gtor ma'o// //zhing ni bsrung bar byed pa dag /thams cad kyis ni rab mnyes 'gyur/ /zhing spyad gtor ma'i
361b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa/ dngos grub don du gang du gnas/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi gsungs par gyur/ /de la 'di rnams ni zhing rnams kyi brda'i ming yin te//
362a1(rgyud 'grel): pu dza o a go ra de ma/ ka o tri ko /ka la ka hi pri gri so su nA si ma ku/ pu li ra ma ya dang/ dza lan d+ha ra dang/ oM Di ya na dang oM? rbu ta rnams ni gnas dag yin no/ /go nga wa ri dang/ rA me shwa ra dang/ di bi ko Ti dang/ mA lA ba rnams
362a2(rgyud 'grel): ni nye ba'i gnas so/ /kA ma ru pa dang/ o De dag ni zhing ngo/ /tri sha ku ne dang/ ko sa la dag ni nye ba'i zhing ngo/ /ka liM ka /lam ba ga dag ni ts+tshan do ha'o/ /kany+tsi dang/ hi ma la ya dag ni nye ba'i ts+tshan do ha'o/ /pre ta pu ri dang/ gri ha de pa ta dag ni
362a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'o/ /sau raSh+Ta dang/ su war+N+Na dwI pa dag ni nye ba'i 'dus pa'o/ /na ga ra dang/ sin d+hu sha dag ni dur khrod do/ /ma ru dang/ ku lu ta dag ni nye ba'i dur khrod do/ /zhing de rnams kyi bdag po dag ni ming rnams brjod par bya ste/ /rgas pa med dang
362a4(rgyud 'grel): chur 'gyur dang/ de bzhin i dang rkun po dang/ zla ba'i gzugs can dug gong dang/ drod za dang ni drag po 'joms/ /lus med byug pa'i lus can dang/ rol pas 'don byed mche ba can/ /sa srung dang ni rlabs can dang/ /de bzhin du ni smad
362a5(rgyud 'grel): 'joms dang/ /mdza' yas dang ni nyon mongs sems/ /a mra len dang mi bzad gdong/ /ba lang gdong can dril bu'i 'od/ /za byed gtum po dang ldan dang/ ral pas 'gying pa zhing srung rnams/ /go rims bzhin du shes par bya/ /spyan ser dgu
362a6(rgyud 'grel): sgra gyen du brdzes/ /mche gtsigs pa yi zhal mnga' dang/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /phyag na thod pa kha TwAM ga /nags dang 'brog dang grong so so/ /ri dang tshang tshing chu 'gram dang/ chu bo rdzing 'gram dag dang ni/ /khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang/
362a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyen ba tshong 'dus yul 'khor dang/ grong khyer shing drung dag dang ni/ /dur khrod dang ni tshang tshing khyim/ /smad 'tshong khyim dang mun khung dang/ gnas gzhan dag tu de dag ni/ /gnas bcas nas ni rtag tu gnas/ /hUM gis sa bon las byung ba//
362b1(rgyud 'grel): nang gi yig gsum byin gyis brlabs/ /rnal 'byor pas ni mdun gnas par/ /'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /chang dang sha dang 'bru'i chang/ /'bras kyi rgyal po'i chan gyis dgang/ /snod ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag /blangs nas gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /dril bu'i
362b2(rgyud 'grel): sgra bcas spos phul nas/ /rnal 'byor rig pas spyan drang bya/ /de nas spyan drang don du na/ /de yis sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /oM a An+tu/ oM a yan tu/ k+She tra a d+hi pa ta ye/ mA ma shAn ti puSh+Ti wa sh+yas di d+hi sA d+hA na ya/ na mo g+ha naM na shtsa Dha
362b3(rgyud 'grel): na pa te sa pa ri wA ri sa rak+ShA raM s+than+na hi ta i ha b+ha ban+tu swAhA/ /de nas bos te dri'i chus/ /zhal bsil mchod yon dag phul nas/ /sngags 'di gsang sngags rig pa yis/ /de rnams la ni gtor ma dbul/ oM hIM(rgyud 'grel): hUM a mu ka a ba ta
362b4(rgyud 'grel): rak+She tra pA la/ mahA ba la ka li la dza ti la ma hA ba la b+ha su ra tri ni tra dzwa la mu/ ga gand+ha d+hu pa ba li pu dza gri h+na gri h+na/ b+hai ra ba rU be ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru tu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ kha kha khA khA la la la/ he he ha ha/ mahA d+ha ma ra a ti pa ta ye
362b5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes bya ba brjod la/ /dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i rgyud las bshad pa'i mkha' 'gro phyag rgyas btab ste/ shing gcig gi drung du gtor ma dor bar bya'o/ /de ltar byas na rnal 'byor pas/ /gang gis sems can dag gi don/ /rgyun
362b6(rgyud 'grel): mi 'chad par byed pa'i las/ /zhi ba la sogs de 'grub 'gyur/ /gal te thun ni gsum mam bzhir/ /rnal 'byor pas ni gtor ma sbyin/ /des na de la zhing srung rnams/ /rtag tu srung bar byed par 'gyur/ /dgra bo dang ni rgyal po dang/ /seng ge
362b7(rgyud 'grel): stag la sogs pa dang/ /gzhan yang gsod byed rigs can dang/ rkun ma'ang de la gnod mi byed/ /langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ /nyal lam 'gro bar 'gyur kyang rung/ /spyod lam thams cad dang ldan pa/ /de la de rnams srung bar byed//
363a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag la/ gang zhig myur du skyob 'dod pa/ /de yis zhing srung gtor ma ni/ /gus pa yis ni rtag tu bya/ /de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi man ngag gi sgo nas dpal bde mchog gi zhing gi bdag
363a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o// //gang gis rims sogs rnal 'byor pas/ /skad cig gis ni rab zhi byed/ /sha za'i gtor ma'i sgrub pa ni/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /dang por ting 'dzin las langs te/ /'jigs
363a3(rgyud 'grel): rung dur khrod song nas ni/ /dogs pa med pa'i yid kyis ni/ /de ru dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dur khrod kyi ni so phag tshogs/ /lag pas brdungs te khyer byas nas/ /tshon rtsi kha dog lnga pa dag /de ni rnal 'byor rig pas bya/ /de ni
363a4(rgyud 'grel): bde mchog dkyil 'khor ni/ /go rims bzhin du legs bris nas/ /me tog ka ra bi ra sogs go ku da ha na rnams dang/ bdud rtsi yi ni rdzas dag dang/ bza' btung de bzhin shes rab dang/ /snyoms 'jug mchod pas sgrub pa pos/ /gtso bo
363a5(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka mchod bya/ /ji srid dkyil 'khor las 'od zer/ /kha dog sngon po rnam byung ba/ /de srid rkang pa brgyan pa'i sngags/ /mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor ba yis bzla/ /de mthong yid ches shes byas nas/ /sha za'i gtor ma brtsam
363a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /chang gi btung ba dang ldan khrag /nya sha rlon pa dag dang ni/ /bsregs dang bcos pa'i bye brag dang/ /dri zhim me tog dmar po dang/ /khab dang ras ni sngon po dang/ zangs dang mkhar ba las byas dang/ /lcags kyi phye ma dag dang ni/ /'bru
363a7(rgyud 'grel): sna'i chan gyis yongs gang ba/ byas nas spos dang me tog sogs/ /byin te bod pa yang dag brtsam/ /khro bo'i sems ldan thub dka' ba/ /dogs med yid kyis sngags pa yis/ /dur khrod gnas pa'i shing gcig la/ /'jogs nas
363b1(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo la gnas pa/ /gcer bu skra bshig gyur pa yis/ /dpa' bo drug gi go cha dgod/ /Ta dang ma las yang dag byung/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma dag /mig la bsams nas gnod mdzes ni/ /rgyal po phyogs dag bcing bar bya/ /oM a ra li ho dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): badzra
363b2(rgyud 'grel): DA ki n+ya sa ma ya stwaM dri sh+ya ho/ /de nas sha za blo ldan gyis/ /'di yis bong pa byas nas su/ /brtse ba'i bdag nyid khro tshig gis/ /tshigs bcad 'di ni brjod par bya/ /sha za 'am de'i yid 'ong ba/ /'dir ni mi bzad su zhig gnas/ /ming ni 'di zhes bya ba
363b3(rgyud 'grel): des/ /kye lus gtor mar sbyin par bya/ /nga'i lus las sha khrag sogs/ /bza' ba dang ni btung bar gyis/ /tshigs dang rkang dang glang pa dang/ /de bzhin khams ni bdun po dag /'ongs te nga las blangs nas ni/ /ci bde bar ni gnas par gyis/ /rnal 'byor
363b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni de'i tshig /de skad mtshan phyed nas thos nas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i yid ldan pa/ /sha za kun kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /gus pas sha ni bza' ba'i phyir/ /byin cig ces ni nges par smra/ de nas de yi tshig thos te/ 'di ni khyer cig ces brjod bya//
363b5(rgyud 'grel): gal te nus yod pa'i lus las/ /khrag la sogs pa dag khyer cig /de nas he ru ka'i gzugs su mthong nas/ /de dag 'jigs par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa'i rang la gnas/ /gtor ma blangs te 'gro bar byed/ /de la gtor ma'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM
363b6(rgyud 'grel): pi tsi pi tsi pi sma shA na wa si b+hyo/ mahA pi shI tsa b+hyo(rgyud 'grel): i maM ba liM gri h+na tu/ b+hu dza tha/ bi ba tha/ ya the ShA da ma me pra yats+tshan tu swAhA/ de nas rab tu gsang bar bya/ /tshig brgyad pa'i sngags brjod cing/ /de ni shing rtse nas babs te/ ye shes 'khor lo
363b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /rims la sogs pa'i nad zhig /de nas de yi rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa ni ji ltar 'dod/ /las byed 'gyur 'dir the tshom med/ /de nas rang gi gnas phyin te/ /chu'i gtor ma gtang bar bya/ /de yis sngar bshad rim pa
364a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin snyim pa gsum ni sbyin par bya/ /de ni rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi man ngag gi cho ga'o// //rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /btus nas dug ni zhi bya'i phyir/ /mkha' lding gtor ma bya
364a2(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /pha rol chu rol med pa'i mchog /'o ma'i rgya mtsho zab mo ni/ /chu srin 'dzin kri kun tu khyab/ /g.yo zhing nam mkha' i gtos reg pa/ /rlabs kyis chu ni kun tu 'khrugs/ /'o ma mu tig kun da mtshungs
364a3(rgyud 'grel): chu ni dkar po mkha' gsal ba/ /yi ge sam las byung bar bsam/ /de'i dbus gnas yi ge tAM/ /shin tu dkar po bsam par bya/ /de las yongs su grub pa'i gru/ /gser gyi rgyan ni sna tshogs pas/ /phyogs bzhi nas ni rnam spras pa'aM//
364a4(rgyud 'grel): ka ba dag gis brgyan pa bsam/ /de'i steng paM las byung ba yi/ /pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad pa/ /lte ba ge sar dang bcas shing/ /'od kyi tshogs kyi rab 'bar bsam/ /yaM sogs sa bon las byung ba/ /rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
364a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ /de'i steng du phyogs su ni/ /go rims bzhin du bsam par bya/ /sngar bzhin bdud rtsi zhes bya ba/ /spro dang bsdu pa'i rim pa yis/ /mkha' lding bdag po skyed byed pa/ /sa bon de'i steng du dgong/ /de nas de ni gyur pa las/ /mkha' lding bdag
364a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya/ /gdong cig lag pa bzhi pa ste/ /kha dog dkar po 'od chen ldan/ /gser gyi gshog pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /nor bu bai DUrya'i mchu/ /rkang sder gyu ru las byung ba/ /shel ltar dkar ba'i gdong dang ldan/ /rkeng lte bar du
364a7(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsis gang/ /bum pa lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ /phyag byed pa la rab tu brtson/ /mig sogs la ni gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum la tshigs gsum dgod/ /bskyed nas de'i yan lag gi /tshigs rnams la ni hUM dgod bya//
364b1(rgyud 'grel): rig byed yi ge dang po ni/ de'i spyi bor bsam par bya/ /snying ga'i yi ge hUM byung ba'i/ /'od zer mang po tshogs kyis ni/ /mkha' lding dbang phyug 'khor rnams ni/ /rang gi rnam pa can nyid spro/ /de nas mkha' lding dbang phyug gi /dkyil 'khor rdzogs
364b2(rgyud 'grel): par bltas nas ni/ /dri zhim chu yis de nyid la/ /mchod yon byin nas de bzhin yod/ /dug 'joms pa la brtson ldan pa'i/ /phyag rgya 'bar ba bcing bar bya/ /oM pa she swAhA/ snying ga'o/ /oM khri ba swAhA/ mgo bo'o/ /oM sa kI pa swAhA/ gtsug
364b3(rgyud 'grel): phung ngo/ /oM ha k+Shi pa swAhA/ cho ga'o/ /ha sak+Shi pa oM mtshon cha'o/ /yang oM ba k+She swAhA/ lte ba'o/ /de ni yan lag drug la go cha dgong pa'o/ /de bzhin du bod pa'i phyag rgya 'byung ste/ lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo bsgreng ste/ mdzub mo dang srin lag
364b4(rgyud 'grel): cung zad bkug nas mthe'u chung dang mthe bong dag dgug par bya'o/ /de ni nam mkha' lding bong pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): pak+Shi rA dzA ya A gats+tsha sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nI mA khaM band+ha ku ru mahA kA la kU Ta pi sh+ra pa ha ri ni shI g+h+raM sa ma yaSh+Ta sbruM sbruM sbruM/ sa sa sa hUM hUM
364b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ nam mkha' ldang bod pa'i sngags so/ /de nas mdun du ba lang dang ma he la sogs pa'i kha na ma tho ba med pa'i srog chags kyi rigs rnams kyi 'o mas snod yongs su bkang ste/ gang+gA'i chu dang yang bsres nas de bzhin
364b6(rgyud 'grel): du snod gnyis pa'o/ /thugs yongs su gang bar byas la sngags 'dis byin brlabs bya'o/ /sarba ta thA ga ta mi bai dya sa ma ya mu tra sa pa ra Na sh+rI ye hUM/ de nas spos dang me tog dang/ mar me dang/ dri dang/ lta bu shos rnams/ dzA ti pa la dang/ gla gor
364b7(rgyud 'grel): zho sha la sogs pa rnams kyis gtor ma la mchod de rtse gsum pa'i nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgyas mngon par btang la yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas te gtor ma'i sngags brjod par bya'o/ /oM na mo b+ha ga tyai Arya pa ra ma a sh+ya 
365a1(rgyud 'grel): ya/ /ta thA ga tA ya arha te samyaksaM bud+d+ha ya/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ oM gri h+Na gri h+Na puShpa d+hU pa ba liM i maM sarba u pa tsa ra saM pan+naM/ kha g+hA d+hi pa te/ kha kha khA hi khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes brjod
365a2(rgyud 'grel): la snying gar pad+ma bskor ba la lan lnga byas te/ rdo rje dang dril bu dkrol ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi snying po 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ rta'i rgyal po nga rgyal dang ldan pas gtor ma dor ba bya ste/ pad+ma'i mtsho 'gram mam/

365b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /cho ga yis ni rim bzhin du/ gsal bar de nas yang dag bshad/ /gtor ma'i las ni thams cad la/ /bsgom pa'i stobs kyis 'byung po rnams/ //bskyed nas mgu bar bya zhes grags/ /rnal 'byor pas 'dir de bzhin min/ /

365b7(rgyud 'grel): gam ni dur khrod nas/ /chu yi 'gram dang ri bo ru/ /bya ba dag ni thams cad bsgrub/ /de bzhin ro langs bslang ba ni/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /bsgegs nas shi ba gang yin pa/ /gdol pa 'am ni g.yung mo 'ang rung/ /sdug
366a1(rgyud 'grel): cing mdzes la rma med pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis so dang ldan/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lon/ /yang na btsa' ba' i dus su ni/ /shi ba'i bud med bslang bar bya/ /sngags dang sman dang ldan pa yi/ /chu mdog dag gis khrus bya zhing//
366a2(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan dkar po gla rtsi yis/ /de la rnam par byug par bya/ /spos dang me tog dag gis mchod/ /gtor ma sna tshogs sbyin par bya/ /til mar chen pos byug nas ni/ /yungs kar gyis ni gdong la brdeg /sgrub pa pos ni he ru ka/ zhes
